items.name: Stone Amulet
items.description: A basic amulet given to all orc children.

items.name: Warm Amulet
items.description: Obviously magical - it radiates heat.

items.name: Familial Amulet
items.description: An amulet of warding constructed by our community's sage.

items.name: Bone Breaker Amulet
items.description: My father's amulet; worn in battle dozens, perhaps hundreds of time.

items.name: Cloth Belt
items.description: A simple belt; better to wear this than to have your pants fall down.

items.name: Soft Belt
items.description: Softness isn't often a quality I admire, but I make an exception for this belt.

items.name: Ornate Belt
items.description: A wizard's belt, but still useful to a warrior such as myself.

items.name: Artisan Belt of the Way Finder
items.description: This belt belonged to my mother; it saw her safely through countless dangers.

items.name: Torn History Book
items.description: So much is missing; someone who learns history from this book is bound to repeat it.

items.name: Faded History Book
items.description: There are important lessons in all of our pasts.

items.name: Detailed History Book
items.description: A detailed history of half-orc culture, written by myself.

items.name: Tome of Orcish History
items.description: A detailed encyclopedia of orcs and their customs - my mother's life's work.

items.name: Cracked Warhammer
items.description: It cracked when I hit a Stone Golem so hard that it shattered.

items.name: Solid Warhammer
items.description: Heavy to carry around, but worth it in battle.

items.name: Spiked Warhammer
items.description: A warrior needs every advantage to catch his enemy off guard.

items.name: Unity
items.description: My bonded warhammer has served me well throughout the years.

items.name: Pilling Scarf
items.description: I should probably get this replaced.

items.name: Hand-knit Scarf
items.description: Yes, I knit. What's your problem with that?

items.name: Wizard's Scarf
items.description: A fine scarf, though not very warrior-ly.

items.name: Flowing Scarf of the Eldritch Knight
items.description: A memento from my time training as an Eldritch Knight.

items.name: Weak Pauldron
items.description: Adequate for a child perhaps, but I hope to find a new pair soon enough.

items.name: Tough Pauldron
items.description: Hardened leather can surprisingly deflect even strong and sharp attacks.

items.name: Spiked Pauldron
items.description: A good shoulder charge never hurt anyone; perhaps just my enemies.

items.name: Strong Iron Pauldron of the Charging Orc
items.description: If magic fails me, these pauldrons will see me through.

data.backstory: Extremely elderly for a Tortle, Gromma Nander grew discontent with her secluded life after giving birth to her offspring. Once they were old enough to fend for themselves, she ventured back out into the world to learn as much as she could about the strange creatures that inhabit it. Gromma is a wise and inquisitive Tortle who is quick to friendship but slow to trust. She carries a pouch of smooth colored stones that she has collected on her journey and walks with the aid of a battle-worn spear.
data.name: Gromma

base.name: Slow and Steady
base.description: Gromma Nander, moving faster than you would expect for an 80 year old Tortle, stabs the closest enemy with her spear.

base.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
base.description: Gromma attacks the nearest target, dealing BUD-based area damage in a small radius.

ult.name: Wall Of Stone
ult.description: Gromma summons a wall of stone, knocking enemies back and blocking their movement.
ult.long_description: A wall of stone bursts up out of the ground under a random enemy. The targeted enemy and any enemies in the column that the wall appears in take damage and are knocked backwards. The wall lasts for 15 seconds, and for that time enemies cannot pass it.

abilities.name: Grandmotherly Love
abilities.desc: Gromma increases the damage of all other heroes proportional to their age. The buff starts applying to each Champion at 100%, and for every 10 years younger than 100 that Champion is, the buff on them is increased by 100%, stacking multiplicatively.

data.backstory: Dhadius is a mage of legendary status and acclaim (at least, in his own mind), who sees everyone else as intellectual worms. Being an egomaniac, he seeks out esoteric lore and rare magical secrets so he may know things that the 'common fools' do not. Dhadius hails from Luskan in the north, where he is a member of the Arcane Brotherhood, an infamous group of wizards. He joined them only recently and hasn't been taken as seriously by the others as he thinks he should be. He's determined to let it be known far and wide that he is a wizard to be respected and feared.

data.backstory: Despite his increasing fame (or infamy) across the Sword Coast North as a drow who dwells on the surface, is deadly in battle, fights with great agility and two enchanted scimitars, and can call on an onyx panther figurine of wondrous power to bring a battle companion to his side, Drizzt Do'Urden remains an enigma. Thoughtful and sensitive to others, Drizzt holds himself to the highest ideals but does not expect the same of others. Ever alert for treachery and danger, he speaks little but is apt to be polite (if terse) in his dealings. A perfectionist who yearns to be accepted into places and groups and to make friends widely, Drizzt is haunted by the danger he brings to those he befriends thanks to the scrutiny of Lolth and his other foes (notably the demon Errtu and the human Artemis Entreri). Those he meets see his manner as grim.
data.name: Drizzt

data.backstory: A proud daughter of Clan Undurr and a devout follower of Gorm Gulthyn, the dwarven god of vigilance and duty. She spent fifteen years in the city of Ironmaster, in Icewind Dale, overseeing and protecting her family's investment in the city's lucrative mining operations. However, she saw little action and feared that her talents were being squandered. She has recently found a home within a budding organization called the Order of the Gauntlet, which vigilantly guards against the rise of evil in all its forms.

base.description: Barrowin smashes the nearest enemy with her mighty warhammer.

data.backstory: As a poor urchin on the streets of Calimport, Regis quickly learned that survival often requires bending the rules in your favor. He fled to the north to avoid capture after stealing his former master's magical ruby pendant. Eventually, he found companionship amongst the Companions of the Hall, becoming one of Bruenor Battlehammer's most trusted confidants. Bruenor was the one who gifted Regis with the nickname 'Rumblebelly' due to the halfling's insatiable appetite. Regis would prefer nothing more than to relax in the sun with a full belly near his home in Ten-Towns and fish for knucklehead trout, the source of all of his scrimshaw carvings. But when his friends need help, Regis is always there for them. He never sees himself as the hero, even though his true friends know better.

data.backstory: Birdsong, a cunning young Tabaxi bard, learned to defend herself while enslaved by the Yuan-ti. Proficient in playing the lute, Birdsong discovered her potential as a bard when witnessing the effect her songs had on other slaves. After her escape, she became one of the greatest minstrels of Chult. She promised herself to, one day, get revenge on the Yuan-ti who destroyed her village.
data.name: Birdsong

data.backstory: Zorbu grew up in a small village on the slopes of the mountains south of Yartar. He lived a typical gnomish childhood: tinkering with mechanical toys, pulling pranks on unsuspecting neighbors, and exploring the woodlands covering the mountains in the company of a local dwarf ranger, Galor Rockshield. One night an army of Lolth's followers descended upon the village in force. Galor saved Zorbu's life, but many others were killed, including Zorbu's parents. From that day forth, Zorbu trained under Galor as a ranger, vowing to prevent another such tragedy from occurring. Cunning and imaginative, Zorbu makes use of his tinkering skills to wield an impossibly large crossbow called Thunderbolt.

abilities.name: Know Your Enemy
abilities.desc: Humanoids, beasts, undead, and aberrations are Zorbu's Favored Foes. He tracks the number of each type that he has killed and gains a 0.01% damage bonus against that type for each kill, stacking additively. If an enemy has multiple types, they count for each type and the damage bonuses stack multiplicatively. These bonuses persist through resets.

raw.tip_text: Zorbu tracks the number of certain types of enemies that he kills and increases his own damage based on that.

description.desc: Humanoids, beasts, undead, and aberrations are Zorbu's Favored Foes. He tracks the number of each type that he has killed and gains a $(amount)% damage bonus against that type for each kill, stacking additively. If an enemy has multiple types, they count for each type and the damage bonuses stack multiplicatively. These bonuses persist through resets.

data.backstory: The sorcerer known as Strix hails from Sigil, the City of Doors at the center of the multiverse. Very little is known of Strix's heritage, even to herself, but it was recently discovered that she was a powerful member of the Skizziks family, who long ago made a pact with Asmodeus, ruler of the Nine Hells, to become Tieflings. Strix is careful, suspicious, and paranoid. She assumes the worst in everyone and is always ready to run away or hide. She lacks basic manners and maintains poor personal hygiene, exemplified by the collection of filthy oddities she hoards within her robes. As a child, Strix witnessed a shadowy creature slaughter her friends at the bakery where she worked, but was spared for unknown reasons. Her survivor's guilt drives her to try and help those in need, no matter the personal cost.

normal.desc: We're friends? Are you moving into my trash pile?

normal.name: Giant Stench
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strix's Aura of Unclean ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Do you smell burning trash? Yeah? Okay, good.

data.backstory: Having watched your party's progress for many years from Limbo, the Great Githzera, Zaerith Menyar-Ag-Gith, has dispatched Nrakk to join your party on the Material Plane. Though his true motivations are unknown, Nrakk is a masterful Kensai monk whose kensei weapon Naginata is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Reserved and aloof, Nrakk sometimes has a hard time interacting with those he sees as his lessers, but he nevertheless seems committed to the party's cause.
data.name: Nrakk

base.name: Naginata
base.description: Nrakk attacks the nearest enemy with his Kensei Weapon.

ult.name: Ki Blast
ult.description: Nrakk blasts a random enemy and gains Ki Points
ult.long_description: Nrakk blasts a random enemy and gains Ki Points. Reactivate when the blue ring fills to the orange area to blast another enemy and gain additional Ki Points.

abilities.name: Way of the Kensei
abilities.desc: Nrakk increases the damage of all Champions in the columns in front of and behind him by 100%.

raw.name: Way of the Kensei
raw.tip_text: Nrakk increases the damage of some Champions near him. Place your damage deals in the column in front of or behind him to make use of this!

description.desc: Nrakk increases the damage of all Champions in the columns in front of and behind him by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Ki Blast
abilities.desc: Unlocks Nrakk's Ki Blast Ultimate Attack.

description.desc: Unlocks Nrakk's Ki Blast Ultimate Attack

abilities.name: Ki Master
abilities.desc: Based on the maximum number of Ki Points Nrakk has had at one time during this adventure, Way of the Kensei is increased by 100% for each of those Ki Points, stacking multiplicatively. Nrakk can have at most 60 Ki Points at once.

description.desc: Based on the maximum number of Ki Points Nrakk has had at one time during this adventure, Way of the Kensei is increased by $(amount)% for each of those Ki Points, stacking multiplicatively. Nrakk can have at most 60 Ki Points at once.

abilities.name: Stunning Strike
abilities.desc: When Nrakk has at least 1 Ki Point before he attacks, consume 1 Ki Point and stun all enemies Nrakk hits for 3 seconds. Affected enemies take 50% more damage for each Ki Point Nrakk currently has, stacking multiplicatively. This debuff does not stack and lasts until the affected enemy is killed or Nrakk has no Ki Points remaining.

raw.name: Stunning Strike
raw.tip_text: Nrakk gains Ki Points from his ultimate ability and uses them to greatly impact his contributions to the formation.

description.desc: When Nrakk has at least 1 Ki Point before he attacks, consume 1 Ki Point and stun all enemies Nrakk hits for $(stun_time) seconds. Affected enemies take $(not_buffed amount)% more damage for each Ki Point Nrakk currently has, stacking multiplicatively. This debuff does not stack and lasts until the affected enemy is killed or Nrakk has no Ki Points remaining.

abilities.name: Kensei Cleave
abilities.desc: Every third attack, Nrakk cleaves multiple enemies dealing damage in an area.

description.desc: Every third attack, Nrakk cleaves multiple enemies dealing damage in an area.

abilities.name: Perfect Self
abilities.desc: While Nrakk has no Ki Points he reduces his ultimate cooldown by 1 second each time he attacks, and an additional 4 seconds each time he hits a boss creature.

description.desc: While Nrakk has no Ki Points he reduces his ultimate cooldown by $(cooldown_reduction) second each time he attacks, and an additional $(cooldown_reduction_boss) seconds each time he hits a boss creature.

conditions.desc: ^^$nrakk_current_ki_points

specs.name: Githzerai Focus
specs.desc: Increases the potency of most Positional Formation Abilities of adjacent Champions with a Wisdom (WIS) score of 14 or higher by 50%.

raw.name: Githzerai Focus
raw.specialization_description: Nrakk advises adjacent Champions with high Wisdom in order to make their positional formation abilities more effective.

description.desc: Increases the potency of most Positional Formation Abilities of adjacent Champions with a Wisdom (WIS) score of 14 or higher by $(amount)%.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the potency of $target's Positional Formation Abilities by $amount%

specs.name: Githzerai Agility
specs.desc: Increases the potency of most Positional Formation Abilities of adjacent Champions with a Dexterity (DEX) score of 16 or higher by 50%.

raw.name: Githzerai Agility
raw.specialization_description: Nrakk trains adjacent Champions with high Dexterity to make their positional formation abilities more effective.

description.desc: Increases the potency of most Positional Formation Abilities of adjacent Champions with a Dexterity (DEX) score of 16 or higher by $(amount)%.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the potency of $target's Positional Formation Abilities by $amount%

items.name: Dull Naginata
items.description: Still functions as a passable stave. I will need to get this sharpened.

items.name: Steel Naginata
items.description: A decent enough material, for your type at least.

items.name: Silver Naginata
items.description: Aha! Gith silver is unparallelled in battle. For Zaerith!

items.name: Kensei Naginata of Illithid Slaying
items.description: The force of this Naginata disrupts the Illithid's psionic field.

items.name: Woven Bracers
items.description: They are quite comfortable, unlike your Material Plane.

items.name: Dyed Wool Bracers
items.description: Your world is cold and unpleasant, but I will adapt.

items.name: Fine Bracers
items.description: I would prefer a Limbo-crafted pair, but these will do.

items.name: Chaotic Bracers of the Githzerai
items.description: Crafted by Githzerai artificers out of Limbo chaos-stuff.

items.name: Sealed Jug
items.description: Well that's not much use to me now, is it?

items.name: Empty Jug
items.description: Almost as useless as a sealed jug, but at least I can fill it.

items.name: Alchemy Jug
items.description: A wonderous device. Would you like 2 gallons of mayonnaise?

items.name: Overflowing Alchemy Jug
items.description: Useful for long journeys through the Material Plane, such as the one I'm on.

items.name: Ruby Amulet
items.description: A trinket. A toy. Not of much use, to be honest.

items.name: Bloodstone Amulet
items.description: A precious gem for you, perhaps, but easily come by in Limbo.

items.name: Calming Amulet
items.description: Only when one is calm can one access Ki.

items.name: Planar Amulet of Homecoming
items.description: The swirling reminds me of Limbo.

items.name: Short Scarf
items.description: A simple accessory, but comforting in this strange place.

items.name: Heavy Scarf
items.description: Keeps me warm during cold Material Plane nights.

items.name: Embroidered Scarf
items.description: Flits and flutters behind me in battle.

items.name: Scarf of Fluid Motion
items.description: When my Ki is centered, the scarf barely flutters at all.

items.name: Depleted Ioun Stone
items.description: Perhaps it once held some small magic.

items.name: Dim Ioun Stone
items.description: Its magic barely strong enough to detect, let alone make use of.

items.name: Ioun Stone of Awareness
items.description: I can't be surprised when this stone's magic is active.

items.name: Pulsing Ioun Stone of Wisdom
items.description: Wisdom isn't something the Githzerai lack, but this takes it to a new level.

normal.name: Timed Practice
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Way of the Kensei ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I'll give the signal -- just as we practiced.

normal.name: Formation Tactics
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Way of the Kensei ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I can't say I've trained ten people for one attack before...

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I was sent here to assist, and assist I shall.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Together we shall defeat the illithid threat once and for all!

normal.name: Keen Mind
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Nrakk by 1.
normal.desc: I am smarter than even your most brilliant material plane citizen.

normal.name: Chosen of Gith
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Githzerai Focus and Githzerai Agility by 40%.
normal.desc: In Gith's name, you will meet your end.

normal.name: Centered
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Ki Master ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: There is no solution through rage.

normal.name: Entertainer
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Nrakk by 2.
normal.desc: Some have called my battle meditations... calming to watch.

normal.name: Illithid Tadpole
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%. Additively increases Ceremorphosis Stacks by 1.
normal.desc: They said it would be fine...

normal.name: Guarded Stance
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Stunning Strike ability by 20%.
normal.desc: A perfect strike is nothing without a perfect defense.

normal.name: Feinting Stance
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Stunning Strike ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Never let your opponent know your next move.

normal.name: Heightened Focus
normal.effect: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% and Nrakk's ultimate now hits once and sets his Ki Points to 15 without any mini-game.
normal.desc: The churning chaos of Limbo has sharpened my will.
effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by $amount% and Nrakk's ultimate now hits once and sets his Ki Points to 15 without any mini-game

normal.name: Perfect Focus
normal.effect: Increases the damage of all Champions by 200% and Nrakk's ultimate now hits once and sets his Ki Points to 30 without any mini-game.
normal.desc: I am one with the multiverse.
effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by $amount% and Nrakk's ultimate now hits once and sets his Ki Points to 30 without any mini-game

normal.name: Enlightened
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nrakk's Githzerai Focus and Githzerai Agility by 80%.
normal.desc: Mind, heart, body, and soul in perfect balance, as all things should be.

data.backstory: Catti-brie is a kind, tolerant, and pragmatic warrior. She has spent much of her life adventuring with the legendary Companions of the Hall, accompanying Drizzt Do'Urden, Bruenor Battlehammer, Regis, and Wulfgar on numerous escapades. As the moral compass of the group, Catti-brie helps guide her companions to wise actions through common sense and clear insight. She wields the legendary bow Taulmaril, which shoots silver arrows.
data.name: Catti-brie

base.name: Long Shot
base.description: Catti-brie shoots the farthest enemy with her bow

base.name: Long Shot - Piercing Arrow
base.description: Catti-brie shoots the farthest enemy with her bow, hitting all enemies along the arrows path

ult.name: Empty the Quiver
ult.description: Catti-Brie shoots six arrows at once from her bow, making each enemy hit more vulnerable for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: Catti-Brie shoots six arrows at once from her bow. Each enemy hit by her arrows have a higher chance of being crit, and take more crit damage based on Catti-brie's crit chance and damage for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Critical Hit
abilities.desc: Catti-brie's base chance to Critical Hit is 20%.

description.desc: $source's base chance to Critical Hit is $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Powerful Draw
abilities.desc: Catti-brie deals additional damage to enemies the farther they are from the formation, from 0% bonus at 20% away from the formation to 1000% bonus at the spawn point.

description.desc: $source deals additional damage to enemies the farther they are from the formation, from 0% bonus at $start_percent% away from the formation to $amount% bonus at the spawn point.

abilities.name: Mark for Death
abilities.desc: Enemies hit by Catti-brie's arrows are Marked and take additional damage equal to $Catti-brie's critical hit damage bonus until the enemy is defeated.

raw.name: Mark for Death
raw.tip_text: Catti-brie marks enemies she attacks, causing them to take extra damage.

description.desc: Enemies hit by $source's arrows are Marked and take additional damage equal to $source's critical hit damage bonus until the enemy is defeated.

conditions.desc: ^^Base Damage Bonus: $(cattibrie_mark_for_death_debuff_amount)%

abilities.name: Grievous Wounds
abilities.desc: When an enemy that is Marked is critically hit by any Champion, they are stunned for 5 seconds and the damage bonus of their Mark is increased by 100%. This effect can only occur every 10 seconds, and the damage bonus increase can stack multiplicatively up to 10 times.

description.desc: When an enemy that is Marked is critically hit by any Champion, they are stunned for $(stun_time) seconds and the damage bonus of their Mark is increased by $(amount)%. This effect can only occur every $(cooldown_time) seconds, and the damage bonus increase can stack multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks) times.

abilities.name: Push Forward
abilities.desc: Catti-brie increases the damage of herself and all Champions in front of her in the formation by 50% each time she gets a critical hit, stacking multiplicatively up to 25 times and resetting when she changes areas.

raw.name: Push Forward
raw.tip_text: Catti-brie increases the damage of Champions in front of her when she gets a critical hit.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of herself and all Champions in front of her in the formation by $(not_buffed amount)% each time she gets a critical hit, stacking multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks) times and resetting when she changes areas.

abilities.name: Mark of the Hall
abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Mithral Hall stack. Catti-brie increases the damage bonus of Mark for Death by 100% for each Mithral Hall stack you have, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Your formation gains one Mithral Hall stack. $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Mithral Hall stack you have, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Piercing Arrow
specs.desc: Catti-brie's damage is increased by 400% and her arrows hit all enemies on their way to their target. Each enemy hit has a separate chance of being a critical hit.

raw.name: Piercing Arrow
raw.specialization_description: Catti-brie strengthens her bow for more powerful shots

description.desc: $source's damage is increased by $(amount)% and her arrows hit all enemies on their way to their target. Each enemy hit has a separate chance of being a critical hit.

specs.name: Big Push
specs.desc: Increases the base effect of Push Forward to 60% per stack and Catti-brie only loses half of her existing stacks when changing areas instead of all of them.

raw.name: Big Push
raw.specialization_description: Catti-brie focuses on pushing forward

description.desc: Increases the base effect of $(upgrade_name id) to $(amt)% per stack and $source only loses half of her existing stacks when changing areas instead of all of them.

specs.name: Critical Family
specs.desc: Additively increases the critical hit chance of all Companions of the Hall Champions by 20%.

raw.name: Critical Family
raw.specialization_description: Catti-brie shares her Critical Hit secrets with the Champions of the Hall

description.desc: Additively increases the critical hit chance of all Companions of the Hall Champions by $(amount)%.

items.name: Well Worn Longbow
items.description: It has seen battle more than once, and it'll see battle again.

items.name: Fine Elven Longbow
items.description: If I had a copper for every knock-off elven bow I've seen...

items.name: Polished Wood Longbow
items.description: As finely crafted a bow as you will ever see!

items.name: Taulmaril
items.description: Also known as Heartseeker. My shots never miss.

items.name: Leather Bracers
items.description: Simple yet effective.

items.name: Warrior's Bracers
items.description: Bracers fit for any warrior, but these are mine.

items.name: Fine Studded Bracers
items.description: Fine northern craftsmanship. You won't find its like to the south.

items.name: Mithral Embedded Bracers
items.description: A gift from Bruenor Battlehammer. Perhaps you know him?

items.name: Dull Dagger
items.description: Has anyone got a spare whetstone?

items.name: Polished Dagger
items.description: Blood and dirt will ruin a good dagger.

items.name: Embellished Dagger
items.description: A little flashy perhaps, but it still cuts true.

items.name: Elven Dagger of the Ambush
items.description: Never let them see you coming.

items.name: Iron Hairclip
items.description: Hair in the face is never good in battle.

items.name: Steel Hairclip
items.description: Lighter and more durable than other hairclips I've tried.

items.name: Mastercraft Hairclip
items.description: It seemed like a lot of coin to spend on a hairclip, but it's worth it.

items.name: Mithral Hairclip of the Companion
items.description: Forged in Mithral Hall by the best smithies in Faerûn.

items.name: Dull Breastplate
items.description: Substance over style -- at least until I can get better style.

items.name: Solid Breastplate
items.description: A bow does no good if a dagger kills you first.

items.name: Inscribed Copper Breastplate
items.description: The craftsmanship is incredible.

items.name: Shining Breastplate of the Champion
items.description: Champion? I've heard it said, though others deserve the title more than I.

items.name: Empty Quiver
items.description: Not much use right now, but I can always fletch more arrows.

items.name: Sturdy Quiver
items.description: Nothing's worse than a floppy quiver.

items.name: Heartseeking Quiver
items.description: Arrows from this quiver always strike true.

items.name: Quiver of Anariel
items.description: Alongside its companion, Taulmaril, this quiver is priceless.

normal.name: Elven Accuracy
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Catti-brie by 30%.
normal.desc: Drizzt knows more than just swords.

normal.name: Sharpshooter

normal.desc: Sharpest eye in the north.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: For the Companions of the Hall! For Faerûn!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: This won't be the final test we face! But we will pass it!

normal.desc: Every backstep they take is more ground for us.

normal.name: Actor
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Catti-brie by 1.
normal.desc: What? I'm not charming enough for you?

normal.name: Athlete
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Catti-brie by 1.
normal.desc: I can pull my bowstring back even further!

normal.name: Trained in the North

normal.desc: Behind you! I've got them!

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Catti-brie by 10%.
normal.desc: Ye should have worn a helm.

normal.name: Cataclysmic Strike
normal.effect: Increases the Crit Damage of Catti-brie by 60%.
normal.desc: They won't see this coming.

normal.name: On My Mark
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Catti-brie's Mark for Death ability by 40%.
normal.desc: When ye see my arrow fly -- strike true!

normal.name: Archer's Perception
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Catti-brie's Mark for Death ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I'll know them when I see them. Attack on my signal.

normal.name: Dwarf Glitch

data.backstory: Caring, motherly, and endlessly optimistic, Evelyn has adventured across the realms as part of the Waffle Crew for many years. She's always first in battle, thanks to her flying boots, and will always take a hit to protect others. Short, yet tough, her devotion to Lathander has seen her through many perilous situations.
data.name: Evelyn

base.name: Mighty Axe
base.description: Evelyn smashes the front-most enemy with her enormous battleaxe. Every third attack, she cleaves all nearby enemies as well.

ult.name: Find Steed
ult.description: Evelyn summons her Celestial Pegasus and dashes across the battlefield.
ult.long_description: Evelyn summons her Celestial Pegasus and dashes across the battlefield, damaging all enemies in a line for massive damage and briefly stunning all damaged enemies.

abilities.name: Divine Prayer
abilities.desc: Evelyn increases the damage of everyone behind her in the formation by 200%.

raw.name: Divine Prayer
raw.tip_text: Evelyn buffs all Champions behind her in the formation. Place her in front of your main damage dealers.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of everyone behind her in the formation by $(amount)%

abilities.name: Channel Divinity
abilities.desc: After Evelyn attacks an enemy, Divine Prayer is buffed by 100% for 15 seconds. If the enemy had a debuff affecting them, the effect is increased by 300%. Does not stack.

description.pre: After Evelyn attacks an enemy, $(upgrade_name id) is buffed by $(not_buffed amount)% for $(buff_duration___3) seconds. If the enemy had a debuff affecting them, the effect is increased by $(amount___2)%. Does not stack.

conditions.desc: ^^Seconds Remaining: $(evelyn_channel_divinity_time_remaining)

abilities.name: Steadfast Might
abilities.desc: Increases the effect of Divine Prayer by 100% multiplied by the highest number of enemies that Evelyn has tanked at once in the current area plus the highest enemy enrage stack in the current area.

description.desc: Increases the effect of $(upgrade_name id) by $(amount)% multiplied by the highest number of enemies that $source has tanked at once in the current area plus the highest enemy enrage stack in the current area.

abilities.name: Font of Heroism
abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 25% of Evelyn's Max Health.

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $amount% of $source's Max Health

abilities.name: Conduit of the Light
abilities.desc: After an ally effectively heals Evelyn, Divine Prayer is buffed by 100% for 15 seconds.

description.desc: After an ally effectively heals $source, Divine Prayer is buffed by $amount% for 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Lathander's Grace
abilities.desc: Every Champion in the formation grants Evelyn Grace stacks for every 100 levels above their last unlockable upgrade that they are leveled. Each Grace stack increases the effect of Divine Prayer by 100%, stacking multiplicatively. Champions can contribute at most 1 Grace stack each for every 400 areas completed in the current adventure.

raw.name: Lathander's Grace
raw.tip_text: Evelyn is a late-game tank who provides additional buffs for the formation beyond the soft cap.

description.desc: Every Champion in the formation grants Evelyn Grace stacks for every $num_levels_per_stack___2 levels above their last unlockable upgrade that they are leveled. Each Grace stack increases the effect of Divine Prayer by $(amount)%, stacking multiplicatively. Champions can contribute at most 1 Grace stack each for every $num_areas_per_stack___2 areas completed in the current adventure.

specs.name: Fighting Style: Protection
specs.desc: After an ally of Evelyn is attacked by an enemy, Divine Prayer is buffed by 300% for 15 seconds.

raw.name: Fighting Style: Protection
raw.specialization_description: Evelyn's Prayer grows more powerful when the formation comes under attack.

description.desc: After an ally of $source is attacked by an enemy, Divine Prayer is buffed by $amount% for 15 seconds.

specs.desc: After Evelyn attacks an Enemy that has recently attacked them, Divine Prayer is buffed by 300% for 15 seconds.

description.desc: After $source attacks an Enemy that has recently attacked them, Divine Prayer is buffed by $amount% for 15 seconds

specs.desc: The effect of the bonus upgrades granted by Lathander's Grace is increased by 10% (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively) for each Acquisitions Incorporated, The "C" Team, or Waffle Crew Champion in the formation.

raw.name: Lathander's Allies
raw.specialization_description: Evelyn's late game ability is increased with more of her affiliated allies in the formation.

description.desc: The effect of the bonus upgrades granted by Lathander's Grace is increased by $(amount)% (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively) for each Acquisitions Incorporated, The "C" Team, or Waffle Crew Champion in the formation.

items.name: Chipped Battleaxe
items.description: I dented it flying into battle against Strahd. It's fine, though!

items.name: Dulled Battleaxe
items.description: I'm sure it'll sharpen itself! Let's keep fighting!

items.name: Shining Battleaxe
items.description: The light itself loves this axe!

items.name: Lightfall
items.description: My beloved battleaxe, reforged!

items.name: Chubby Mouse

items.name: Sleepy Mouse
items.description: Wake up little buddy!

items.name: Alert Mouse
items.description: What's that? What do you smell?

items.name: Scuffed Amulet
items.description: Does anyone have a cloth? I need to polish this thing!

items.description: The light protects me while I wear this amulet.

items.name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
items.description: Strahd will never see us coming. Right guys?!

items.name: Flimsy Breastplate
items.description: This just won't do. I'll never protect the party with this!

items.name: Dented Breastplate
items.description: Sometimes you've got to take the hit, but I'm still standing.

items.description: Lathander appreciates well polished armor.

items.name: Shining Breastplate of Lathander
items.description: The light will protect me!

items.name: Moldy Boots
items.description: I think it's time to go shopping!

items.name: Light Boots
items.description: I feel almost weightless.

items.name: Flying Boots
items.description: Once you get used to it, flying isn't half bad.

items.name: Winged Boots of the Dawn
items.description: Charging into battle for the light!

items.name: Few Pretty Things
items.description: Some pretty things that Strix didn't want.

items.name: Several Pretty Things
items.description: Aren't they pretty?!

items.name: Sack of Pretty Things
items.description: I'm not really sure what's in here, but they're pretty!

items.name: Hoard of Pretty Things
items.description: Don't tell Strix. She'll judge me.

normal.name: Selflessness

normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.

data.backstory: A grumpy and headstrong dwarf with a penchant for springing traps rather than disarming them, if Binwin's not the first into battle then he's disappointed. There's nary a door, tankard, or acid pit that hasn't felt the wrath of Binwin Bronzebottom at one time or another.
data.name: Binwin

base.name: Twin Axes
base.description: Binwin attacks the front-most enemy with his twin axes, Rook and Ruin.

ult.name: Barrel Roll
ult.description: Binwin hops onto a sturdy wooden barrel and rides toward a single enemy, creating a path of destruction in his wake.
ult.long_description: Binwin hops onto a sturdy wooden barrel and rides toward a single enemy, dealing damage along the way. When he reaches the targeted enemy, the barrel explodes, dealing AOE damage and slowing all affected enemies.

abilities.name: Extra Attacks
abilities.desc: Binwin gains extra attacks when Champions adjacent to him do a certain number of attacks before Binwin's next attack. Each Extra Attack does 25% more damage (multiplicatively)$only_when_purchased.

raw.name: Extra Attacks
raw.tip_text: Binwin can attack multiple times per attack, doing more damage with each attack. He excels against large groups of durable enemies.

data.backstory: A former member of the Dripping Fang clan, Deekin was once a Skald for a White Dragon named Tymofarrar. Once he was released from Tymofarrar's service, he set out to become the most amazing storyteller in all of Faerûn. He yearns to sing and tell stories of heroic deeds, but his songs often devolve into 'tales' of the doom that is coming to him or his companions.
data.name: Deekin

base.name: Building Suspense

ult.long_description: Deekin shouts DOOM as loud as he can, dealing massive damage and setting Story of Doom to max stacks for 30 seconds.

data.backstory: Fascinated by magic at a young age when he lived in an orphanage, but lacking any ability or proficiency, Xander is not terribly good at much of anything, though something about his adorable clumsiness and childlike wonder anytime magic is being used nearby has been known to inspire those around him. Until recently, he was living on the streets of Waterdeep, scraping together just enough to survive. Now, he is a faithful member of your party, always ready to leap into the fray, even if he doesn't really seem to be able to hit much of anything.

data.backstory: Azaka Stormfang was once a guide who operated out of Port Nyanzaru on Chult. She originally concealed her curse of lycanthropy from the champions, as she has lost many friends to that revelation in the past. Her true self was revealed to the Champions after she valiantly helped them collect 3 of the 9 puzzle cubes they needed to defeat the villain Acererak in the Tomb of the Nine Gods. She was killed in the battle, but was able to be resurrected after the champions defeated Acererak's soulmonger. Now, she travels with her new friends, as a champion.
data.name: Azaka

base.name: Pick Them Off
base.description: Azaka leaps into the air and strikes a random enemy; 33% cleave chance

ult.name: Mask of the Beast
ult.description: Azaka dons her Mask of the Beast, summoning 2 tigers to her side for 30 seconds, the tigers attack every 5 seconds
ult.long_description: Azaka dons her Mask of the Beast, summoning 2 tigers to her side that attack every 5 seconds. The tigers stay for 30 seconds. If Azaka specs with Lycanthrope Forever the tiger attacks count towards her weretiger transformation, and her weretiger cooldown is paused during her Ultimate. If she specs with Resist the Curse, the tigers' attacks cause enemies to drop gold even if they aren't killed.

data.backstory: Ishi Snaggletooth hails from a warren of Kobolds living in the sewers under Baldur's Gate. Always the type to be more curious than careful, she accidentally stowed away on a ship headed to Port Nyanzaru. There, she met her dear friend, the Firbolg Littlefox. Often shunned by humans, Ishi hopes to prove herself as a true hero however she can. Ishi's biggest claim to fame is the defeat of the known swordsman, Hershel Von Saberburg, and since that day she's touted herself as a renowned duelist to anyone that'll listen to her.
data.name: Ishi

base.name: Quick Strike
base.description: Ishi attacks the front-most enemy a quarter second faster than anyone else.
base.long_description: Ishi attacks the front-most enemy. She always attacks 0.25 seconds faster than the fastest member of the formation, or every 6 seconds if she is the only Champion

ult.name: Confidence Boost
ult.description: For 30 seconds, Ishi's damage is increased by 100% for each non-human in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.
ult.long_description: For 30 seconds, Ishi's damage is increased by 100% for each non-human in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. The duration extends when Ishi lands the killing blow on a boss.

abilities.name: Me First!
abilities.desc: Ishi always attacks 0.25 seconds faster than the fastest member of the formation, or every 6 seconds if nobody else is in the formation.

description.desc: Ishi increases the effect of Let's Find Some Treasure by $amount% for every $(per_seconds___2) seconds it has been since Ishi attacked but did not kill an enemy, stacking multiplicatively up to $max_stacks times.

abilities.name: Faster, Harder, Stronger

description.desc: Ishi keeps track of the number of attacks she has made in the last minute. She increases her damage by $(not_buffed amount)% for each attack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Winner Take All
abilities.desc: Every day Ishi gains 5 Duel To The Death stacks. When Ishi has an available Duel To The Death stack, and gets the killing blow on a boss that drops a loot sack, there is a 5% chance that she will consume a Duel To The Death stack and claim a piece of that boss's equipment as her own, granting 6 item levels to a piece of her equipment at random. Ishi can store up to 50 Duel To The Death stacks at once.

description.pre: Every day Ishi gains $stacks_per_day Duel To The Death stacks. When Ishi has an available Duel To The Death stack, and gets the killing blow on a boss that drops a loot sack, there is a $amount% chance that she will consume a Duel To The Death stack and claim a piece of that boss's equipment as her own, granting $levels item levels to a piece of her equipment at random. Ishi can store up to $stacks_limit Duel To The Death stacks at once.

conditions.desc: ^^$item_levels_on_boss_kill_stacks

data.backstory: Wulfgar started his life in the north as the flag bearer of the barbarian Tribe of the Elk. He was bested in the assault on Ten-Towns by Bruenor who decided his punishment would be five years and a day of service. Bruenor grew to love the tall barbarian, eventually seeing him as an adopted son. At the end of his service, Drizzt Do'Urden taught Wulfgar the ways of combat and Bruenor crafted a mighty warhammer, named Aegis-fang. This magical warhammer bears the symbols of three of the Dwarven Gods: Moradin, Clangeddin, and Dumathoin. It is specifically attuned to Wulfgar and magically returns to his hand upon telepathic command.
data.name: Wulfgar

base.description: Wulfgar smashes the nearest group of enemies with his warhammer.

ult.name: Aegis-fang

ult.long_description: Shouting the name of his deity, Wulfgar tosses his warhammer, Aegis-fang, at the most distant enemy, dealing damage to and stunning all enemies in a line for 10 seconds.

items.name: Dagger of the Elk

items.name: Icingdeath Bracer

items.name: Worn Wolf Cloak

items.description: It still smells of battle.

items.name: Ten-Towns Cloak

items.name: Chieftain's Cloak

data.backstory: Abandoned as an infant and adopted by an outcast dragonborn warrior, Farideh grew to adulthood acutely aware of the drawbacks of being a tiefling. While those from the Nine Hells do their utmost to corrupt her, Farideh isn't interested in power so much as defending the world from demons, the undead, and any other villains trying to bring trouble or drag her friends and family into danger.

raw.specialization_description: The Dark One's power infuses Farideh, further increasing her damage, and thus the damage of Hellish Rebuke.

items.name: Small Holy Symbol
items.description: It's tarnished, but it's a comfort...Maybe I won't tell Mehen though.

items.name: Symbol of Selûne
items.description: The Moonmaiden Selûne helps me navigate my fate.

items.name: Selûne and Nanna-Sin Pendant
items.description: The other side shows the axe of the Untheran god who protects Djerad Kethendi.

items.name: Amulet of Selûne
items.description: A gift from Tam, when we were in the ruins of Neverwinter.

items.name: Pact Focus
items.description: This makes it much easier to channel my pact.

items.name: Sentimental Rod
items.description: A gift from Dahl. It's not pretty, but it means a lot.

items.name: Rod of the Traitor's Reprisal
items.description: Lorcan gave me this to help protect from devils. They definitely don't like it.

items.name: Ruby Rod of Asmodeus
items.description: ...I don't think I'm supposed to have this. Am I supposed to have this? Better not drop it.

items.name: Used Grimoire
items.description: Ritual books are expensive! This is all I could afford.

items.name: Lorcan's Grimoire
items.description: It's supposed to help my pact, but I much prefer the rod.

items.name: Book of Shadows
items.description: This is eveything I need, except it reminds me of the Shadovar and Adolican Rhand.

items.name: Book of Promises
items.description: Dahl and I burned the old one. New memories, new spells!

items.name: Flimsy Armor
items.description: Better than nothing! Maybe next bounty we'll get enough to go shopping.

items.name: Warlock Armor
items.description: Good coverage and flexible. My sister, Havilar, says it's dumpy.

items.name: Shadow Armor
items.description: I pretty much vanish between its dark colors and the shadow-smoke.

items.name: Armor of Khorsaya
items.description: A gift from Verthisathurgiesh, my adoptive clan. It's dragonborn armor, cut for me.

items.name: Water-Damaged Deck
items.description: This Wroth Deck has seen better days, but it still freaks out shadar-kai!

items.name: Deck of Fortune Cards
items.description: Dahl gave me these for patience games, but they feel eerie.

items.name: The Adversary
items.description: This one card keeps coming up, even when I try to bury it.

items.name: Nightmare Wroth Deck
items.description: This...isn't my deck. I dream of this one when Asmodeus wants something.

items.name: Torn Chapbook
items.description: My sister is so rough on her things. I can't even read the title.

items.name: The Prince of Al-Qadim
items.description: This one is one of Havi's boyfriend Brin's favorites.

items.name: Red Bess and the Kelpie's Regret
items.description: Havi says this story is basically me and Lorcan. I don't want to read it.

items.name: Havi's Chapbook
items.description: ...Karshoj, those bookmarks better not be for me.

normal.name: Adept
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Farideh by 30%.
normal.desc: I just want my friends to be safe.

normal.name: Elementalist
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Farideh by 60%.
normal.desc: I am the element of death in battle.

normal.name: Tiefling Magic
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Farideh's Pact Family ability by 20%.
normal.desc: We know things that maybe we should not.

normal.name: Dark Allegiance
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Farideh's Pact Family ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Not all tieflings are pure evil, you know?

normal.name: Observant
normal.effect: Increases the Wisdom score of Farideh by 1.
normal.desc: What can I say? I like to read.

normal.name: Spell Master
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Farideh by 120%.
normal.desc: What trouble did Havi get into this time?

normal.name: Ice Knife
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Farideh's Hellish Rebuke ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Freely... I think something just happened... Where's Havilar?

normal.name: Infernal Heritage
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Farideh's Pact Family ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Use the tools you have.

normal.name: Impulsive Hero
normal.effect: Reduces the cooldown on Farideh's Base Attack by 1s.
normal.desc: Maybe that eldritch blast was a little quick.

normal.name: Immolation
normal.effect: Farideh's attacks deal an additional 1s of BUD damage every second for 5s.
normal.desc: I'll defeat you with the flames of the Hells if I have to.

normal.name: Mehen's Pride
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Farideh's Sister, Sister ability by 80%.
normal.desc: You may be stronger than me, but you're not stronger than my sister!

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 95% for each Tiefling Champion in the formation.

data.backstory: This copper, draconic gentleman claims to know more than one hundred different dragons. Chromatic, metallic -- just tons and tons of dragons -- I'm hoping we can leverage some of these connections in our dealings. None of the dragons I've contacted have gotten back to me, but they're probably just very busy right now. This is one of the busiest times for dragons... or so I've been told by my new best friend, Donaar Blit'zen.
data.name: Donaar

base.name: Command
base.description: Donaar targets a random enemy, casting a random Command on them and doing a small amount of psychic damage
base.long_description: Hold: stuns enemy for $(attack_indexed_effect_amount 0)s; Flee: Enemy pushed back, taking $(attack_indexed_effect_amount 1)% more damage for 10s; Fear: Enemy has $(attack_indexed_effect_amount 2)% chance attacks miss for 5s; Drop: Enemy drops $(attack_indexed_effect_amount 3)% bonus gold on death

ult.name: Acid Vomit
ult.description: Donaar attacks the nearest enemies with his comically oversized sword, then vomits acid.
ult.long_description: Donaar attacks the nearest enemies with his comically oversized sword, then vomits acid in a puddle which deals damage to enemies who walk through it.

abilities.name: Aura of Vitality
abilities.desc: Every second, Donaar targets the Champion that has lost the most health (on a percentage basis), giving them a healing buff that lasts for 10 seconds, and heals for 5 HP every second (stacks by resetting the time).

raw.name: Aura of Vitality
raw.tip_text: Donaar heals the most damaged members of your formation, regardless of where they are in relation to him.

description.desc: Every second, $source targets the Champion that has lost the most health (on a percentage basis), giving them a healing buff that lasts for $duration seconds, and heals for $amount HP every second (stacks by resetting the time)

abilities.name: Lead By Example
abilities.desc: Increases the Damage of all Champions in the same column as Donaar as well as all Champions behind him in the formation by 100%.

raw.name: Lead By Example
raw.tip_text: Donaar buffs Champions in the same column and columns behind him. Place him near the front of your formation to gain the biggest benefit.

description.desc: Increases the Damage of all Champions in the same column as $source as well as all Champions behind him in the formation by $amount%

specs.name: Ohhhhh Yeaaaaaah!
specs.desc: Increases the duration of Donaar's Hold Command by 2s and the effects of Flee by 100%, of Fear by 50%, and of Drop by 100%.

raw.specialization_description: Increases the effect or duration of each of Donaar's Command effects.

description.desc: Increases the duration of $target's Hold Command by $(amount)s and the effects of Flee by $amount___2%, of Fear by $amount___3%, and of Drop by $amount___4%

specs.name: Everyone Coooooool Out!
specs.desc: Donaar's Command effects now also affect enemies in a small area around the primary target.

raw.specialization_description: Donaar's Command now also affect enemies in a small area around the primary target.

description.desc: Donaar's Command effects now also affect enemies in a small area around the primary target.

items.name: Realistic Greatsword
items.description: It comes with a year's supply of sharpening scales

items.name: Serrated Greatsword
items.description: It's a family hair loom. Yeah, I know what I said, it's like a machine that makes rope from hair.

items.name: Toothbrush
items.description: Oooooooooooh Yeeeeeeaaaaaaaahhhhh!

items.name: Twothbrush
items.description: Everybody coooooooool out!

items.name: Royal Toothbrush
items.description: Tooth decay is no joke. Gotta respect your gums!

items.name: Acid-Cleaning Toothbrush
items.description: When you vomit acid as much as I do, it's important to keep your teeth cleaned!

items.name: Bejeweled Toothbrush
items.description: If you brush really fast, the jewels make the room look like a party!

items.name: Percival
items.description: When I really want to get my point across, Percival can double as a mic! Ooh Yeaah!

items.name: Stained Menu
items.description: Anything is better than these trail rations!

items.name: Wrinkled Menu
items.description: I know I have it here. . . somewhere.

items.name: Well-Designed Menu
items.description: If you join us for happy hour, we have Tarrasque Kabobs!

items.name: Yum-Yum Hut Menu
items.description: I'm John, Paul, and George, but you guys are my Ringos. I need my Ringos!

items.name: Worn Coin
items.description: You never forget your first coin flip.

items.name: Talisman of the Gold Variety
items.description: Chronaar may have chewed on it a bit.

items.name: Acquisitions Incorporated Coin
items.description: Boulder beats knife. Knife beats parchment. Parchment beats boulder. Tail beats everything.

items.name: Decisionist's Coin
items.description: Remember? Tail beats everything.

items.name: Lost Egg
items.description: Did you know that I know a ton of dragons? They're very busy right now.

items.name: Dragonborn Egg
items.description: Dibs. I found it.

items.name: Eggy
items.description: This egg is more important than the rest of the group.

items.name: Chronaar
items.description: She lives in Skolla now. She's sort of my daughter? It's a long story.

items.name: Barely Torn Cloak
items.description: If you sit in the corner and put the cape over your head, you can take a nap and Rosie won't even know!

items.name: Adventurous Cloak
items.description: It even covers my tail! If I do this cool curl like so. Sorry. Did I hit you?

items.name: Regal Cloak
items.description: Did you know that oceans are the forests of the sea? True story.

items.name: Nase's Cape
items.description: This was my brother's cape, I brought it with me when I left Jinaar. I don't want to talk about it.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I've decided I will stay back and heal.

normal.name: Medic
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Donaar's Aura of Vitality ability by 15%.
normal.desc: You all just need to coooool out.

normal.name: Combat Healer
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Donaar's Aura of Vitality ability by 30%.
normal.desc: We'll make it through if you just stop dying, alright?

normal.name: Dragonborn Leadership
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Donaar's Lead By Example ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Careful not to step in the acid vomit, okay?

normal.name: Watch This!
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Donaar's Lead By Example ability by 80%.
normal.desc: This time I'm gonna do a flip! Then you try!

normal.name: Wound Master
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Donaar's Aura of Vitality ability by 60%.
normal.desc: This time, I'll do a flip before I swing the sword!

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: Maybe I just like having gold on me?

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: If I just keep yelling 'I'm lucky!' it will happen. One day.

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Everyone get behind me -- I'm gonna vomit!

normal.name: Aasimar Glitch

normal.desc: Wait, what's my breath weapon now?!
effects: Donaar also counts as an Aasimar

normal.name: Fortune's Favor

normal.desc: What do you mean: give up the gold? There was nothing there...

data.backstory: Fate Weaver, Spy mistress, New Olamn college of whispers instructor, Band Manager of Sirens of the Realms & Magic Missile, long time pal of Durnan. This noble looking Eladrin Elf has friends in high and low places. Her true origins are unknown though it is rumored she traveled across Faerûn with a bard troupe and learned about the world one tavern at a time.
data.name: Vlahnya

base.name: Mage Hand
base.description: Vlahnya damages a random enemy with her Mage Hand.

ult.name: Plane Shift
ult.description: Vlahnya leaps into the fray and instantly teleports up to 10 non-boss enemies away.
ult.long_description: Vlahnya leaps into the fray and instantly teleports up to 10 non-boss enemies away, permanently removing them from combat. Also maxes out all stacks of Enthralling Performance.

abilities.name: Enthralling Performance
abilities.desc: Vlahnya buffs those ahead of her in the formation. Place her far enough back in your formation to buff your hardest hitters.

raw.name: Enthralling Performance

items.name: Hand me down Zither

items.name: Baby's First Zither
items.description: You never forget your first tutor.

items.description: Class and craftsmanship!

items.name: Siren's Zither

data.backstory: Forged to be the jailer for a prison filled with eldritch horrors in a faraway land, Warden became corrupted by the monstrosities they sought to keep locked away. Now they journey at the behest of an otherworldly master, seeking souls for the insatiable Dark Hunger to corrupt and feast upon.
data.name: Warden

base.name: Hex Weapon Armblade
base.description: Warden leaps to a random enemy and attacks them with their armblade.

ult.name: Hunger of Hadar
ult.description: Warden opens a rift to the void, pulling all enemies and specters to one spot on the screen.
ult.long_description: Warden opens a rift to the void, damaging and momentarily stunning all enemies and pulling them and all active specters to a position slightly in front of the formation.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.desc:
Warden curses their target enemy before attacking it, applying 1 stack of Hex. Enemies take 100% more damage for each Hex stack afflicting them, stacking multiplicatively. Initially, each enemy can only have 1 Hex stack at a time.  
> Post stack Hex bonus: 100%.

raw.name: Hex
raw.tip_text: Warden Hexes all enemies that they attack, causing them to take extra damage.

data.backstory: Nerys Kathon joined the Heroes of Baldur's Gate on a mission to protect her church, but was soon pulled into a harrowing journey to Barovia and beyond. As a cleric of Kelemvor, she grew up in service to the dying and the dead and developed a cold detachment to anything outside of duties to her faith. Beneath that frosty exterior is a loyal and caring adventurer, but it's a side she rarely shows to anyone outside her closest friends.
data.name: Nerys

base.name: Dash and Slash
base.description: Nerys cleaves all targets near the closest enemy. Undead enemies take an additional 5 seconds worth of BUD damage.

ult.name: Tip the Scales
ult.description: Nerys blasts all enemies, reducing their damage and increasing party damage.
ult.long_description: Nerys leaps into the field, unleashing a halo of divine energy. It hits all enemies and decreases their damage done by 50% while increasing the damage the party does by 300%. These effects last 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Spiritual Weapon
abilities.desc: Nerys calls her Spiritual Weapon to her side. It attacks on her attack timer, dealing Nerys's base damage with a $(amount)% bonus. Spiritual Weapon attacks can set BUD (crediting Nerys).

raw.name: Spiritual Weapon
raw.tip_text: Nerys's Spiritual Weapon deals bonus damage when it attacks.

description.desc: Nerys calls her Spiritual Weapon to her side. It attacks on her attack timer, dealing $(target)'s base damage with a $(amount)% bonus. Spiritual Weapon attacks can set BUD (crediting Nerys).

abilities.name: War Healing
abilities.desc: When Nerys' Spiritual Weapon attacks, Nerys targets the column with the most damaged Champion and heals all the Champions in it for 70 health.

raw.name: War Healing
raw.tip_text: Nerys heals Champions in a column whenever her Spiritual weapon attacks.

description.desc: When Nerys' Spiritual Weapon attacks, Nerys targets the column with the most damaged Champion and heals all the Champions in it for $(amount) health.

description.desc: Undead enemies become Nerys' Favored Foe and take $(amount)% increased damage from all Champions.

abilities.name: Follow my Friend
abilities.desc: Nerys' Spiritual Weapon follows the Champion with the highest damage instead of her. It attacks on that Champion's attack timer, dealing damage based on their damage instead of Nerys'. If those attacks are BUD-setting, then the Champion it is following gets credit for setting the BUD.

items.name: Aging Greatsword
items.description: A sturdy blade is all I need.

items.name: Agile Blade
items.description: Minsc isn't the only one who can swing a greatsword!

items.name: Holy Warrior's Greatsword
items.description: I have devoted all I have to the Lord of the Dead.

items.name: Blessed Greatsword of Kelemvor
items.description: Death comes to all. Until it's my time, I will do Kelemvor's will.

items.name: Rusty Breastplate
items.description: One would be fool hearty to head into battle without the proper protection.

items.name: Worn Breastplate
items.description: It has protected me against blades and arrows.

items.name: Adamantine Breastplate
items.description: Some say the skull is unnerving. For me, it's a comfort.

items.name: Breastplate of the Devout Cleric
items.description: My faith sustains me. My friends give me reasons to fight on when all seems lost.

items.name: Dark Eyeshadow Components

items.name: Crushed Charcoal Eyeshadow
items.description: Just make sure it's cooled first. You only make that mistake once.

items.name: Shea Nut Butter Eyeshadow
items.description: It took me quite a while to find a mixture that stays on during the heat of battle.

items.name: Arrowroot Eyeshadow
items.description: I save this eyeshadow for the right occasion.

items.name: Patched Together Cloak
items.description: I used to not care as much about my cloak. Then we landed in the tundra.

items.name: Fur Cloak
items.description: I trust Kelemvor will protect me until it is time for me to pass into his care.

items.name: Wolf Fur Cloak
items.description: The beast that supplied the fur has gone onto Kelemvor. I thank it for it's sacrifice.

items.name: Cloak of the Wolf
items.description: With the correct gear, the Heroes of Baldur's Gate can weather any storm.

items.name: Cracked Kelemvor Symbol
items.description: I cracked it fighting a wave of undead. It reminds me to never let my guard down.

items.name: Ancient Kelemvor Relic
items.description: How many people were comforted by this on their way to the Lord of the Dead?

items.name: Holy Symbol of Kelemvor
items.description: The scales, like most things in life, must be balanced. Death comes for us all.

items.name: Ostentatious Symbol of Kelemvor
items.description: The gold used to make this symbol could have been put to use in better ways.

items.name: Ancient Locket
items.description: It was found among priceless relics of the Kelemvor faith. It was not of Toril.

items.name: Barovian Locket
items.description: The mists that carried us to Barovia are somehow tied to this locket.

items.name: Locket of Protection
items.description: This locket has protective energy, but more research is required to unlock its power.

items.name: Sergei's Soul Bound Locket
items.description: A soul that couldn't pass on saved us from the vampire. I hope his soul now rests.

data.backstory: Curious, affable, and morbid, the drow heretic K'thriss Drow'b seeks the insane god-truth behind the veil of reality. As the 'C' Team's hoardsperson, he keeps an eye out for occult relics that could aid him in his unearthly quest.
data.name: K'thriss

base.name: Dissonant Whispers
base.description: K'thriss telepathically whispers a discordant melody that damages and slows a random enemy.

ult.name: Tentacular Spectacular
ult.description: K'thriss summons a horde of tentacles that damage and slow all enemies.
ult.long_description: K'thriss summons a horde of tentacles across the battlefield that damage and slow all enemies.

abilities.name: Hoardsperson
abilities.desc: Reduces gold find by 10%, but increases the damage of all Champions by 100%. Collect bonus coins to summon a demon that massively buffs the damage of your lowest damage Champion for 30 seconds. `$hordesperson_description`.

raw.name: Hoardsperson
raw.tip_text: K'thriss collects some of the formation's earnings, but don't fret -- he uses it to summon a helpful demon!

description.desc: Reduces gold find by $amount___2%, but increases the damage of all Champions by $amount%. Collect bonus coins to summon a demon that massively buffs the damage of your lowest damage Champion for 30 seconds. $hordesperson_description

Increase the damage of the champions furthest from K'thriss by $amount%

items.description: My eyes have opened! The unfathomable eidolon!

data.backstory: Paultin and his 'son' Simon (AKA Murderbot) have been adventuring as part of the Waffle Crew for many years. Paultin is a wise-cracking adventurer who is more at home at a tavern than anywhere else. He cares deeply for those he considers his friends and will leap into action if anyone hurts them.
data.name: Paultin

base.name: Poison Dart
base.description: Simon attacks with a poisoned dart. Paultin attacks too, sometimes.

ult.name: Thunderwave
ult.description: Paultin swings the Sunsword, creating a shockwave that deals massive damage to all enemies.
ult.long_description: Paultin swings the Sunsword, dealing massive damage to all enemies. The damage is increased by the current enemy enrage multiplier.

abilities.name: Lucky
abilities.desc: Paultin increases the party's gold find by 20% for each Champion adjacent to them.

data.backstory: The Black Viper was a notorious burglar, pickpocket, mugger, and assassin who died a century ago, after a long and nefarious career. Esvele Rosznar, a brash young noble, has recently adopted the Black Viper's persona to lead a secret life of crime. Like many other nobles, Esvele gossips about the Black Viper's exploits to lend credence to the villain's mystique.
data.name: Black Viper

base.name: En Garde
base.description: Black Viper attacks a random enemy with her daggers.

ult.name: Smokescreen
ult.description: Black Viper throws down a massive smokescreen, hindering enemies and helping herself.
ult.long_description: Black Viper creates a smokescreen, reducing damage done to the formation and causing all of her attacks to be Sneak Attacks.

abilities.name: Jewel Thief
abilities.desc: Black Viper powers up over time by collecting Red Gems. Red Gems have both a permanent effect that persists between runs and a damage bonus that applies to the current run.
