raw.specialization_description: Black Viper is one with the shadows and can Sneak Attack more often; she attacks faster when she does.

specs.name: Collector
specs.desc: Increases the drop chance for Red Gems to 33% and increases the current adventure damage bonus by 2.5% per gem.

raw.specialization_description: Black Viper has a keen eye for valuables and will collect more Red Gems and increase their effectiveness.

description.desc: Increases the drop chance for Red Gems to 33% and increases the current adventure damage bonus by 2.5% per gem.

items.name: Leather Bracers
items.description: I've seen house servants better equipped for battle than this.

items.name: Fashionable Gauntlets
items.description: These work with my day to night outfit... if you know what I mean.

items.name: Spiked Gauntlets
items.description: 10 points if you can poke someone in the eye. Double if you can do it without laughing.

items.name: Master Thief's Gauntlets
items.description: ... they have pockets!

items.name: Decorative Rapier
items.description: This thing couldn't cut an apple!

items.name: Esvele's Rapier
items.description: Good for my fencing lessons, but not much else.

items.name: Balanced Rapier
items.description: A good sword should be balanced and move like an extension of yourself.

items.name: The Black Viper's Rapier
items.description: I still prefer my daggers, but sometimes you need something sharp to help keep a bit of distance.

items.name: Simple Mask
items.description: I had to glue it on & awkwardly explain the red marks on my face to nobles over tea.

items.name: Thief's Mask
items.description: I once stole the wrong signet ring because I couldn't see well enough through the eye holes.

items.name: Cheeky Mask
items.description: I had to smile constantly to get the mask to stick. I hated it.

items.name: The Black Viper's Mask
items.description: Its a pity to hide a face like mine, but if I must, then I will do so in style.

items.name: Kris Dagger
items.description: One of the first items I stole. Sentimental but not too sharp.

items.name: Kara-Tur Dagger
items.description: A gift from an aunt who lives near Kara-Tur. She always gives the best gifts.

items.name: Engraved Dagger
items.description: I had them specially made in Luskan. The black horn handles fit my palms perfectly.

items.name: The Viper's Fangs
items.description: Acquired with a friend after a long adventure. They hold poison in the handle.

items.name: Ragged Cloak
items.description: Well, at least no one will recognize me in this tattered thing.

items.name: Evening Wear
items.description: I vastly prefer this to the stuffy dresses and corsets I usually have to wear.

items.name: Stealth Cloak
items.description: You won't notice me there, behind you... you'll just notice your coinpurse is gone.

items.name: Viper's Cloak
items.description: I'm known for my talents, but I'll be remembered for my fashion sense.

items.name: False Gem
items.description: The first necklace I stole. I didn't realize it was a fake.

items.name: Sparkling Necklace
items.description: It's not as nice as the ones I own, but its disappearance will still stir up some fun.

items.name: Noble Jewels
items.description: They won't miss them. Trust me.

items.name: Ostentatious Display
items.description: I hate the nobility that requires these. . . baubles to show status.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Black Viper by 30%.
normal.desc: If I did brawl in a tavern, my enemies would never see me.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Black Viper by 60%.
normal.desc: I aim to disarm my foes before they taste my blade.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I steal from the rich and give to the poor.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Without us, Waterdeep would have been reduced to rubble.

normal.name: Athlete
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Black Viper by 1.
normal.desc: All of this leather armor has really helped my cardio.

normal.name: Raid Planner
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Black Viper by 2.
normal.desc: Forget the chest, come check out the bookshelf!

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Human Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion with a DEX score of 15 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a STR score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion in the formation with a CHAOTIC alignment.

data.backstory: Weighing in at just under 30 pounds and with a grandmotherly demeanor befitting her advanced age, Rosie Beestinger is easily mistaken for someone on the wrong side of the 'aggressor/victim' relationship. But this is a mix-up that few people make more than once.
data.name: Rosie

base.name: Shadow Step
base.description: Rosie Shadow Steps behind one of the three closest enemies at random and hits them with a flurry of blows.

ult.name: Grammamancy
ult.description: Rosie roots all enemies and darts around, striking up to 10, then prepares to deflect more missiles.
ult.long_description: Rosie roots all enemies in place for 5 seconds and becomes a blur of movement, pummeling up to 10 enemies on screen for ultimate damage, and refilling her deflect stacks to max.

abilities.name: Sassy
abilities.desc: Rosie deals +400% increased damage for every Champion in the formation younger than she is, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Sassy
raw.tip_text: Rosie's damage is increased by having Champions in the formation who are younger than she is. Stack that formation!

description.desc: Rosie deals +$amount% increased damage for every Champion in the formation younger than she is, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Deflect Missiles
abilities.desc: Rosie gains a deflect stack every time she attacks. She can store up to 100 deflect stacks at once. Whenever an enemy attacks the formation with a ranged/magic attack, Rosie consumes a deflect stack and reflects it back at the attacker. The reflected attack deals Rosie's damage with a 100% additively increased chance of dealing a critical hit. This effect can trigger as often as necessary, as long as Rosie has deflect stacks available.

raw.name: Deflect Missiles
raw.tip_text: Rosie can deflect ranged/magic attacks back at the attacker, increasing her own damage each time she does so!

description.desc: Rosie gains a deflect stack every time she attacks. She can store up to $max_stacks deflect stacks at once. Whenever an enemy attacks the formation with a ranged/magic attack, Rosie consumes a deflect stack and reflects it back at the attacker. The reflected attack deals Rosie's damage with a 100% additively increased chance of dealing a critical hit. This effect can trigger as often as necessary, as long as Rosie has deflect stacks available.

abilities.name: Timeless Body
abilities.desc: Rosie gains a Timeless Body stack every time she successfully deflects a ranged/magic attack with Deflect Missiles. For each Timeless Body stack she has, Rosie increases the effect of Sassy by 1%, stacking additively. Stacks persist between adventures.

description.desc: Rosie gains a Timeless Body stack every time she successfully deflects a ranged/magic attack with Deflect Missiles. For each Timeless Body stack she has, Rosie increases the effect of Sassy by $amount%, stacking additively. Stacks persist between adventures.

abilities.name: Grammamancy
abilities.desc: Unlocks Rosie's Grammamancy Ultimate Attack.

description.desc: Unlocks Rosie's Grammamancy Ultimate Attack

abilities.name: Slow Decay
abilities.desc: Whenever Rosie is your BUD-setting Champion, the rate of BUD decay is decreased by 50%.

description.desc: Whenever Rosie is your BUD-setting Champion, the rate of BUD decay is decreased by $amount%.

abilities.name: Shadow Arts
abilities.desc: Rosie's critical hit damage is increased by 100% for every 100 levels she has been leveled up, stacking multiplicatively. Additionally, for every 4th attack, Rosie makes a Shadow Arts attack that deals 10 seconds worth of BUD damage to all enemies in a small area.

conditions.desc: Rosie's critical hit damage is increased by $amount% for every $per_num_levels levels she has been leveled up, stacking multiplicatively. Additionally, for every 3rd attack, Rosie makes a Shadow Arts attack that deals 10 seconds worth of BUD damage to all enemies in a small area.

Rosie's critical hit damage is increased by $amount% for every $per_num_levels levels she has been leveled up, stacking multiplicatively. Additionally, for every 4th attack, Rosie makes a Shadow Arts attack that deals 10 seconds worth of BUD damage to all enemies in a small area.

specs.name: Matriarch
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by 100% for every Female or Nonbinary Champion in the formation who is younger than Rosie, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Matriarch
raw.specialization_description: Rosie particularly enjoys grandmothering females younger than herself.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by $amount% for every Female or Nonbinary Champion in the formation who is younger than Rosie, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Familiar Friends
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by 100% for every Champion in the formation that belongs to the "C"-team, Acquisitions Incorporated, or Wafflecrew affiliations, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Familiar Friends
raw.specialization_description: Rosie has close ties to the assorted Acquisitions Incorporated teams.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by $amount% for every Champion in the formation that belongs to the "C"-team, Acquisitions Incorporated, or Wafflecrew affiliations, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Grandmother Night
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by 100% for every Champion in the formation that is a Halfling, Rogue, or Monk, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Grandmother Night
raw.specialization_description: The legend of Grandmother Night is well known in the halfling community.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Sassy by $amount% for every Champion in the formation that is a Halfling, Rogue, or Monk, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Grandma-Bod
specs.desc: The damage bonus provided by Timeless Body stacks is increased by 200%, and whenever she deflects a ranged/magic attack with Deflect Missiles she gains 4 stacks of Timeless Body instead of 1.

raw.name: Grandma-Bod
raw.specialization_description: 28 pounds of solid muscle.

conditions.desc: The damage bonus provided by Timeless Body stacks is increased by $amount%, and whenever she deflects a ranged/magic attack with Deflect Missiles she gains 7 stacks of Timeless Body instead of 1.
The damage bonus provided by Timeless Body stacks is increased by $amount%, and whenever she deflects a ranged/magic attack with Deflect Missiles she gains 4 stacks of Timeless Body instead of 1.

specs.name: Busy Beestinger
specs.desc: Rosie's attack speed cooldown is lowered by 0.5 seconds (stacking additively) and her damage is increased by 400% (stacking multiplicatively) for each member of the "C"-Team in the formation, including herself.

raw.name: Busy Beestinger
raw.specialization_description: Rosie always helps her family.

description.desc: Rosie's attack speed cooldown is lowered by $amount seconds (stacking additively) and her damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)% (stacking multiplicatively) for each member of the "C"-Team in the formation, including herself.

specs.name: Slower Decay
specs.desc: Increases Rosie's critical hit damage by 600% and the effect of Slow Decay is set to 75%.

raw.name: Slower Decay
raw.specialization_description: Peak condition at 110 years.

description.desc: Increases Rosie's critical hit damage by $amount% and the effect of Slow Decay is set to $(new_amount___2)%.

items.name: Scratched Spyglass
items.description: If you put a drink at one end, it's easier to focus.

items.name: Case of lenses
items.description: One of these works, I swear! Not that one. Or that one.

items.name: AI Cartographer's Gear
items.description: Treat it right and it'll guide you to your goal - and your gold.

items.name: Rosie's Cartographer's Kit
items.description: You can map the land AND the stars with this one.

items.name: Crafty Necklace
items.description: A necklace crafted by my hand over many years.

items.name: Decorative Necklace
items.description: Each ball represents a single regret.

items.name: Necklace of the Greater Will
items.description: If you're lucky, your regrets can provide strength and empower your will.

items.name: Necklace of Grammamancy
items.description: Regret is only a reminder to act. Next time, laugh louder. Hit harder. Hug longer.

items.name: Flimsy Belt
items.description: It accentuates my figure.

items.name: Constellation Belt
items.description: It reminds me of the stars, even when the clouds are out.

items.name: Belt of the Beestinger
items.description: May it always guide your blows home.

items.name: Honeycombed Beestinger Belt
items.description: What's the exact opposite of a chastity belt?

items.name: Common Staff
items.description: It's not the worst staff I've ever seen.

items.name: Ringed Staff
items.description: Ringed for her pleasure. And their pain!

items.name: Beestinger Staff
items.description: Technically, Walnut found this for me. I should remember to thank her...

items.name: Ancient Staff of the Beestinger
items.description: If you sing to it just right, you may find an unlikely friend.

items.name: Dusty Jar
items.description: Do you have any eyeballs you can spare?

items.name: Half-empty Jar of Eyeballs
items.description: It was half-full, then I dropped one.

items.name: Stuffed Jar of Eyeballs
items.description: Oh, sure, now this collection is suddenly 'unnerving.'

items.name: Eyeballs of Legend
items.description: Break glass only in case of emergency. Seriously.

items.name: Smelly Pouch
items.description: Just a nice, empty bag. Nothing to clutter the mind.

items.name: Emerald Bag
items.description: Don't be absurd, dear. Do I look like I would collect 'protection payments?'

items.name: Overloaded Emerald Bag
items.description: Okay, seriously, no more emeralds.

items.name: Heirloom Bag
items.description: Fine. You know what? The Family thanks you for your generosity. Are you happy now?

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Rosie by 30%.
normal.desc: Oh, I've been known to brawl in my past.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Rosie by 60%.
normal.desc: I'm a slippery little grandma.

normal.name: Not Your Grandma's Grandma
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Sassy ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: What? Who said that? Sometimes I am!

normal.name: Sassiest Grandma
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Sassy ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Sass must be expertly allocated for maximum effect.

normal.name: Keen Mind
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Rosie by 1.
normal.desc: This mind isn't a day over 21! Keen as heck!

normal.name: Grandmother Night
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Grandma-Bod, Busy Beestinger and Slower Decay by 40%.
normal.desc: What? Who said that? Sometimes I am!

normal.name: These Hands Catch
normal.effect: Increases the max stacks of Rosie's Deflect Missiles by 50.
normal.desc: This arrow you shot at me would look REALLY good through your face.

normal.name: Halfling from Toril
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Timeless Body ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Never ask a grandma her age! Especially if your name is Perkins!

normal.name: Shadow Routine
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Timeless Body ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Do you know what I have to DO to look this good at my age?

normal.name: Best Damn Grandma
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Matriarch, Familiar Friends and Grandmother Night by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Oh, you WISH you were one of my kids!

normal.name: Beestinger Reunion
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Rosie's Matriarch, Familiar Friends and Grandmother Night by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Don't embrace me in front of my work associates!

normal.name: G-Ma Workout Routine
normal.effect: Increases the bonus Timeless Body stacks provided by Grandma-Bod by 100%.
normal.desc: Oh, you think you can handle the big kid weights? All right, try to keep up!
effects: Increases the bonus Timeless Body stacks provided by Grandma-Bod by $amount%

normal.name: Tenacious
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Rosie by 2.
normal.desc: I can take way more hits than you - here, watch!

normal.name: Heavy Lifter
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Rosie by 2.
normal.desc: Hey, think I could punch that tree in half? Let's find out!

normal.name: Tactical Prowess
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Rosie by 5%.
normal.desc: Yes. Kicking the door down IS an option.

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Rosie by 10%.
normal.desc: I may have seen some things...

normal.name: Devastating Impact
normal.effect: Increases the Crit Damage of Rosie by 30%.
normal.desc: That Orc had more teeth before, right? RIGHT?

normal.name: Cataclysmic Strike
normal.effect: Increases the Crit Damage of Rosie by 60%.
normal.desc: Don't mess with a grandma!

data.backstory: Aila was found and raised by a clan of wild elves, but never truly felt like she belonged. The tartan that was found with her is the only clue she has to her lost elven roots. Aila is stubborn and proud. Whenever anyone questions her past, she simply states 'I'm a delight!'. However, her smirk holds a lifetime of anger & questions that she's held close to her heart.
data.name: Aila

base.name: The Howling Gale
base.description: Aila attacks the nearest enemy with her warhammer, the Howling Gale, knocking them back slightly.

ult.name: Storm Herald
ult.description: Aila unleashes lightning across all her enemies, damaging and stunning all of them.
ult.long_description: Aila unleashes lightning across all enemies, damaging and stunning them for 5 seconds. Deals 10% more damage for each stack of Aerois Synergy.

abilities.name: Storm Aura
abilities.desc: A random enemy approaching the formation is zapped by lightning and becomes Primed every 8 seconds. Primed enemies take 50% more damage from all Champions.

raw.name: Storm Aura
raw.tip_text: Aila periodically Primes enemies with her lightning aura, increasing the damage they take from all Champions.

description.desc: A random enemy approaching the formation is zapped by lightning and becomes Primed every $prime_time seconds. Primed enemies take 50% more damage from all Champions.

abilities.name: Heart of the Storm
abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 25% of Aila's Max Health.

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $amount% of $source's Max Health

abilities.name: Storm Soul
abilities.desc: When Aila attacks a Primed enemy they are stunned for 2 seconds and become Electrified, increasing the damage they take from all Champions by 100% for each Electrified normal enemy on the screen, and 1000% for each Electrified boss on the screen. Stacks additively.

raw.name: Storm Soul
raw.tip_text: Aila's attacks cause Primed enemies to become Electrified, further increasing the damage they take from all Champions.

description.desc: When Aila attacks a Primed enemy they are stunned for $stun_time seconds and become Electrified, increasing the damage they take from all Champions by 100% for each Electrified normal enemy on the screen, and 1000% for each Electrified boss on the screen. Stacks additively.

abilities.name: Raging Storm
abilities.desc: Whenever Aila attacks an Electrified enemy, the Electrified state spreads to nearby enemies who are Primed, then all nearby enemies who are Electrified are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

description.desc: Whenever Aila attacks an Electrified enemy, the Electrified state spreads to nearby enemies who are Primed, then all nearby enemies who are Electrified are stunned for $stun_time seconds.

abilities.name: Shielding Storm
abilities.desc: When an Electrified enemy attacks Aila she gains a damage shield equal to 0.5% of her health times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

description.desc: When an Electrified enemy attacks Aila she gains a damage shield equal to 0.5% of her health times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy
abilities.desc: Aila contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time any Champion attacks an Electrified enemy. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Electrified enemies take additional damage equal to 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

description.desc: Aila contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time any Champion attacks an Electrified enemy. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Electrified enemies take additional damage equal to 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

specs.name: Stormcaller
specs.desc: Reduce the cooldown of Storm Aura by 3 seconds.

raw.name: Stormcaller
raw.specialization_description: Aila is one with the storm, and primes enemies more quickly.

description.desc: Reduce the cooldown of Storm Aura by 3 seconds.

specs.name: Stormbreaker
specs.desc: Doubles the stun durations of Storm Soul and Raging Storm.

raw.name: Stormbreaker
raw.specialization_description: Aila's storm is more forceful, stunning enemies for a longer duration.

description.desc: Doubles the stun durations of Storm Soul and Raging Storm.

items.name: Scraps of Fur
items.description: With my first kill, I learned to fend for myself.

items.name: Decorative Furs
items.description: Take what you can and leave nothing behind; it's the way of my people.

items.name: Hunting Furs
items.description: Poke it into a bush and it makes the perfect distraction.

items.name: Furs of the Stormbringer
items.description: Look upon the many trophies of my glorious hunts and tremble!

items.name: Snare Trap
items.description: Hunting was the first skill I learned in the lowlands.

items.name: Improved Snare Trap
items.description: From a child's toy to a tool for survival.

items.name: Catch Trap
items.description: Just add bait.

items.name: Mr Snappy the Trap
items.description: Pro tip: don't stand on it.

items.name: Weighted Hammer
items.description: It's all in the back-swing.

items.name: Survival Hammer
items.description: Can also be used to hammer in nails or crack open crustaceans. Or skulls.

items.name: Warhammer of Legend
items.description: When I lift it, you'd better run.

items.name: The Howling Gale
items.description: Given to me by the Airdeith, it brings me strength.

items.name: Tartan Scrap
items.description: I was found as a baby, wrapped in nothing but a scrap of tartan...

items.name: Clan Tartan
items.description: It's the only clue to my past, and the clan that I've lost.

items.name: Repaired Tartan
items.description: It's all I've got to find home. I'll never let it fray.

items.name: Heritage Tartan
items.description: Someone will recognize it eventually. Then I will unlock my past and my family.

items.name: Leather Coverings
items.description: Just because I'm a barbarian, doesn't mean I run around with bare feet.

items.name: Lowland Boots
items.description: Comfortable footwear is key. No one wants to run on blisters.

items.name: Strapped Boots of Strength
items.description: One of these days, these boots are going to walk all over you.

items.name: Airdeith Clan Boots
items.description: My people know how to weather the storm.

items.name: Worn Belt
items.description: Does the job.

items.name: Basic Belt
items.description: Multi-functional: can also be used as a garotte, a snare or restraints.

items.name: Airdeith Championship Belt
items.description: Behold my majesty as Airdeith's Champion Strongwoman!

items.name: Belt of the Storms
items.description: It sparks with lightning when I get angry. Would you like to see?

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I'll take the hits so you don't have to.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Nothing can stand between us and victory!

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Aila by 15%.
normal.desc: Living in the storm has toughened me up.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Aila by 30%.
normal.desc: Falling trees and flying stones couldn't take me down.

normal.name: Observant
normal.effect: Increases the Wisdom score of Aila by 1.
normal.desc: My best wisdom: Don't go outside during a storm.

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Aila takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Line them up to take them down.

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Aila takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: If I can survive the storm, I can survive this.

normal.name: Storm Warden
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Aila's Storm Soul ability by 80%.
normal.desc: You'll regret that move.

normal.name: Heavily Armored
normal.effect: Increases the health of Aila by 60%.
normal.desc: The Howling Gale is all the protection we need.

normal.name: Lightning Rod
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Aila's Aerois Synergy ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I'll bring the storm to you.

normal.name: Everything's a Nail
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Aila's Aerois Synergy ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I'm a delight.

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Put your back into it!

data.backstory: Spurt the Kobold Inventor is crafty and quick with his hands. He builds improvised weapons in the hope of gaining some new advantage in combat. Spurt never knew he would have such lasting appeal when he met a mighty group of adventurers in a cave, but here we are. Packed to the gills with his 'awesome' inventions this clever kobold brings his 11-days of life experiences to the Champions, along with a really cool 'Centi-pult'!
data.name: Spurt

base.name: Wasp Nest
base.description: Spurt tosses a wasp nest at a random enemy, dealing damage.

ult.name: You Dead!
ult.description: Spurt tosses a wasp nest at a stalking giant, and then is immediately killed.
ult.long_description: Spurt tosses a wasp nest at a stalking giant, and then is immediately killed by a giant hammer, which damages all Enemies on screen. Spurt then comes back as a spirit, increasing the effects of his abilities until he revives.

abilities.name: Heroic Sacrifice
abilities.desc: Unlocks Spurt's ultimate attack: You Dead! When Spurt uses his ultimate he becomes Spurt's Spirit until his ultimate is 10s from cooling down. While he's a Spirit, he increases the party's damage and buffs his other formation abilities in unique ways.

raw.name: Heroic Sacrifice
raw.tip_text: Spurt's ultimate causes him to temporarily sacrifice himself, increasing the effects of his other abilities.

description.desc: Unlocks Spurt's ultimate attack: You Dead! When Spurt uses his ultimate he becomes Spurt's Spirit until his ultimate is 10s from cooling down. While he's a Spirit, he increases the party's damage and buffs his other formation abilities in unique ways.

abilities.name: Centipede Net
abilities.desc: Unknown.

conditions.desc: Spurt increases the damage of Champions two slots away by $amount%
Spurt increases the damage of adjacent Champions by $amount%
^^({Spirit:}#99C7F7 This effect is increased by 2% for each second of Spurt's maximum Ultimate cooldown, stacking multiplicatively)

abilities.name: Wa-spiration
abilities.desc: Spurt gains a stack of Wa-spiration every time he attacks. Every 10 Wa-spiration stacks, Spurt invents a random effect. Effects can stack up to 5 times each and persist until the area changes.

raw.name: Wa-spiration
raw.tip_text: Spurt's attacks grant him the inspiration he needs to create new and interesting buffs for the party.

description.pre: Spurt gains a stack of Wa-spiration every time he attacks. Every $(stacks_until_effect) Wa-spiration stacks, Spurt invents a random effect. Effects can stack up to $(max_effect_stacks) times each and persist until the area changes.

conditions.desc: ^^({Spirit:}#99C7F7 Wa-spiration stacks are gained when an adjacent Champion attacks and the base multipliers of the invented effects are increased by 100%)
^^$(spurt_waspiration_v2_desc)

abilities.name: Pack Tactics

data.backstory: Qillek is timid, meek and nervous, being a comparably young character in the party and thrown into a world he doesn't understand with no wing to fly him out of a bad situation. His charisma, wit, and superiority ripped away when flying through the Valley of the Storms, taking his left wing and arm away but introducing him to H'esper, who gave him dark visions to push him forward. Inside him is an envious amount of courage and a stable sense of logic when things get dire, which has led other party members to consider him their leader. He doesn't agree with the idea, but he's not ready to let his friends down.
data.name: Qillek

base.name: Feather Flurry

ult.name: Calm Emotions
ult.description: Qillek rains purple feathers from above, calming all attacking monsters.
ult.long_description: Qillek rains purple feathers from above, calming all attacking monsters and slowing their attack speeds by 200% for the next 30 seconds, and slowing their enrage power-up timer by 200% for the next 60 seconds.

data.backstory: Raised as a gladiator in the pit arenas of Kara-Tur, Korth has since traveled the world studying fighting styles and the art of war. Korth is infamous for his skill and efficiency in battle - and for his ruthlessness, as he never spares the lives of his opponents. Those who cross Korth's path do so at their own risk.
data.name: Korth

base.name: Samurai Slice
base.description: Korth charges out and attacks the nearest non-marked enemy with his samurai sword.

ult.name: Hungry Jaws
ult.description: Korth leaps to the nearest enemy and ferociously bites them.
ult.long_description: Korth leaps to the nearest enemy and ferociously bites them, causing massive damage and a bleed for 5x the base damage over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Lizardfolk Tactics

abilities.name: Fighting Spirit

description.desc: Whenever a Champion attacks any enemy that is Marked, they gain $(amount) temporary hit points. This effect is increased by $(tank_bonus_percent)% on Champions with the Tanking role. This effect can only occur for each Champion once every $(cooldown_seconds) seconds.

raw.name: Calculated
raw.tip_text: Korth likes formations with lots of high Dexterity Champions. The more dexterity, the better he buffs!

description.desc: Korth sums up the total Dexterity scores of all Champions in the formation and increases the effect of Rapid Training by $(not_buffed amount)% for each point, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Strength Before Death
abilities.desc: Whenever any Champion is about to be killed and this ability is available, Korth prevents the death. The Champion stays at 1HP, gains the Fighting Spirit shield, and is invulnerable for 5 seconds. Then, Korth immediately makes an ultimate attack against the enemy that tried to kill the Champion. This ability has up to 3 charges and regenerates 1 charge every 1 minute.

description.desc: Whenever any Champion is about to be killed and this ability is available, Korth prevents the death. The Champion stays at 1HP, gains the Fighting Spirit shield, and is invulnerable for $(invulnerable_time) seconds. Then, Korth immediately makes an ultimate attack against the enemy that tried to kill the Champion. This ability has up to $(max_charges) charges and regenerates 1 charge every 1 minute.

data.backstory: Walnut is a child of the Enclave Panax Anima, an all-female clan of woodland defenders within the Kryptgarden Forest. Not only a frighteningly enthusiastic member of Acquisitions Incorporated, she also strives to protect the natural world by any means necessary. Did we mention she also has the goddess Mielikki living inside her? That seems important.
data.name: Walnut

base.name: Wicked Scimitar
base.description: Walnut savagely attacks the nearest enemy with her scimitar.

ult.name: Forest Friends
ult.description: Walnut summons a swarm of lovable forest friends to attack all enemies.
ult.long_description: Walnut summons a swarm of lovable forest friends to attack all enemies. Each enemy killed heals the party by 10% of their max health. If no enemies are killed, the formation gains a temporary hit point shield equal to 100% of their max health.

abilities.name: Documancer
abilities.desc: Increases the damage of adjacent champions by 10% for each enemy killed in this area. Resets when changing areas.

raw.name: Documancer
raw.tip_text: Walnut increases the damage of some Champions in the formation for each enemy killed.

conditions.desc: Increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each enemy killed in this area. Resets when changing areas.
Increases the damage of adjacent champions and champions in the top or bottom of their column by $(not_buffed amount)% for each enemy killed in this area. Resets when changing areas.
Increases the damage of champions up to two slots away by $(not_buffed amount)% for each enemy killed in this area. Resets when changing areas.
Increases the damage of adjacent champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each enemy killed in this area. Resets when changing areas.

abilities.name: Job's Done
abilities.desc: Adds a 200% bonus to Documancer for 30 seconds when completing a quest or entering a completed area. Killing enemies in completed areas resets the duration to 30 seconds.

description.desc: Adds a $amount% bonus to $(upgrade_name id) for $(duration) seconds when completing a quest or entering a completed area. Killing enemies in completed areas resets the duration to $duration seconds.

raw.name: Wolfnut

description.desc: $target uses Wild Shape to turn into a wolf whenever they are under attack, gaining $(round amount) temporary hit points for each enemy on-screen at the time of the transformation.

abilities.name: Contractual Obligations
abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 12.5% of Walnut's maximum health. This effect is doubled when in wolf form.

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $(amount)% of $source's maximum health. This effect is doubled when in wolf form.

abilities.name: Pen-Paws
abilities.desc: Increases the effect of Documancer by 200% for every 2 seconds that Walnut is in wolf form. The buff decreases every 4 seconds while $Walnut is not in wolf form.

data.backstory: Shandie grew up on the rough streets of the Lower City of Baldur's Gate. She quickly learned that if she wanted to survive, she needed to be fast on her feet and even faster with her wit and weaponry. The first time Shandie saw a bowmaster gracefully launch an arrow into a bull's-eye, she knew she had to master archery. With years of practice under her belt, any opponents underestimating this stealthy halfling will soon realize how dangerous she is as a volley of arrows bear down on them unexpectedly from shadowy corners.
data.name: Shandie

ult.long_description: Shandie bends the odds in the party's favor, throwing smoke grenades and caltrops onto the battlefield, causing enemies to take the ultimate's full damage over 10 seconds and having a 50% chance to miss their attacks during that time.

data.backstory: James Winifred Darkmagic III is the scion of a mysterious, multiplanar wizarding family. As an entertainer and purveyor of the 'Jim Darkmagic Experience,' the legendary mage can often be found in markets and town squares performing feats of mundane legerdemain. The renown he has earned for these feats is nearly equaled by the reputation that follows him as a Chief Arcanist (and occasional arsonist) for Acquisitions Incorporated.

description.desc: Increases the damage of Jim and everyone in the columns in front of and behind him by $(amount)% for each affected Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Wand of Wonder
abilities.desc:
Every 10 attacks, Jim uses his Wand of Wonder. It provides one of five random effects:  
>   
> - Turns a random enemy into a Large Warty Toad, stunning it for 5 seconds and then slowing it for 10 seconds after the stun wears off. It maintains its pre-transformation health.  
> - Turns a random enemy into an Abyssal Chicken, reducing its max health by 5 orders of magnitude to a minimum of 10.  
> - Turns a random enemy into a Mimic with 5 armored hit points that drops 10x normal gold when killed.  
> - A random ally is assigned one of their skins at random until you change areas.  
> - Jim shoots a line of gold coins out across the field, dealing damage to all enemies in a line and dropping one enemy's worth of gold.  
>   
> Note: Transformations don't affect bosses or special enemies.

description.desc: Every $(trigger_every) attacks, Jim uses his Wand of Wonder. It provides one of five random effects:^^- Turns a random enemy into a Large Warty Toad, stunning it for $(stun_time___2) seconds and then slowing it for $(slow_time___2) seconds after the stun wears off. It maintains its pre-transformation health.^- Turns a random enemy into an Abyssal Chicken, reducing its max health by $(reduce_health_orders_of_mag___3) orders of magnitude to a minimum of $(min_health___3).^- Turns a random enemy into a Mimic with 5 armored hit points that drops 10x normal gold when killed.^- A random ally is assigned one of their skins at random until you change areas.^- Jim shoots a line of gold coins out across the field, dealing damage to all enemies in a line and dropping one enemy's worth of gold.^^Note: Transformations don't affect bosses or special enemies.

items.name: Stage Gloves

items.name: Gloves of Distraction

data.backstory: Wherever the aasimar known as Turiel goes, devils and demons know to tread lightly. Acting on orders of his divine patron, Bahamut, Turiel works tirelessly to bring law, order, and justice to Toril. When not busy with inquisitions or crusades, Turiel calls the endless libraries of Candlekeep his home, studying ancient tomes and seeking guidance for his next holy mission.
data.name: Turiel

base.name: Sacred Flame
base.description: Turiel points at a random enemy and flame-like radiance strikes them from above.

ult.name: Beacon of Light
ult.description: Turiel pushes back enemies and slowly increases party damage for 30 seconds as long as no one in the party is attacked.
ult.long_description: Turiel removes his mask and becomes enveloped in a pillar of light. All enemies are pushed back and the party's damage slowly increases over 30 seconds. If a Champion gets attacked, this buff is reduced. The ultimate will end early if the party gets hit by too many attacks. During this time Turiel is immobile and doesn't attack.

data.backstory: Despite a reputation as a loud, gruff, and stinky dwarf who hates bathing, Thibbledorf Pwent is a loyal and beloved member of Clan Battlehammer. Known as 'Pwent' to his friends, he leads the Gutbusters of Mithral Hall, a dwarven battlerager squad focused on direct combat with little regard for their own safety. He wears armor completely covered in spikes to help rend the flesh of his enemies, and in the midst of battle Pwent often falls into a bloodrage, doing anything to protect his allies. While not an official member of the Companions of the Hall, Pwent will always aid his King when possible -- even beyond death...
data.name: Pwent

base.description: Pwent lowers his head and rushes to a random enemy, using his armor as a weapon to cut & injure the enemy.

If $source attacks an enemy that is already bleeding the duration is reset.

data.backstory: Avren is an embodiment of mischief; a trickster god in humanoid form. Long ago, he tricked an ancient being into giving him magic and immortality. This power also came with a curse: whenever Avren dies, he will return to life with a new body and varying abilities. While Avren's body may change, however, his soul and his undying love for his wife, Sofieus, always remains. The two have remained married for centuries, seeking each other out to reunite in each lifetime.
data.name: Avren

ult.long_description: Avren casts Reduce on all enemies on the screen, dealing some damage and reducing their size by half and their damage done by 50% for 15 seconds. He also casts Enlarge on himself for the duration, and during that time his base attack changes from Spectral Shards to Kick.

data.backstory: Sentry, protector of the Kingdom of Solwynn, is an ancient relic on her plane. Long ago, a dark power obliterated Sentry's peaceful home, forcing her to power down until a new purpose could wake her. Now, with her ceremonial axe, and memories of Solwynn guiding her, Sentry devotes herself to protecting the friends fighting alongside her. Despite being thrust into a new world eons beyond the one she knew, Sentry defends the good of the world from the dark reaches of evil's grasp. She will not fail again.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy
abilities.desc: Sentry contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy spawns, and for each second a boss has been alive. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Guardian of Solwynn is increased by 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

description.desc: Sentry contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy spawns, and for each second a boss has been alive. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Guardian of Solwynn is increased by 10% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Guardian of Solwynn
abilities.desc: Increases the damage of Champions within two slots of Sentry by 100% if Sentry is in the front-most column of the formation.

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions within two slots of Sentry by $(amount)% if Sentry is in the front-most column of the formation.

specs.name: Dedicated Guardian
specs.desc: Guardian of Solwynn is now only active if Sentry is in the front-most column of the formation, but its effect is increased by 400%.

raw.name: Dedicated Guardian
raw.specialization_description: Sentry increases her buff to damage,but only from the front

description.desc: Guardian of Solwynn is now only active if Sentry is in the front-most column of the formation, but its effect is increased by $amount%

specs.name: Nature's Wrath
specs.desc: Sentry gains the Control role and her Divine Strike has a 50% chance to ensnare affected enemies in a circle of vines, stunning them for 4 seconds.

raw.name: Nature's Wrath
raw.specialization_description: Sentry's base attacks gain a chance to ensnare affected enemies in a circle of vines, stunning them for a short time.

description.desc: Sentry gains the Control role and her Divine Strike has a $(amount)% chance to ensnare affected enemies in a circle of vines, stunning them for $(duration) seconds.

specs.name: Sentry's Homeland
specs.desc: Sentry increases her ability to buff nearby allies by a significant amount.

raw.name: Sentry's Homeland
raw.specialization_description: Sentry increases her ability to buff nearby allies by a significant amount.

items.name: Lowlands Axe
items.description: A good axe is a fine companion for the road ahead!

items.name: Convenient Axe
items.description: Well forged, well weighted. Much easier to swing!

items.name: Unflinching Axe
items.description: A wonderful axe! To drive back evil's reaching grasp!

items.name: Honored Axe of the Guardian
items.description: I feel the might of Solwynn guide my hand! It feels like home again!

items.name: Rough Board Shield
items.description: I like to feel the texture of the tree. It feels more alive.

items.name: Splintered Shield
items.description: It's taken a beating, but it's still solid.

items.name: Guardian of Solwynn's Shield
items.description: I defend the defenseless

items.name: Ancient Shield of Solwynn
items.description: My city, my history, my goal, my future.

items.name: Unkempt Vines
items.description: Sometimes its hard to keep them still during battle.

items.name: Hair Vines
items.description: They help me feel more 'human'.

items.name: Entrapping Vines
items.description: Hold onto something!

items.name: Flowering Hair Vines
items.description: Aila helps me braid them.

items.name: Green Tabard
items.description: It matches my hair vines. Seems like the logical choice.

items.name: Simple Tabard
items.description: Humans enjoy covering themselves in colorful fabric.

items.name: Versatile Tabard
items.description: Sometimes I hide warm plates under it.

items.name: Hero of Aerois Tabard
items.description: I cleaned it up after my resurrection.

items.name: Vine Bundle
items.description: Oh! Hello there!

items.name: Sentient Gem
items.description: This is Echo. They are here to help.

items.name: Echo
items.description: You think this look is cool? Just wait.

items.name: Festive Echo
items.description: Power stores depleted slightly, but the results are. . . lovely.

items.name: Ancient Belt
items.description: It holds the symbol of my city.

items.name: Solid Belt
items.description: What do you mean, 'it's for pants'?

items.name: Ceremonial Belt
items.description: Wearing this makes me feel closer to home.

items.name: Studded Belt of Solwynn
items.description: I will fight to unlock the past until my last bolt rusts.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Perhaps we should hit a bit harder next time.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Trust me. You just put the plate up to your face. Doesn't it feel wonderful!?

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Sentry by 15%.
normal.desc: I've got a spare panel here somewhere...

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Sentry by 30%.
normal.desc: Echo, to my side!

normal.name: Well Guarded
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sentry's Guardian of Solwynn ability by 40%.
normal.desc: True power comes with friends at your side.

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Sentry takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: I will not fail again.

normal.name: Her Majesty's Rose
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sentry's Guardian of Solwynn ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I shall not misuse this power.

normal.name: Heavily Armored
normal.effect: Increases the health of Sentry by 60%.
normal.desc: I can handle the drider. You should deal with the spellcaster.

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Is this how it's done? Do I look like a doll?

normal.name: Watchful Guardian
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sentry's Aerois Synergy ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I am far from my past, but exactly where I should be to assist.

normal.name: Sentinel Prime
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sentry's Aerois Synergy ability by 80%.
normal.desc: My new home will be protected.

normal.name: Sprint
normal.effect: Increases the quest requirement reduction of Echo Resolution to 30%.
normal.desc: I'm on it!

normal.effect: Increases the damage of Sentry by 400%. Sentry's attacks prevent the target from healing for 10s.
normal.desc: There is more where that came from.

normal.name: Half-Elf Glitch
normal.effect: Sentry also counts as a Half-Elf. Increases the effect of Sentry's Guardian of Solwynn ability by 20% for each Half-Elf Champion in the formation.
normal.desc: I... I can still feel a connection to The Prime Matrix.
effects: Sentry also counts as a Half-Elf

normal.name: Overdrive
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sentry's Dedicated Guardian and Sentry's Homeland by 80%. Increases the duration of Stun effects on Sentry's Base Attack by 3.2 seconds.
normal.desc: I can go further, I promise.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.

Increases the damage of all Warforged Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Krull is a death-cleric of Tiamat who swore allegiance to Arkhan the Cruel after being bested by him in combat. He's Arkhan's alchemist, his experimenter, his torturer... Always surrounded by the dead, Krull wears a white painted face mask that makes him look undead in an effort to confuse and strike fear in his opponents.
data.name: Krull

base.name: Krull's Maul
base.description: Krull attacks a random enemy with his Maul.

base.name: Necrotic Touch
base.description: Krull attacks a random enemy with his Maul. Adding a Plague if possible, or adding 2 stacks to each of their Plagues.

ult.name: Corrupted Ghouls
ult.description: Krull summons four corrupted ghouls that rush towards the nearest enemies and explode.
ult.long_description: Krull summons four corrupted ghouls that rush towards the nearest enemies and explode, damaging all nearby enemies and leaving behind pools of necrotic goo that last for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Draconic Plague
abilities.desc: Every 5 seconds, Krull applies a draconic plague to the next enemy to spawn. The plagues gain a stack every 3 seconds, increasing their power and capping at 10 stacks. Plagues can also be applied by Krull's base attack.

raw.name: Draconic Plague
raw.tip_text: Krull occasionally infects the next enemy to spawn with a Draconic Plague which can increase their damage taken, gold dropped, or make them trigger AOE damage.

description.desc: Every 5 seconds, Krull applies a draconic plague to the next enemy to spawn. The plagues gain a stack every 3 seconds, increasing their power and capping at 10 stacks. Plagues can also be applied by Krull's base attack.^$plague_description

abilities.name: Virulent Strain
abilities.desc: When an enemy with a Draconic Plague dies there is a 10% chance that its plague(s) will transfer to another enemy. It's possible for an enemy to gain multiple copies of the same plague when this occurs, which will stack multiplicatively.

description.desc: When an enemy with a Draconic Plague dies there is a $(amount)% chance that its plague(s) will transfer to another enemy. It's possible for an enemy to gain multiple copies of the same plague when this occurs, which will stack multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Arkhan's Army
abilities.desc: Krull increases the damage of all Evil Champions in the formation by 100%, reduced by 10% for each Good Champion in the formation.

raw.name: Arkhan's Army
raw.tip_text: Krull increases the damage of all evil Champions, but reduces the bonus for each good Champion in the formation.

description.desc: Krull increases the damage of all Evil Champions in the formation by $(amount)%, reduced by $(reduction)% for each Good Champion in the formation.

abilities.name: The Master's Call
abilities.desc: Krull increases the damage of Arkhan the Cruel by 400%, reduced by 75% (multiplicatively) for each slot away from Krull greater than one.

description.desc: Krull increases the damage of Arkhan the Cruel by $(amount)%, reduced by $(reduce_by_slot)% (multiplicatively) for each slot away from Krull greater than one.

abilities.name: Dark Order Synergy
abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Arkhan's Army by 100% for each Dark Order member adjacent to Krull.

description.desc: Increase the effect of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Dark Order member adjacent to $source.

specs.name: Plague Focus: {Pilfer}#0F0
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Plague: {Pilfer}#0F0 by 100%.

raw.name: Plague Focus: {Pilfer}#0F0
raw.specialization_description: Krull focuses his research on pilfering more gold from plagued foes.

specs.name: Plague Focus: {Pain}#F00
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Plague: {Pain}#F00 by 100%.

raw.name: Plague Focus: {Pain}#F00
raw.specialization_description: Krull focuses his research on inflicting more pain on plagued foes.

specs.name: Plague Focus: {Traitor}#F0F
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Plague: {Traitor}#F0F by 100%.

raw.name: Plague Focus: {Traitor}#F0F
raw.specialization_description: Krull focuses his research on increasing the traitorous tendencies of plagued foes.

items.name: Skulled Maul
items.description: Their skills were lacking.

items.name: Heavy Maul of the Ancients
items.description: These came from two who were seeking my master. They no longer matter.

items.name: Necrotic Maul
items.description: Arkhan bested me, but spared my life for an oath of servitude.

items.name: Maul of the Speechless
items.description: Screams replaced by crippling fumes. Excellent.

items.name: Experiment Book
items.description: Subject #466: Successful bone devil tail attachment. Subject stayed sane for 2 days.

items.name: Book of Plagues
items.description: Plague 42: Relieving pain by popping boils spiked mortality of the exposed by 400%

items.description: Consider vampiric components to increase bloodlust. Remember to lock door.

items.name: Krull's Book of Secrets
items.description: Arkhan gained my servitude, but I gained access TO A GOD.

items.name: Donations
items.description: You have such... interesting eyes.

items.name: Unnatural Spell Components
items.description: I said a FRESH tongue, this one is hours old!

items.name: Fae Components
items.description: The more magical the source, the more delicious the concoction.

items.name: Experimental Components
items.description: Have you ground up a unicorn horn? It rips at your soul in a way that... tickles me.

items.name: 5-Headed Dragon Symbol
items.description: She empowers my master; the one known simply as: 'The Cruel'.

items.name: Tiamat Amulet
items.description: Show them your god, then make them regret standing in her way.

items.name: Poisonous Flask of Tiamat's Rage
items.description: Do not underestimate the dragon queen's rage.

items.name: Arkhan's Tribute
items.description: My master can withstand any torture, so long as he can learn to control the hand.

items.name: Shell Fragments
items.description: They said it couldn't be done, but my mutilation is now complete.

items.name: Overwritten Carving
items.description: My shell's prayers have evolved as my eyes have been opened by my master.

items.name: Torn Fragment of Shell
items.description: I knew I was bested when Arkhan's strikes started shearing off pieces of my shell.

items.name: Arkhan's Trophy
items.description: I reconstituted it, but it was painful.

items.name: Honored Symbology
items.description: If you don't know, I can't tell you.

items.name: Symbol of the Dark Order
items.description: The first rule of the Dark Order is... well, I have to kill you now.

items.name: The Weight of Servitude
items.description: It helps to keep a watchful eye on our subjects.

items.name: Hand Painted Symbol
items.description: With Arkhan, myself, and Torogar, the Dark Order is now complete.

data.backstory: Raised by the thieves' guild in Calimport, Artemis Entreri has since become one of the deadliest and most feared assassins in the history of Faerûn. Entreri is completely devoted to mastery of his craft, leaving no room in his life for emotional attachment or even personal pleasures. His fighting skills and tactical brilliance are equalled only by one other - the drow warrior Drizzt Do'Urden.
data.name: Artemis

base.name: Vampiric Dagger
base.description: Artemis attacks the nearest enemy with his Vampiric Dagger.

ult.name: One Upped
ult.description: Artemis shows off his martial prowess, leaping out to attack whenever someone else does.
ult.long_description: For 30 seconds, Artemis concentrates on showing off his martial prowess, increasing his base damage by 300% for each DPS Champion in the formation (including himself), stacking multiplicatively. Artemis' base attack cooldown also completes whenever another DPS Champion attacks.

abilities.name: Observance
abilities.desc: Artemis observes and copies the positional formation abilities applied to other DPS Champions in the formation and gains a copy of those abilities on himself at 75% of their effectiveness, even if he himself already receives that effect.

raw.name: Observance
raw.tip_text: Artemis observes and duplicates a portion of formational abilities affecting other DPS Champions in the formation. You'll need a unique formation to take advantage of this.

description.desc: Artemis observes and copies the positional formation abilities applied to other DPS Champions in the formation and gains a copy of those abilities on himself at $(amount)% of their effectiveness, even if he himself already receives that effect.

abilities.name: Jeweled Power
abilities.desc: Whenever Artemis kills an enemy, Artemis' damage is increased by 100% (multiplicatively). There is a 10% chance per stack (additive) that Artemis' next attack deals 300% more damage and resets the stack count.

raw.name: Jeweled Power
raw.tip_text: Artemis' power increases over time as he gets kills; this power gets unleashed randomly when he attacks.

description.desc: Whenever Artemis kills an enemy, Artemis' damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% (multiplicatively). There is a $(chance)% chance per stack (additive) that Artemis' next attack deals $(extra)% more damage and resets the stack count.^$artemis_effect_description

specs.name: Observance: Friend
specs.desc: Observance's effect is increased by 10% (multiplicatively) for positional formation ability observed and copied from Champions adjacent to Artemis.

raw.name: Observance: Friend
raw.specialization_description: Artemis makes cautious friends with those around him, increasing the effect of abilities observed on them.

description.desc: Observance's effect is increased by $(amount)% (multiplicatively) for positional formation ability observed and copied from Champions adjacent to Artemis.

specs.name: Observance: Foe
specs.desc: Observance's effect is increased by 25% (multiplicatively) for positional formation ability observed and copied from Drizzt Do'Urden or Catti-brie.

raw.name: Observance: Foe
raw.specialization_description: Artemis has a keen eye for abilities copied from his lifelong nemesis, Drizzt Do'Urden and his tiresome band of companions.

description.desc: Observance's effect is increased by $(amount)% (multiplicatively) for positional formation ability observed and copied from Drizzt Do'Urden or Catti-brie.

items.name: Aged Cloak
items.description: If you see him, run. Don't think. Run!

items.name: Dark Alley Cloak
items.description: Just keep walking and hope he don't follow.

items.name: Drow Piwafwi
items.description: Is that a shadow, or URGHK!

items.name: Winged Cloak of the Assassin

items.description: It gets the job done.

items.name: Well-Balanced Sword
items.description: A masterful item for a dual-wielding devil.

items.name: Distraction Blade
items.description: He'll make ye watch the longsword, and ye'll miss the dagger till it's in yer gut.

items.name: Charon's Claw
items.description: I saw it burn the flesh right off of someone who picked it up mid-battle!

items.name: Magical Fragments
items.description: I heard someone in Luskan was looking for these.

items.name: Broken Flute
items.description: A masterful piece of art, until someone smashed it.

items.description: Playing it brings a haunted look to the eyes of the musician.

items.name: Idalia's Flute
items.description: Music can help to soothe even the most broken souls.

items.name: Hidden Dagger
items.description: They never see it coming.

items.name: Jeweled Dagger
items.description: The jewelled hilt belied the dangerous magic held within.

items.name: Vampiric Dagger
items.description: Life forces are a tricky thing.

items.name: Entreri's Shade Killer
items.description: Some say he is more shade than man now.

items.description: Not really Calimport fashion, but it works.

items.name: Horse Statue
items.description: It feels warm?

items.name: Flowing Horsehair Statue
items.description: Not to be confused with a panther.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
items.description: The magic of the statue allows you to call an ally to your side.

normal.desc: Sit down. It's done.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Artemis by 60%.
normal.desc: I'll turn them around so you can stab them. Go.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: I resent the implication.

normal.desc: The shadow is my ally.

normal.name: Weapon Master

normal.desc: As long as it doesn't talk to you, any blade will do.

normal.name: Master's Precision

data.backstory: The ranger Môrgæn is a renowned tracker and hunter, able to pinpoint-target foes at any range, then vanish into the woods with no one the wiser. Her legendary ability with the longbow and the custom arrows she crafts instills fear into the hearts of her many enemies -- and more than a few of her coworkers. Famously, she is the only member of Acquisitions Incorporated known to be paid in advance, lest a missed invoice lead to dire repercussions.
data.name: Môrgæn

base.name: Rapid Shot
base.description: Môrgæn shoots an arrow at a random target, then quickly follows up with a second arrow.
base.long_description: Môrgæn shoots an arrow at a random target, then quickly follows up with a second arrow. This arrow always targets the same enemy, even if that enemy is killed by the first arrow.

ult.name: Customized Arrow
ult.description: Môrgæn shoots a customized arrow from her quiver, with one of 3 random effects.
ult.long_description: Môrgæn pulls a customized arrow from her quiver at random, and fires this more powerful arrow towards a random enemy.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.desc: If Môrgæn's first arrow kills her target, the second arrow causes the enemy to drop a second set of gold.

description.desc: If Môrgæn's first arrow kills her target, the second arrow causes the enemy to drop a second set of gold.

abilities.name: Paid Up Front
abilities.desc: Môrgæn collects 25% of all Gold dropped by enemies, but in turn increases the Damage of adjacent Champions by 100%, increased by 5% for each order of magnitude Gold that Môrgæn has collected (stacking additively). The collected gold count persists through resets.

raw.name: Paid Up Front
raw.tip_text: Môrgæn collects a portion of the gold dropped by monsters but then buffs the formation partially based on the gold collected.

The collected gold count persists through resets.^^$paid_up_front_bonus

Môrgæn collects $amount___2% of all Gold dropped by enemies, but in turn increases the Damage of Champions ahead of Môrgæn by $amount%, increased by $increase_per_magnitude% for each order of magnitude Gold that Môrgæn has collected (stacking additively). The collected gold count persists through resets.^^$paid_up_front_bonus

Môrgæn collects $amount___2% of all Gold dropped by enemies, but in turn increases the Damage of Champions behind Môrgæn by $amount%, increased by $increase_per_magnitude% for each order of magnitude Gold that Môrgæn has collected (stacking additively). Môrgæn collects $amount___2% of all Gold dropped by enemies, but in turn increases the Damage of adjacent Champions by $amount%, increased by $increase_per_magnitude% for each order of magnitude Gold that Môrgæn has collected (stacking additively). specs.desc: Paid Up-Front continues to only apply to adjacent Champions.

raw.name: Fine As Is
raw.specialization_description: Môrgæn isn't picky. The way Paid Up-Front works now is fine with her.

description.desc: Paid Up-Front continues to only apply to adjacent Champions

specs.name: Keep Your Distance
specs.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to non-adjacent Champions.

raw.name: Keep Your Distance
raw.specialization_description: Môrgæn would like some of the less interesting Champions in your formation to please keep their distance.

description.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to non-adjacent Champions

specs.name: Monster Fodder
specs.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to Champions in front of Môrgæn.

raw.name: Monster Fodder
raw.specialization_description: Môrgæn would like to stay behind some of the tastier looking Champions in your formation. Let the monsters eat them, instead of her.

description.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to Champions in front of Môrgæn

specs.name: Stay Out Of My Way
specs.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to Champions behind Môrgæn.

raw.name: Stay Out Of My Way
raw.specialization_description: Môrgæn doesn't want to hit some of the less agile Champions in your formation with her arrows, so keep her closer to the front.

description.desc: Paid Up-Front now only applies to Champions behind Môrgæn

specs.name: Keep It Simple
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by 300%.

raw.name: Keep It Simple
raw.specialization_description: Nothing fancy here, just keep the damage flowing.

specs.name: Tight Formation
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by 75% (additively) for each Champion adjacent to Môrgæn.

raw.name: Tight Formation
raw.specialization_description: Keep our formation tight, and the benefits will be immense.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by $amount% (additively) for each Champion adjacent to Môrgæn

specs.name: Calm Under Pressure
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by 20% for each Enemy attacking a Champion within 2 slots of Môrgæn (additively), up to a max of 20 Enemies.

raw.name: Calm Under Pressure
raw.specialization_description: Yes, some people nearby are being viciously attacked, but at least the buff is getting bigger.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by $amount% for each Enemy attacking a Champion within 2 slots of Môrgæn (additively), up to a max of 20 Enemies

specs.name: The Long Game
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Paid Up-Front by 10% for every second that an enemy isn't killed, up to a max of 60 seconds; resets when an enemy is killed.

raw.specialization_description: If we just keep increasing our damage, we're bound to kill something eventually.
