items.name: Alley Blade
items.description: Don't pretend like you've never taken a blade from an alley rat...

items.name: Ancient Scimitar
items.description: I wonder how many this blade has cut down?

items.name: Blade of the Forest
items.description: Sharp, well-balanced, and deadly. Oh the scimitar? That too.

items.name: Scimitar of Lost Warriors
items.description: What do you mean, backup? I am the backup!

items.name: Leather Strap
items.description: Useful when you need to tie an opponent down.

items.name: Solid Belt
items.description: Every adventurer started somewhere. You should start with a solid belt.

items.name: Belt of the Hidden Ranger
items.description: Green is the color of profit.

items.name: Belt of Nature's Resolve
items.description: The trees have started to fight back! With... arrows! Goblins are so gullible.

items.name: Child's Bow
items.description: If it has a bowstring, I can work with it.

items.name: Well-Made Bow
items.description: Strike while the iron's hot, and the bows are strung!

items.name: Ceremonial Bow
items.description: Omin makes me wield this whenever I'm meeting a new client.

items.name: Rapid-Fire Bow
items.description: What's the point of asking questions? Shoot first.

items.name: Glass Mug
items.description: Any port in the storm, right?

items.name: Franchise Mug
items.description: Acquisitions Incorporated wants to talk to you.

items.name: Improvised Weapon
items.description: With bonus piercing damage! Acid damage too, depending on what you're drinking.

items.name: Môrgæn's Stein of Whatever
items.description: I'll have what they're having.

items.name: Nature's Arrow
items.description: I was fletching arrows from a young age.

items.name: Green-Leaf Arrow
items.description: It's time for the forest to bite back.

items.name: Smokepowder Arrow
items.description: Warning: It. Goes. Boom.

items.name: Skull-Carved Arrow
items.description: The sharper the tip, the better.

items.name: Dyed Armor
items.description: It's important for me to be able to work from the safety of the trees.

items.name: Solid Chestpiece
items.description: I can't fight with arrows sticking out of me!

items.name: Dusk-Dweller Armor
items.description: Always use your environment to your advantage.

items.name: Chestpiece of Nature's Wrath
items.description: I am a champion of nature, a hero to some, and ALWAYS paid in advance.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Sure, that works.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Who, me?

normal.name: Necessary Paperwork
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Môrgæn's Paid Up Front ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Who knows if you're going to be alive when I return?

normal.name: Red Tape
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Môrgæn's Paid Up Front ability by 40%.
normal.desc: This isn't my first adventure, you know.

normal.name: Running with the Cool Kids
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Môrgæn's Friends In Wealth ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I'll have what they're having.

normal.name: Coin in Hand
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Môrgæn's Paid Up Front ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I'll start as soon as you pay me.

normal.name: Time is Money
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Môrgæn's Friends In Wealth ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Sure, I'll help -- but you better be collecting gold for me!

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a INT score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a WIS score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Neutral Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Havilar's twin sister Farideh has always been 'the smart one' and 'the responsible one'-but that's all right, Havilar is definitely 'the tough one,' 'the funny one' and the 'pretty one' (despite being identical twins). Plus, Havilar has a hellhound! Even if it means she's a sort-of-but-not-quite Chosen of Asmodeus, too, not that anyone asked Havi about that. But he should know her glaive is as good as her right hand, and she can slice a devil just as well as an orc, a zombie, or any other villain!
data.name: Havilar

base.name: Glaive Thrust
base.description: Havilar cleaves the closest enemy with her Glaive, hitting all nearby enemies.

ult.name: Summon Imps
ult.description: Mot and another imp are summoned. The Imps attack with Fire of Asmodeus.
ult.long_description: Mot and another imp (Dembo, Olla, or Bosh) are summoned. The Imps attack with Fire of Asmodeus, dealing AoE damage. Havilar's ultimate attack is replaced with Heroic Sacrifice. The Imps stay active until Heroic Sacrifice is used.

abilities.name: Summon Imps
abilities.desc: Unlocks Havilar's Ultimate Attacks Summon Imps and Heroic Sacrifice.

raw.name: Summon Imps
raw.tip_text: Havilar summons and sacrifices her Imps using her ultimate ability. Use it at the right time to gain superior benefits!

description.desc: Unlocks Havilar's Ultimate Attacks Summon Imps and Heroic Sacrifice

abilities.name: Leadership Summit
abilities.desc: Havilar increases the damage of all Champions in the 2 columns behind her by 100%. This ability is augmented by whichever imps are currently assisting her.

raw.name: Leadership Summit
raw.tip_text: Havilar is a tank who increases the damage of those in the two columns behind her.

description.desc: Havilar increases the damage of all Champions in the 2 columns behind her by $amount___2%. This ability is augmented by whichever imps are currently assisting her.^$leadership_summit_description

abilities.name: Sister, Sister
abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Havilar's Leadership Summit by 200%, when Farideh is in the formation.

description.desc: Increase the effect of Havilar's Leadership Summit by $amount%, when Farideh is in the formation

abilities.name: Infernal Fortitude
abilities.desc: Increases the health of all other Champions in the formation by 25% of Havilar's max health.

description.desc: Increases the health of all other Champions in the formation by $(amount)% of Havilar's max health.

abilities.name: Fiendish Resolve
abilities.desc: When any Fiend is in the area, Havilar focuses less on her own attacks and more on buffing the party. Her base attack cooldown is doubled, but the effect of Leadership Summit is increased by 100%.

description.desc: When any Fiend is in the area, Havilar focuses less on her own attacks and more on buffing the party. Her base attack cooldown is doubled, but the effect of Leadership Summit is increased by 100%.^$demon_sickness_description

abilities.name: Battlemaster
abilities.desc: Each time Havilar attacks she increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each enemy she hit (additively), up to a max of 20 stacks. The effect lasts for half of Glaive Thrust's base cooldown.

conditions.desc: Each time Havilar attacks she increases the damage of all Champions by $amount___2% for each enemy she hit (additively), up to a max of $max_stacks___2 stacks. The effect lasts for all of Glaive Thrust's base cooldown.

Each time Havilar attacks she increases the damage of all Champions by $amount___2% for each enemy she hit (additively), up to a max of $max_stacks___2 stacks. The effect lasts for half of Glaive Thrust's base cooldown.

specs.name: Speedy Sacrifice
specs.desc: Decrease the cooldown of Havilar's Summon Imp ultimate to 10 seconds.

raw.name: Speedy Sacrifice
raw.specialization_description: Havilar focuses on summoning (and disposing of) her Imps at a faster rate.

description.desc: Decrease the cooldown of Havilar's Summon Imp ultimate to $amount seconds.

specs.name: Mastery of Battle
specs.desc: Increase the duration of Battlemaster's effect by 100%.

raw.name: Mastery of Battle
raw.specialization_description: Havilar focuses on maintaining her Battlemaster focus for more time.

description.desc: Increase the duration of Battlemaster's effect by $amount%.

items.name: Lost Pup
items.description: This is a hellhound? She's too cute to be scary!

items.name: Loyal Hellhound
items.description: Zoonie! Imps are not chew toys! I don't care if it squeaks when you bite it!

items.name: Warhound Mount
items.description: All right, I'm on. Let's go for a run--NO! STOP CHASING THAT OWLBEAR!

items.name: Azounarella the Devourer
items.description: ...You know what, Zoonie? You can eat as many gnolls as you can catch. Get 'em!

items.name: Justice
items.description: ...I don't think this name strikes FEAR into my enemies.

items.name: Kidney Carver
items.description: Mehen says my glaive doesn't need a name, I need to watch my stance. DISAGREE!

items.name: Eater of Her Enemies' Livers
items.description: Bonus points if you can find the liver on a hezrou when I'm finished!

items.name: Devil Slayer
items.description: That's right! Watch out, Nine Hells!

items.name: Commoner's Dress
items.description: I look anything but common in this.

items.name: Festive Wear
items.description: I asked the seamstress to add a slit in it, just in case combat breaks out.

items.name: Undercover Ball Gown
items.description: Two long sleeves, two halves of a glaive. It's perfect! As long as I don't move much.

items.name: The Fanciest Dress
items.description: Hey, I worked for this. And it is WORKING for me!

items.name: Dembo
items.description: 'You order, we act. That's the deal.'

items.name: Olla
items.description: 'When your economy becomes this inflated, you have to reset. That's the rule.'

items.name: Bosh
items.description: 'Don't turn around! The world doesn't exist behind you!'

items.name: Mot
items.description: 'Lady, I'm mostly sure you're not supposed to be doing this!'

items.name: Leftover Ribbon
items.description: Farideh, hold still--I want to see how this would look on me.

items.name: Glaive Decorations
items.description: The ribbon makes it slash faster--that does so make sense, Farideh!

items.name: Elegant Ribbon
items.description: If someone grabs me by the ribbon, worrywart, I'll chop their hands off.

items.name: Embroidered Ribbon
items.description: For your information, bossyboots, the pattern hides the dried monster brains.

items.name: Worn Chapbook
items.description: Brin and I have read this to each other about a hundred times.

items.name: The Giantess's Curse
items.description: Little did she know, the curse was true love. And also beholders.

items.name: The Secrets of the Obarskyrs
items.description: I love Brin, but his family is crazy. But also crazy entertaining.

items.name: The Lonely Widow
items.description: For best experience, get Brin to do the lonely widow's voice! Hilarious!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: You owe me one!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: A great leader needs a splash of color, don't you think?

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Havilar by 15%.
normal.desc: My glaive is more than just a weapon. It's... a big weapon.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Havilar by 30%.
normal.desc: Knock me down, and you are going to RUIN this outfit.

normal.name: Imp Brigade
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Havilar's Leadership Summit ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Meet Mot, Dembo, Ola, and Bosh. They're my posse!

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Havilar takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Sometimes, you need to block a few hits to find your opening.

normal.name: Connoisseur of Fancy Things
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Havilar by 2.
normal.desc: Look at this! I would look fantastic in this!

normal.name: Vajra's Summons
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Havilar by 1.
normal.desc: Vajra said you need me along for protection!

normal.name: Glaive Finesse
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Havilar's Leadership Summit ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Watch and follow me, but NOT TOO CLOSE!

normal.name: Heavily Armored
normal.effect: Increases the health of Havilar by 60%.
normal.desc: Do you know what? I think this is really Tiamat!

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Ok, let me recap.

normal.name: Raven Mirror
normal.effect: Havilar takes 20 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: You were always afraid it would come to this. But I was eager.

normal.name: As Good As Her Right Hand
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Havilar's Battlemaster ability by 80%.
normal.desc: You guys know I'm real good at attackin' stuff with my glaive.

normal.name: Half-Elf Glitch
normal.effect: Havilar also counts as a Half-Elf. Increases the effect of Havilar's Battlemaster ability by 20% for each Half-Elf Champion in the formation.
normal.desc: UGH, no horns? How am I supposed to look cool?!
effects: Havilar also counts as a Half-Elf

normal.name: Yuan-ti Glitch
normal.effect: Havilar also counts as a Yuan-ti. Increases the effect of Leadership Summit by 20% per unique species in the formation.
normal.desc: Somethingsss Ssstrange... Wait, WHERE IS MY HAIR?!
effects: Havilar also counts as a Yuan-ti
Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Male Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Tiefling Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a DEX score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion in the formation with a GOOD alignment.

data.backstory: An outcast even from her home city of Omu on Chult, Sisaspia does not seek wealth or glory for herself. Instead, she wishes only to hone her powers, and anyone or anything that gets in her way will learn that she has already made great strides towards doing so. A reluctant ally, she joins the Champions solely because they are a means to an end: an endless stream of foes on which to unleash and perfect her sinister machinations.
data.name: Sisaspia

base.name: Blight
base.description: Sisaspia unleashes a wave of necrotic energy upon a random enemy. Deals additional damage to plants, but no damage to undead/constructs.

ult.name: Fungal Infestation
ult.description: Sisaspia causes all of her spores currently affecting her enemies to delve deep into their targets and tear them apart from the inside, dealing massive damage.
ult.long_description: Sisaspia causes all of her spores currently affecting her enemies to delve deep into their targets and tear them apart from the inside, dealing massive damage based on the total number of spores in play.

abilities.name: Halo of Spores
abilities.desc: Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores. Every second, one of the spores shoots out and attaches itself to an enemy that is near the formation. When enemies are damaged, they take 400% additional damage over 5 seconds for each spore affecting them. Normal enemies can only be affected by 4 spores, while bosses can be affected by 10 spores. Sisaspia regenerates a spore every 4 seconds and can have up to 20 spores in her reserve.

raw.name: Halo of Spores
raw.tip_text: Sisaspia infects enemies as they approach, causing them to take additional damage over time from each attack.

conditions.desc: Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores that cause enemies to take additional damage over time when attached to them.

Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores. Every second, one of the spores shoots out and attaches itself to an enemy that is near the formation. When enemies are damaged, they take $(amount___2)% additional damage over 5 seconds for each spore affecting them. Normal enemies can only be affected by 4 spores, while bosses can be affected by 10 spores. Sisaspia regenerates a spore every 3 seconds and can have up to 30 spores in her reserve.^^$halo_of_spores_description2

Sisaspia is surrounded by a torus of necrotic spores. Every second, one of the spores shoots out and attaches itself to an enemy that is near the formation. When enemies are damaged, they take $(amount___2)% additional damage over 5 seconds for each spore affecting them. Normal enemies can only be affected by 4 spores, while bosses can be affected by 10 spores. Sisaspia regenerates a spore every 4 seconds and can have up to 20 spores in her reserve.^^$halo_of_spores_description2

abilities.name: Symbiotic Infection
abilities.desc: Sisaspia uses her reserve of necrotic spores to empower a subtle infection she maintains upon her "companions", goading them forward and hopefully assisting her in her own selfish goals. This infection increases the damage of all Champions within 2 slots of herself by 33% for each spore she has used in the current area, stacking multiplicatively, up to a maximum equal to her maximum spore reserve.

raw.name: Symbiotic Infection
raw.tip_text: Sisaspia uses the spores she has in reserve to buff nearby Champions.

description.desc: Sisaspia uses her reserve of necrotic spores to empower a subtle infection she maintains upon her "companions", goading them forward and hopefully assisting her in her own selfish goals. This infection increases the damage of all Champions within 2 slots of herself by 33% for each spore she has used in the current area, stacking multiplicatively, up to a maximum equal to her maximum spore reserve.

abilities.name: Symbiotic Healing
abilities.desc: Sisaspia's subtle infection heals damaged Champions within 2 slots of herself for 1 per second for each spore she has used in the current area, up to a maximum equal to her maximum spore reserve.

description.desc: Sisaspia's subtle infection heals damaged Champions within 2 slots of herself for $(amount) per second for each spore she has used in the current area, up to a maximum equal to her maximum spore reserve.

abilities.name: Dance of the Spores
abilities.desc: Sisaspia's maximum spore reserve is increased by the average DEX score of the formation, rounded down. Additionally, if the average DEX score is 16 or higher, the range of Halo of Spores is additively increased by 12.5% for each full point above 15.

description.desc: Sisaspia's maximum spore reserve is increased by the average DEX score of the formation, rounded down. Additionally, if the average DEX score is 16 or higher, the range of Halo of Spores is additively increased by 12.5% for each full point above 15.

specs.name: Simple Infection
specs.desc: Sisaspia concentrates on improving the effect of the subtle infections she maintains on nearby Champions.

raw.name: Simple Infection
raw.specialization_description: Sisaspia concentrates on improving the effect of the subtle infections she maintains on nearby Champions.

specs.name: Spreading Spores
specs.desc: Halo of Spores now generates a new spore every 3 seconds, and Sisaspia's maximum reserve spore count is increased by 10.

raw.name: Spreading Spores
raw.specialization_description: Sisaspia endeavours to create spores more quickly and keep more in reserve to power her subtle infections.

description.desc: Halo of Spores now generates a new spore every $amount seconds, and Sisaspia's maximum reserve spore count is increased by $amount___2.

specs.name: Fungal Body
specs.desc: The effects of Symbiotic Infection and Symbiotic Healing are increased by 400% after Sisaspia has used at least 30 spores in the current area.

raw.name: Fungal Body
raw.specialization_description: Sisaspia is one with the spores and is at her most potent when she has infected many enemies.

description.desc: The effects of Symbiotic Infection and Symbiotic Healing are increased by $amount% after Sisaspia has used at least 30 spores in the current area.^^$sisaspia_spores_used

items.name: Sinister Stick
items.description: Yes, Isn't it lovely? It's meant to distract you.

items.name: Snake-Headed Staff
items.description: How folks respond to my staff tells me if I'm safe to remove my cloak.

items.name: Solemn Staff
items.description: Drop the loot, count yourself lucky, and start running.

items.name: Serpent Scepter
items.description: Don't you love how the spores worship it?

items.name: Spare Spores
items.description: You can never have enough.

items.name: Spore Shaker
items.description: In case of emergency: throw.

items.name: Spore Garden
items.description: It would be in much better shape if we stopped walking all over the Sword Coast!

items.name: Fungal Syndicate
items.description: They each have a purpose.

items.name: Creeper Bulb
items.description: I've been studying the bulb's growth. It's terrifyingly fast. I love it!

items.name: Yellow Musk Growth
items.description: This should give my garden raider quite the fright.

items.name: Yellow-Musk Zombie Rabbit
items.description: I just call it Flopsy.

items.name: Zombie Grung
items.description: I can't tell you how many times it's gotten me out of trouble! Just let 'em loose!

items.name: Snake Ring
items.description: I feel at peace whenever I can feel it on my finger.

items.name: Tail Devouring Ring
items.description: Twisting it around has become a nervous tic. I must control it.

data.backstory: Relentlessly brave but markedly uncouth, Briv Steelmarrow is a stalwart champion of the weak, innocent, downtrodden, and oppressed. Centuries ago, a cabal of Netherese mages experimented on Briv's clan, gifting him with a magical metal inside his bones that he can pull through his skin and shape for attack or defense. Once a bloodthirsty raider, Briv sought atonement by joining the Order of the Lost Cause, an elite group of knights that travel across Faerûn, taking on quests that only fools would pursue.
data.name: Briv

base.name: Mocking Cleave
base.description: Briv cleaves a random enemy with his greatsword. Each enemy hit has a 20% chance of being taunted, switching its target to Briv.
base.long_description: Briv cleaves a random enemy with his greatsword. Each enemy hit has a 20% chance of being taunted, switching its target to Briv.

ult.name: Netherese Explosion
ult.description: Briv forces all of his remaining Netherese Metal out of his body, damaging enemies that it passes through.
ult.long_description: Briv forces all of his remaining Netherese Metal out of his body, shooting it out in an arc in front of him and damaging all enemies that it passes through. He then draws it all back into himself, dealing double damage to enemies that it hits on its way back.

abilities.name: Steelbones

abilities.name: Unnatural Haste
abilities.desc: Briv has a 0% chance of sprinting forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area, skipping the next area entirely. This action consumes 4% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least 50 stacks to occur.

conditions.desc: Briv has a chance of sprinting forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area. This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur. When you reset the adventure, all stacks of Steelbones that Briv has gained convert into stacks of Sprint. Unused Sprint stacks persist through resets.^$unnatural_haste_description

Briv sprints forward quickly on steel-springs after completing a new area, skipping the next $guaranteed_skip_amount areas entirely; Briv has a $skip_chance% chance to skip the next $skip_amount areas instead.  This action consumes $stack_consume_percent% of his Sprint stacks, and requires at least $required_stacks stacks to occur.^$unnatural_haste_description

data.backstory: Born into the royal family of Celene, he assumed the simple name of Melf eschewing a life of comfort as a noble to study the arcane arts and train as a swordsman. He delved in the dungeons of Castle Greyhawk, the Lost Caverns of Tsojcanth and many other harrowing places honing his skills, knowledge and amassing powerful magical items. Melf sees himself as a weapon of weal hurtling toward the heart of the darkest evils in the realm. He is opinionated and has a touch of conceit that he is blissfully ignorant of possessing.
data.name: Melf

base.name: Zagyg's Needle
base.description: Melf leaps out and attacks the nearest enemy with his magic spear. If he has any Minute Meteors active, he fires one at a random enemy as well.
base.long_description: Melf leaps out and attacks the nearest enemy with his magic spear. If he has any Minute Meteors active, he fires one at a random enemy as well.

description.desc: Increases the damage of Champions adjacent to Melf by $adaptive_support_base_value%. Effect increased by 50% if another elf is in the formation. Effect range increased by 2 if Melf is not in the front-most or rear-most columns. Effect increased by 25% for each unique species in the formation. ^$adaptive_support_description

Melf provides a random speed-up buff. The buff provided changes after every 50th area and draws from these three possibilities:  
> - ```$(buffed_number 25)```% chance to spawn additional enemies.  
> - Increased enemy spawn speed by $(buffed_number 25)%.

data.backstory: A scoundrel, a swashbuckler and a schemer, Krydle pretends he's not a hero, but somehow keeps finding himself on the side of light alongside his Baldur's Gate companions. Despite all his protests, Krydle is courageous when the chips are down and willing to sacrifice anything to save his newfound adventuring family.
data.name: Krydle

base.name: Reverse Pickpocket
base.description: Krydle attacks a random enemy with his daggers. He also sneaks a smokepowder bomb onto their person, which explodes after 3 seconds.
base.long_description: Krydle attacks a random enemy with his daggers. While doing so, he reverse pick-pockets a smokepowder bomb onto their person, which explodes for which deals 3 seconds of BUD damage in a small radius after 3 seconds if the enemy is not killed in the meantime.

ult.name: Distracted Strike
ult.description: Krydle appears from the shadows behind a random enemy and brutally backstabs it for massive damage.
ult.long_description: Krydle appears from the shadows behind a random enemy and brutally backstabs it for massive damage. The damage of this attack is increased by 200% for each Hero of Baldur's Gate in the formation (stacking multiplicatively).

abilities.name: From The Shadows
abilities.desc: Increase the damage of all Champions in the back two columns of the formation by 100%.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.desc: Krydle begins every area with stacks of Evasion equal to his Overwhelm. When Krydle gets attacked, as long as he has at least 1 stack of Evasion left, he dodges the attack completely and uses up 1 stack of Evasion. Krydle restores 2 stacks of Evasion every second for each Healing Champion in the formation. Number of stacks can not surpass his Overwhelm. If a boss or enemies are enraged, max stacks are divided by the enrage multiplier, rounded down.

raw.name: Evasion
raw.tip_text: Krydle can evade attacks, completely negating their effect.

description.desc: Krydle begins every area with stacks of Evasion equal to his Overwhelm. When Krydle gets attacked, as long as he has at least $(stacks_to_trigger) stack of Evasion left, he dodges the attack completely and uses up $(stacks_to_use) stack of Evasion. Krydle restores $(stacks_to_restore) stacks of Evasion every second for each Healing Champion in the formation. Number of stacks can not surpass his Overwhelm. If a boss or enemies are enraged, max stacks are divided by the enrage multiplier, rounded down.

description.desc: Krydle's base max health is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for every 50 areas completed, up to area 600.

items.name: Cracked Dagger
items.description: It's got one good use left.

items.name: Hidden Dagger
items.description: It pays to have a few in handy places.

items.name: Thrown Blade
items.description: Watch and learn.

items.name: Coran's Dagger
items.description: He's a politician in Baldur's Gate, just a guy I know.

items.name: Stiff Belt
items.description: Any belt in a storm.

items.name: Leather Belt
items.description: Look, it only has a few slash marks!

items.name: Versatile Belt
items.description: I've got what we need... hopefully.

items.name: Tools of the Trade
items.description: Shandie and I are always prepared. For the job, not for Minsc.

items.name: Tattered Cloak
items.description: Yeah. It's seen some action. Still keeps the wind at bay though.

items.name: Dark Alley Cloak
items.description: Shadows are this cloak's best friend.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Cloak
items.description: It helps you blend into the fog.

items.name: Cloak of The Blades
items.description: I ran with them for a while. It... didn't end well.

items.name: Crude Badge
items.description: Flash it quickly. Don't let them study it or they'll see the edge of the paste.

items.name: Zhent Badge
items.description: The Black Network relies on these badges to tell friend from foe.

items.name: Flaming Fist Badge
items.description: Guards, mercs, bullies. They're all the same.

items.name: Harper Badge
items.description: This can actually get us some reliable help when we need it.

items.name: Ashpowder Escape
items.description: Just make sure you throw it really hard.

items.name: Improvised Bomb
items.description: Trust me Minsc, just THROW it.

items.name: Smokepowder Spheres
items.description: If we could stay away from our normal scrums that would be great.

items.name: Smokepowder Bombs
items.description: I'll never get over that Flaming Fist guard that thought it was a candy!

items.name: Pilfered Key
items.description: Eventually, I'll find the lock it opens...

items.name: High Hall Key
items.description: It's for the High Hall in Baldur's Gate. Or at least it was the last time I broke in.

items.name: Ring of the Elves
items.description: They live in the Forest of Tethir.

items.name: The Arcanist
items.description: The land of Strahd is not one I'm eager to return to...

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I'd go to the Nine Hells and back for my friends.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: The next round is on me!

normal.name: Shadow Dealing
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krydle's From The Shadows ability by 40%.
normal.desc: It's the deals made when everyone is distracted that count.

normal.name: Harrowing History
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krydle's Charismatic Leader ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Minsc, Boo, and an ankheg walk into a tavern.

normal.name: Shadow Stalker
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krydle's From The Shadows ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Shhh. This is the best part.

normal.name: Silvertongued
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krydle's Charismatic Leader ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Listen, I've got a plan...

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Krydle takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: You THINK you have me cornered, but I have you right where I want you!

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Krydle takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: I've gotten out of worse scrapes than this.

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Krydle by 15%.
normal.desc: I'll bleed when we get to the safehouse.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Krydle by 30%.
normal.desc: Hey, free dagger. Just have to get it out -- oof!

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: You can trust me!

normal.name: Taunt
normal.effect: All Champions damage +100%. Krydle's attacks have a 50% chance to taunt enemies.
normal.desc: Is that the best you can do?

normal.name: Heavily Armored
normal.effect: Increases the health of Krydle by 60%.
normal.desc: You want me to hide in this?! Do you have a barn?

data.backstory: Jaheira is a noble-born half-elf who was raised by an enclave of druids after her family was killed. Having gained an understanding of balance, she resolved to serve nature with the skills the druids taught her. She was recruited by the Harpers, where she met her late husband, Khalid. Jaheira knows life isn't black and white. She lives in the balance, as nature demands.
data.name: Jaheira

base.name: Tangling Scimitar
base.description: Jaheira attacks the nearest enemy with her scimitar, dealing BUD damage and rooting them and nearby enemies in place with vines.
base.long_description: Jaheira attacks the nearest enemy with her scimitar and then summons roots to hold them in place for 3 seconds. The roots also damage and root other nearby enemies.

ult.name: Insect Plague
ult.description: Jaheira blankets the area in front of the party with a swarm of insects for 30 seconds, dealing a small amount of damage to all enemies within the swarm every half-second.
ult.long_description: Jaheira blankets the area in front of the party with a swarm of insects for 30 seconds, dealing a small amount of damage to all enemies within the swarm every half-second.

abilities.name: Fierce Hunter
abilities.desc: beast enemies are Jaheira's Favored Foe. When an enemy of her Favored Foe type is attacked (by any Champion), Jaheira gains a Hunter stack. This increases her damage by 200% per stack and increases the effect of Class Act by 100% per stack, stacking additively. Maximum 20 stacks. Stacks are reset when you change areas.

raw.name: Fierce Hunter
raw.tip_text: Jaheira is a fierce hunter of certain creatures. Killing those enemies buff her other abilities.

description.desc: $(text_key tag___3) enemies are Jaheira's Favored Foe. When an enemy of her Favored Foe type is attacked (by any Champion), Jaheira gains a Hunter stack. This increases her damage by $(not_buffed amount)% per stack and increases the effect of Class Act by $(not_buffed amount___2)% per stack, stacking additively. Maximum $(max_stacks) stacks. Stacks are reset when you change areas.

abilities.name: Battle Focus
abilities.desc: After 20 of Jaheira's Favored Foes have been killed, this ability activates and she becomes more focused, increasing the effects of Fierce Hunter by $(not_buffed amount)% until you change areas.

description.desc: After $(favored_foes_kills_to_trigger) of Jaheira's Favored Foes have been killed, this ability activates and she becomes more focused, increasing the effects of Fierce Hunter by $(not_buffed amount)% until you change areas.

abilities.name: Persistent Focus
abilities.desc: Jaheira gains 1 stack of Persistent Focus every 30 seconds while Battle Focus is active, and 1 stack when it expires. This increases the damage of all Champions, including herself, by $(not_buffed amount)% per stack, stacking additively.

description.desc: Jaheira gains $(time_stack) stack of Persistent Focus every $(stack_time) seconds while Battle Focus is active, and $(expire_stack) stack when it expires. This increases the damage of all Champions, including herself, by $(not_buffed amount)% per stack, stacking additively.

abilities.name: Unity
abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Class Act by 200% for each Champion affected by it, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Increase the effect of Class Act by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion affected by it, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Ancient Scimitar
items.description: Don't ignore gear that skeletons carry.

items.name: Harper's Blade
items.description: Tread lightly. You must show respect.

items.name: Silent Scimitar
items.description: I cleared half of camp before Minsc tripped and woke them all up.

items.name: Tethyrian Blade
items.description: A blade crafted for noble families.

items.name: Simple Necklace
items.description: It may be simple, but it means the world to me.

items.name: Rejuvenating Necklace
items.description: It makes me feel like.. we're together again.

items.name: Aquamarine Necklace
items.description: Khalid is always close to my heart

items.name: Khalid's Gift
items.description: Let my love guide the way.

items.name: Iron Pin
items.description: The Harpers have been keeping the balance for more than a century.

items.name: Harp Pin
items.description: This can be stronger than chainmail.

items.name: Harper Coin
items.description: Mirt knows to look for this.

items.name: Harper Pin
items.description: Those who wear this live by Harper code.

items.name: Lost Cloak
items.description: Darkness falls and nature sleeps. Why do we still tramp about?

items.name: Ragged Cloak
items.description: You asked for help. How I look does not matter.

items.name: Fur Cloak
items.description: Nights are cold. Guard duty is long. I come prepared.

items.name: Cloak of Nature's Guardian
items.description: Remove yourselves from this area before I do it for you.

items.name: Plant Paste
items.description: Minsc only lets me treat his wounds if I call it plant paste.

items.name: Nature's Balm
items.description: What you need, nature can provide.

items.name: Aloe Lotion
items.description: This is Imoen's favorite.

items.name: Zurkhwood Bark Balm
items.description: Deekin says it's good for hair. Not sure I trust them...

items.name: Runt of the Litter
items.description: You see runt. I see fighter.

items.name: Sleepy Pooch
items.description: How are you never where I leave you?

items.name: Poochie
items.description: Yes, oh omnipresent authority figure?

items.name: Solemn Watchdog
items.description: Poochie is in charge till I return. Make sure to tell Jarlaxle.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Jaheira by 30%.
normal.desc: You are amusing, in a 'what the hell is wrong with you' kinda way.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Jaheira by 60%.
normal.desc: Nature's servant awaits.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: No sorrow for those lost in righteous battles.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Nature be well-armed and demands so of her servants!

normal.name: Gate Warden
normal.effect: Increase the effect of Jaheira's Class Act ability by 40%.
normal.desc: You couldn't have made a better choice.
effects: Increase the effect of Jaheira's Class Act ability by $(amount)%.

normal.name: Unerring Aim
normal.effect: Decreases the stack time of Jaheira's Persistent Focus to 20 seconds.
normal.desc: I'll finish this fight!
effects: Decreases the stack time of Jaheira's Persistent Focus to 20 seconds.

normal.name: Dogged Pursuit
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jaheira's Fierce Hunter ability by 20%.
normal.desc: There's nowhere you can go that I can't track you.

normal.name: Wild Stalker
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jaheira's Fierce Hunter ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The forest is my home, my friend -- you're out of your depth.

normal.name: Thrill of the Hunt
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jaheira's Fierce Hunter ability by 80%.
normal.desc: You won't escape me!

normal.name: Clear the Field
normal.effect: Decreases the stack time of Jaheira's Persistent Focus to 10 seconds.
normal.desc: I'll stop when every enemy is down!
effects: Decreases the stack time of Jaheira's Persistent Focus to 10 seconds.

normal.name: Swift
normal.effect: Increases the Dexterity score of Jaheira by 2.
normal.desc: They'll never see us coming!

normal.name: Illithid Tadpole
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%. Additively increases Ceremorphosis Stacks by 1.
normal.desc: I am only doing this to save Baldur's Gate...

normal.name: Sylvan Calling
normal.effect: Increase the effect of Jaheira's Class Act ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I'm getting in touch with my roots.

data.backstory: Nova V'ger has a voracious appetite for knowledge; she needs to know anything and everything about anything and everything. Her magic powers have been gifted to her by a mysterious entity called Tiangong. She dreams of travelling to the stars and discovering the location of the true genasi homeworld.
data.name: Nova

base.name: Dissect
base.description: Nova leaps out and slices through the nearest enemy with Tiangong.
base.long_description: Nova leaps out and slices through the nearest enemy with Tiangong. If her attack kills the enemy, it drops a monster heart.

base.name: Dissect
base.description: Nova leaps out and slices through and slows the nearest enemy with Tiangong.
base.long_description: Nova leaps out and slices through and slows the nearest enemy with Tiangong. If her attack kills the enemy, it drops a monster heart.

ult.name: Activate Tiangong
ult.description: Nova levitates with Tiangong, releasing three waves of blue energy damaging all enemies.
ult.long_description: Nova levitates up in the air as Tiangong floats in front of the formation, releasing three waves of blue energy that deal damage to all enemies. The damage is increased by 1% times to total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Curiosity
abilities.desc: Nova is intrinsically curious about the creatures inhabiting the world. She inspects enemies as soon as they spawn, increasing their damage taken by 100%. This increases by 10% (additively) every second they are alive, to a cap of 1000% (90 seconds). This ability is increased by 200% if Nova is in the front-most column of the formation.

raw.name: Curiosity
raw.tip_text: Nova is intrinsically curious about the world around her. She increases the damage done to creatures the longer they are alive.

description.desc: Nova is intrinsically curious about the creatures inhabiting the world. She inspects enemies as soon as they spawn, increasing their damage taken by $amount%. This increases by 10% (additively) every second they are alive, to a cap of 1000% (90 seconds). This ability is increased by 200% if Nova is in the front-most column of the formation.

abilities.name: The Crew
abilities.desc: Nova increases the damage of Champions within two slots by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion level on the affected Champions, stacking multiplicatively. Each Champion's contribution caps at 1000 levels after their last available upgrade.

raw.name: The Crew
raw.tip_text: Nova increases the damage of all nearby Champions based on the sum of their levels.

description.desc: Nova increases the damage of Champions within two slots by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion level on the affected Champions, stacking multiplicatively. Each Champion's contribution caps at $(max_level_contribution_after_last_upgrade) levels after their last available upgrade.

abilities.name: Protective Field
abilities.desc: Nova increases the max health of all other Champions by 25% of her base max health.

description.desc: Nova increases the max health of all other Champions by 25% of her base max health.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy
abilities.desc: Nova contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy is stunned, rooted, or slowed. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. The Crew is increased by 20% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

description.desc: Nova contributes one stack to Aerois Synergy every time an enemy is stunned, rooted, or slowed. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5 (rounded down). 50% of her contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. The Crew is increased by 20% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Slow
abilities.desc: Nova's attacks slow the movement of enemies she damages by 50% for 5 seconds. Enemies that are Slowed by this ability deal half damage to Nova. This effect does not stack if it is applied again before it expires, but the cooldown is refreshed.

description.desc: Nova's attacks slow the movement of enemies she damages by 50% for 5 seconds. Enemies that are Slowed by this ability deal half damage to Nova. This effect does not stack if it is applied again before it expires, but the cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Failsafe
abilities.desc: When Nova becomes Overwhelmed, Tiangong creates a protective barrier around her and all other Champions in her column, granting them each 250% of Nova's max health as temporary HP. The effect of The Crew is increased by 400% for each Champion's shield that remains in place (stacking multiplicatively). Nova is stunned until the shield is broken or she is no longer overwhelmed. This can only trigger once per area. Changing areas resets it so it can happen again, but also resets the damage bonus and un-stuns Nova.

description.desc: When Nova becomes Overwhelmed, Tiangong creates a protective barrier around her and all other Champions in her column, granting them each 250% of Nova's max health as temporary HP. The effect of The Crew is increased by 400% for each Champion's shield that remains in place (stacking multiplicatively). Nova is stunned until the shield is broken or she is no longer overwhelmed. This can only trigger once per area. Changing areas resets it so it can happen again, but also resets the damage bonus and un-stuns Nova.

abilities.name: Discovery
abilities.desc: Unknown.

conditions.desc: Nova increases the damage of the $number_of_targets Champions in the formation with the highest Intelligence score by $amount%. This effect is buffed by $monster_heart_buff% for each monster heart she has collected (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively), and $monster_brain_buff% for each monster brain she has collected (stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively).^Heroes of Aerois are automatically buffed by Discovery and are not included in the calculations for highest INT score.

Nova increases the damage of the $number_of_targets Champions in the formation with the highest Intelligence score by $amount%. This effect is buffed by $monster_heart_buff% for each monster heart she has collected (stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively), and $monster_brain_buff% for each monster brain she has collected (stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively).
^^$nova_discovery

specs.name: New Recruits
specs.desc: The Crew now applies to all Champions within 3 slots, but the extra Champions are only counted towards its levels total at 50% effectiveness.

raw.name: New Recruits
raw.specialization_description: Nova focuses on expanding her crew

description.desc: The Crew now applies to all Champions within 3 slots, but the extra Champions are only counted towards its levels total at 50% effectiveness.

specs.name: Tight Knit
specs.desc: Increases the effect of The Crew by 100%.

raw.name: Tight Knit
raw.specialization_description: Nova focuses on her closest crewmates

description.desc: Increases the effect of The Crew by 100%

items.name: Explorer's Goggles
items.description: They put an amazing hue on everything! Try them!

items.name: Safety Goggles
items.description: Because Safety is Sexy.

items.name: Forge Goggles
items.description: Eyes work MUCH better when they aren't exposed to excess heat. I tested.

items.name: Amplifying Lenses of the Explorer
items.description: I'm trying to get a better look, but Quill keeps getting in my light!

items.name: Crystal Fragment
items.description: I'm sure it controls something. Let's keep searching.

items.name: Dark Crystal
items.description: We found it on the orbital citadel, Aegis V.

items.name: Crystal Handle
items.description: If I could harness its knowledge, that'll give us the edge over Starbane.

items.name: Contentious Crystal
items.description: I've been speaking with it. It makes sense...I just. NO! Don't touch it!

items.name: Necro-Hand
items.description: Oh dear, it smells really bad.

items.name: The Aegis V Sacrifice
items.description: The price for saving my friends. I'd do it again without question!

items.name: Hidden Injury
items.description: Huh? You can heal it? Yes. Yes, please!

items.name: Golden Gauntlet
items.description: A couatl gifted me with my restored hand! She was beautiful.

items.name: Genasi Texts
items.description: Just stories I wrote about home. My old home, that is. It's - It's a long story.

items.name: Secrets of Aerois
items.description: What is it that makes Aerois so special? Can it be the key to saving the universe?

items.name: Professor Whitsong's Book
items.description: 'A Short History of the Wonders and Dangers of Planar Magic.' She wrote it herself!

items.name: Nova V'Ger's Notebooks
items.description: Volume 24, pertaining to the location of planetary bodies within the Astral Sea.

items.name: Ragged Scarf
items.description: Okay, so maybe it needs a wash.

items.name: Worn Scarf
items.description: Keeping my neck warm helps me to think.

items.name: Mother's Scarf
items.description: She knitted it from the finest wool, each color representing our family.

items.name: Genasi Weave
items.description: To keep me warm and safe, no matter how far I find myself from Ma.

items.name: Ancient Blade
items.description: It called to me from the dark.

items.name: Glowing Blade
items.description: Its light is what guided me to find it aboard that crashed skiff.

items.name: Hexblade
items.description: I need more fragments, so I can piece it back together. This is important!

items.name: Tiangong
items.description: Just one part of the Eternal Triumvirate. Will I ever hear them speak?

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: The needs of the many, you know how it goes.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: ME?? I mean...uh...We can do this! Yay! Go us!

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Nova by 15%.
normal.desc: I'd recalculate your odds, but that's just me.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Nova by 30%.
normal.desc: What? My Ma always taught me to dress in layers!

normal.name: Naive
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's The Crew ability by 20%.
normal.desc: With a name like Brookstone, I'm sure we can trust him!

normal.name: Explorer
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's The Crew ability by 40%.
normal.desc: So what planet are we on again?

normal.name: Mathematics
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's Curiosity ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I'm happy to wait here till my theory is confirmed.

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Nova takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Perhaps we can talk this out? No?

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Nova takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: You've handled worse, Nova. You've definitely handled worse.

normal.name: Star-Bound Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's Aerois Synergy ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Have you ever seen so many beautiful worlds?

normal.name: Merry Crew
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's Aerois Synergy ability by 80%.
normal.desc: If we all work together, what could go wrong?

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Oh, you want me to lead? Well...Let's go team!

normal.name: United Crew
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's The Crew ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I'm open to suggestions...

spoilers.name: Applied Mathematics
spoilers.effect: Increases the effect of Nova's Curiosity ability by 80%.
spoilers.desc: Now that it's confirmed, let's put my theory to the test.

data.backstory: Freely has travelled across multiple Planes, but he has always had his luck to keep him safe. Even an unfortunate detour into being trapped as an Illithid ultimately led him into the company of his new friends! Armed with the magic in his blood, and the Faith that flows through his sword, he always seeks to destroy evil wherever he can sense it. Freely prefers to act first and think later, since hey, things always tend to work out for him anyway, right?
data.name: Freely

base.name: Eldritch Blast

ult.name: I Will Not Deafen

ult.long_description: Freely grabs his sword and smashes into his opponent for massive damage. He also applies or refreshes all four Lucky Breaks on that enemy, if it is unlucky enough to survive.

data.backstory: Beadle may not have the strength of his best friend Grimm, but his quick wit and sharp instincts have saved the day more times than he can count. Whether managing the Giant's Bane Tavern or outsmarting enemies, Beadle brings cunning to every adventure.
data.name: Beadle

ult.name: Arcane Strike
ult.description: Beadle attacks all enemies, dealing ultimate damage and stunning them.
ult.long_description: Beadle teleports and blasts all enemies with arcane magic, dealing ultimate damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Inseparable
abilities.desc: Beadle & Grimm are so inseparable that if either one qualifies for an adventure restriction based on their tags, ages, ability scores, etc., then both can be used.

description.desc: Beadle & Grimm are so inseparable that if either one qualifies for an adventure restriction based on their tags, ages, ability scores, etc., then both can be used.

abilities.name: Ultimate Tag Team
abilities.desc: When Grimm uses his ultimate ability in the same party as Beadle, Beadle's ultimate ability goes on cooldown and he gains one Tag Team stack. For each Tag Team stack Beadle has, his ultimate cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, and his next ultimate attack deals 200% more damage, stacking multiplicatively. Tag Team stacks cap at 10 and reset when Beadle uses his ultimate ability.

data.backstory: Omin Dran built the organization called Acquisitions Incorporated to facilitate his quest to find his true sister, at least in part. Despite his unprecedented success in establishing the market for franchised adventuring across the Sword Coast and beyond, Omin's full measure eludes most people. He is known to be a worshiper of Tymora, ruthless in matters of business, feckless in matters of love, and hopeless in games of chance. He is often accused of being a Masked Lord of Waterdeep, though that would explain some things...
data.name: Omin

data.backstory: Born in The Cogs beneath Sharn's Lower City, Lazaapz's remarkable intellect elevated her to the Tradefair district, where her mechanical genius became highly sought after by the Dragonmarked Houses. Lazaapz's first invention was a functional mechanical arm to replace the one she was born without; now she leads an elite team of engineers in cutting edge research and development. Following the discovery of a mysterious Eldritch Machine, Lazaapz was brought in by House Cannith to ascertain the purpose of the device. Shortly after, both Lazaapz and the machine disappeared, never to be seen again.

data.backstory: Dragonbait is a champion of good and a saurial - a species that originated on a distant world and whose members have long lives. Very few saurials dwell in the Forgotten Realms, and no saurial communities are believed to exist anywhere in the world. The saurial's language is a combination of clicks and whistles beyond the human range of hearing, so Dragonbait relies on 'shouting' scents to communicate emotions. Dragonbait's known scents include: brimstone (confusion), roses (sadness), lemon (pleasure or joy), baked bread (anger), violets (danger or fear), honeysuckle (tenderness or concern), wood smoke (devotion or piety), tar (victory or celebration), and ham (nervousness or worry).

Any Fiends or Undead left alive are marked with an overlay of the Holy Avenger. Champions who attack marked enemies deal 400% additional damage.

data.backstory: Ulkoria has defended Waterdeep with her magic more times than she can recall. She is a well-respected member of the Watchful Order, often working closely with The Blackstaff on the city's defense. Known only as 'the Gargoyle' by most, her face often locks into a scowl of concentration. Few have withstood her withering stares without relenting.

abilities.name: Watchful Order
abilities.desc:
Ulkoria provides additional buffs based on the number of Spellcaster School stacks she has.  
> 3+ stacks: Attack speeds of Champions counting towards Spellcaster School are reduced by 300 sec.  
> 5+ stacks: Increase the positional formation ability effects of Champions counting towards Spellcaster School by 300% for each stack.  
> 7+ stacks: Each time a Champion counting towards Spellcaster School attacks there is a 50% chance that their base attack cooldown will immediately reset.  
> 9+ stacks: Increase the base value of Spellcaster School by 200%.

data.backstory: There's savage, and then there's Torogar. Few had even survived a head-to-head match with him before he ran into Arkhan the Cruel. He was known worlds over as an unstoppable brute. Now, as a part of the Dark Order, Torogar leads armies and communes with a god, but he's always down for another one-on-one match.

conditions.desc: Whenever Torogar's Zealot stacks reaches a multiple of 50, Torogar enters a Blood Rage for 45 seconds. While active, if Torogar fails to kill an enemy he adds a Mark of Tiamat to them, increasing damage taken from all Champions by 300%. At several Zealot Stack levels Blood Rage adds additional benefits.

Whenever Torogar's Zealot stacks reaches a multiple of 50, Torogar enters a Blood Rage for $amount seconds. While active, if Torogar fails to kill an enemy he adds a Mark of Tiamat to them, increasing damage taken from all Champions by 300%. At several Zealot Stack levels Blood Rage adds additional benefits.

data.backstory: Ezmerelda (Ez) d'Avenir, a legendary monster hunter, has devoted herself to ridding the world of evil in all of its forms. After years of tutelage by her mentor, the vampire hunter Rudolph van Richten, Ez struck out on her own. She has since amassed a sizable personal fortune and an impressive arsenal of weapons for hunting monsters. Following the defeat of Strahd von Zarovich, Ez joins the Champions on their journeys through the world of Toril.
data.name: Ezmerelda

base.name: Fire Bolt
base.description: Ezmerelda hurls a mote of fire at a random enemy.
base.long_description: Ezmerelda hurls a mote of fire at a random enemy.

ult.name: My Signal
ult.description: Ezmerelda attacks the enemy with the highest health, greatly debuffing them.
ult.long_description: Ezmerelda attacks the enemy with the highest health, greatly debuffing them. The debuff gets stronger with each debuff applied in the current area.

abilities.name: Training Montage
abilities.desc: Ezmerelda marks enemies that she attacks, training other Champions to spot their vulnerable points. Marked enemies take 50% more damage from all Champions for each Debuff Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Training Montage
raw.tip_text: Ezmerelda debuffs enemies as she strikes them, causing them to take more damage when attacked by any Champion.

description.desc: Ezmerelda marks enemies that she attacks, training other Champions to spot their vulnerable points. Marked enemies take $amount% more damage from all Champions for each Debuff Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Preparation
abilities.desc: Every time a debuff is applied to an enemy, the effect of Training Montage is increased by 10%, stacking multiplicatively, up to 100 times and resetting when changing areas.

description.desc: Every time a debuff is applied to an enemy, the effect of Training Montage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively, up to $max_stacks times and resetting when changing areas.

abilities.name: Threat Tracking
abilities.desc: Undead are Ezmerelda's favored foes. Whenever one of Ezmerelda's favored foes are killed while she is in the formation, she tracks it, increasing the base effect of Training Montage by $amount% for each favored foe killed (additively then multiplicatively). These stacks persist for the entire adventure, resetting when you complete it. Caps at 100000 favored foe kills.

raw.name: Threat Tracking
raw.tip_text: Ezmerelda increases her debuffs as the Champions defeat more undead, her favored foe. Ezmerelda can add additional favored foes with feats.

description.desc: Undead are Ezmerelda's favored foes. Whenever one of Ezmerelda's favored foes are killed while she is in the formation, she tracks it, increasing the base effect of Training Montage by $amount% for each favored foe killed (additively then multiplicatively). These stacks persist for the entire adventure, resetting when you complete it. Caps at $max_stacks favored foe kills.

abilities.name: Enemies In The Mist
abilities.desc: While Ezmerelda is in the formation, 0-2 "Mist" enemies can spawn with each wave. When a "Mist" enemy is defeated, an enemy whose type matches one of Ezmerelda's favored foes appears from the mist, and all nearby enemies gain the Training Montage debuff.

description.desc: While Ezmerelda is in the formation, 0-2 "Mist" enemies can spawn with each wave. When a "Mist" enemy is defeated, an enemy whose type matches one of Ezmerelda's favored foes appears from the mist, and all nearby enemies gain the Training Montage debuff.

specs.name: We've Trained For This
specs.desc: Ezmerelda gains the Breaker role, and all Champions deal 100% more damage against enemies with armor-based health, increasing their chance of breaking an armor piece. Additionally, if a hits-based or armor-based enemy is affected by Training Montage, successful hits against them remove an additional hit or armor piece.

raw.name: We've Trained For This
raw.specialization_description: Ezmerelda expands her training regiment to concentrate on well-armored foes.

description.desc: Ezmerelda gains the Breaker role, and all Champions deal $amount% more damage against enemies with armor-based health, increasing their chance of breaking an armor piece. Additionally, if a hits-based or armor-based enemy is affected by Training Montage, successful hits against them remove an additional hit or armor piece.

specs.name: Vampire Hunter
specs.desc: The effect of Training Montage is increased by 400% on enemies who are one of Ezmerelda's favored foes, and Threat Tracking counts each favored foe killed twice.

raw.name: Vampire Hunter
raw.specialization_description: Ezmerelda focuses on dispatching her favored foes quickly and efficiently.

description.desc: The effect of Training Montage is increased by $amount% on enemies who are one of Ezmerelda's favored foes, and Threat Tracking counts each favored foe killed twice.

raw.specialization_description: Ezmerelda steels herself in preparation when participating in adventures that Strahd has taken an interest in.

data.backstory: Penelope 'Half-Pint' is a halfling who just wants to be everyone's best friend, even if they are evil, or a plant, or a rock. With friends that already include a treant named Neverember, and a clan of chwinga that have adopted her, Penelope is ready for anything! She has the heart of a true hero and will always stand by her friends, until she goes into shrub mode of course.
data.name: Penelope

base.name: Go Away
base.description: Penelope jumps out and hits the closest enemy with her quarterstaff, dealing damage and knocking it back slightly.

ult.name: Erupting Earth
ult.description: A fountain of churned earth and stone erupt under the nearest enemy, dealing area damage in a large radius and creating difficult terrain that lasts for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: A fountain of churned earth and stone erupt under the nearest enemy, dealing area damage in a large radius and creating difficult terrain that slows enemies in it by 50% and lasts for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Have You Met My Friends
abilities.desc: Whenever Penelope attacks an enemy and doesn't kill it, for the next 30 seconds, all Champions deal 500% additional damage against them.

raw.name: Have You Met My Friends
raw.tip_text: Penelope causes enemies she hits but doesn't kill to take additional damage from other Champions.

description.desc: Whenever Penelope attacks an enemy and doesn't kill it, for the next 30 seconds, all Champions deal $(amount)% additional damage against them.

abilities.name: Insect Plague
abilities.desc: Upon entering an area, Penelope summons 4 medium-sized, randomly positioned Insect Swarms on the enemy's side of the battlefield. Enemies who are in a Swarm are slowed by 100% and are afflicted by the Have You Met My Friends debuff. The slow effect can stack multiplicatively if an enemy is inside multiple Swarms. Every second an enemy is in a swarm, its slowing effect is reduced by 1%. When the slow effect reaches 40%, the swarm is dispersed and disappears.

description.desc: Upon entering an area, Penelope summons 4 medium-sized, randomly positioned Insect Swarms on the enemy's side of the battlefield. Enemies who are in a Swarm are slowed by $(amount)% and are afflicted by the Have You Met My Friends debuff. The slow effect can stack multiplicatively if an enemy is inside multiple Swarms. Every second an enemy is in a swarm, its slowing effect is reduced by $(slow_reduction_per_second)%. When the slow effect reaches $(min_slow_amount)%, the swarm is dispersed and disappears.

abilities.name: Chwinga Mask
abilities.desc: When any enemy enters one of Penelope's Insect Swarms, Penelope dons her chwinga mask, calling an elemental friend to her aid. It sits on her shoulder while her mask is on. All Champions adjacent to Penelope gain the following charm(s) based on their tags. Charms last until the party changes areas.

raw.name: Chwinga Mask
raw.tip_text: When an enemy enters one of Penelope's Insect Swarms, she buffs the formation based on Champions around her.

description.pre: When any enemy enters one of Penelope's Insect Swarms, Penelope dons her chwinga mask, calling an elemental friend to her aid. It sits on her shoulder while her mask is on. All Champions adjacent to Penelope gain the following charm(s) based on their tags. Charms last until the party changes areas.

conditions.desc: ^^Healing Charm: Penelope heals affected Champions for $(amount___2) HP every second.^^Tools for the Job Charm: Penelope increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount___3)% for each Champion affected by this charm. This effect stacks multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Story Time
abilities.desc: Each time a Champion adjacent to Penelope attacks, add a stack of Story Time. The party's gold find is increased by 1% for each stack of Story Time, stacking additively. Story Time stacks are capped at 1000000000. Whenever a boss enemy enters an Insect Swarm, the number of Story Time stacks are increased by 2.5%.

description.desc: Each time a Champion adjacent to Penelope attacks, add a stack of Story Time. The party's gold find is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each stack of Story Time, stacking additively. Story Time stacks are capped at $(max_stacks). Whenever a boss enemy enters an Insect Swarm, the number of Story Time stacks are increased by $(boss_percent)%.

specs.desc: Each time one of Penelope's Insect Swarms is dispersed, another smaller swarm appears randomly (preferring to appear on an enemy if possible), damaging enemies in it for 15 seconds of BUD damage and slowing them using the same rules as the original Insect Plague. These smaller swarms do not spawn additional ones when they disperse.

description.desc: Each time one of Penelope's Insect Swarms is dispersed, another smaller swarm appears randomly (preferring to appear on an enemy if possible), damaging enemies in it for $(seconds_of_bud) seconds of BUD damage and slowing them using the same rules as the original Insect Plague. normal.name: After You Left...
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Penelope's Story Time ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Once in a lifetime for sure!

normal.name: Growing Friendships

normal.desc: I cherish our time together!

normal.effect: Increases the effect of Penelope's Friends Specialization abilities by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Aw, I just love you all so much.
