data.backstory: Lucius Virion-Elluin Elenasto was born to high nobility. He thought he knew what he was getting into when he joined the Heroes of Aerois, but then he met his first cow. Dreadful, evil creatures. Lucius is slowly coming out of his nobility shell as he continues to learn the true value of comradery, friendship, and a world without barriers.
data.name: Lucius

base.name: Acid Splash
base.description: Lucius attacks a random enemy with Acid Splash, dealing damage. Prefers enemies not affected by acid.

ult.name: Prismatic Spray
ult.description: Lucius attacks with a cone of prismatic energy dealing damage and applying both Arcane Chromat debuffs.
ult.long_description: Eight multicoloured rays flash from Lucius' hand in a cone shape. Each enemy in the cone takes damage and receives both the Arcane Chromat - Acid and Arcane Chromat - Cold.

abilities.name: Arcane Chromat - Acid
abilities.desc: Enemies damaged by Acid Splash gain one stack of Acid. Each enemy can have up to 10 stacks of Acid. Acid stacks last until the enemy is defeated. Enemies affected by Acid take 400% more damage per stack (stacking multiplicatively) from Lucius' subsequent Acid attacks. Armored enemies affected by at least one stack of Acid lose twice as many armored hit points when Lucius damages them with Acid attacks.

raw.name: Arcane Chromat - Acid
raw.tip_text: Lucius deals extra damage to enemies the more times he attacks them.

description.desc: Enemies damaged by Acid Splash gain one stack of Acid. Each enemy can have up to $(acid_max_stacks) stacks of Acid. Acid stacks last until the enemy is defeated. Enemies affected by Acid take $(acid_base_amount)% more damage per stack (stacking multiplicatively) from $(source_hero)' subsequent Acid attacks. Armored enemies affected by at least one stack of Acid lose twice as many armored hit points when $(source_hero) damages them with Acid attacks.

abilities.name: Arcane Chromat - Cold
abilities.desc: Enemies damaged by Ray of Frost are slowed by 50% for 10 seconds and take 400% more damage from Ray of Frost for each slow, stun, or root affecting them (stacking multiplicatively), including the initial slow. If an enemy is affected by Ray of Frost again before the slow/debuff expires, the cooldown is renewed.

raw.name: Arcane Chromat - Cold
raw.tip_text: Lucius deals extra damage to slowed, stunned, and rooted enemies.

description.desc: Enemies damaged by Ray of Frost are slowed by $(cold_slow_amount)% for $(debuff_duration) seconds and take $(cold_base_amount)% more damage from Ray of Frost for each slow, stun, or root affecting them (stacking multiplicatively), including the initial slow. If an enemy is affected by Ray of Frost again before the slow/debuff expires, the cooldown is renewed.

abilities.name: Elemental Adept
abilities.desc: When an enemy is affected by both Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for  seconds. After, they "explode", applying one stack of Arcane Chromat - Acid and dealing Acid damage to themselves and all nearby enemies. This removes the Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff on the enemy. The explosion damage is equal to 10% of Lucius' normal attack damage times the total Aerois Synergy stacks.

description.desc: When an enemy is affected by both Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for $(lucius_elemental_adept_timer) seconds. After, they "explode", applying one stack of Arcane Chromat - Acid and dealing Acid damage to themselves and all nearby enemies. This removes the Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff on the enemy. The explosion damage is equal to $(amount)% of $(source_hero)' normal attack damage times the total Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Aerois Synergy
abilities.desc: Lucius contributes 2 stack to Aerois Synergy every time Elemental Adept is triggered; bosses contribute an additional 8 stacks. Their maximum number of stacks is 200 plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5. 50% of his contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. Lucius' damage is increased by 50% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

description.desc: $(source_hero) contributes $(base_stacks___2) stack to Aerois Synergy every time Elemental Adept is triggered; bosses contribute an additional $(bonus_boss_stacks___2) stacks. Their maximum number of stacks is $(base_max_stacks___2) plus the highest area completed in the current run divided by 5. $(percent_of_stacks_to_remove_on_area_change___2)% of his contributed stacks are removed when changing areas. $(source_hero)' damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% times the total number of Aerois Synergy stacks.

abilities.name: Elemental Adept
abilities.desc:
When an enemy is affected by both of Lucius' Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for 3 seconds then "explode" with acid, taking 3000 damage (1/5th of Elemental Adept stacks seconds worth of Acid Chromat tick damage). This also consumes both the Arcane Chromat debuffs on the enemy, and spreads the Acid DoT to nearby enemies.  
>   
> Each explosion increases Elemental Adept's stacks by 1.

description.pre: When an enemy is affected by both of Lucius' Arcane Chromat abilities they are stunned and frozen in place for 3 seconds then "explode" with acid, taking $(lucius_elemental_adept_explosion_damage) damage (1/5th of Elemental Adept stacks seconds worth of Acid Chromat tick damage). This also consumes both the Arcane Chromat debuffs on the enemy, and spreads the Acid DoT to nearby enemies.^^Each explosion increases Elemental Adept's stacks by 1.

conditions.desc: ^Stacks cap at $(lucius_elemental_adept_max_stacks) and reset by $(lingering_chill_amount)% when changing areas.^Elemental Adept Stacks: $(lucius_elemental_adept_stacks)
^Stacks cap at $(lucius_elemental_adept_max_stacks) and reset to 0 when changing areas.^Elemental Adept Stacks: $(lucius_elemental_adept_stacks)

specs.name: Dichromancy
specs.desc: Increase the "explode" damage of Elemental Adept by 200%.

raw.name: Dichromancy
raw.specialization_description: Lucius focuses on increasing the damage dealt by the combination of his two elements.

description.desc: Increase the "explode" damage of $(upgrade_name id) by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Elemental Master
specs.desc: Increase the effect of Aerois Synergy on Lucius' damage by 100%.

raw.name: Elemental Master
raw.specialization_description: Lucius specializes in working with his allies to increase his damage.

description.desc: Increase the effect of $(upgrade_name id) on $(source_hero)' damage by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Lingering Chill
specs.desc: When an enemy explodes and loses their Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff, they gain a Lingering Chill debuff which slows them by 25% and lasts for 20 seconds. If this debuff applies again before it expires, the cooldown is refreshed. Stacks with Arcane Chromat - Cold.

raw.name: Lingering Chill
raw.specialization_description: Lucius' enemies remain minorly slowed even after he has triggered his combo.

description.desc: When an enemy explodes and loses their Arcane Chromat - Cold debuff, they gain a Lingering Chill debuff which slows them by $(cold_slow_amount)% and lasts for $(debuff_duration) seconds. If this debuff applies again before it expires, the cooldown is refreshed. Stacks with Arcane Chromat - Cold.

items.name: Common Currency
items.description: Is this a lot? I don't know all the types of coinies!

items.name: Stash of Jewels
items.description: SHINIES! How quaint.

items.name: A Proper Loot Bag
items.description: Can I buy sweeties with this much?

items.name: Anonymous Donation
items.description: I thought the cows were zombies! No-one stopped me!

items.name: Gusthaven Hat
items.description: I hate gusts. This is my fourth hat.

items.name: Fancy Hat
items.description: Daddy prepared me for this moment!

items.name: Airship Captain's Hat
items.description: This shall protect me against beasts of the night!

items.name: Captain of the Stormchaser
items.description: Up time, everyone. Up time!

items.name: Sorcerer's Training Vest
items.description: Chilly outside without my undergarmies.

items.name: Leather-Edged Vest
items.description: Cows. Such evil creatures.

items.name: Flowing Vest
items.description: Very well. I'll do it.

items.name: Chromatic Vest
items.description: Perhaps I'm ready?

items.name: Shoulder Cloak
items.description: I'm sorry everyone, I don't think I can handle this right now.

items.name: Violet Cape
items.description: This journey continues to ask too much of me.

items.name: Elenasto Cloak
items.description: I hope my Daddy is proud.

items.name: Glamerweave Cloak
items.description: I... I have to do my best, for my friends

items.name: Empty Gauntlet
items.description: You just snap the baubles in here, here, and... Where did my gems go?

items.name: Pre-Combat Gauntlet
items.description: OH! Big strong friends to the front! I'll be uh... waaay back here!

items.name: Alternator Gauntlet
items.description: A gift from my sister, who is far cooler than I.

items.name: Arcane Chromat Glove
items.description: I like your optimism in my abilities in combat.

items.name: Vigilante Mask
items.description: I believe we might be acquaintances?

items.name: Moonstar's Mask
items.description: Perhaps I have more bravery in my blood than I thought.

items.name: Nanny Norfir's Pack
items.description: Do you all have secret pasts as well?

items.name: Etherium Cage
items.description: It houses an airship power source. Daddy entrusted it to my care.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Lucius by 30%.
normal.desc: Yes. Well. Daddy paid for many classes.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Lucius by 60%.
normal.desc: I've been known to throw down!

normal.name: Stinging
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lucius's Arcane Chromat - Acid ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I believe that might leave a mark.

normal.name: Sizzling
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lucius's Arcane Chromat - Acid ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Do you need to cool that off?

normal.name: Frostbite
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lucius's Arcane Chromat - Cold ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Anyone feeling a chill? I think it's getting cold!

normal.name: Elemental Tutors
normal.effect: Increases the stun duration of Lucius Elemental Adept by 2 seconds.
normal.desc: Just STAY there!
effects: Increases the stun duration of Lucius Elemental Adept by 2 seconds.

normal.name: Durable
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Lucius by 1.
normal.desc: Right, then. Let's just soldier on, shall we?

normal.name: Arcane Chromat
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lucius's Aerois Synergy ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I can draw magic from color itself.

normal.name: Privileged Background
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lucius's Aerois Synergy ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Can we just solve this with coin?

normal.name: Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Lucius by 2.
normal.desc: I do think my tutors covered this.

normal.name: Spell Master
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Lucius by 120%.
normal.desc: Here's a little variation I learned from one of my tutors.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Male Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a DEX score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a CON score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion in the formation with a LAWFUL alignment.

data.backstory: Baeloth Barrityl is the master of The Black Pits, the combat arena he claims is 'the best show in all the realms'. Baeloth captures hapless adventurers to fight to the death all for the sake of entertainment! When he's not commanding the attention of anyone near him, he's doing whatever he can to reinforce that he's one of the top five spellcasters in all the realms.
data.name: Baeloth

base.name: Chain Lightning
base.description: Baeloth fires a bolt of lightning at a random enemy, which deals damage and arcs up to 4 times dealing, 20% less damage per arc.
base.long_description: Baeloth fires a bolt of lightning at a random enemy, which deals damage and arcs up to 4 times dealing, 20% less damage per arc.

ult.name: Now That's An Entrance
ult.description: Najim streaks across the field, damaging all enemies, pushing survivors back slightly, and setting Baeloth's excitement stacks to max.
ult.long_description: Najim streaks across the field, dealing massive damage to all enemies, pushing ones that survive back slightly, but more importantly increasing Baeloth's excitement stacks to max.

abilities.name: Paid Partially with Pain
abilities.desc: Enemies hit by Baeloth's Chain Lightning drop 25% more gold when killed.

description.desc: Enemies hit by Baeloth's Chain Lightning drop $amount% more gold when killed.

abilities.name: Cause For Celebration
abilities.desc: Enemies killed by Champions in the column ahead of or behind Baeloth explode into magical paper confetti, dealing damage and slowing enemies near them by 50% for 10 seconds. The damage done ignores debuffs and is either half of the hit that killed them or one quarter of their max health, whichever is higher. This effect can chain if the explosion kills an enemy.

raw.name: Cause For Celebration
raw.tip_text: Champions immediately in front or behind Baeloth kill enemies in an explosion of confetti that can damage nearby enemies.

description.desc: Enemies killed by Champions in the column ahead of or behind Baeloth explode into magical paper confetti, dealing damage and slowing enemies near them by 50% for 10 seconds. The damage done ignores debuffs and is either half of the hit that killed them or one quarter of their max health, whichever is higher. This effect can chain if the explosion kills an enemy.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Whenever $target kills an enemy Baeloth's Cause for Celebration is triggered

abilities.name: Morbid Excitement
abilities.desc:
All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do 10% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at 20.  
> Stacks are earned for the following:  
> - A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack  
> - An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack  
> - An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +2 Stacks  
> - A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +3 Stacks  
> - A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks  
> - A Champion dies: +100 Stacks.

conditions.desc: All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do $amount___2% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at $max_stacks___2.^Stacks are earned for the following:^- A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack^- An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack^- An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +4 Stacks^- A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +6 Stacks^- A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks^- A Champion dies: +100 Stacks

All Champions in the column in front or behind Baeloth do $amount___2% more damage per Morbid Excitement stack. Morbid Excitement loses 10% of stacks every 10 seconds and stacks cap at $max_stacks___2.^Stacks are earned for the following:^- A favored foe is defeated: +1 Stack^- An enemy drops more gold due to Paid Partially with Pain: +1 Stack^- An enemy explodes in confetti due to Cause for Celebration: +2 Stacks^- A chain reaction kills an enemy due to Cause for Celebration: +3 Stacks^- A Champion in any column in front of Baeloth takes damage: +5 Stacks^- A Champion dies: +100 Stacks

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increase the damage of $target by $amount%

abilities.name: Generous Djinn
abilities.desc: Champions revived by Najim provide a large buff which lasts until they are killed again.

raw.name: Generous Djinn
raw.tip_text: Champions revived by Najim provide a large buff which lasts until they are killed again.

conditions.desc: Baeloth's Djinn servant, Najim, will bring any Champion that dies back to life at 1HP and make them immune to all damage for 30 seconds. For as long as the resurrected Champion lives, the party's damage is increased by $amount%. This ability has a 60 second cooldown.

Baeloth's Djinn servant, Najim, will bring any Champion that dies back to life at 1HP and make them immune to all damage for 20 seconds. For as long as the resurrected Champion lives, the party's damage is increased by $amount%. This ability has a 60 second cooldown.

specs.name: Baeloth's Birthday Party
specs.desc: Increase the Cause for Celebration related stacking values for Morbid Excitement by 100% and increase the damage bonus by 100%.

raw.name: Baeloth's Birthday Party
raw.specialization_description: Baeloth focuses on turning enemies to confetti, and the excitement that brings him

description.desc: Increase the Cause for Celebration related stacking values for Morbid Excitement by $amount% and increase the damage bonus by $amount___2%

specs.name: Over Excited
specs.desc: Increase the max stacks of Morbid Excitement by 200%.

raw.name: Over Excited
raw.specialization_description: Baeloth focuses on the excitement of battle, wringing even more benefit out of it.

description.desc: Increase the max stacks of Morbid Excitement by $amount%

specs.name: The Show Must Go On
specs.desc: Champions resurrected by Najim are invulnerable for an additional 10 seconds and increase the pre stack damage bonus of resurrected Champions by 100%.

raw.name: The Show Must Go On
raw.specialization_description: Baeloth focuses on his bond with Najim, granting even greater favor from the Djinn

description.desc: Champions resurrected by Najim are invulnerable for an additional 10 seconds and increase the pre stack damage bonus of resurrected Champions by $amount%

items.name: Combatant Covering
items.description: I hope you're satisfied. Look at my ragged raiment!

items.name: Everyday Armor
items.description: We do wonderful work! I'm impressed.

items.name: Pristine Provisions
items.description: Perhaps you can deal with those persistent pixies. I have a speech to prepare!

items.name: Sorcerer's Ceremonial Covering
items.description: Always look your best. You never know when you're going to meet a god.

items.name: Basic Hooded Robes
items.description: I do enjoy messing with lesser spellcasters.

items.name: Spellcaster Robes
items.description: Ulkoria, perhaps it's time for the adept to become the apprentice.

items.name: Evil Robes of the Archmagi
items.description: Fight or flee, either way, you fall!

items.name: Grand Entertainer's Robes
items.description: Let me entertain you!

items.name: Carved Staff
items.description: Death delivered! In handy hand-held form!

items.name: Skull Staff
items.description: I will join you. So that you can feel safe.

items.name: Staff of Striking
items.description: The skull sparkles when I smack someone's scalp. How scintillating!

items.name: Staff of the Dungeon Director
items.description: You wouldn't be interested in playing a little game, would you?

items.name: Threadbare Rug
items.description: Honestly, I'm huge in the Underdark.

items.name: Hidden Carpet
items.description: No one looks down when you command the crowd!

items.name: Carpet of Flying
items.description: Yes, yes. It flies. It also has a temper. Watch out.

items.name: Standard Entrance Supplies
items.description: Fireworks, flaying, a flying carpet, and me. It's like my birthday all over again!

items.name: Painted Placard
items.description: Are you ready to spill blood in the arena?

items.name: Average Advertisement
items.description: Well, it's a pit, and the sun is setting. Quiet down, doubters, it'll do.

items.name: Printed Paraphernalia
items.description: Franchise opportunities available.

items.name: Black Pits Banner
items.description: Witness the brilliant and bizarre battles in the Black Pits!

items.name: Accursed Ring
items.description: It looks great, but... yes. It does look great, doesn't it. What were we talking about?

items.name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
items.description: Najim shall ensure that we are rewarded appropriately.

items.name: Barrityl's Burden
items.description: Regrettably, the ring's removal is not a resource I retain.

items.name: The Entertainer's Ring
items.description: Najim? Are you even LISTENING?

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I shall find something far deadlier to trouble you with.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Batter your enemies to bloody rubbish!

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: No escape, no more tricks, no more performances. Your lives end here.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: I am a fair master, as long as my needs are served by being fair.

normal.name: Prodigious Pain
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Baeloth's Paid Partially with Pain ability by 40%.
normal.desc: How furious you must think I am!

normal.name: Aberrant Action
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Baeloth's Morbid Excitement ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Unlike any you have seen before!

normal.name: Entertainer's Exclamation!
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Baeloth's Morbid Excitement ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Champions, I have created the entertainment spectacle of a generation!

normal.name: Gruesome Gamesmanship
normal.effect: Increases the max stacks of Baeloth's Morbid Excitement by 40%.
normal.desc: What this contest needs is some fresh faces!

normal.name: Djinni Servant
normal.effect: Increases the post-stack buff of Baeloth's Generous Djinn by 40%.
normal.desc: Najim, prepare a suitable gift for them.

normal.name: Curse of Rhymes
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Baeloth's Morbid Excitement ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Nevermind magic, illusion, or lies; let's go with Plan A and kill those guys!

normal.name: Red Panda Djinni
normal.effect: Increases the post-stack buff of Baeloth's Generous Djinn by 80%.
normal.desc: NAJIM! You've changed, you know.

normal.name: Fortune's Favor
normal.effect: Gold Found +50%.
normal.desc: The Black Pits is a great place for someone, namely me, to get rich.

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Might I make you an offer to join the Black Pits' team?

normal.name: Spectacle of Slaughter
normal.effect: Increases the max stacks of Baeloth's Morbid Excitement by 80%.
normal.desc: Now appearing in the Black Pits...your worst nightmare!

normal.name: Electrodeposition
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Baeloth's Paid Partially with Pain ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Did you know gold is highly conductive? Would you like a demonstration?

data.backstory: Talin Uran is a rogue of great renown within Waterdeep. While on an assignment with the Grambar's Blades a few years ago, he was caught in a building collapse which left him paralysed from the waist down. Now equipped with his combat wheelchair, Talin is back to doing what he does best: Saving the day and looking awesome doing it.
data.name: Talin

base.name: Quiet Ambush
base.description: Talin disappears into the shadows and stabs a random enemy with his rapier.
base.long_description: Talin disappears into the shadows and reappears behind a random enemy, stabbing them with his rapier. He then shadowsteps back into the formation.

ult.name: Razor Edged Chakram
ult.description: Talin throws a hoop blade in a large looping arc, damaging all enemies it encounters before returning to Talin.
ult.long_description: Talin detaches a secondary hoop-shaped blade from his wheelchair's rear wheel and flings it at the farthest enemy. It travels in a large looping arc, damaging all enemies it encounters before returning to Talin.

abilities.name: Scatter Tacks
abilities.desc: When Talin attacks with Quiet Ambush he leaves behind a set of Scatter Tacks which cause enemies standing on them to be slowed by 50% and take 100% more damage from attacks.

raw.name: Scatter Tacks
raw.tip_text: Talin scatters tacks behind him after attacking, slowing enemies that walk in that area.

conditions.desc: When Talin attacks with Quiet Ambush he leaves behind a set of Scatter Tacks which cause enemies standing on them to be slowed by 75% and take $(amount)% more damage from attacks.
When Talin attacks with Quiet Ambush he leaves behind a set of Scatter Tacks which cause enemies standing on them to be slowed by 50% and take $(amount)% more damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Spot Weakness
abilities.desc: Talin increases the damage of all Champions by 100%. This ability is increased by 10% for each enemy killed in the current area, stacking multiplicatively and capping at $(talin_weakness_max_stacks) kills. The effect is reduced by 25% for each slot past one a given Champion is away from Talin(stacking multiplicatively).

raw.name: Spot Weakness
raw.tip_text: Talin observes weaknesses of enemies and whispers them to nearby Champions increasing their damage.

description.pre: Talin increases the damage of all Champions by $(amount)%. This ability is increased by $(amount_per_stack)% for each enemy killed in the current area, stacking multiplicatively and capping at $(talin_weakness_max_stacks) kills. The effect is reduced by $(reduction_per_slot)% for each slot past one a given Champion is away from Talin(stacking multiplicatively).

conditions.desc: ^^Current Stacks: $(talin_weakness_current_stacks)^Damage Bonus Amount: $(talin_weakness_total_bonus)%

abilities.name: Antagonist
abilities.desc: Talin decreases the DPS of Evil Champions in the formation by 50%, but increases the damage of Good Champions by 50% for each Evil Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

conditions.desc: Talin decreases the DPS of Good Champions in the formation by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, but increases the damage of Evil Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Good Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

Talin decreases the DPS of Evil Champions in the formation by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, but increases the damage of Good Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Evil Champion, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Path Finder
specs.desc: Increases the stack cap and damage buff of Spot Weakness by 100%.

raw.name: Path Finder
raw.specialization_description: Talin focuses on enemy weaknesses, increasing the damage of nearby Champions.

description.desc: Increases the stack cap and damage buff of Spot Weakness by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Additional Scatter Tacks
specs.desc: Increase the slow effect, radius, and damage of Scatter Tacks by 50% (multiplicatively).

raw.name: Additional Scatter Tacks
raw.specialization_description: Talin focuses on scattering tacks, slowing more monsters.

description.desc: Increase the slow effect, radius, and damage of Scatter Tacks by $(amount)% (multiplicatively).

specs.desc: Reverse the effect of Antagonist, decreasing the damage of Good Champions and increasing the damage of Evil Champions based on the number of Good Champions.

raw.name: Reversal of Fortunes
raw.specialization_description: Talin prefers the company of Evil, increasing the damage of Evil Champions at a cost to Good Champions.

description.desc: Reverse the effect of Antagonist, decreasing the damage of Good Champions and increasing the damage of Evil Champions based on the number of Good Champions.

items.name: Repaired Rapier
items.description: Damaged in the same accident that paralyzed me.

items.name: Trusty Old Blade
items.description: It isn't new any more. But then again, neither am I.

items.name: Lifelong Companion
items.description: There's a lot of history tied to that weld on the blade.

items.name: Tenacious Blade
items.description: We don't back down.

items.name: Spider Badge
items.description: You'd be surprised how often this gets me out of jams!

items.name: Bregan D'aerthe Badge
items.description: Don't tell Jarlaxle.

items.name: Grambar's Blades Brooch
items.description: Keep this in your pocket while in the Dock Ward. Tell 'em Talin Uran sent you.

items.name: Champion's Badge
items.description: Nat made it after my latest argument with Jarlaxle. I have no idea where she got the feather...

items.name: Hanging Lantern
items.description: If you twist the pole in a counter-clockwise motion, the light extinguishes.

items.name: Lit Lamp
items.description: It's a bit more subtle than the time Ezmerelda cast light on my whole wheelchair.

items.name: Ornate Lamp
items.description: A gift from Ulkoria, an old friend from Waterdeep.

items.name: Prismatic Lamp
items.description: The Champions don't give up. Never forget that.

items.name: Caltrops
items.description: I upgraded my tires, don't worry.

items.name: Parting Gifts
items.description: They don't look so fast NOW do they?

items.name: Scatter Tacks
items.description: Did you think this was my first adventure?

items.name: Smokepowder Tacks
items.description: Baeloth makes his big entrance, and I'm on our exit distraction, got it.

items.name: Well-Worn Gloves
items.description: That muck? Won't be a problem.

items.name: Fingerless Grips
items.description: No friction burns, and I can still pick a lock with finesse!

items.name: Combat Wheelchair Gloves
items.description: I had them commissioned after my last trip into Undermountain. Yuck.

items.name: Ornate Gloves of Speed
items.description: Watch me now!

items.name: Sharp Rims
items.description: You should have seen them after Avernus!

items.name: Hoop-Shaped Blades
items.description: They attach to the outside of my push rims and detach with a quick wrist flick.

items.name: Razor Edges
items.description: I said we can never have enough targets, but I might have been mistaken. DUCK!

items.name: Slicer and Dicer
items.description: Only for special occasions.

normal.desc: Flip the table and dive out of the way. I've got them lined up.

normal.name: Quick-Release Hook

normal.desc: Now THOSE are some scatter tacks!

normal.desc: Is that true?

data.backstory: Zrang, his twin brother Kleeb, and their brood-sister Yassa began their Icewind Dale existence stealing gems and dreaming of being respected by the locals. Inspired by their mentor, Jarlaxle, they stand tall to form Hew Maan - who is totally a human and not on a nefarious mission to steal all the Champions' stuff.
data.name: Hew Maan

base.name: Crossbow Bolt
base.description: The middle kobold shoots a random enemy with a small crossbow.
base.long_description: The middle kobold shoots a random enemy with a small crossbow.

ult.name: Roll Out!
ult.description: The Kobolds pepper a random enemy with bolts. The effect of Zrang's Teamwork is doubled for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: The Kobolds pepper a random enemy with bolts and Zrang's Teamwork is doubled for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Teamwork
abilities.desc:
Depending on where they are placed in the formation, a different kobold takes the top slot in the trench coat and provides a different buff:  
> {Zrang}#955d81 $(hewmaan_zrang_inactive)- $(hewmaan_front_x_columns) - Enemies have a 20% chance to drop double quest items or count for double quest progress.  
> {Kleeb}#992920 $(hewmaan_kleeb_inactive)- $(hewmaan_middle_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions against boss enemies by 400%. If the boss has hits-based or armor-based health, successful attacks destroy twice as many segments as they normally would.  
> {Yassa}#d39322 $(hewmaan_yassa_inactive)- $(hewmaan_back_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions within two columns of Hew Maan by 100%.

raw.name: Teamwork
raw.tip_text: Hew Maan provides different buffs depending on their proximity to the front of the formation.

description.pre: Depending on where they are placed in the formation, a different kobold takes the top slot in the trench coat and provides a different buff:^{Zrang}#955d81 $(hewmaan_zrang_inactive)- $(hewmaan_front_x_columns) - Enemies have a $(amount___2)% chance to drop double quest items or count for double quest progress.^{Kleeb}#992920 $(hewmaan_kleeb_inactive)- $(hewmaan_middle_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions against boss enemies by $(amount___3)%. If the boss has hits-based or armor-based health, successful attacks destroy twice as many segments as they normally would.^{Yassa}#d39322 $(hewmaan_yassa_inactive)- $(hewmaan_back_x_columns) - Increases the damage of Champions within two columns of Hew Maan by $(amount___4)%

conditions.desc: ^^Current Top Kobold: $(hewmaan_teamwork_top_kobold)

abilities.name: Hello, Fellow Humans
abilities.desc:
Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of human Champions in the formation:  
> 1-3 others: +100%  
> 4-5 others: +700%  
> 6-7 others: +3100%  
> 8+ others: +12700%.

raw.name: Hello, Fellow Humans
raw.tip_text: Hew Maan buffs their abilities based on the number of "other" humans in the formation.

conditions.desc: Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of Champions of the most populous species in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of other lawful Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of other unaffiliated Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

Increases the effect of {Kleeb}#992920 and {Yassa's}#d39322 Teamwork abilities based on the number of human Champions in the formation:^1-3 others: +100%^4-5 others: +700%^6-7 others: +3100%^8+ others: +12700%

abilities.name: Carefully Balanced
abilities.desc: Increases the effect of {Zrang's}#955d81 Teamwork ability by 5% for each Champion adjacent to the kobolds (stacks additively and then applied to Teamwork multiplicatively).

description.desc: Increases the effect of {Zrang's}#955d81 Teamwork ability by $(amount)% for each Champion adjacent to the kobolds (stacks additively and then applied to Teamwork multiplicatively).

abilities.name: Impressive Coatwork
abilities.desc: The effect of all Teamwork abilities are increased by 100%.

description.desc: The effect of all Teamwork abilities are increased by $(amount)%

abilities.name: Please Stand By
abilities.desc:
The two kobolds that are not on top provide lesser buffs passively. These abilities are not buffed by Hello, Fellow Humans.  
> {Zrang}#955d81 - Boss enemies move 25% slower  
> {Kleeb}#992920 - Hits-based enemies have a 50% chance of spawning with 25% of their hits already gone (rounded down)  
> {Yassa}#d39322 - Reduces the base attack cooldown of Champions adjacent to the kobolds by 0.5s.

description.desc: The two kobolds that are not on top provide lesser buffs passively. These abilities are not buffed by Hello, Fellow Humans.^{Zrang}#955d81 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_zrang_inactive)- Boss enemies move $(amount___2)% slower^{Kleeb}#992920 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_kleeb_inactive)- Hits-based enemies have a 50% chance of spawning with $(amount___3)% of their hits already gone (rounded down)^{Yassa}#d39322 $(hewmaan_please_stand_by_yassa_inactive)- Reduces the base attack cooldown of Champions adjacent to the kobolds by $(amount___4)s

abilities.name: Unlock Ultimate Ability
abilities.desc: Unlocks Hew Maan's Roll Out! Ultimate Attack.

description.desc: Unlocks Hew Maan's Roll Out! Ultimate Attack.

conditions.desc: ^^The Kobolds pepper a random enemy with bolts. An additional effect is provided depending on which kobold is on top:^{Zrang}#955d81 - The effect of Zrang's Teamwork is doubled for 30 seconds.^{Kleeb}#992920 - Non-boss enemies are stunned and no additional enemies will spawn for 15 seconds.^{Yassa}#d39322 - Reduce any active ultimate cooldowns of all Champions in the formation by 25%.

data.backstory: A glamorous diva possessed by a Deva, with an inciting voice and gleaming pristine robes, Orisha is the lead vocalist of the Sirens of the Realms, her found family. She is of such great renown, that she needs no last name.
data.name: Orisha

base.name: Scorching Ray
base.description: Orisha summons rays of fire and hurls them at multiple random targets.
base.long_description: Orisha summons rays of fire and hurls them at multiple random targets.

ult.name: Radiant Soul
ult.description: Orisha eyes light aglow and two angel wings burst from her back. A wave of divine energy surges across the screen damaging all enemies.
ult.long_description: Orisha eyes light aglow and two angel wings burst from her back. A wave of divine energy surges across the screen damaging all enemies.

abilities.name: Flaming Wings
abilities.desc: Whenever Orisha uses Radiant Soul, her angel wings burst aflame and Flaming Wings gains $(orisha_max_stacks) stacks. Stacks decay by 1 per second. The damage of Scorching Ray is increased by $(orisha_flaming_buff_base_amount)% plus $(orisha_flaming_buff_stack_amount)% (additive) for every stack remaining. At 0 stacks, her wings and damage bonus are removed. Whenever Orisha gets a kill, the stacks reset to $(orisha_max_stacks), but the decay rate is increased by 20% (multiplicative).

raw.name: Flaming Wings
raw.tip_text: When Orisha uses her ultimate her Wings burst aflame, increasing damage, kills further increase damage but make the wings burn out more quickly.

description.pre: Whenever Orisha uses Radiant Soul, her angel wings burst aflame and Flaming Wings gains $(orisha_max_stacks) stacks. Stacks decay by 1 per second. The damage of Scorching Ray is increased by $(orisha_flaming_buff_base_amount)% plus $(orisha_flaming_buff_stack_amount)% (additive) for every stack remaining. At 0 stacks, her wings and damage bonus are removed. Whenever Orisha gets a kill, the stacks reset to $(orisha_max_stacks), but the decay rate is increased by $(decay_amount)% (multiplicative).

conditions.desc: ^^Current Stacks: $(orisha_flaming_stacks)^Current Buff Amount: $(orisha_flaming_buff_amount)%

abilities.name: Bardic Connection
abilities.desc: Orisha seeks out Vlahnya in the formation and increases the damage of Champions along the shortest path(s) between herself and Vlahnya by 400%.

raw.name: Bardic Connection
raw.tip_text: Orisha has a strong connection with Vlahnya, they strongly buff each others abilities.

description.pre: Orisha seeks out Vlahnya in the formation and increases the damage of Champions along the shortest path(s) between herself and Vlahnya by $(amount)%.

conditions.desc: ^^{If Vlahnya is not in the formation, this ability applies to only adjacent Champions at a reduced amount.}#afafaf

abilities.name: Diva Mode
abilities.desc: Whenever there is a boss monster on the screen, Orisha's Flaming Wings and Bardic Connection abilities are increased by 100%.

description.desc: Whenever there is a boss monster on the screen, Orisha's Flaming Wings and Bardic Connection abilities are increased by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Blazing Soul
specs.desc: The effect of Flaming Wings is increased by 200%.

raw.name: Blazing Soul
raw.specialization_description: Orisha focuses on the power of her Flaming Wings.

description.desc: The effect of Flaming Wings is increased by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Long Burn
specs.desc: Flaming Wings starts with 50% more stacks.

raw.name: Long Burn
raw.specialization_description: Orisha focuses on keeping her Flaming Wings ablaze.

description.desc: Flaming Wings starts with $(amount)% more stacks.

specs.name: Sirens' Connection
specs.desc: The effect of Bardic Connection is increased by 200%.

raw.name: Sirens' Connection
raw.specialization_description: Orisha increases her contribution to Bardic Connection.

description.desc: The effect of Bardic Connection is increased by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Fierce Connection
specs.desc: Orisha's damage is increased by 200% for each Champion affected by Bardic Connection (stacking multiplicatively). Vlahnya's Enthralling Performance buff always applies to Orisha, and Orisha counts as adjacent to her for the Bass portion.

raw.name: Fierce Connection
raw.specialization_description: Orisha increases her bond with Vlahnya.

description.desc: Orisha's damage is increased by $(amount)% for each Champion affected by Bardic Connection (stacking multiplicatively). Vlahnya's Enthralling Performance buff always applies to Orisha, and Orisha counts as adjacent to her for the Bass portion.

items.name: Worn Staff
items.description: It gets the job done.

items.name: Icebreaker Staff
items.description: Here, hold my staff. Let me juggle for you!

items.name: Backup Staff
items.description: For when we really need to hit the harmonies!

items.name: Songstress Staff
items.description: You'll regret the day the Sirens turned their eyes on you.

items.name: Castoff Camouflage
items.description: The less familiar I am, today, the better.

items.name: Borrowed Cloak
items.description: Come on, we need to fit in here!

items.name: Cloak of Many Fashions
items.description: Looking good is its own revenge.

items.name: Deva's Regalia
items.description: Wait, did it happen again?

items.name: Morning Robe
items.description: Oh this? It's my workout gear.

items.name: Evening Shawl
items.description: Come watch the sunset with me.

items.name: Robe of Resilience
items.description: Vlahnya has another heist for us. Best look my best.

items.name: Dazzling Armor of the Diva
items.description: Watch me roll.

items.name: Road Gear
items.description: I'm with the band.

items.name: Charming Shield
items.description: Let me sing you a song...

items.name: Ancient Armor
items.description: We recovered it when we were repairing the Yawning Portal. Don't tell Durnan.

items.name: Radiant Shield
items.description: You mess with one of our bandmates, you mess with all of us.

items.name: Costume Jewelry
items.description: I'd rather go without.

items.name: Child's Creation
items.description: My dad said that it makes me invincible. Why tempt fate?

items.name: Concert Wear
items.description: Gotta look my best for our show!

items.name: Diva Crown
items.description: I'll distract them, you grab the mark!

items.name: Weathered Sheet
items.description: Let's do this, Sirens!

items.name: Missed Show Flier
items.description: Ghost was a cat at the time..?

items.name: Performance Review
items.description: They loved the show, just not the fight that broke out after.

items.name: Yawning Portal Presents
items.description: All proceeds go to Durnan to pay for portal repair.

normal.desc: Let's go.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Get behind me and close your eyes!

normal.name: Radiant Soul
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Orisha's Flaming Wings ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I was made for this.

normal.name: Sound Check

normal.desc: Vlahnya always has our backs. Except for when she doesn't.

data.backstory: Alyndra Alexandria Garanahil Sarrbarand is known by many names: Lorekeeper of Rime Spiro, Kinscribe of Clan Monkeymouse, Daughter of Oblivion, Fate Changer, Knight of Wonder and Captivation...and apologetic offspring of Avren & Sofieus.
data.name: Alyndra

base.name: Mind Spike
base.description: Alyndra spikes the mind of a random enemy, damaging them and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
base.long_description: Alyndra reaches into the mind of a random enemy, dealing damage and slowing the enemy by 50% for 3 seconds.

ult.name: I Have Foreseen This
ult.description: Alyndra foresees the death of all her enemies. For 30 seconds, all enemies take extra damage equal to the total Portent buff being given.
ult.long_description: Alyndra foresees the death of all her enemies. For 30 seconds, all enemies take extra damage equal to the total Portent buff being given.

abilities.name: Portent
abilities.desc: Every 30 seconds, Alyndra peers into the future of the formation, increasing the damage of random adjacent Champions.

raw.name: Portent
raw.tip_text: Every 30 seconds, Alyndra peers into the future of the formation, increasing the damage of random adjacent Champions.

conditions.desc: Every $(portent_time) seconds, Alyndra randomly chooses up to three adjacent Champions and peers into their futures, helping guide their attacks and increasing their damage by $(amount)%.
Every $(portent_time) seconds, Alyndra randomly chooses up to two adjacent Champions and peers into their futures, helping guide their attacks and increasing their damage by $(amount)%.
^^Total Bonus: $(amount)%^Portent refreshes in $(alyndra_portent_time_left) seconds

abilities.name: Brows of Judgement
abilities.desc: Griff, Alyndra's owl companion, sits on Alyndra's shoulder and judges enemies as they spawn. They have a 25% chance to judge normal enemies as unworthy, and a 100% chance to judge bosses as unworthy. For each living unworthy normal enemy, Portent's base buff is increased by 100%, stacking additively. Each living boss increases Portent's base buff by 400%.

raw.name: Brows of Judgement
raw.tip_text: Griff judges enemies as they spawn increasing the effect of Portent per judged enemy.

description.desc: Griff, Alyndra's owl companion, sits on Alyndra's shoulder and judges enemies as they spawn. They have a $(amount)% chance to judge normal enemies as unworthy, and a 100% chance to judge bosses as unworthy. For each living unworthy normal enemy, Portent's base buff is increased by $(amount___3)%, stacking additively. Each living boss increases Portent's base buff by $(amount___4)%.

effect_keys.comment: amount is chance to apply to non-boss, otherwise, it's 100

abilities.name: Heroes of the Planes
abilities.desc:
If Portent is applied to a Champion under the effect of certain Heroes of the Planes Champions' abilities, those effects are increased in power.  
>   
> Avren: Mirror Image effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%  
> Freely: Unlucky For Them increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Luck of Yondalla (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Penelope: Chwinga Mask: Tools for the Job Charm increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Chwinga Mask (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Briv: Netherese Steel effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%  
> Orkira: Elemental Fire increased by 200% for each Portented Champion affected by Lesser Restoration (stacking multiplicatively)  
> Widdle: Vampiric Gaze effects on the Portented Champion is increased by 200%.

description.desc: If Portent is applied to a Champion under the effect of certain Heroes of the Planes Champions' abilities, those effects are increased in power.^^Avren: Mirror Image effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount)%^Freely: Unlucky For Them increased by $(amount___2)% for each Portented Champion affected by Luck of Yondalla (stacking multiplicatively)^Penelope: Chwinga Mask: Tools for the Job Charm increased by $(amount___3)% for each Portented Champion affected by Chwinga Mask (stacking multiplicatively)^Briv: Netherese Steel effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount___6)%^Orkira: Elemental Fire increased by $(amount___8)% for each Portented Champion affected by Lesser Restoration (stacking multiplicatively)^Widdle: Vampiric Gaze effects on the Portented Champion is increased by $(amount___7)%

data.backstory: Orkira Illdrex is a gold dragonborn from the Nentir Vale, where she grew up nurturing a love of healing and fire. Between a strange life filled with monsters, Gods, time and multiplanar travel, death, the destruction of worlds and the saving of others, Orkira has survived and adapted to deal with any situation with a motto of 'One problem at a time.'
data.name: Orkira

base.name: Burning Hands
base.description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a small AoE cone of fire.
base.long_description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a small AoE cone of fire.

base.name: Burning Hands
base.description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a medium AoE cone of fire.
base.long_description: Orkira leaps to a random enemy and attacks with a medium AoE cone of fire.

ult.name: Radiance of the Phoenix
ult.description: Orkira summons The Phoenix to rain Elemental Fire down upon the battlefield. This deals damage and increases the Elemental Fire stacks.
ult.long_description: Orkira flies up over the enemies, grasping The Domain of the Phoenix and uttering a prayer, summoning The Phoenix to rain Elemental Fire down upon the battlefield. This deals damage and increases the Elemental Fire stacks of affected enemies by 1 every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Lesser Restoration
abilities.desc: Orkira heals all non-adjacent damaged Champions for 7 health per second.

raw.name: Lesser Restoration
raw.tip_text: Orkira heals non-adjacent Champions who are damaged.

description.desc: Orkira heals all non-adjacent damaged Champions for $(amount) health per second.

abilities.name: Elemental Fire
abilities.desc: Whenever Orkira damages an enemy, they receive one stack of Elemental Fire, taking 10% of Orkira's damage per second for 15 seconds and receiving 100% additional damage from all attacks. This ability stacks up to 10 times (additively) and attempting to add another stack will reset the cooldown of all stacks.

raw.name: Elemental Fire
raw.tip_text: Orkira leaves a stacking debuff and DoT on enemies she damages.

description.desc: Whenever Orkira damages an enemy, they receive one stack of Elemental Fire, taking $(dot_percent)% of Orkira's damage per second for $(debuff_time_limit) seconds and receiving $(amount)% additional damage from all attacks. This ability stacks up to $(debuff_max_stacks) times (additively) and attempting to add another stack will reset the cooldown of all stacks.

abilities.name: Healing Flame
abilities.desc: Increase the effect of Elemental Fire by 100% for each order of magnitude worth of effective healing done with Lesser Restoration on the current run.

description.pre: Increase the effect of Elemental Fire by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each order of magnitude worth of effective healing done with Lesser Restoration on the current run.

conditions.desc: ^^Effective healing done: $(orkira_healing_flame_amount_healed)

abilities.name: Self Sacrifice
abilities.desc: If a Champion Orkira is able to heal (ie. non-adjacent) is about to take a killing blow, Orkira instantly swaps formation slots with that Champion for 10 seconds and takes the hit for them. During this time Orkira's overwhelm point is set to twice the other Champion's and neither Orkira or the other Champion can be moved, removed, or swapped out; after the time expires they swap back regardless of whether Orkira and/or the other Champion died during the time. This effect can only occur once every 60 seconds.

description.pre: If a Champion Orkira is able to heal (ie. non-adjacent) is about to take a killing blow, Orkira instantly swaps formation slots with that Champion for $(duration) seconds and takes the hit for them. During this time Orkira's overwhelm point is set to twice the other Champion's and neither Orkira or the other Champion can be moved, removed, or swapped out; after the time expires they swap back regardless of whether Orkira and/or the other Champion died during the time. This effect can only occur once every $(cooldown) seconds.

conditions.desc: ^^$(orkira_self_sacrifice_cooldown)

specs.name: Breath of the Phoenix
specs.desc: Increase the size of Orkira's Burning Hands AoE cone and have Elemental Fire apply two stacks instead of one.

raw.name: Breath of the Phoenix
raw.specialization_description: Orkira focuses on applying more stacks of Elemental Fire as quickly as possible.

description.desc: Increase the size of Orkira's Burning Hands AoE cone and have Elemental Fire apply two stacks instead of one.

specs.name: Tailfeather of the Phoenix
specs.desc: Increase the effect of Lesser Restoration by 100%. Lesser Restoration will now "heal" undamaged Champions and Healing Flame will count 1% of this non-effective healing as well.

raw.specialization_description: Orkira focuses on healing those who are injured, and even those who are not.

items.name: Orkira's Makeshift Pants

items.name: Pantaloons of the Dragonborn
items.description: Yeah. I'm used to being weird everywhere.

items.description: One problem at a time.

items.description: We're going to get coffee and truffles soon.

items.description: I'd do anything to protect him! I feel bad about the accordion though...

items.name: Traveler's Sac
items.description: Do you not have dragonborn in this plane of existence?

items.description: My whole life is in this bag. I'm always ready to go!

items.description: I need to save a little bit, in case one of you dies...

items.description: I hate being cold. Even the reminder of warmth helps!

items.description: Wow! I really like... all the... flames. Can I keep this?

items.name: Ashes of the Phoenix
items.description: It's my job to keep others from getting burned.

data.backstory: As a member of Rivals of Waterdeep, Shaka is always looking for the latest adventure and the latest puzzle. His party has encountered mysteries and foes throughout Waterdeep, Candlekeep, Icewind Dale, and Avernus. Their base of operations is located in the Trollskull Manor in Waterdeep where a brain in a jar named Brian stands watch.
data.name: Shaka

base.name: Eldritch Blast
base.description: A beam of crackling green shoots towards an enemy, dealing damage.
base.long_description: A beam of crackling green shoots towards an enemy, dealing damage.

animations.comment: for some reason the eldritch blast graphic origin point is in the center, so x here is 95+29=124

ult.name: Blinding Wall of Light
ult.description: All enemies are pushed back and a wall of light appears in front of the formation for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: All enemies are pushed back slightly and then a wall of light appears slightly in front of the formation for 15 seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall of light take damage, are stunned for 5 seconds, and gain a white glow which causes them to miss with 75% of all attacks for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: A Celestial Puzzle
abilities.desc: Shaka attempts to solve a celestial puzzle with the potential for great rewards. Four random slots in the formation are assigned a random tag. For each Champion in those slots that match the slot's tag, Shaka increases the damage of all Champions by 400%, stacking multiplicatively. A fifth slot is chosen but remains locked with an unknown tag until a specialization is chosen.

raw.name: A Celestial Puzzle
raw.tip_text: Shaka solves a random puzzle on each adventure, buffing all Champions

description.desc: Shaka attempts to solve a celestial puzzle with the potential for great rewards. Four random slots in the formation are assigned a random tag. For each Champion in those slots that match the slot's tag, Shaka increases the damage of all Champions by $(amount)%, stacking multiplicatively. A fifth slot is chosen but remains locked with an unknown tag until a specialization is chosen.

abilities.name: Celestial Resistance
abilities.desc: Shaka adds $(amount___3) temporary health to the entire party when changing areas, and refreshes them every 10 seconds. The amount of hit points is increased by 25% for each A Celestial Puzzle slot that is filled properly, stacking additively.

raw.name: Celestial Resistance
raw.tip_text: Shaka grants temporary hit points to all Champions as they change areas.

description.desc: Shaka adds $(amount___3) temporary health to the entire party when changing areas, and refreshes them every 10 seconds. The amount of hit points is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each A Celestial Puzzle slot that is filled properly, stacking additively.

conditions.desc: ^^Total Temporary Health: $(amount)

effect_keys.comment: This effect key is just so we have a base amount for the description. Things that buff celestial resistance should also buff this key.

abilities.name: Feast or Famine
abilities.desc: Shaka increases the base effect of A Celestial Puzzle by 50% for each properly filled puzzle slot he's adjacent to, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Shaka increases the base effect of A Celestial Puzzle by $(not_buffed amount)% for each properly filled puzzle slot he's adjacent to, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Riddling Rivals
abilities.desc: The base effect of A Celestial Puzzle is increased by 100% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: The base effect of A Celestial Puzzle is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Unlucky Crossbow
items.description: Be careful. I shot myself in the foot with this once. It's a long story.

items.description: You don't mess with someone with a crossbow on their back.

items.name: Target Shooter

items.description: It might be a bit too extravagant to carry around Waterdeep.

items.description: Growing up as a tiefling means knowing when you're in trouble.

items.name: Blade of Avernus
items.description: I lost my patron once. It wasn't great. Neither was he, if I'm being honest.

items.description: I keep it close to my heart.

items.name: Mysterious Locket

data.backstory: Mehen's life changed three times: once when he was exiled from the dragonborn stronghold of Djerad Thymar for refusing to be his tyrannical father's puppet; once when he took in twin tiefling babies abandoned in the snow; and once when his teenaged daughter, Farideh, made a pact with a devil from the Nine Hells. But Mehen is both adaptable and resilient; nothing out there will break his love for his daughters, his sense of self, or the strike of his falchion.
data.name: Mehen

base.name: Double Strike
base.description: Mehen leaps out and attacks a random enemy, swinging down and then up, scoring a hit each time.
base.long_description: Mehen leaps out and attacks a random enemy, swinging down and then up with a second swing, scoring a hit each time.

ult.name: Lightning Breath
ult.description: Mehen breathes a cone of lightning that hits and potentially stuns all enemies.
ult.long_description: Mehen breathes a cone of lightning that hits all enemies in the area. If it hits more than 5 enemies, or a boss, it stuns all enemies for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Always By Your Side
abilities.desc: When Mehen is in the formation, Farideh and Havilar become eligible for the current adventure, even if a Patron, Variant, or other restriction would say otherwise.

description.desc: When Mehen is in the formation, Farideh and Havilar become eligible for the current adventure, even if a Patron, Variant, or other restriction would say otherwise.

abilities.name: Grumpy
abilities.desc:
Mehen gains a stack of Grumpy for each of the following checks that is met. He increases the damage of all Champions in the formation by 200% for each stack of Grumpy he has, stacking multiplicatively.> - Adjacent to Farideh
> - At least two columns behind Havilar
> - At the top of the column
> - At least three Champions in the column(s) in front of him
> - At least two Champions in the column(s) behind him
> - Adjacent to Champions with an average base attack cooldown of 5 seconds or less
> - Adjacent to at least two Tiefling or Dragonborn Champions
> - At least one other Tiefling or Dragonborn in his column
> - Within 2 slots of Champions with at least 4 unique classes
> - Within 2 slots of Champions with at least 6 unique roles

raw.name: Grumpy
raw.tip_text: Mehen gets more powerful if you meet the positional requirements for his Grumpy ability.

description.desc: Mehen gains a stack of Grumpy for each of the following checks that is met. He increases the damage of all Champions in the formation by $amount% for each stack of Grumpy he has, stacking multiplicatively.

conditions.desc: ^^$stacks_from_effect_key_stacks_desc

At the top of the column
At least three Champions in the column(s) in front of him

Within 2 slots of Champions with at least 4 unique classes
Within 2 slots of Champions with at least 6 unique roles

abilities.name: Intimidating Presence
abilities.desc: When a monster tries to attack any Champion in the formation for the first time, the damage is prevented and the monster is stunned for 5 seconds and takes 200% more damage during this time. If the attacked Champion is Havilar, the duration is 10 seconds instead.

raw.name: Intimidating Presence
raw.tip_text: Some of Mehen's abilities have special effects if Havilar and Farideh are in the formation.

description.desc: When a monster tries to attack any Champion in the formation for the first time, the damage is prevented and the monster is stunned for $stun_duration seconds and takes $amount% more damage during this time. If the attacked Champion is Havilar, the duration is $buffed_stun_duration seconds instead.

abilities.name: Gruff
abilities.desc: Mehen increases Gold Find of the formation by 100% for every stack of Grumpy that he has, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Mehen increases Gold Find of the formation by $amount% for every stack of Grumpy that he has, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Expose Weakness
abilities.desc: When a Champion adjacent to Mehen applies a stun, knockback, slow, or root, the enemy takes 1000% more damage for 10 seconds. If Farideh is adjacent to Mehen, she prioritizes attacking those enemies. This debuff does not stack, but the duration is extended if it applies again before it expires.

description.desc: When a Champion adjacent to Mehen applies a stun, knockback, slow, or root, the enemy takes $amount% more damage for $debuff_duration seconds. If Farideh is adjacent to Mehen, she prioritizes attacking those enemies. This debuff does not stack, but the duration is extended if it applies again before it expires.

specs.name: Fighting Force
specs.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by 100% for each DPS Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value.

raw.name: Fighting Force
raw.specialization_description: Mehen rallies a fearsome crew of hard-hitting heroes.

description.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by $amount% for each DPS Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value.

specs.name: Father Figure
specs.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by 150% for each Champion in the formation who is 20 years old or younger, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value.

raw.name: Father Figure
raw.specialization_description: Mehen supports promising young adventurers, guiding them with the same wisdom that shaped his adopted daughters.

description.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by $amount% for each Champion in the formation who is 20 years old or younger, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value.

specs.name: Found Family
specs.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by 300% for each Dragonborn Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value. Farideh and Havilar both gain the Dragonborn species when this spec is chosen.

raw.name: Found Family
raw.specialization_description: Mehen embraces his role as a father by welcoming Farideh and Havilar fully into his Dragonborn family.

description.desc: Mehen increases the effect of Grumpy by $amount% for each Dragonborn Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applying to the post-stack value. Farideh and Havilar both gain the Dragonborn species when this spec is chosen.

items.name: Worn and Torn Chapbook
items.description: Havi keeps sneaking these into my haversack.

items.name: The Lonely Dragonborn
items.description: Havi, this is not subtle.

items.name: Mehen's Travel Reading
items.description: That is not mine...but if you lose my place, you're polishing armor til supper.

items.name: The Viper's Fangs
items.description: ...I don't know if I'm glad Havi's friends with this woman or if I should worry.

items.name: Child's Shortsword
items.description: Every child should have a sword. How else will they learn?

items.name: Worn Sword
items.description: Farideh favored this before Lorcan came around. She could have been a fighter.

items.name: Fancy Shortsword
items.description: More reliable than that cambion of hers, not that Fari wants to hear it.

items.name: Unconventional Blade
items.description: I'm just saying: she could use a sword AND eldritch blast.

items.name: Patchwork Scrap
items.description: I keep it under my chestpiece, close to my heart.

items.name: Baby Blanket Keepsake
items.description: It's hard to believe my fierce, clever girls were ever so small.

items.name: Kallan's Poem
items.description: You have to admire the bravery of a man rhyming 'passion' with 'slashing.'

items.name: Message from the Vanquisher
items.description: No one writes Kallan's letters for him--at least not to me. I miss him.

items.name: Sharpened Blade
items.description: You'll never go wrong with this by your side.

items.name: Wicked Weapon
items.description: I'd prefer you back away so I don't have to re-sharpen this once we're done.

items.name: Ceremonial Falchion
items.description: In Tymanther, even ceremonial weapons have an edge.

items.name: Fatherly Falchion
items.description: This is a sweet gift, girls, but Havi, I am not calling it 'Monster Gutter.'

items.name: Spacers
items.description: You can grow your piercing, or get a larger blade to make the cut. Your call.

items.name: Wooden Piercings
items.description: You get used to being clanless, but in the meantime, these help.

items.name: Jade Eye of Blazing Rorn
items.description: The piercings of my clan--bunch of tyrannical snobs.

items.name: Family Clan Piercings
items.description: Verthisathurgiesh is adaptable after all--my girls and I are a package deal.

items.name: Hammered Breastplate
items.description: Hit them before they have a chance to hit you.

items.name: Battle-Worn Armor
items.description: Listen, nothing looks good once it's gone through a behir.

items.name: Bounty Hunter Chestpiece
items.description: Tough and flexible--it does the job.

items.name: Dragonborn Scale Armor
items.description: It itches and the gems have no defensive purpose.

normal.name: Selfless
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: If you mean willing to take a hit, yeah. That's me.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Blades out, eyes up, spells ready and don't get cocky!

normal.name: Surly Survivalist
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Grumpy ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Keep your eyes on the road ahead!

normal.name: Testy Temperament
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Grumpy ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: If I have to come up there, I swear I'll turn this caravan around.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: We'll just call it an extra bounty.

normal.name: Bounty Hunter Training
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Gruff ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: People always need sellswords.

normal.name: Veteran's Eye
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Expose Weakness ability by 40%.
normal.desc: You don't survive long in my line of work without learning exactly where to strike.

normal.name: One of Many
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Gruff ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Keep your wits about you. You never know who you'll run into here.

normal.name: Adoptive Father
normal.effect: Mehen also counts as a Tiefling.
normal.desc: Where my girls go, I go.
effects: Mehen also counts as a Tiefling

normal.name: Expert Assessment
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Expose Weakness ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Watch how they move. They put too much weight on one side. Sweep the leg.

normal.name: Battle-Hardened
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Intimidating Presence ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I've fought tougher battles in my sleep. Let's end this quickly.

normal.name: Golden Wisdom
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's Gruff ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Gold's no use to you if you're dead. Since I'm here, that won't happen.

normal.name: Fierce Fighter
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's specializations by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I've seen a thousand battles, and I'll see a thousand more.
effects: Increases the effect of Mehen's specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Seasoned Leader
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Mehen's specializations by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I've seen enough battles to know how this ends. Watch and learn.
effects: Increases the effect of Mehen's specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Fashionably Grumpy
normal.effect:
Add the following check to Mehen's Grumpy ability:   
> Adjacent to at least 2 Champions with skins equipped.
normal.desc: What are you wearing? Actually, I don't care. Just stay alive.
effects: Add the following check to Mehen's Grumpy ability: ^Adjacent to at least 2 Champions with skins equipped

normal.name: Scale & Horn
normal.effect:
Add the following check to Mehen's Grumpy ability:

normal.desc: You fight like family, or close enough.

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: Count your coins before you store your pouch. There are those we can't trust among us.

data.backstory: Selise is of the Turami people, who trained to become a Paladin after losing her beloved wife right in front of her. In her travels, she came across the Rivals and joined up, despite her misgivings about the group. In the time she's been with them, she finally found the one she swore vengeance upon; but in doing so she lost her connection to Tyr.
data.name: Selise

base.name: Sword and Board - Aggressive
base.description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy and bashes them, stunning them for 2 seconds.
base.long_description: Bash the enemy before attacking them, stunning them for 2 seconds. This can cause hits- and armor-based enemies to take two hits.

base.name: Sword and Board - Aggressive
base.description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy and bashes them, stunning them for 2 seconds.
base.long_description: Bash the enemy before attacking them, stunning them for 2 seconds. This can cause hits- and armor-based enemies to take two hits.

base.name: Sword and Board - Wall
base.description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy and damages all enemies in a small area.
base.long_description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy and damages all enemies in a small area.

base.name: Sword and Board - Last Resort
base.description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy, damaging and knocking back enemies in a small area.
base.long_description: Selise attacks the nearest enemy, damaging and knocking back enemies in a small area.

ult.name: Switch to Wall Stance
ult.description: When used, Selise will switch to Wall stance.
ult.long_description: When used, Selise will switch to Wall stance.

abilities.name: Divine Sense
abilities.desc: Selise increases the damage of Champions in the two columns behind her by 100%. Bonus effects are provided based on Selise's current stance, which can be changed by using her Ultimate Attack.

raw.name: Divine Sense
raw.tip_text: Selise has 3 different stances that provide unique bonus effects and buffs to the Champions behind her.

conditions.desc: Selise increases the damage of Champions in the three columns behind her by $amount%. Bonus effects are provided based on Selise's current stance, which can be changed by using her Ultimate Attack.
Selise increases the damage of Champions in the two columns behind her by $amount%. Bonus effects are provided based on Selise's current stance, which can be changed by using her Ultimate Attack.

^^Aggressive: Champions affected by Divine Sense have their base attack cooldowns reduced by $(amount___4)s.^^Wall: Increases the effects of Divine Sense by $(amount___5)% when Selise has been attacked in the last $(seconds_since_attacked___5) seconds. Additionally, Champions in the same column as Selise take $(amount___6)% less damage from melee and ranged attacks.^^Last Resort: Increases the base effect of Vow of Vengeance by $(amount___8)%. This buff is additively reduced by $(reduce_amount___8)% every $(update_time___8) seconds Selise is in Last Resort stance, and additively increased by $(increase_amount___8)% every $(update_time___8) seconds Selise is not in Last Resort stance. (Current buff amount: $selise_last_resort_buff_amount%)^^Current stance: $(selise_stance)

effect_keys.override_key_desc: $target takes $amount% less damage from Melee Attacks and Ranged Attacks

abilities.name: Protect The Party
abilities.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by 25% of Selise's Max Health. This is increased by 5% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation applied additively.

description.desc: Increases the Health of all other Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% of $source's Max Health. This is increased by 5% for each other Rivals of Waterdeep Champion in the formation applied additively.

abilities.name: Shield of Psychomancy
abilities.desc: While in Aggressive stance, Selise will toss her shield in an arc targeted at the farthest enemy every 4th attack. It deals damage and stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds. If the enemy is armor/hits-based it takes double hits from all attacks until Selise attacks with Shield of Psychomancy again or changes stances.

description.desc: While in Aggressive stance, Selise will toss her shield in an arc targeted at the farthest enemy every 4th attack. It deals damage and stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds. If the enemy is armor/hits-based it takes double hits from all attacks until Selise attacks with Shield of Psychomancy again or changes stances.

abilities.name: Vow of Vengeance
abilities.desc: While not in Aggressive stance, Selise increases the effect of Divine Sense by 10% each time an enemy attacks her, stacking multiplicatively up to 100 times and resetting when changing areas. Stacks do not reset when changing stances.

description.desc: While not in Aggressive stance, Selise increases the effect of Divine Sense by $amount% each time an enemy attacks her, stacking multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks___3) times and resetting when changing areas. Stacks do not reset when changing stances.

conditions.desc: ^^$(selise_vow_of_vengeance_active)

abilities.name: Thunderous Smite
abilities.desc: When switching from Last Resort to Aggressive stance, Selise channels the divine power of Tyr and attacks a random enemy with her sword, dealing BUD-based AoE damage and BUD-based chaining lightning damage from the enemy struck to five nearby enemies. This effect can only trigger every 180 seconds.

raw.name: Thunderous Smite
raw.tip_text: Selise unleashes a powerful Thunderous Smite on multiple enemies when she moves from her Last Resort Stance to her Aggressive stance.

description.desc: When switching from Last Resort to Aggressive stance, Selise channels the divine power of Tyr and attacks a random enemy with her sword, dealing BUD-based AoE damage and BUD-based chaining lightning damage from the enemy struck to five nearby enemies. This effect can only trigger every $amount seconds.

conditions.desc: ^^$(selise_thunderous_smite_cooldown_remaining)

abilities.desc: Divine Sense is increased by 100% for each Rivals of Waterdeep affiliated Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Divine Sense is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Rivals of Waterdeep affiliated Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Chipped Blade
items.description: Works just as well.

items.name: Found Blade
items.description: Any sword in a storm, right?

items.name: Solid Sword
items.description: I use it to defend my home and my family.

items.name: Neverending Stormblade
items.description: Vengeance comes but once.

items.name: Woodworking Gloves
items.description: They double as good dueling gauntlets.

items.name: Training Gauntlets
items.description: Protects against errant blade knicks.

items.name: Battle-Ready Gear
items.description: I heard there's trouble! Where's the trouble?

items.name: Ruby-Encrusted Gauntlets
items.description: I got them for the next time we meet the Blackstaff!

items.name: Metal Ring
items.description: I carry them to help patch my armor during long rests.

items.name: Simple Ring
items.description: A simple circle, yet it means so much to so many.

items.name: Tarnished Ring
items.description: I won't stop until I have vengeance for what I lost.

items.name: Wedding Band
items.description: I'll always hold you close to my heart, my love.

items.name: Whittling Tools
items.description: It's a wonderful hobby.

items.name: Empty Canvas
items.description: I can already see it in my head.

items.name: Tiwaz Rune Carving
items.description: Let's see what it turns into.

items.name: Carving of the Just
items.description: The rune will help me reconnect with Tyr...eventually.

items.name: Training Shield
items.description: Just hold still. Don't flinch!

items.name: Tiwaz Shield
items.description: Tyr protect me. Let's do this.

items.name: Shield of Hope
items.description: For the longest time, I held on to hope that I'd have my vengeance. Now what?

items.name: Psychomancer Shield
items.description: Do you know how long I had to practice to get it to come back?

items.name: Soiled Cloak
items.description: Today was a day. Anyone have prestidigitation prepared?

items.name: Stained Cloak
items.description: I let my inner bear out, oops?

items.name: Bloodhunter Cloak
items.description: Luckily, stains won't show on this one

items.name: Astorio's Elegant Cloak
items.description: Elminster said it looked 'dashing'!

normal.name: Selfless
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Don't make me go momma bear on that beholder.

normal.desc: I worry that my thirst for vengeance clouds my judgement.

normal.name: Divine Vow
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Selise's Vow of Vengeance ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Tyr supports my quest, I wouldn't suggest getting in my way.

normal.name: Observant

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Selise by 15%.
normal.desc: I've seen worse.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Selise by 30%.
normal.desc: Justice must perservere and so will I.

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Selise takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: You really going to try me?

normal.effect: Selise takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
