normal.name: Sentinel
normal.effect: Selise takes 20 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: As long as power flows through my roots, I will fight.

normal.name: Shield Throw
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Selise's Rivalry's Insight ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Evade this.

normal.name: Champion of Tyr
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Thunderous Smite by 100% and prevents roaming familiars from automatically activating Selise's ultimate attack.
normal.desc: Tyr, give me strength!
effects: Increases the damage of Thunderous Smite by $amount% and prevents roaming familiars from automatically activating Selise's ultimate attack.

normal.name: Taunt
normal.effect: All Champions damage +100%. Selise's attacks have a 50% chance to taunt enemies.
normal.desc: I've killed Death. You're nothing compared to that.

normal.name: Nowhere to Run
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Selise's Vow of Vengeance ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Did you really think you could get away?

data.backstory: The imposing presence of Sergeant Knox came to Neverwinter when the Mintarn mercenaries were hired to retake the city following the eruption of Mount Hotenow. Soon he became a daily presence and mentor for new Adventurers in the city. Celeste reached out to her old friend following the catastrophic events at Elturel, hoping the veteran mercenary would join the Champions as they face the greatest foe the Sword Coast has ever seen!
data.name: Sgt. Knox

base.name: Battleaxe
base.description: Sgt. Knox swings his enormous Battleaxe through a random group of enemies.
base.long_description: Sgt. Knox swings his enormous Battleaxe through a random group of enemies.

base.name: Eldritch Blast
base.description: Five beams of green crackling energy streaks towards random enemies.
base.long_description: Five beams of green crackling energy streaks towards random enemies.

ult.name: Break The Line
ult.description: Sgt. Knox performs two attacks, knocking back, stunning and damaging enemies.
ult.long_description: Sgt. Knox swings his axe in an arc, knocking nearby enemies back, damaging, and stunning them for 2 seconds. He then leaps at a random enemy and swings his axe in an overhead blow, dealing even more damage and stunning enemies in the area for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Rallying Cry
abilities.desc: Increases the damage of Champions in all the columns behind Sgt. Knox by 100% for each positional formation ability affecting them, stacking multiplicatively and including this one.

data.backstory: Ellywick Tumblestrum has created music of such stirring quality that she was once invited to the Feywild where she played for the Summer Queen and the Queen of Air and Darkness. So moved were the two queens that they gifted the bard with her instrument, Morningmist. Tumblestrum's affinity for the Feywild brought her and her frog companion, Groak, to the Witchlight Carnival, where she spins tales and sings songs about the Plane of Faerie.

abilities.name: Call Of The Feywild
abilities.desc:
Ellywick unlocks her ultimate ability and, when she uses it, discards her current hand of cards. There is an instant effect based on each card discarded:  
>   
> Knight - All enemies currently spawned take 500% more damage from all attacks (stacks multiplicatively)  
> Moon - Instantly drop 10% of the gold from all currently spawned enemies (stacks multiplicatively)  
> Fates - Champions gain temporary hit points for 50% of their max health (stacks additively)  
> Flames - All currently spawned enemies move 50% slower and deal 50% less damage (stacks multiplicatively)  
> Gems - The next X bosses you fight have their max health reduced by 50% (X = # of cards).

description.desc: Ellywick unlocks her ultimate ability and, when she uses it, discards her current hand of cards. There is an instant effect based on each card discarded:^^Knight - All enemies currently spawned take 500% more damage from all attacks (stacks multiplicatively)^Moon - Instantly drop 10% of the gold from all currently spawned enemies (stacks multiplicatively)^Fates - Champions gain temporary hit points for 50% of their max health (stacks additively)^Flames - All currently spawned enemies move 50% slower and deal 50% less damage (stacks multiplicatively)^Gems - The next X bosses you fight have their max health reduced by 50% (X = # of cards)

data.backstory: The least ethical of the Oxventure crew, Prudence is a grumpy, power-hungry Tiefling Warlock. Cthulhu is Prudence's chosen warlock patron and stand-in father figure, and she does The Great Old One proud by waking up and choosing violence every single day. When she's not doing murders, Prudence enjoys a good book. Well, not a good book. An evil book. She has two in particular with her at all times in the monstrous forms of her beloved bitey book babies, Frisky and The Darkness. Prudence delights in anything creepy, gory and/or openly evil but has a soft spot for her fellow Oxventurers, who are the only folks this former hermit has any patience for. Either that or she hasn't found space in her busy murdering schedule to murder them yet.
data.name: Prudence

ult.long_description: Prudence opens a gateway to the dark between the stars, a region infested with unknown horrors. An area of blackness and bitter cold appears on the ground slightly in front of the formation. Tentacles erupt out of it, pulling all enemies together.

abilities.desc: Every time Prudence attacks an enemy but does not kill it she gains a stack of frustration. Frustration stacks increase her damage by 200%, stacking multiplicatively. The maximum number of Frustration stacks is equal to the number of Champions adjacent to Prudence. Frustration stacks are reduced by 1 each time Prudence gets a kill.

data.backstory: Dashing Human Pirate Rogue Corazón de Ballena grew up as posh Percival Milquetoast, heir to the Milquetoast estate, but he left it all behind - partly for adventure on the high seas, partly to spite his terrible, terrible dad.  Corazón is on a long-term quest to save the former crew of his ship, The Joyful Damnation, from a curse that he is at least partially responsible for. In the short term, the Joyful Damnation has become the Oxventurers' preferred mode of transportation. Corazón likes to avoid getting his hands dirty, preferring to use fast talking, deception and sheer force of personality to get around trouble. If things come down to a fight, he likes to stay stealthy, hiding, or darting in to take on foes one on one like a true swashbuckler.  And if that fails he can always fall back on the old classic, Grease, the world's best spell. According to him, And only him.
data.name: Corazón

base.name: Shadow Step
base.description: Corazón attacks a random enemy from the shadows.
base.long_description: Corazón attacks a random enemy from the shadows.

ult.name: Fiery Bombardment
ult.description: The joyful Damnation fires flaming cannonballs, igniting all current Grease puddles.
ult.long_description: Corazón's ship, the Joyful Damnation, fires flaming cannonballs from afar. This bombardment damages all enemies and lights all existing Grease puddles on fire for 30 seconds. Enemies in the flaming Grease puddles are dealt 1/30th of this ultimate's damage per second and take 100% more damage while the puddle is on fire.

abilities.name: Pirate's Code
abilities.desc: Corazón increases the damage of all Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions in the formation by 100%.

raw.name: Pirate's Code
raw.tip_text: Corazón increases the damage of all Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions in the formation

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of all Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions in the formation by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Grease
abilities.desc:
Whenever Corazón deals damage he leaves behind a moderately sized puddle of Grease under the enemy he attacked. Grease puddles do not hinder other Champions, but do slow enemies passing through them by 25%. The maximum number of Grease puddles on the screen at once is equal to the number of Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions in the formation. The effects of Grease puddles stack multiplicatively if an enemy is standing in multiple puddles at once.  
>   
> Max Grease Puddles: `$(corazon_max_grease_puddle_count)`.

raw.name: Grease
raw.tip_text: Corazón drops Grease puddles when he attacks, these impede all enemies who walk through them

The effects of Grease puddles stack multiplicatively if an enemy is standing in multiple puddles at once.^^Max Grease Puddles: $(corazon_max_grease_puddle_count)

items.name: Decorative Blade
items.description: It cuts butter quite well. Care to see?

items.name: Gilded Practice Sword
items.description: If it wasn't for this, I'd still be holding my sword all weird.

items.name: de Ballena's Cutlass
items.description: For whaling on people.

items.name: Ancient Cavalier Cutlass
items.description: I think this blade is speaking to me and - Oh! That's quite rude...

items.description: If I can find some gold paint, I can keep Dob from throwing our real coins in a lake.

items.name: Wooden Coins
items.description: Just dig through them. You'll find the real coins below. Clever, eh?

items.name: Silver Pieces
items.description: I don't know the exchange rate, but this seems like a lot.

items.name: Cursed Coins of the Lost Crew
items.description: If Curly Joe and the others could stop trying to kill me for five minutes, maybe I can finally rescue them.

items.name: Judgy Ring
items.description: I was just napping. Stop looking at me.

items.name: Watchful Ring
items.description: It's like my old crew is always watching me.

items.name: Serpent Ring
items.description: I, uh... won this in a game of chance from a snake priest! Yes.

items.name: Regal Rings of the Corsair
items.description: They each tell a story. Plus they look REALLY good.

items.name: Rogue's Cap
items.description: It looks dashing, right? You can be honest.

items.name: Pirate Hat
items.description: Do you have a drink called grog? I hear pirates drink it.

items.name: Captain's Hat
items.description: And THAT is why Grease is the world's best spell. I'll hear no more on this topic.

items.name: Joyful Damnation's Regalia
items.description: Could someone else steer? I'm having trouble seeing past these feathers.

items.name: Solid Boots
items.description: Is this all they had? They're so... basic.

items.name: Travelling Boots
items.description: I had to buy off the rack because the guy who makes the bespoke ones wasn't in that day.

items.name: Armored Knee Boots
items.description: Let's see them try that again! Or let's maybe just avoid them next time.

items.name: Commander's Boots
items.description: While you're shaking that person, could you also rob them for me?

items.name: Stealthy Overcoat
items.description: I immediately hide.

items.name: Milquetoast's Cloak
items.description: About the only good thing Dad ever did was buy this cloak.

items.name: Swashbuckler's Coat
items.description: Not sure about the swash, but it certainly has a lot of buckles.

items.name: Captain's Coat
items.description: The Joyful Damnation is at your service! Unless you're poor. Or a villain, I guess.

normal.name: Selflessness

data.backstory: Born in the land of Turmish, Reya came to the holy city of Elturel to train as a Hellrider when she was twelve. As a faithful follower of Torm, Reya trained to sacrifice herself for the greater good. That preparation led to her taking Zariel's sword and joining the Champions, after rescuing the city of Elturel from Avernus.
data.name: Reya

base.name: Sword of Zariel
base.description: Reya leaps out and slashes at a random enemy, cleaving nearby enemies as well.
base.long_description: Reya leaps out and slashes at a random enemy with the Sword of Zariel, cleaving nearby enemies as well.

ult.name: Avatar of Zariel
ult.description: Lulu puts all enemies to sleep for 10 seconds, then, Reya swings her sword in a massive circle.
ult.long_description: Reya launches to the sky, she lands by SLAMMING the Sword of Zariel into the ground with a shockwave summoning Zariel and her friend Lulu. While Reya communes with Zariel, Lulu zips around the board, putting all enemies to sleep for 10 seconds. While the enemies are asleep and Reya remains in her pose, the Champions deal massive damage against them. When the 10 seconds is complete, Reya removes the sword and swings it in a massive circle.

abilities.name: Searing Radiance
abilities.desc: Reya imbues adjacent Champions with her Searing Radiance, causing their attacks to deal 200% more damage.

description.desc: Reya imbues adjacent Champions with her Searing Radiance, causing their attacks to deal $(amount)% more damage.

description.desc: Fiends become Reya's Favored Foe and take $(amount)% more damage from Reya and adjacent champions.

abilities.name: Echoes of Zariel
abilities.desc: The gaze of Zariel turns from Reya and sweeps across the formation, looking at a random number of unique champions before returning to Reya. Once it returns to Reya it increases the effect of Searing Radiance by 100% for each Champion it looked at, including Reya, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Echoes of Zariel
raw.tip_text: The gaze of Zariel passes over champions, the more it visits prior to Reya the higher the bonus to her buffs.

Once it returns to Reya it increases the effect of Searing Radiance by $(amount)% for each Champion it looked at, including Reya, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Child's Badge
items.description: I was 12 when I swore an oath to Elturel, and the Hellriders.

items.name: Broken Badge
items.description: I'm still the same girl, just with a larger purpose.

items.name: Hellrider Badge
items.description: Even without the Companion, Elturel will always be protected.

items.name: Retired Badge of the Hellrider
items.description: There is more than one city. With the Champions, I can defend them all.

items.name: Hellrider Blade
items.description: My constant companion for almost a decade.

items.name: Ichor-Covered Blade
items.description: Fiends eventually realized that getting in my way was a bad idea.

items.name: The Bleeding Citadel's Prize
items.description: Yael blessed us with knowledge when we needed it most.

items.name: The Sword of Zariel
items.description: Zariel trusted me with this ancient blade. I pray I do her justice.

items.name: Mucked-Up Armor
items.description: You'd be surprised how quickly it gets dirty!

items.name: Hellrider Fatigues
items.description: Good for defending against the hordes of Avernus, not so great for rubble removal.

items.name: Zariel's Holy Armor
items.description: When I took the sword... I understood. Finally.

items.name: Armor of the Avatar
items.description: I am Reya Mantlemorn, Avatar of Zariel. You'll probably want to back down.

items.name: Trumpet of my Dreams
items.description: Memories of Lulu help me sleep at night.

items.name: Lulu's Far-Off Trumpet
items.description: Lulu's trumpet sound was my only clue to the Champions' location in Avernus.

items.name: Lulu the Hollyphant
items.description: Lulu is a rare thing; A true friend. She always has my back.

items.name: Lulu the Mammoth
items.description: I try not to call for her while in cramped quarters... We learned that lesson the hard way.

items.name: Lost Doll
items.description: I feel something pulling us to the east. A mountain... on fire?

items.name: Ruined Childhoods
items.description: The Hellriders have taken up the the task of providing stability to the survivors.

items.name: High Hall Stone
items.description: That place held the happiest of memories prior to the fall. Now it reminds me of my trials.

items.name: Broken Hellrider Sign
items.description: I put it on the wall in Trollskull. A reminder of where I've been.

items.name: Feather Sac
items.description: When you collect hundreds of feathers, you can make a really comfy pillow!

items.name: Small Feathers
items.description: A key spell component for Feather Fall.

items.name: Feather of the Past
items.description: It's from Idyllglen. When I returned with it, I knew Zariel had chosen me.

items.name: Zariel's Golden Feather
items.description: A gift. From my friend.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader

normal.desc: Zariel has blessed us with much.

normal.desc: Zariel has warned me. Our trials are not yet complete.

normal.name: Zariel's Gaze

normal.desc: She always has our back.

normal.desc: It's a ceremonial title, but... I like it.

data.backstory: A spontaneous fighter, a creative ranger, and a daring rogue team up with a humorous bard, a deep-thinking wizard, and a logical cleric. Together, they form a sweet partnership! Each NERD has a role, but like all adventuring parties, they're better together!

data.backstory: Xerophon went to sleep as a prisoner in a Netherese floating city, and awoke centuries later to the Champions asking them questions about a glacier. To say it's been a rough day would be an understatement. In an attempt to avoid the icy tomb of Ythryn, Xerophon joins with the Champions and is willing to see where this decision takes them. After all, they've played many roles in their life, but never the hero.
data.name: Xerophon

base.name: Stab
base.description: Xerophon stabs a random enemy
base.long_description: Xerophon leaps at a random enemy and stabs them with thier dagger.

ult.name: Perfect Imitation
ult.description: Xerophon imitates an enemy and buffs all Champions for 60 seconds.
ult.long_description: Xerophon picks an enemy from the current adventure and imitates them for 60 seconds. While the imitation lasts, Xerophon does not attack, but increases the damage of all Champions. If the enemy has been seen in the past 15 seconds the damage increase is further buffed.

abilities.name: Perfect Imitation
abilities.desc: While Xerophon is transformed, they do not attack; however, all Champions deal more damage.

raw.name: Perfect Imitation
raw.tip_text: While Xerophon is transformed, they do not attack; however, all Champions deal more damage.

conditions.desc: Unlocks $target's $(attack_name attack_id___3) Ultimate Attack

When Xerophon uses Perfect Imitation they pick a monster from the current adventure and imitates them for 60 seconds. While the imitation lasts, Xerophon does not attack, but increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)%. If the monster Xerophon is imitating has been seen in the past 15 seconds the damage is increased by an further $(amount___2)%.

^^Imitation Target: $(xerophon_perfect_imitation_target_name)^Time since last $(xerophon_perfect_imitation_target_name): $(xerophon_perfect_imitation_target_alive_timer)^Time Remaining: $(xerophon_perfect_imitation_timer)^Total Damage Bonus: $(amount)%

abilities.name: Adaptable
abilities.desc: Increase the damage of all Champions by 100%. Further increased by 25% for each stack of Adaptable Xerophon has. Each champion provides Adaptable stacks based on the number of specializations that they do not qualify for.

raw.name: Adaptable
raw.tip_text: Xerophon causes all Champions to deal more damage, this is buffed by the number of Champion ability scores that do NOT match their specialization choices.

description.desc: Increase the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)%. Further increased by $(amount___2)% for each stack of Adaptable Xerophon has. Each champion provides Adaptable stacks based on the number of specializations that they do not qualify for.

abilities.name: Minion Meets Master
abilities.desc: When the only enemy alive during Perfect Imitation is a boss, increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 25% per second, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

description.desc: When the only enemy alive during Perfect Imitation is a boss, increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by $(not_buffed amount___2)% per second, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

abilities.name: Repeated Imitation
abilities.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 5% each time it is used in an adventure, stacking multiplicatively up to 500 times. Stacks reset when the adventure is reset.

description.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by $(not_buffed amount___2)% each time it is used in an adventure, stacking multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks___2) times. Stacks reset when the adventure is reset.

abilities.name: Weak Spot
abilities.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by 25% each time the enemy Xerophon is imitating (or an enemy with the same name) is killed during that use of Perfect Imitation, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

description.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Perfect Imitation by $(not_buffed amount___2)% each time the enemy Xerophon is imitating (or an enemy with the same name) is killed during that use of Perfect Imitation, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks reset when the ultimate ends.

items.name: Cutting Edge
items.description: A knife is a versatile tool, for a commoner or an assassin.

items.name: Tool of the Trade
items.description: Once upon a time, this was my trade and my companion.

items.name: Polished Dagger
items.description: This fits my hand well -- but I'll put it to more heroic purposes than the old one.

items.name: Blade of the Ages
items.description: A reminder of a time and place I've left behind. I doubt Ythyrn's dead will mind.

items.name: Tattered Bindings
items.description: My ability to disguise myself is unparalleled... but it wasn't enough to save me.

items.name: Broken Straps
items.description: The wizard trapped me with his magic and these bindings for thousands of years.

items.name: Remains of Imprisonment
items.description: I was freed to a new world--Ythryn beneath a glacier, Netheril long crumbled to dust and legend

items.name: Reminder of Freedom
items.description: My future lays before me -- a new path, a new me. I am no one's tool and no one's captive.

items.name: Flimsy Cloak
items.description: It doesn't even take the edge off.

items.name: Cold Weather Wear
items.description: The cold seeps through this fabric, but it's better than going without.

items.name: Trusty Hook
items.description: The walls are slick, but this is what I trained for so long ago.

items.name: Jawbone Pick
items.description: It bites into Ythryn's ice like its former own once bit into its prey.

items.name: Ancient History
items.description: The pages are mildewed and fragile.

items.name: Tome of the Empire
items.description: Inside are the memories of Netheril's most powerful wizards.

items.name: Nether Oak Wand
items.description: I had to be stealthy to steal this from the Nether Oak while it was dormant.

items.name: Driftglobe
items.description: Netherese ingenuity at its finest -- why is this world not lit with magic everywhere?

items.name: Iron Ball
items.description: The first rule of the game chain lightning is don't let this hit you.

items.name: Galvanic Sphere
items.description: If this hits, it leaves a bruise and you're out. If you can get it charged though...

items.name: Tines of Lightning
items.description: Pass the ball through these tines so that it charges up.

items.name: Storm Orb
items.description: Hit an opponent with a charged ball and they won't just be out of the game!

items.name: Ancient Garb
items.description: I dressed my best while impersonating the wizard.

items.name: Imperial Attire
items.description: It was easy to blend in with Ythryn's mage class while wearing this.

items.name: Cloak of Another Age
items.description: I get the impression my outfit's a little out of date...

items.name: Fresh New Look
items.description: Jarlaxle gifted me this hat to mark my new life's beginning. How does it look?

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: My future depends on the strength of my friends.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Netheril couldn't break me, and neither can this.

normal.name: Look Into the Mirror
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Adaptable ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Who you seem to be is only a fraction of who you are.

normal.name: Who You Want to Be
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Adaptable ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Who you are inside -- who you can become -- is paramount.

normal.name: Rising Up the Ranks
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Minion Meets Master ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Who me? I've been here for years.

normal.name: Who to Trust?
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Minion Meets Master ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I don't want to gossip, but I think that one over there is a traitor...

normal.name: Perfect Double
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Repeated Imitation ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I look more 'you' than you do.

normal.name: Viper in Their Midst
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Xerophon's Weak Spot ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The folly of not getting to know your subordinates -- tsk!

normal.name: Athlete
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Xerophon by 1.
normal.desc: Head for the top! Quickly!

normal.name: Durable
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Xerophon by 1.
normal.desc: I spent a thousand years in a glacier --  I've toughened up.

normal.name: Keen Mind
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Xerophon by 1.
normal.desc: There's a way through this if we plan carefully.

normal.name: Guardian of Icewind Dale
normal.effect: Xerophon may be used in any Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden adventure or variant when a patron is enabled, even if the patron or variant restrictions would normally restrict them.
normal.desc: From Ten-Towns to Ythryn, from the Spine to the frozen sea, I shall defend this place.
effects: Xerophon may be used in any Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden adventure or variant when a patron is enabled, even if the patron or variant restrictions would normally restrict them.

data.backstory: D'hani's adventures began when she left Chult out of boredom to travel the world. She joined the Rivals as a spy for their enemy but liked them enough to stay! When not out on missions with the rest of the team, she enjoys painting the things and people she's seen on her travels.
data.name: D'hani

base.name: Fists of Fury
base.description: D'hani attacks the nearest enemy and one other random enemy.
base.long_description: D'hani attacks the nearest enemy and one other random enemy.

ult.name: Flurry of Brushes
ult.description: The weather clears and D'hani flings sharpened paint brushes at five random enemies, dealing damage and applying paint.
ult.long_description: The weather clears and D'hani pulls a quiver of sharpened paint brushes from her robes and flings them out at five random enemies. They deal damage and apply D'hani's paints to all enemies they hit.

abilities.name: Paint Them Red
abilities.desc: When D'hani attacks she paints the enemy red. An enemy can be painted up to three times. D'hani's damage is increased by 33% for each stroke of paint she has applied to a normal enemy in the current area, and 1000% for each stroke of paint she has applied to a boss enemy in the current area, stacking multiplicatively. Normal enemy strokes cap at 100, and boss area strokes cap at 6.

raw.name: Paint Them Red
raw.tip_text: D'hani paints enemies she attacks, this causes them to take extra damage based on the number of paint strokes she can see.

description.desc: When $(source_hero) attacks she paints the enemy red. An enemy can be painted up to three times. $(source_hero)'s damage is increased by 33% for each stroke of paint she has applied to a normal enemy in the current area, and 1000% for each stroke of paint she has applied to a boss enemy in the current area, stacking multiplicatively. Normal enemy strokes cap at 100, and boss area strokes cap at 6.

abilities.name: Way of the Brush
abilities.desc: D'hani keeps track of the total number of enemies she has painted across all time. This tracking persists between resets. D'hani's damage is increased by 0.03% for each enemy she has ever painted, stacking additively.

raw.name: Way of the Brush
raw.tip_text: D'hani remembers all the enemies she has ever painted, this strengthens her attacks against all future enemies.

description.desc: $(source_hero) keeps track of the total number of enemies she has painted across all time. This tracking persists between resets. $(source_hero)'s damage is increased by 0.03% for each enemy she has ever painted, stacking additively.

conditions.desc: ^^Total Monsters Painted: $(dhani_num_lifetime_painted_enemies_v2)^Total Bonus: $(dhani_current_damage_bonus_v2)%

abilities.name: Splash of Yellow
abilities.desc: Enemies D'hani paints have a 33% chance to gain a splash of yellow. Enemies painted in this way drop `$(dhani_gold_bonus)`% more gold when they are killed.

description.desc: Enemies $(source_hero) paints have a $(amount)% chance to gain a splash of yellow. Enemies painted in this way drop $(dhani_gold_bonus)% more gold when they are killed.

abilities.name: Stroke of Green
abilities.desc: Enemies D'hani paints have a 33% chance to gain a stroke of green. Enemies painted in this way cause D'hani's attacks against them to damage nearby enemies as well at `$(dhani_aoe_damage)`% damage. This effect does not chain, but does apply paint to the enemies it damages.

description.desc: Enemies $(source_hero) paints have a $(amount)% chance to gain a stroke of green. Enemies painted in this way cause $(source_hero)'s attacks against them to damage nearby enemies as well at $(dhani_aoe_damage)% damage. This effect does not chain, but does apply paint to the enemies it damages.

abilities.name: Blotch of Blue
abilities.desc: Enemies D'hani paints have a 33% chance to gain a blotch of blue. Enemies painted in this way are stunned for `$(dhani_stun_duration)` seconds when D'hani attacks them and boss enemies painted in this way take `$(dhani_boss_damage_bonus)`% more damage from all attacks.

description.desc: Enemies $(source_hero) paints have a $(amount)% chance to gain a blotch of blue. Enemies painted in this way are stunned for $(dhani_stun_duration) seconds when $(source_hero) attacks them and boss enemies painted in this way take $(dhani_boss_damage_bonus)% more damage from all attacks.

abilities.name: Friendly Rivalry
abilities.desc: D'hani's damage is increased by 200% for each Rival of Waterdeep in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero)'s damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Rival of Waterdeep in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Ochre Jelly Yellow
specs.desc: Increase the gold find effect of Splash of Yellow by 100%.

raw.name: Ochre Jelly Yellow
raw.specialization_description: D'hani adds more yellow to increase gold found.

description.desc: Increase the gold find effect of Splash of Yellow by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Twig Blight Green
specs.desc: Increase the damage done by Stroke of Green by 100%.

raw.name: Twig Blight Green
raw.specialization_description: D'hani adds more green to increase damage to nearby enemies.

description.desc: Increase the damage done by Stroke of Green by $(amount)%

specs.name: Frost Giant Blue
specs.desc: Increase the bonus damage done to bosses by Blotch of Blue by 100%.

raw.name: Frost Giant Blue
raw.specialization_description: D'hani adds more blue to increase damage against bosses.

description.desc: Increase the bonus damage done to bosses by Blotch of Blue by $(amount)%.

items.name: Old Staffs
items.description: What? I didn't want to get my hands dirty!

items.name: Training Staffs
items.description: Practice makes perfect!

items.name: Painted Staffs
items.description: I know, the paint gets everywhere. Isn't it wonderful!?

items.name: Ornamental Staffs
items.description: I keep them in the corner of my room.

items.name: Wood Bangles
items.description: They have a satisfying clink when I punch things!

items.name: Aarakocran Bangles
items.description: You can tap them together for secret messages while flying.

items.name: Golden Bangles
items.description: I think these really compliment my sash!

items.name: Exquisite Bangles
items.description: Only for fancy occasions.

items.name: Dirty Smock
items.description: Is that paint, or blood? Doesn't really matter.

items.name: Painter's Smock
items.description: For when I need to explore some colors.

items.name: Regal Tunic
items.description: Don't distract me, I have a dinner to attend right after I'm done!

items.name: Pesquet Tunic
items.description: Now, this is what I call an UPGRADE!

items.name: Traveller's Sash
items.description: It also doubles as a headscarf in a storm.

items.name: Chultan Sash
items.description: When I was foraging, it was a good sack in a pinch.

items.name: Honeycomb Sash
items.description: It reminds me of my favorite snack.

items.name: Saffron Sash
items.description: It's not often you meet the Open Lord of Waterdeep!

items.name: Wooden Cup
items.description: Always keep those paintbrushes handy.

items.name: Paint Rinse Cup
items.description: For rinsing, not sipping!

items.name: Clay Paint Pot
items.description: I'm painting the entrance to Trollskull Manor regal red.

items.name: Telescoping Easel
items.description: With my art supplies, even my staff gets used.

items.name: Decorated Dart
items.description: They'll do for a tavern brawl.

items.name: Cassalanter Dart
items.description: I know they are master-crafted, but they just don't feel balanced.

items.name: Dual Use Dart
items.description: No one suspects the paintbrushes!

items.name: Exquisite Dart of the Painter
items.description: It's poison-tipped. Best used with an oil-based paint.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of D'hani by 30%.
normal.desc: Oh, I'm IN!

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of D'hani by 60%.
normal.desc: They're focused on my hands, so they never see the feet or the wings coming.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: Could we get some new paints on the way home?

normal.name: Cardinal Colors
normal.effect: Increases the effect of D'hani's Paint Them Red ability by 20%.
normal.desc: This shade matches your mood, doesn't it?

normal.name: Crimson Competitors
normal.effect: Increases the effect of D'hani's Paint Them Red ability by 40%.
normal.desc: See the red ones? Punch the red ones!

normal.name: Rivalrous Party
normal.effect: Increases the effect of D'hani's Friendly Rivalry ability by 20%.
normal.desc: The Cassalanters planted me as a spy, but that sort of backfired, didn't it?

normal.name: Unrivaled Friendships
normal.effect: Increases the effect of D'hani's Friendly Rivalry ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I didn't understand what friendship was until I met the rivals.

normal.name: Chromatic Foe
normal.effect: Increases the effect of D'hani's Paint Them Red ability by 80%.
normal.desc: If I survive this battle, I'm going to paint it.

normal.name: Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of D'hani by 2.
normal.desc: Careful study reveals truth--in life and in art.

normal.name: Fresh Pigments
normal.effect: Increase the chance of applying a Splash of Yellow by 80%.
normal.desc: We need more yellow? Oh, that's fine - I've got red and green!
effects: Increase the chance of applying a $(upgrade_name id) by $(amount)%

normal.name: Fields of Green
normal.effect: Increase the chance of applying a Stroke of Green by 80%.
normal.desc: I think we need a bit more mossy colors.

normal.name: Fresh Palette
normal.effect: Increase the effect of all D'hani's Specializations by 40%.
normal.desc: A refreshed fighter is a strong fighter.
effects: Increase the effect of all D'hani's Specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Color Theory
normal.effect: Increase the effect of all D'hani's Specializations by 80%.
normal.desc: Fighting is like mixing paint. You need to know what works for a situation.
effects: Increase the effect of all D'hani's Specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Group Portrait
normal.effect: Increase the effect of all D'hani's Specializations by 20%.
normal.desc: It wouldn't be complete without all of us.

data.backstory: Harbinger of mayhem and music, Brig Hellclaw causes mischief anywhere he goes.  As a member of The Sirens of the Realms, he's always on the lookout for the next place to perform.  He prefers singing over combat, but when fighting is inevitable, he's all in!  Together with his Almiraj pet Spikey, when Brig's on the loose you never know what to expect!  His trusty wand of wonder could bring a curse or a boon, but it's all in another day's work for Brig!
data.name: Brig

base.name: War Lute
base.description: Brig leaps out and smashes a random enemy with his metallic guitar.

ult.name: Solo
ult.description: Cranks the hype by 11, damaging and pushing enemies.
ult.long_description: Brig performs a killer solo, with flashing lights and musical notes flying everywhere, damaging and pushing enemies back with massive sound power. For the next 30 seconds, Brig's Hype stacks are increased by 11.

abilities.name: Hype
abilities.desc: Brig increases the damage of everyone in the formation by 100%. For each Hype stack the buff is increased by 10%, stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively.

raw.name: Hype
raw.tip_text: Brig increases the damage of all Champions in the formation

description.desc: Brig increases the damage of everyone in the formation by $(not_buffed amount)%. For each Hype stack the buff is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Rallying Chord
abilities.desc: Brig's Hype is increased by 5 while at least one enemy has been defeated within the last 10 seconds. If no enemy has been defeated in the last 20 seconds, Brig gains 1 Hype stack each time a unique Champion attacks, up to a maximum of 10 Hype stacks.

description.pre: Brig's Hype is increased by 5 while at least one enemy has been defeated within the last 10 seconds. If no enemy has been defeated in the last 20 seconds, Brig gains 1 Hype stack each time a unique Champion attacks, up to a maximum of 10 Hype stacks.

conditions.desc: ^^Seconds Since Last Enemy Defeated: $(brig_rally_chord_seconds_since_last_kill)^Rallying Chord Hype Stacks: $(brig_rally_chord_stacks)

abilities.name: Inspired Bard
abilities.desc: Brig gains 1 Hype stack for each adjacent Champion. He gains an additional Hype stack for each adjacent Champion whose listed attack damage is higher than his.

raw.name: Inspired Bard
raw.tip_text: Brig increases his damage buff for adjacent champions who deal more damage than him

description.pre: Brig gains 1 Hype stack for each adjacent Champion. He gains an additional Hype stack for each adjacent Champion whose listed attack damage is higher than his.

conditions.desc: ^^Inspired Bard Hype Stacks: $(brig_inspired_bard_stacks)

abilities.name: Siren's Chant
abilities.desc: Increases the effect of Brig's Hype by 200% for each Champion in the formation with the Sirens of the Realms affiliation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Brig's Hype by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation with the Sirens of the Realms affiliation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Critical Moment
abilities.desc: Brig gains 1 Hype stack for every 5 enemies on the screen, rounded up. He gains an additional 10 Hype stacks whenever a boss enemy is on the screen.

description.pre: Brig gains 1 Hype stack for every 5 enemies on the screen, rounded up. He gains an additional 10 Hype stacks whenever a boss enemy is on the screen.

conditions.desc: ^^Enemies On Screen: $(brig_critical_moment_num_monsters_on_screen)^Inspired Bard Hype Stacks: $(brig_critical_moment_stacks)

abilities.name: Volume Up
abilities.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Hype based on the highest number of Hype stacks that Brig has ever had at once. The increase is 5% per Hype stack, stacking multiplicatively before applying.

description.desc: Increase the damage bonus of Hype based on the highest number of Hype stacks that Brig has ever had at once. The increase is $(not_buffed amount___2)% per Hype stack, stacking multiplicatively before applying.

specs.name: "Back"-Up Singer

data.backstory: Widdle is a Gnome turned Dhampir who has made it her life goal to destroy Strahd. Navigating this odd mutation will not be easy for her, but she has made a promise to herself to set a good example for Dhampirs everywhere, with the help of Rend and her friends, to show them that this life does not make you a monster. She is incredibly fast, has a big personality, and an even bigger trenchcoat full of tricks!
data.name: Widdle

base.name: Blunderbolt
base.description: Widdle fires a firebolt from her enormous Blunderbuss, damaging a random enemy.
base.long_description: Widdle fires a firebolt from her enormous Blunderbuss, damaging a random enemy.

ult.name: Vampiric Bite
ult.description: Widdle leaps out and bites a random enemy, dealing damage and healing everyone affected by Vampiric Gaze.
ult.long_description: Widdle leaps out and ferociously bites a random enemy, dealing enormous damage. She then leaps back into the formation where her Vampiric Bite heals her and everyone affected by Vampiric Gaze for an amount equal to her own max health.

items.name: Boots of Deftness
items.description: I'll figure out where I'm going when I get there.

data.backstory: Yorven Springpaw disappeared from the Feywild as a child after an encounter with a malicious coven of hags. He ended up lost in the Shadowfell, where he embraced his innate primal spirit to survive. The power of this ancient feral beast helped Yorven do more than survive the dangers of the Shadowfell -- he thrived. When Yorven came across the Witchlight Carnival he managed to convince the owners to bring him on board. When the Witchlight Carnival returned to the Feywild years later, Yorven moved on, seeking his childhood home - and the hags who banished him.
data.name: Yorven

base.name: Ferocious Maul
base.description: Yorven leaps out at the nearest enemy, pinning it in place and attacking it once a second for 5 seconds
base.long_description: Yorven leaps at the nearest enemy, rooting it in place and attacking it once every second for 5 seconds.

ult.name: Fey Wild Shape
ult.description: Yorven Springpaw wild shapes into a powerful shadow mastiff-like creature for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: Yorven Springpaw wild shapes into a shadow mastiff-like creature for 30 seconds. During this time their attack cooldown is reduced by 2.5 seconds, and their damage is increased by 400%.

items.name: Protective Shears
items.description: They keep a keen edge, no matter how many times I use them.

items.description: A memento of a more innocent time, before I was stolen from my home.

items.name: Dragon Card
items.description: The Feywild is a tricky place, but it pays to remember who your friends are.

items.description: Of course, it hurt when I got them. But the pain is a trifle.

items.name: Wooden Hoops
items.description: Decoration may be frivolous, but it reminds me I am still myself.

items.name: Silver Earrings
items.description: These blaze like the moonlight over Prismeer.

items.name: Golden Jewelry
items.description: There is a warmth to this gold that I never knew in the Shadowfell.

items.name: Markings of Power
items.description: I used the tools at hand to survive in the Shadowfell.

items.name: Blood Fury Tattoo

items.name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo

items.description: I can move faster in this.

items.description: It's safe to wear in colors now. As powerful as I've become I don't need to hide.

items.name: Claw-Forged Vessel

items.name: Child's Vest

items.name: Child's Vest

items.name: Repaired Jerkin
items.description: I pieced this together to stay warm as I grew

items.name: Repaired Jerkin

data.backstory: Viconia DeVir is a devout cleric of Shar, the goddess of darkness and loss. Viconia was cast out of Menzoberranzan and house DeVir after refusing to sacrifice a child to the spider goddess Lolth. Don't mistake her for a champion of good, however. Viconia has lived a dangerous and difficult life, and she joins the Champions at the behest of two old 'friends', Baeloth & Minsc. She may not approve of how the Champions work, but she's here and ready to assist, so long as the quest, and the payout pleases her.
data.name: Viconia

base.description: Viconia slings a stone at a random enemy.
base.long_description: Viconia slings a stone at a random enemy.

ult.description: Viconia summons darkness that damages all enemies and increases the odds of triggering Animate Dead.
ult.long_description: Viconia summons a cloying miasma of cold and greasy darkness that damages all enemies and increases the odds of any enemies killed by it triggering Animate Dead by 50%.

While it is re-animated, it deals 20% of your BUD to nearby enemies each second. There can be up to 25 re-animated enemies at a time.

While it is re-animated, it deals $(amount___2)% of your BUD to nearby enemies each second. There can be up to $(max_reanimated) re-animated enemies at a time.

items.name: Battered Mace
items.description: It will have to do.

items.name: Well-Used Weapon
items.description: An unused weapon has yet to fulfill its promise.

items.name: Handmaiden's Mace
items.description: The only one who'll guard my back is me, and I prefer it that way.

items.name: Mace of Magnificence
items.description: Avert your eyes, swine, or I'll acquaint you with my weapon.

items.name: Dark Lady's Mark
items.description: I'm not fool enough to dismiss Lolth...but she's not fool enough to dismiss Shar.

items.name: Symbol of Devotion
items.description: Everything becomes nothing. Why not seize what you can in the meantime?

items.name: Emblem of Shar
items.description: Be glad I do not still follow Lolth; if I did, your death would be much slower.

items.name: Eye of the Void
items.description: There is no power greater than the void of Shar. You'll see.

items.name: Novice's Circlet
items.description: You don't need to know my past. Only that Shar has lifted me from it.

items.name: Priestess's Tiara
items.description: I wear my allegiance with pride. I'd rather know you were against me from the start.

items.name: Crown of Power
items.description: Sometimes life has its little rewards.

items.name: Circlet of Blasting
items.description: I think you'll find my eyes are up here. Below the crystal full of evocation magic.

items.name: Minor Tincture
items.description: I have all manner of potions and poisons at my disposal.

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
items.description: I know who I am--but you don't need to know I was here.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: A sip of this, and you could crush anyone who sought to hold you down.

items.name: Potion of Superior Healing
items.description: I will say this for spiders: they always come right back. I admire that.

items.name: Tattered Sling
items.description: I don't need to be close to you to know I want to destroy you.

items.name: Repaired Flinger
items.description: It does make a nice 'thwack' when it hits.

items.name: Skillful Sling
items.description: This stone has your name on it, I believe.

items.name: Missiles of the Inferno
items.description: I'll burn a hole right through you.

items.name: Encompassing Cloak
items.description: I prefer privacy as I go about my business.

items.name: Shadowy Hood
items.description: You don't need to look at me.

items.name: Cloak of the Dark Lady
items.description: Purple and black are very much my colors.

items.name: Mantle of Eternal Night
items.description: Wrapped in Shar's purpose, I feel comfort and certainty.

data.backstory: Rust on the Harbour is a former pirate who gave up a life at sea because it was far too wet. Now trying life as an adventurer on land, he'll lend his roguish skills to anyone who can give him that which his heart desires most: one gold piece.
data.name: Rust

base.name: Bang Bang
base.description: Rust shoots a random enemy with his pistols.
base.long_description: Rust shoots a random enemy with his pistols.

ult.name: Cannonball!
ult.description: Rust climbs into a cannon and fires himself at the enemies, dealing damage in a large area.
ult.long_description: Rust loads himself into a cannon and fires himself toward the enemies, dealing damage in a large area upon landing. If Rust has a shiny gold piece, he drops it while flying through the air.

abilities.name: Hello, Friends
abilities.desc: Rust increases the damage of all Champions by 400% for each Champion in the formation with the Gold Find role or the Oxventurers Guild affiliation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Hello, Friends
raw.tip_text: Rust increases the damage of all Champions, and those benefits increase for each Gold Find Champion or Oxventurers Guild affiliation member in the formation.

description.desc: Rust increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation with the Gold Find role or the Oxventurers Guild affiliation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Rust For Hire
abilities.desc: Rust increases your gold find by 400%.

description.desc: Rust increases your gold find by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: One Gold Piece
abilities.desc: Assuming Rust does not already have one, he has a 10% chance to find a shiny gold piece after any kill that drops gold. Each time Rust finds a shiny gold piece he gains a Riches stack. Rust increases the effect of Hello, Friends by 5% for each Riches stack he has, stacking multiplicatively. Rust loses his shiny gold piece whenever you use his ultimate ability. Riches stacks are capped at the highest area unlocked divided by 5, rounded up.

raw.name: One Gold Piece
raw.tip_text: Rust has a chance of finding his One Gold Piece whenever an enemy is defeated which increases his damage buff. By using his ultimate, he'll drop his gold piece and give you another chance to increase his buff even further!

description.desc: Assuming Rust does not already have one, he has a $(amount___2)% chance to find a shiny gold piece after any kill that drops gold. Each time Rust finds a shiny gold piece he gains a Riches stack. Rust increases the effect of Hello, Friends by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Riches stack he has, stacking multiplicatively. Rust loses his shiny gold piece whenever you use his ultimate ability. Riches stacks are capped at the highest area unlocked divided by 5, rounded up.

conditions.desc: ^^Shiny Gold Piece: $(rust_shiny_gold_piece_v2)

abilities.name: Highest Bidder
abilities.desc: Rust increases the damage of all Champions by 100% for each order of magnitude of your Gold Find percentage, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Rust increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each order of magnitude of your Gold Find percentage, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Rags to Riches
abilities.desc: Whenever Rust is holding a shiny gold piece, he increases the effect of Hello, Friends by 200%. Whenever Rust is NOT holding a shiny gold piece, he increases the effect of Rust For Hire by 200%.

description.desc: Whenever Rust is holding a shiny gold piece, he increases the effect of Hello, Friends by $amount%. Whenever Rust is NOT holding a shiny gold piece, he increases the effect of Rust For Hire by $amount%.

specs.name: Get Rich Quick

raw.name: Get Rich Quick
raw.specialization_description: Rust's flamboyant nature inspires his friends to also attempt fantastic feats of daring-do.

description.desc: When Rust uses his ultimate, all other Champions with the Gold Find role or Oxventurers Guild affiliation have their remaining ultimate cooldowns reduced by $amount%.

data.backstory: Artificer, entrepreneur, and planeswalker, the gnome Vi hails from the world of Eberron. Seeking to atone for her part in creating devastating weapons for the Last War, she established the Fixers, a business dedicated to fixing problems others deem unfixable. Born with an aberrant dragonmark that allows her to travel from one plane of existence to another, she's brought her genius, warm heart, and love for a stiff drink to many worlds. Headquartered in Sigil, the City of Doors, the Fixers now have offices throughout the multiverse.
data.name: Vi

base.name: Pistol
base.description: Vi shoots the closest enemy with her pistol.
base.long_description: Vi shoots the closest enemy with her pistol.

base.name: Bored Now
base.description: Vi waits for a bigger threat before acting.
base.long_description: Vi waits for a bigger threat before acting.

ult.name: Arcane Cannon
ult.description: Vi's Cockatrice starts attacking the nearest enemy. Trigger again to dive bomb the enemies.
ult.long_description: The first time the ultimate button is hit, a metal Cockatrice appears next to her and starts dealing ultimate damage to the closest enemy every second for 30 seconds. The second time the ultimate button is hit, the Cockatrice flies to the middle of a swarm of enemies and explodes, dealing 1000% ultimate damage to all enemies in an area attack.

abilities.name: A Good Example
abilities.desc: Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions' damage is increased by 300% for each Good, Acquisitions Incorporated, or "C" Team Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: A Good Example

abilities.name: Catch and Release
abilities.desc: Instead of a base attack with her pistol, there is a 10% chance Vi takes out her comically oversized blunderbuss and fires it at a random normal enemy. This instantaneously transforms the enemy into a small glowing crystal sphere that has 1% of a normal enemy's health and is worth an additional 1000% gold when defeated. When changing areas, any remaining spheres are automatically killed and the gold from them is collected.

description.desc: Instead of a base attack with her pistol, there is a $(amount)% chance Vi takes out her comically oversized blunderbuss and fires it at a random normal enemy. This instantaneously transforms the enemy into a small glowing crystal sphere that has 1% of a normal enemy's health and is worth an additional $(amount___2)% gold when defeated. When changing areas, any remaining spheres are automatically killed and the gold from them is collected.

abilities.name: I'm Too Old For This #*&!
abilities.desc: If there are 5 or fewer enemies on screen, Vi waits impatiently instead of attacking with her base attack, and there is a 25% chance that the second monster in each wave will spawn alongside the first one.

raw.name: I'm Too Old For This #*&!
raw.tip_text: Vi increases the rate at which enemies spawn if you're able to kill them quickly.

description.desc: If there are $(max_monsters) or fewer enemies on screen, Vi waits impatiently instead of attacking with her base attack, and there is a $(amount)% chance that the second monster in each wave will spawn alongside the first one.

abilities.name: I Can't Get No Sass-isfaction

description.desc: Vi gains $(stacks_per_second) Sass stack for each second she spends impatiently waiting. A Good Example is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Sass stack, stacking multiplicatively. Sass stacks are capped at $(max_stack_mult___2) times the highest area unlocked in the current adventure.

data.backstory: Desmond stands an absolutely towering 5 foot 10 inches. He was inflicted with lycanthropy as a teenager on a hunt for food. While it's taken him a long time to do so, he's finally accepted his curse and savors any opportunity to unleash the beast inside if the situation arises... It often does.

ult.long_description: Desmond transforms into his Werewolf form and leaps at the enemy with the most hit points. He swipes with both claws, then bites them, then returns to formation and back to human form. Noble Heart gets a +300% increase for 30 seconds.

data.backstory: Tatyana is an air-genasi barbarian gladiator, towering near seven feet tall, who earned her stripes in the fighting pits of Koshmarr. The talons of Falkovnia taught her the power of the bear totem, and the spirits of the mist connected her to the natural druidic world through the power of the moon. She is a fierce guardian of all who show her respect, is curious and bold, quick to fight but quick to forgive. Some see this giant blue weightless warrior as a bit of an 'air-head' but those who know this lightness comes from a deep knowledge that the moment is all we have, and death may lurk around any corner.
data.name: Tatyana

base.name: Twin Kukri Strike
base.description: Tatyana strikes at the closest enemy with two Kukri strikes.
base.long_description: Tatyana strikes at the closest enemy with two Kukri strikes.

base.name: Primal Savagery
base.description: Tatyana strikes at the closest enemy biting and clawing them.
base.long_description: Tatyana strikes at the closest enemy with a bite and two clawed swings for three hits.

ult.name: Entangle
ult.description: Entangling roots appear, dealing damage to enemies within while reducing their damage.
ult.long_description: A stripe of entangling roots appears to the right of the front column, dealing damage to all enemies inside it, and all enemies that enter it during its duration. Enemies standing in the roots deal 50% less damage. The roots last for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Faithful Friend
abilities.desc: A random slot from the middle columns of the formation is chosen. Tatyana increases the damage of the Champion in that slot by 100%.

raw.name: Faithful Friend
raw.tip_text: Tatyana buffs the damage of a randomly chosen champion in the middle columns of the formation

conditions.desc: A random slot from the middle columns of the formation is chosen. $(source_hero) increases the damage of the Champion in that slot and adjacent to it by $(amount)%.
A random slot from the middle columns of the formation is chosen. $(source_hero) increases the damage of the Champion in that slot and in the same column as it by $(amount)%.
A random slot from the middle columns of the formation is chosen. $(source_hero) increases the damage of the Champion in that slot by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Loyal Protector
abilities.desc: Tatyana increases the health of all other Champions by 25% of her max health.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the health of all other Champions by $(amount)% of her max health.

abilities.name: Rising Fury
abilities.desc: Each time Tatyana is attacked, she gains one Fury stack. The effect of Faithful Friend is increased by 100% for each Fury stack, stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively. She loses 10% of her Fury stacks every 15 seconds that she is not attacked. Caps at 150 stacks.

description.desc: Each time $(source_hero) is attacked, she gains one Fury stack. The effect of Faithful Friend is increased by $(amount)% for each Fury stack, stacking additively and then applying multiplicatively. She loses $(amount___2)% of her Fury stacks every $(time___2) seconds that she is not attacked. Caps at $(max_stacks) stacks.

abilities.name: Find a Feast
abilities.desc: If Tatyana is not attacked for 15 seconds, and the players are in a non-boss area with no barriers, she briefly runs ahead off the right side of the screen. She returns 2 seconds later from the right side with $(tatyana_find_a_feast_range) additional enemies that simultaneously spawn. After she returns, the 15 seconds counter starts again from 0 seconds.

raw.name: Find a Feast
raw.tip_text: If Tatyana has not been attacked recently she grabs some snacks and brings back some extra enemies to fight

description.pre: If $(source_hero) is not attacked for $(time) seconds, and the players are in a non-boss area with no barriers, she briefly runs ahead off the right side of the screen. She returns $(offscreen_time) seconds later from the right side with $(tatyana_find_a_feast_range) additional enemies that simultaneously spawn. After she returns, the $(time) seconds counter starts again from 0 seconds.

conditions.desc: ^^Minimum Enemies spawned: $(tatyana_find_a_feast_range_min)^Chance of Additional Enemy: $(tatyana_find_a_feast_range_extra_chance)%

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.desc: When Tatyana reaches 50+ Fury stacks, and for every 15 seconds she's above 50+ Fury stacks, she gets a Rage stack, up to 6 Rage stacks. With at least 1 Rage stack, she rages and her base attack changes. For each Rage stack, Faithful Friend gets a 400% bonus, stacking multiplicatively. If she goes below 50 Fury stacks, she loses all Rage stacks.

description.desc: When $(source_hero) reaches $(amount___2)+ Fury stacks, and for every $(time___2) seconds she's above $(amount___2)+ Fury stacks, she gets a Rage stack, up to $(max_stacks) Rage stacks. With at least 1 Rage stack, she rages and her base attack changes. For each Rage stack, Faithful Friend gets a $(amount)% bonus, stacking multiplicatively. If she goes below $(amount___2) Fury stacks, she loses all Rage stacks.

data.backstory: Gazrick Nomrad is just your standard gnome druid/businessman/detective/chef/socialist construct. Harnessing the magic of all things cold, he brings a wealth of frost-based spells to the table, as well as insisting his actions are not weird. They are.
data.name: Gazrick

base.name: Frostbite
base.description: Gazrick attacks the closest enemy with magic dealing damage with a chance to stun them.
base.long_description: Gazrick attacks the closest enemy with a magic attack that causes one hit and a 50% chance that the enemy is stunned for 2 seconds.

ult.name: Sleet Storm
ult.description: Gazrick summons a sleet storm above the nearest enemy dealing damage and freezing the ground in a large AOE radius.
ult.long_description: Gazrick summons a sleet storm above the nearest enemy dealing damage and freezing the ground in a large AOE radius. The frozen ground lasts for 30 seconds slowing enemies by 50% while they travel through it. If not already snowing, it begins to snow until the area changes.

abilities.name: Frosty Friendship

data.backstory: He is Dungeon Master, your guide in the realm of Dungeons & Dragons!
data.name: Dungeon Master

base.name: Magic Missile
base.description: Dungeon Master fires white rays at a random enemy.
base.long_description: Dungeon Master fires 1 or more white rays at a random enemy.

ult.name: Invigorate
ult.description: Dungeon Master waves his hands, and the Ultimate ability with the longest remaining cooldown immediately recharges.
ult.long_description: Dungeon Master waves his hands, and the Ultimate ability with the longest remaining cooldown immediately recharges. The cooldown for this Ultimate is set to the time the recharged Ultimate had left. Dungeon Master increases the damage of all Champions in the formation for half of the time his Ultimate is cooling down.

abilities.name: Dungeon Master Rules
abilities.desc: Dungeon Master is eligible to start in all adventures, even if the Patron, Variant, or other restrictions would say otherwise.

description.desc: $(source_hero) is eligible to start in all adventures, even if the Patron, Variant, or other restrictions would say otherwise.

abilities.name: Patience, Young Ones!
abilities.desc: Dungeon Master increases the damage of all Champions by 100% for each Champion in the formation that is 20 years or younger, stacking multiplicatively. If the sum of the 6 youngest Champions' ages is 100 years or less, the bonus is increased by 400% (post-stack).

raw.name: Patience, Young Ones!
raw.tip_text: Dungeon Master buffs the damage of all champions based on the number of Champions under 20 in the formation

If the sum of the $(not_buffed num_of_youngest___2) youngest Champions' ages is $(not_buffed max_age_sum___2) years or less, the bonus is increased by $(amount___2)% (post-stack).

$(source_hero) increases the damage of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation that is 20 years or younger, stacking multiplicatively. If the sum of the $(not_buffed num_of_youngest___2) youngest Champions' ages is $(not_buffed max_age_sum___2) years or less, the bonus is increased by $(amount___2)% (post-stack).

data.backstory: Modrons are the embodiment of law and order, marching in lockstep through the planes. But when Nordom Whistlklik was separated from his fellow modrons, the essence of chaos infected this rogue quadrone. Now with his crossbow-shaped gear spirits in hand, he works to fit his complex new outlook into his logical-if quirky-understanding of the planes.
data.name: Nordom

base.name: Gear Spirits
base.description: Nordom simultaneously fires two crossbows at the closest two enemies.
base.long_description: Two gear spirits have taken the form of crossbows, which Nordom fires simultaneously at the closest two enemies. If only one enemy remains, he'll instead hit it twice.

base.name: Gear Spirits - Piercing Bolts
base.description: Nordom simultaneously fires two crossbows at the closest two enemies. Piercing Bolts - Causes enemies to take additional damage for 10 seconds.
base.long_description: Two gear spirits have taken the form of crossbows, which Nordom fires simultaneously at the closest two enemies. If only one enemy remains, he'll instead hit it twice. Piercing Bolts -  Causes enemies to take additional damage for 10 seconds.

base.name: Gear Spirits - Explosive Bolts
base.description: Nordom simultaneously fires two crossbows at the closest two enemies. Explosive Bolts - Knocks enemies back.
base.long_description: Two gear spirits have taken the form of crossbows, which Nordom fires simultaneously at the closest two enemies. If only one enemy remains, he'll instead hit it twice. Explosive Bolts - Knocks enemies back.

ult.name: The Frequent Modron March
ult.description: A multitude of modrons march through pushing back and damaging enemies as they pass by.
ult.long_description: A multitude of modrons march from left to right over 15 seconds, pushing all enemies back a short distance and dealing ongoing massive damage as they pass by.

abilities.desc: Nordom increases the effect of Form Orderly Ranks by 100% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the effect of Form Orderly Ranks by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

data.backstory: Merilwen is the Wood Elf Druid with a penchant for puns and powerful spells. Her trusty bow can help her out of many a tough situation, but she finds that turning into a cat can be just as useful. Oh and she might look cute, but don't underestimate her; fiercely loyal to her friends, and to nature itself, she'll call upon the moon to deal with anyone who gets on her bad side. And if you're really unlucky, you might stumble into Merilwen's Meatgrinder. Spoilers: it's a very bad time.
data.name: Merilwen

base.description: Merilwen attacks a random enemy with a magical spray of poison.
base.long_description: Merilwen attacks a random enemy with a magical spray of poison.

ult.long_description: Stone spikes come out of the ground with a 30 second duration. Enemies take massive damage over time while in the area.

abilities.name: Wild Shape
abilities.desc: At the start of each non-boss area, Merilwen takes on the form of a wild cat. She no longer makes normal attacks, but the attack speed cooldown of every adjacent Champion is reduced by 0.5 seconds. If there are ever 15 or more enemies on the screen, Merilwen transforms back to her normal form and starts attacking until the party switches areas.

If there are ever $(monster_limit___2) or more enemies on the screen, $(source_hero) transforms back to her normal form and starts attacking until the party switches areas.

When $target uses Merilwen's Meat Grinder Secondary effects are triggered based on if other Oxventurers Guild members are part of the formation.^^Corazón: Enemies affected by Grease in the spike area take $(corazon_amount___2)% damage from all sources.^Dob: Dob increases the number of Deposit stacks by 1%, rounding up, minimum 1 stack.^Egbert: Egbert's Atone for the Past is buffed by 1000%^Prudence: Prudence's Glee stacks are set to maximum.^Rust: Gold find is increased by $(rust_amount___2)% while the Meat Grinder is active.

effect_keys.dev_note: any changes to balance here will need to be be made in the attack def as well, these properties were just broken out to allow for easier post-translation changes to the description.

data.backstory: Nahara is a reborn fallen Aasimar undead warlock/college of the spirits bard. She fell into the mists of Ravenloft unable to remember anything from her life (or past lives as we've come to learn). All she knows is that her current Patron, Azalin Rex, has asked her to aid him against his foe Strahd von Zarovich, who for reasons unknown to her, has been desperately seeking her out.
data.name: Nahara

base.name: Witch Bolt
base.description: Nahara attacks a random enemy and every enemy that she already hit with a bolt of energy.
base.long_description: Nahara attacks a random enemy and every enemy that she has already hit with this attack.

ult.description: Nahara takes off and channels Azalin Rex, increasing her damage for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: Nahara takes off into the air and channels the power of her patron Azalin Rex for 15 seconds. Her damage is increased by 1,000% while in this form and any enemy she hits has a 50% chance of being stunned for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Beloved by Strahd

abilities.name: Who Am I?
abilities.desc: Nahara recovers a bit of her lost memory as she adventures. If Nahara is in the formation when you complete an area for the first time, she gets a 0.2% damage bonus, stacking additively. These bonuses persist through resets.

raw.name: Who Am I?
raw.tip_text: Nahara does more damage for every adventure area she completes over all time.

description.desc: $(source_hero) recovers a bit of her lost memory as she adventures. If $(source_hero) is in the formation when you complete an area for the first time, she gets a $(amount)% damage bonus, stacking additively. These bonuses persist through resets.

abilities.name: To Amuse or Avenge
abilities.desc: When Nahara attacks and defeats at least one enemy, she gains a Levity stack, with a maximum of 30 stacks. When she attacks and doesn't defeat an enemy, she loses a Levity stack. Nahara gets a 10% damage bonus for each Levity stack she has below 30, and at the start of each area, she reduces the area requirements by 2% for each Levity stack above 15.

raw.name: To Amuse or Avenge
raw.tip_text: Nahara allows champions to complete future areas more quickly when she is easily defeating enemies, and when she is not she starts to deal more damage.

description.desc: When $(source_hero) attacks and defeats at least one enemy, she gains a Levity stack, with a maximum of $(max_stacks) stacks. When she attacks and doesn't defeat an enemy, she loses a Levity stack. $(source_hero) gets a $(amount___2)% damage bonus for each Levity stack she has below $(max_stacks), and at the start of each area, she reduces the area requirements by $(amount___3)% for each Levity stack above $(start_stacks).

abilities.name: Strong Society
abilities.desc: Nahara gets a 400% damage bonus for each other Black Dice Society affiliation member in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) gets a $(amount)% damage bonus for each other Black Dice Society affiliation member in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.specialization_description: Nahara focuses on her experience to deal more damage

raw.specialization_description: Nahara focuses on her companions to bring the fight to Strahd

data.backstory: Valentine comes from a life of leisure. Once a social butterfly, nightlife connoisseur, and princess of the shady family business but that life ended in sudden tragedy. Through the mysterious will of Bluetspur, Valentine was given a second chance at life, though no miracle comes without consequence. Now she wanders the domains of dread with her companion Tatyana, in search of purpose and power.
data.name: Valentine

base.name: Mind Sliver
base.description: Valentine attacks a random enemy with a mental magic attack, which deals damage and has a chance to stun them.
base.long_description: Valentine attacks a random enemy with a mental magic attack for one hit and enemies have a 50% chance that they are stunned for 2 seconds.

ult.name: Arms of Hadar
ult.description: Valentine targets the nearest enemy and those around it dealing damage and stunning them. While stunned they take additional damage.
ult.long_description: Inky black tentacles erupt from Valentine's mouth and hands targeting the closest enemy and those around it dealing damage and stunning them for 4-8 seconds. While stunned they take an additional 1000% damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Tregrum
abilities.desc: The aberrant spirit in Valentine's brain telepathically reaches out to the other Champions. For each positional formation ability affecting Valentine, she increases the damage of all Champions with the `$(describe_tags target_tags___2)` role by 100%, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Tregrum
raw.tip_text: Valentine buffs all DPS Champions based on the number of positional formation abilities affecting her

description.desc: The aberrant spirit in $(source_hero)'s brain telepathically reaches out to the other Champions. For each positional formation ability affecting $(source_hero), she increases the damage of all Champions with the $(describe_tags target_tags___2) role by $(amount)%, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Socialite
abilities.desc: Valentine duplicates any positional formation abilities that are affecting her to Champions in the formation with the DPS role. If the receiving Champion already has the formation ability, the formation ability is instead boosted by 50%. This happens after Artemis' Observation ability.

raw.name: Socialite
raw.tip_text: Valentine duplicates positional formation abilities affecting her on DPS Champions. This happens after Artemis' Observation ability.

description.desc: $(source_hero) duplicates any positional formation abilities that are affecting her to Champions in the formation with the $(describe_tags tag) role. If the receiving Champion already has the formation ability, the formation ability is instead boosted by $(amount)%. This happens after Artemis' Observation ability.

abilities.name: A Life of Leisure
abilities.desc: Valentine increases the formation's gold find by 100% for each positional formation ability affecting her, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the formation's gold find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each positional formation ability affecting her, stacking multiplicatively.

data.backstory: A young Eladrin woman, raised to be the Queen of Koshmarr, what was meant to be an idyllic life took a dark turn on the night of her wedding. Pulled into the machinations of greater powers, she found herself in Mordent, now one of the many wandering ghosts. A person of great interest both to Azalin Rex and Strahd, she sought to negotiate her freedom from these dread domains. Her longtime companions and their newfound friends wanted the same and imbued her soul into Desmond's sword. As they traveled in search of returning her soul to her body, Voronika took matters into her own hands and used the crown of the Raven Queen to defeat Zybilna and cause the fall of Prismeer. This action drew the mists to Voronika and soon she discovered herself a new darklord in her domain of Koshmarr.
data.name: Voronika

base.name: Produce Flame
base.description: Voronika creates a flame in her hand which she fires at a random enemy.
base.long_description: Voronika creates a flame in her hand which she fires at a random enemy.

base.description: Voronika attacks a random enemy. The target is lit on fire and takes damage for 5 seconds
base.long_description: Voronika creates a flame in her hand which she fires at a random enemy. The target is lit on fire and takes 1 second of BUD damage every second for 5 seconds.

ult.name: Horrifying Visage
ult.description: Voronika magically damages and pushes back all enemies. Survivors do reduced damage for 30 seconds.
ult.long_description: Voronika moves in front of the party, magically damaging and pushing back all enemies. Any surviving enemies do reduced damage for 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Wed, then Undead
abilities.desc: After being killed on her wedding night, Voronika became a ghost. Voronika continues to attack and can be attacked like normal.

description.desc: After being killed on her wedding night, $(source_hero) became a ghost. $(source_hero) continues to attack and can be attacked like normal.

abilities.name: Puppet Master
abilities.desc: Voronika claims the BUD-setting Champion as her Puppet. The damage of her chosen Puppet is increased by 100%. Voronika only changes her Puppet if a different Champion is the BUD-setting Champion for more than 30 seconds in a row. Voronika's Puppet gains the Black Dice Society affiliation.

description.desc: Voronika claims the BUD-setting Champion as her Puppet. The damage of her chosen Puppet is increased by $amount%. Voronika only changes her Puppet if a different Champion is the BUD-setting Champion for more than $puppet_change_time seconds in a row. Voronika's Puppet gains the Black Dice Society affiliation.

abilities.name: Calculating Guidance
abilities.desc: Voronika increases the damage of all Champions in one column in front of her by 100%. Voronika's key allies are members of the Black Dice Society. The effect of this ability is increased by 100% for each key ally in the formation. This stacks additively until Voronika completes her Search for the Crown, when it changes to stack multiplicatively.

raw.name: Calculating Guidance
raw.tip_text: Voronika increases the damage of all Champions in the column in front of her.

This stacks additively until Voronika completes her Search for the Crown, when it changes to stack multiplicatively.

raw.tip_text: Voronika has three quests to complete, and she becomes much stronger when they are complete.

description.pre: Voronika's search for the Crown of Raven Queen requires her to complete 3 goals. When Voronika completes all 3 goals, she acquires the crown, transforms into her Darklord Form, unlocks her ultimate attack, and improves her base attack.

items.name: Withered Blossom

items.name: A Rose By Any Other Name
