data.backstory: Dob is an enthusiastic, energetic music-maker who never lets a little thing like 'not having a plan' stand in the way of action. His sister, Suzette, raised him. When he fell ill, she attempted various, wild cures leaving Dob with a permanent, lurid green hue to his skin. Dob became a traveling bard, self-taught in music and magic. This brought him into contact with the Oxventurers, with whom he shares many bizarre adventures. Accomplished and charismatic, this bard favours lulling enemies to sleep or hard-rocking spell attacks with acrobatic combat. Dob also carries Ethelfrith's Hammer, a cursed weapon with the power to summon 60 obedient skeletons, but exacts a heavy price for doing so.
data.name: Dob

base.name: Thunderwave
base.description: Dob leaps to the closest enemy and attacks with a wave of thunder, knocking them back.
base.long_description: Dob leaps out to the closest enemy and plays a chord on his Lute that sends out a magical blast of thunder and lightning, damaging all enemies in the area and pushing them back a short distance.

ult.name: Ethelfrith's Hammer
ult.description: Summoned skeletons build a wall that lasts for 20 seconds. Evil Champions deal extra damage for the duration.
ult.long_description: Dob uses the hammer to summon a bunch of skeletons to build a wall that lasts 20 seconds, dealing damage to enemies in the way. For the duration, evil Champions deal +1000% damage for reasons best left unsaid.

abilities.name: Traveling Entertainer
abilities.desc: Dob increases the damage of all Champions NOT next to him by 400%.

raw.name: Traveling Entertainer
raw.tip_text: Dob boosts the damage of all Champions NOT adjacent to him, keep him away from your DPS.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of all Champions NOT next to him by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Busking
abilities.desc: Dob increases global gold find by 30% for each Champion next to him, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases global gold find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion next to him, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Offshore Accounting
abilities.desc: At the transition to each new area, there is a 25% chance that Dob sets the Champion's gold amount to zero and gains Deposit stacks equal to the exponent of the lost gold. Dob increases both the damage increase of Traveling Entertainer and the gold find bonus of Busking by 10% for each Deposit stack, stacking additively and applied multiplicatively. Number of Deposit stacks is capped at 25 times the highest area completed in the current adventure.

raw.name: Offshore Accounting
raw.tip_text: Sometimes when heading to a new area, Dob helpfully throws all your saved gold into a lake. Each time he does this his other abilities are buffed!

description.desc: At the transition to each new area, there is a $(amount)% chance that Dob sets the Champion's gold amount to zero and gains Deposit stacks equal to the exponent of the lost gold. Dob increases both the damage increase of Traveling Entertainer and the gold find bonus of Busking by $(traveling_entertainer_buff)% for each Deposit stack, stacking additively and applied multiplicatively. Number of Deposit stacks is capped at $(deposit_stack_cap_mult) times the highest area completed in the current adventure.

data.backstory: Blooshi isn't like other bullywugs-she's dark. Nobody understands this teen, but when she picked up a strange skull, she found someone who does: an undead entity who sealed her in a warlock pact. Now whenever she dies she comes back as a much tougher ghost, smashing her assailants before being sucked back into her body and returning to life. Very useful and goes with her whole, like, vibe. Surely there will be no repercussions!

Each time you defeat a boss enemy, her "next of kin" returns to the formation.

data.backstory: Clumsy but well-meaning, Egbert the Dragonborn Paladin was summarily booted out of his Paladin order after a terrible incident he doesn't like to talk about. Setting out on his quest for atonement with a new deity in tow, La Vache Mauve, he falls in with the Oxventurers Guild and, by his reckoning, questing with them offers as good a chance as any of guiding him towards absolution. Often impulsive, he very rarely plans beyond his initial moment of 'inspiration' but his heart's in the right place. Well, at least until he next rushes into battle, trips into a spike pit and ends up kebabbed on a skewer...

data.backstory: A former archaeologist turned adventurer, Kentucky 'Kent' Jones honed his skills exploring a temple of Talona, goddess of poison and plague. While his team didn't survive the temple's defenses, he returned home to the lakeside town of Caradoon. Still a flamboyant Tiefling, Kent carries a darkness that he does his best to keep hidden. But he doesn't bear the darkness alone. After returning to Caradoon, he met smart and PATIENT Aasimar, Virgil. Together they've flourished, even after accidentally poisoning the ground under a local tavern in an effort to get rid of a few rats and fleeing Caradoon only to meet up with Selise Astorio and join the Rivals.

data.backstory: With an unexpected Celestial and magical heritage, Virgil Zoar was always traveling to get away from both his past and a disapproving family. He put his talents to work on the sea, traveling with crews who he hoped would ask nothing more than that he earn his keep by way of his Storm sorcery. One day, tired of wandering, he ended up in the quiet lakeside town of Caradoon, thinking he might put down roots. But that all changed when he met and fell for a kindred spirit in the form of a charming and witty tiefling named Kent. After some over-enthusiastic handling of the local tavern's rat problem, they found themselves on the move again, met up with Selise Astorio of the Rivals of Waterdeep, becoming quickly entangled in the group's adventures, and realizing that they had found a new family and a new home.

abilities.name: Weather Control
abilities.desc: Virgil gains a Weather stack each time the weather changes when advancing to a new area or when it's changed by an ultimate attack or other ability. Virgil tracks each type of weather in a separate stack. Each stack is multiplied by 10% and then all stacks are multiplied together to get a total value which increases the damage of all Champions. Each stack caps at 500.

Virgil tracks each type of weather in a separate stack. Each stack is multiplied by $(stack_mult_percent)% and then all stacks are multiplied together to get a total value which increases the damage of all Champions. Each stack caps at $(max_stacks_per_weather_type).

data.backstory: Warduke's services as a remorseless killer-for-hire can be easily bought. The evil swordsman isn't terribly bright, which is why he leaves the plotting and scheming to others. He just likes to hit things with his sword.

ult.long_description: Warduke's sword Nightwind ignites in flames for 30 seconds. For the duration, Warduke deals an additional 1000% damage with his normal attacks and he takes half damage from all sources. If Warduke activates his ultimate again before its effect expires the duration is refreshed.

items.name: Trusty Stabber
items.description: For the few times that my sword isn't the answer, the dagger will do.

items.name: Barbaric Knife
items.description: It's seen a lot of use, but the edge is still there.

items.name: Flashing Dagger
items.description: A quick strike of the dagger is all you deserve.

items.name: Dagger of Malevolence
items.description: My arrangement with the League of Malevolence lasts as long as it's to my benefit.

items.name: Magical Gem
items.description: Kelek insisted I wear this, and I trust him...for now.

items.name: Protective Charm
items.description: Bah! I need no protection!

items.name: Amulet of Healing
items.description: Nothing can keep me down.

items.name: Amulet of the Heartstone
items.description: I am what I am. Why change that?

items.name: Demonic Helmet
items.description: Look upon my fearsome visage!

items.name: Winged Helmet
items.description: No one else would dare wear my helmet!

items.name: Dread Helm
items.description: I never take it off. Never.

items.name: Helm of the Hierarch
items.description: Take this as a sign of my true power!

items.name: Splintery Shield
items.description: Good for blocking, good for bashing.

items.name: Sign of the Demon
items.description: A fearsome image gives enemies a moment to reconsider.

items.name: Fiendish Shield
items.description: The first thing my enemies see is this fearsome face -- followed by my dread helm!

items.name: Shield of the Unnameable
items.description: I don't talk with the dark powers behind my magic items. Waste of time.

items.name: Belt of Defense
items.description: When I stride into battle, people flee.

items.name: Girdle of Ferocity
items.description: It's very intimidating.

items.name: Half-Scale Protection
items.description: My sword protects the other side just fine.

items.name: Indomitable Armor
items.description: Cower before me!

items.name: Sword for Hire
items.description: Who do you need me to kill?

items.name: Keen-Edged Blade
items.description: This blade works fine, but it lacks style.

items.name: Bloodied Blade
items.description: I have struck down mightier foes than you.

items.name: Nightwind, the Flametongue
items.description: Feel the burn of Nightwind!

normal.name: Tavern Brawler

normal.desc: Do you wish to test your mettle against Warduke?

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Warduke by 60%.
normal.desc: I don't need my sword to crush you.

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Warduke by 15%.
normal.desc: I'd rather die than surrender.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Warduke by 30%.
normal.desc: It's only a scratch.

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Warduke takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: You'll have to get through me.

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Warduke takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: My sword takes care of everything. What's there to worry about?

normal.effect: Increases the effect of Warduke's Chaos Reigns, Mercenary for Hire and League of Malevolence by 40%.
normal.desc: With muscles like these, how can I not show them off?

normal.name: A Skilled Swordsman
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Warduke's A Trained Killer ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I let the blade do the talking.

normal.name: Trusty Lieutenant
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Warduke's Drawn to Power ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I expect to be paid well.

normal.name: A New Leaf
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Warduke by 2.
normal.desc: My skills could be put to heroic use? You don't say...

normal.name: Vengeful Taunt

normal.desc: Only a fool would face me in combat.

normal.name: Immolation
normal.effect: Warduke's attacks deal an additional 1s of BUD damage every second for 5s.
normal.desc: Yes! Burn! Burn and die!

normal.name: Vicious Damage
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Warduke by 400%. Warduke's attacks prevent the target from healing for 10s.
normal.desc: They had it coming.

data.backstory: Imoen is a surprisingly cheerful young woman considering she eventually discovered that she was the child of a deadly murder god. As an orphan, she moved to Candlekeep at the age of 10 with her adoptive father and innkeeper, Winthrop. She eventually traveled to Baldur's Gate with a childhood friend, where she joined forces with powerful Champions like Minsc and Jaheira.
data.name: Imoen

base.name: Short Bow
base.description: Imoen shoots a random enemy with her bow.

ult.name: Disarm Traps
ult.description: Imoen attacks five enemies, hitting each 5 times. She prioritizes hits-based enemies.
ult.long_description: Imoen leaps out into the fray, attacking five enemies in sequence with her short sword in one hand and her lockpicks in the other. She prioritizes enemies with hits-based health and deals 5 hits per attack; if no hits-based enemies are available she deals normal ultimate damage to enemies she attacks.

abilities.name: Optimism
abilities.desc: Imoen increases the damage of adjacent Champions by 400%.

raw.name: Optimism
raw.tip_text: Imoen buffs the champions adjacent to her.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of adjacent Champions by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.desc: Any time any Champion's Favored Foe appears or is defeated, Imoen increases the effect of Optimism by 50%, stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively. Stacks up to 50 times. Stacks are reset each time the Champions change areas.

raw.name: Perseverance
raw.tip_text: Imoen increases her buff any time a Favored Foe appears or is defeated.

description.desc: Any time any Champion's Favored Foe appears or is defeated, $(source_hero) increases the effect of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively and then applying multiplicatively. Stacks up to $(max_stacks) times. Stacks are reset each time the Champions change areas.

abilities.name: Stoneskin
abilities.desc: Before every eighth attack, or upon entering a new area, Imoen casts Stoneskin on all Champions in the front-most column of the formation, granting them 300 temporary hit points. The amount is increased by 5% (additively) for each Favored Foe that is alive.

description.pre: Before every eighth attack, or upon entering a new area, $(source_hero) casts Stoneskin on all Champions in the front-most column of the formation, granting them $(not_buffed amount) temporary hit points. The amount is increased by 5% (additively) for each Favored Foe that is alive.

conditions.desc: ^^Total Temporary Hit Points: $(amount)

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.desc: Before every third attack, Imoen polymorphs a random non-boss non-static enemy into a monster with the same type as her Favored Foe, but only 10% of its original health. She can not polymorph enemies that are already polymorphed by this ability a second time.

description.desc: Before every third attack, $(source_hero) polymorphs a random non-boss non-static enemy into a monster with the same type as her Favored Foe, but only 10% of its original health. She can not polymorph enemies that are already polymorphed by this ability a second time.

items.name: Orphan's Sword

items.name: Candlekeep Toy
items.description: I grew up among the monks of Candlekeep, but that doesn't mean I didn't train.

items.name: Blade of Defense
items.description: Sometimes the best defense is a sword you're ready to use.

items.name: Sword of Power
items.description: Everything's better with some magic added in!

items.name: Child's Bow

items.name: Trusty Shortbow

items.name: Protector of the Dryads Bow
items.description: I don't know of a shortbow more powerful than this one.

items.description: If you aim just right, you can get it to stick on a monk's forehead!

items.name: Practice Bolt
items.description: They don't let kids in Candlekeep have sharp weapons.

items.description: Always keep it full, in case you don't want to waste a spell.

items.description: Some memories are private. I'll tell you later.

items.description: I have a cowl and I'm a wizard, but I'm not a Cowled Wizard. Got it?

items.name: Trickster's Armor

data.backstory: Fen is a Drow Dhampir Warlock with a touch of mischief and sneakiness. She's loyal to those she cares for, a fearsome opponent for those who have earned her hate. Above all else, everything she's done has been for Isolde's freedom. Now she needs a new purpose to fight for, and maybe she can find it among the Society.
data.name: Fen

base.description: Fen darts out to the closest enemy and slashes with her longsword, hitting all nearby enemies.

base.name: Pact Blade

ult.long_description: Fen transforms into her dread form. She sprouts wings, leaps into the air, and charges directly across the area, dealing one hit of ultimate damage to all enemies she passes and knocking them back a short distance.

data.backstory: Brother Uriah Macawber is a native of Ravenloft, born in the dread domain of Darkon under the iron rule of Azalin Rex. After a horrifying childhood encounter at the Carnival with the demonic entity known as The Caller, Uriah would embrace the worship of the goddess Ezra, Lady of the Mists, offering protection from the forces of darkness to all those in need. Upon joining with the other future members of The Black Dice Society at the infamous House of Lament, Uriah would go on to find true love with his teammate, the undead Aasimar, Nahara... and would eventually discover the dark truth of both the nature of his deity and his mysterious connection to his former liege, the lich-king Azalin Rex.
data.name: Uriah

base.name: Toll the Dead
base.description: Uriah points at a random enemy and deals damage, preferring enemies that are already damaged.

ult.name: Blade Barrier
ult.description: Brother Uriah creates a wall of magical blades that damages enemies for 10 seconds.
ult.long_description: Brother Uriah creates a wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades of magical energy and sends them flying across the area. The blades come to a stop a short distance in front of the formation forming a barrier that lasts for 10 seconds. Each time an enemy passes through the barrier, they take ultimate damage.

^^Attack Count: $(uriah_current_attack_count) / $(attack_count)

items.description: In the darkness of our adventures, meeting Nahara stands out brightly as a star.

items.name: Engagement Ring
items.description: I wish beyond all to travel by her side, to care for one another until we fall.

items.name: Wedding Ring
items.description: 'Til death do us part' takes on a different sort of meaning in our case...

items.name: Book of Hymns
items.description: There's nothing like raising your voice in song to strengthen the spirit!

items.name: Hymnal of Ezra
items.description: Let us turn to page 42 for 'Our Great Lady, Preserve Us From the Skin Thieves.'

items.name: Prayer Book
items.description: I have found much comfort in this book.

items.name: Book of Exalted Deeds
items.description: The power is unmatched. And it comes with a halo!

items.name: Suspicious Toe
items.description: To be technical, all toes found in baked goods, are suspicious.

items.name: Toe of a Clone
items.description: This toe is most definitely like my own...it was another clone of Azalin's, poor devil.

items.name: Mangata's Scales
items.description: In my dreams, I see the moon dragon.

items.name: Uriah and Van Richten: BFFs!
items.description: Just some art to express my esteem for the greatest vampire hunter in the mists.

normal.effect: Increases the effect of Uriah's Doomed in Darkon ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Perhaps, we should consider reconvening at some other location?

normal.desc: In all things Ezra's guidance provides.

normal.desc: My goddess holds secrets I could never have fathomed.

data.backstory: Being telepathic means Solaak knows who to trust-and that's not many people. But when the kalashtar finds the soul of a dragon trapped in a chasm, they form a bond of trust like no other. Solaak rides their dragon mentor, Tempest, into battle, unstoppable together.
data.name: Solaak

base.name: Knockback Strike
base.description: Solaak fires an arrow at the closest enemy, dealing damage and knocking it back a short distance.

base.name: Knockback Strike - Emboldened
base.description: Solaak fires an arrow at the closest enemy, knocking it back and dealing damage to it and nearby enemies. Everyone takes 400% more damage for 5 seconds.

ult.name: Tempest
ult.description: Solaak and Tempest fly over the enemies, while Tempest breaths lightning breath dealing damage, stunning, and knocking the enemies back.
ult.long_description: Solaak flies over the enemies on Tempest's back while Tempest breaths lightning breath on the enemies below dealing damage, stunning, and knocking them back.

abilities.name: Drakewarden
abilities.desc: Solaak's pet pseudodragon Levits takes Solaak's slot in the formation while Solaak rides his drake companion, Tempest, into battle. He attacks from Tempest. If Levits is knocked out by enemies, Solaak and Tempest retreat from the battlefield until you change areas.

description.desc: $(source_hero)'s pet pseudodragon Levits takes $(source_hero)'s slot in the formation while $(source_hero) rides his drake companion, Tempest, into battle. He attacks from Tempest. If Levits is knocked out by enemies, $(source_hero) and Tempest retreat from the battlefield until you change areas.

abilities.name: Compatriots
abilities.desc: Solaak gains a Reach stack for each Champion with a ranged base attack in the formation. Each stack increases the damage of these Champions by 400%, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Compatriots
raw.tip_text: Solaak increases the damage of ranged Champions based on the number of ranged Champions in the formation.

description.desc: $(source_hero) gains a Reach stack for each Champion with a ranged base attack in the formation. Each stack increases the damage of these Champions by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the Damage of $target by $amount%

abilities.name: Maneuvers
abilities.desc: The effect of Compatriots is increased by 25% each time an enemy is knocked back, stacking multiplicatively to a max of 50 stacks. Stacks reset when changing areas.

description.desc: The effect of $(upgrade_name id) is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% each time an enemy is knocked back, stacking multiplicatively to a max of $(max_stacks) stacks. Stacks reset when changing areas.

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.desc: Solaak increases the effect of the outgoing positional formation abilities of all Champions with a ranged base attack by 25% for each Reach stack he has, stacking additively.

raw.name: Critical Mass
raw.tip_text: Solaak increases the effect of outgoing positional formation abilities of ranged champions.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the effect of the outgoing positional formation abilities of all Champions with a ranged base attack by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Reach stack he has, stacking additively.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the effect of $target's outgoing Positional Formation Abilities by $amount%

abilities.name: Blitzing Barrage
abilities.desc: Each time a Champion with a ranged base attack attacks there is a 5% chance per stack of Reach that their base attack cooldown is instantly reset.

description.desc: Each time a Champion with a ranged base attack attacks there is a 5% chance per stack of Reach that their base attack cooldown is instantly reset.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Gives a $(amount)% chance to instantly reset $target's attack cooldown right after using it

specs.name: Unwavering
specs.desc: Solaak's base attack speed is reduced by 30s. Additionally, the effect of Maneuvers is increased to 30% per stack.

raw.name: Unwavering
raw.specialization_description: Solaak focuses on knockbacks and the speed of his attacks

description.desc: $(source_hero)'s base attack speed is reduced by $(seconds_plural amount). Additionally, the effect of $(upgrade_name id___2) is increased to $(new_amount___2)% per stack.

specs.name: Emboldened
specs.desc: Solaak's normal attack deals damage to all enemies in a small radius and all enemies hit take an additional 400% damage for 5 seconds.

raw.name: Emboldened
raw.specialization_description: Solaak imbues his attacks with Tempest's Lightning magic, adding AOE damage

description.desc: $(source_hero)'s normal attack deals damage to all enemies in a small radius and all enemies hit take an additional $(debuff_amount)% damage for $(debuff_duration) seconds.

specs.name: Confidant
specs.desc: Each formation slot occupied by an escort adds 1 Reach stack for Compatriots.

raw.name: Confidant
raw.specialization_description: Solaak trusts those escorted like his ranged bretheren

description.desc: Each formation slot occupied by an escort adds 1 Reach stack for $(upgrade_name id).

items.name: Practice Blade
items.description: I've trained with this so long, my grip's worn the hilt.

items.name: Sturdy Sword
items.description: Keep the edge keen and well-oiled.

items.name: Tempest's Talon
items.description: This sword was a gift from a dragon.

items.name: Blade of the Storm
items.description: Our power suffuses it.

items.name: Standard Boots
items.description: They do the job.

items.name: Uniform Shoes
items.description: Every part of this outfit is standard issue.

items.name: Stealthy Kicks
items.description: Boots are a great place to hide extra blades.

items.name: Dragonrider's Sabatons
items.description: Better protection when you're up in the air.

items.name: Beginner's Longbow
items.description: I'm an excellent shot.

items.name: Hunter's Bow
items.description: Hunting with a bow requires patience.

items.name: Handmade Hunter
items.description: I made this bow myself, carved every sigil into the wood.

items.name: Enchanted Longbow
items.description: With this, I cannot miss.

items.name: Training Armor
items.description: I remember every scar on this armor.

items.name: Protective Tunic
items.description: You have to learn to take a hit as well as make a strike.

items.name: Armored Uniform
items.description: The war rages on, and I must do my part.

items.name: Drakewarden's Armor
items.description: This armor befits Tempest's rider.

items.name: Dragon Scales
items.description: These are from Tempest, the dragon I bonded with.

items.name: Shed Skin
items.description: A kalashtar is bonded to a spirit of the dream. I've expanded that to Tempest.

items.name: Drake's Tooth
items.description: Tempest is a fierce fighter, but a kind friend.

items.name: Soul of the Tempest
items.description: When I found Tempest trapped in that canyon, I had no idea what I was beginning.

items.name: Memory of Tristan
items.description: Tristan was like my sister. We've been through so much together.

items.name: Best Friend's Bracelet
items.description: We grew up together. We trained in the miltary together.

items.name: Hunting Dagger
items.description: Tristan always looked out for me when I couldn't look out for myself.

items.name: Signet Ring
items.description: The gem looks like a dragon eye. It reminds me of the two dearest people in my life.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I won't let you go alone.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: I have a plan.

normal.desc: I can tell you're trustworthy.

normal.name: Compassionate

normal.name: Area of Effect

normal.name: Bolt from the Blue

normal.desc: This should buy us some time to press the attack!

data.backstory: Miria Elithren is a Shadar Kai Silvanesti Elf from the world of Krynn. Born under an ill-omen of the Dark Moon, Nuitari, she had an unhappy childhood that caused her to flee her homeland and seek tutelage in advanced magical arts beyond Elven lands. After passing the Test of High Sorcery, she briefly allied with Lord Soth until he tried to turn Miria into an undead creature subservient to his will. Miria escaped Soth's trap at the cost of the flesh and muscle of her right arm. Pursued by Soth for her arcane knowledge, Miria seeks to escape Krynn.
data.name: Miria

base.name: Ray of Sickness
base.description: Miria fires an energy ray at the nearest enemy, dealing one hit of damage, and reducing its damage by 50% for 6 seconds. Does not stack.

ult.name: Danse Macabre
ult.description: Miria summons skeletons to fight for her. All enemies are slowed due to the confusion on the battlefield.
ult.long_description: Miria summons 5 skeletons to the battlefield. The skeletons deal 15 attacks to the enemies before vanishing. All enemies are slowed by 50% for the duration due to the confusion on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Mage of High Sorcery
abilities.desc: Miria increases the damage of all adjacent Champions by 400%.

raw.name: Mage of High Sorcery
raw.tip_text: Miria increases the damage of Champions adjacent to her, keep her next to your highest damage dealing champions.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of all adjacent Champions by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Zombie Bodyguards
abilities.desc: While Miria is alive, a Zombie Bodyguard that shares hit points with Miria appears in front of each Champion in the front-most column of the formation. When a Champion in that column takes damage, the Zombie Bodyguard takes 90% of the damage instead, while the original target takes the remaining 90%.

raw.name: Zombie Bodyguards
raw.tip_text: Miria protects the formation by summoning Zombie Bodyguards to protect the frontmost Champions. She does not need to be in the front column to be effective.

description.desc: While $(source_hero) is alive, a Zombie Bodyguard that shares hit points with $(source_hero) appears in front of each Champion in the front-most column of the formation. When a Champion in that column takes damage, the Zombie Bodyguard takes $(amount)% of the damage instead, while the original target takes the remaining $(miria_zombie_bodyguards_remaining_amount)%.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: A Zombie Bodyguard defends $target by redirecting $amount% of incoming damage to $(source_hero) instead

abilities.name: Soul Cage
abilities.desc: When an enemy is defeated, Miria can capture its soul and gain a Soul Cage stack. Her maximum number of Soul Cage stacks is 1 for every 20 areas completed in the current adventure, rounded up. Miria increases the damage bonus of Mage of High Sorcery by 25% for each Soul Cage stack she has, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: When an enemy is defeated, $(source_hero) can capture its soul and gain a Soul Cage stack. Her maximum number of Soul Cage stacks is $(num_stacks___2) for every $(num_areas___2) areas completed in the current adventure, rounded up. $(source_hero) increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Soul Cage stack she has, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Clone
abilities.desc: Miria maintains a stash of clones in her Inner Sanctum with a count equal to her Soul Cage stacks. If Miria is defeated, a clone immediately appears and takes her place at full health. This does not reduce the number of Soul Cage stacks she has. Her stash of clones are regenerated when the party changes areas. For each clone summoned in the current area, the effect of Mage of High Sorcery is increased by 25%, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) maintains a stash of clones in her Inner Sanctum with a count equal to her Soul Cage stacks. If $(source_hero) is defeated, a clone immediately appears and takes her place at full health. This does not reduce the number of Soul Cage stacks she has. Her stash of clones are regenerated when the party changes areas. For each clone summoned in the current area, the effect of $(upgrade_name id) is increased by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Life Transference
abilities.desc: Miria increases the health of all other Champions by 1% of her max health for each Soul Cage stack she has, stacking additively.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the health of all other Champions by $(amount)% of her max health for each Soul Cage stack she has, stacking additively.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the Health of $target by $amount

specs.name: Methodical
specs.desc: Miria increases the attack bonus of Mage of High Sorcery by 25% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Methodical
raw.specialization_description: Miria prefers those who follow the rules.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the attack bonus of $(upgrade_name id___2) by $(amount)% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Intellectual
specs.desc: Miria increases the attack bonus of Mage of High Sorcery by 25% for each Champion with an INT score of 15+ in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Intellectual
raw.specialization_description: Miria prefers the smarter crowd.

raw.specialization_description: Miria prefers the lone wolves.

items.name: Trinket Cube
items.description: Oh this? It's merely a play thing, pay it no heed.

items.name: Warding Cube
items.description: Don't worry, darling, this isn't my first undead incursion.

items.name: Cube of Force
items.description: I decide what's going to happen next, not you.

items.name: Enhanced Force Cube
items.description: You might not want to tou -- well, I warned you, didn't I?

items.name: Frumpled Clothing
items.description: I'm not above a little undercover work.

items.name: Initiate Robes
items.description: They thought they could break me by treating me like dirt, but it only made my ambition stronger.

items.name: Black Robes
items.description: I have been guided by Nuitari since my birth.

items.name: High Sorcery Robes
items.description: A mark of the respect and station I deserve.

items.name: Chain Ball
items.description: Something I kept from a former employer, I'll turn it to my own needs.

items.name: Metal Cage
items.description: What could it hold? Come closer and find out, darling.

items.name: Soul Cage
items.description: This one owes me some answers.

items.name: Ancient Soul Cage
items.description: I prefer not to meddle with the soul of others, but if you really make me mad... I might make an exception.

items.name: Ornate Box
items.description: It will eventually house a Starjewel.

items.name: Starjewel Box
items.description: Starjewels? Oh, they are quite important to my people.

items.name: Silvanesti Starjewel
items.description: It creates a bond with my betrothed, whom I've only met in a dream.

items.name: Star of Another World
items.description: My betrothed is not of this world. I need to travel to another world to find them.

items.name: Azure Gemstone
items.description: It's not grave robbing if they asked me to keep it.

items.name: Blue Maw Necklace
items.description: Stare at it long enough and it might SNAP!

items.name: Battle Gear
items.description: You wield armor, I wield prestige. We'll see who survives the day.

items.name: Krynn Hoard
items.description: My collection will help me gain influence once I reach my next world.

items.name: Skeleton Chique
items.description: Sprinkle these around the edge of our camp. That should warn the bandits away.

items.name: Makeshift Servant
items.description: Oh, do sit darling. I'll have my servant get us some tea.

items.name: Fear Ensemble
items.description: Death is nothing to fear, it is inevitible after all. One day you too shall be nothing but unwanted bones in the ground.

items.name: Encrusted Jewelry
items.description: Fit for a queen, I think. Or an Empress perhaps? Very fitting.

normal.name: Selflessness

normal.desc: Why not let the minions take care of it?

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: If you learn something from my tutelage, you may not die so young.

normal.name: Caged Dreams
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Miria's Soul Cage ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Their power flows through me.

normal.name: The Black Rose's Influence

effects: Miria also counts as a Tiefling

normal.name: Heavily Armored

normal.desc: You have no idea how much suffering a body can take.

data.backstory: Antrius is your classic fantasy Bard - he's a lover, not a fighter. After his supportive parents paid his way through Bard College, Antrius is out on the road trying to make a name for himself. With a glorious mane of hair and his lute, he is ready to charm anyone who gets in the party's way, friend or foe. His golden pipes bring inspiration to all who hear his song!
data.name: Antrius

base.name: Vicious Mockery
base.description: Antrius attacks the enemy with the most health, causing it to take +100% damage until he attacks again.

ult.name: Cloud of Daggers
ult.description: Antrius smiles into a mirror causing it to shatter. The shards create a cloud dealing damage to all enemies within it.
ult.long_description: Antrius takes a hand mirror out and smiles into it, causing it to shatter. Shards of glass fly out towards the enemy with the most health forming a cloud upon reaching the target. The cloud deals ongoing damage for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Inspiring Song
abilities.desc: Antrius inspires each adjacent Champion giving them 10 temporary hit points every 5 seconds and increasing their damage by 100%. Any Champion with a Charisma score of 17 or higher further inspires all unaffected adjacent Champions, and this continues to cascade. Antrius' song is so inspiring that he also inspires himself. The total shield amount on each Champion is limited to 10 times the Champion's max health.

raw.name: Inspiring Song
raw.tip_text: Antrius protects and buffs adjacent Champions.

description.desc: $(source_hero) inspires each adjacent Champion giving them $(amount___2) temporary hit points every $(interval___2) seconds and increasing their damage by $(amount)%. Any Champion with a Charisma score of 17 or higher further inspires all unaffected adjacent Champions, and this continues to cascade. $(source_hero)' song is so inspiring that he also inspires himself. The total shield amount on each Champion is limited to 10 times the Champion's max health.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: $target is granted $amount temporary HP every $(interval) seconds. The total temporary HP can only grant up to $optional_percent_limit% of $target's max HP

abilities.name: The Hardiest, Bardiest Bard

data.backstory: Nixie is a charismatic tiefling that brings a chaotic element to the party. Growing up in a wealthy but oppressive household, Nixie was punished for using magic despite her natural talent. In a rebellious move, she stole the family grimoire to teach herself dark sorcery only to result in the burning down of her family manor and all her family inside. Despite this tragedy, Nixie is now on a journey to enjoy her newfound magical freedom and find a new family. When confronted by enemies, and occasionally even friends, she's always ready to hurl her favorite spell, Fireball, with unbridled enthusiasm.
data.name: Nixie

base.name: Fireball?
base.description: Nixie attacks with a ball of fire centered on a random target dealing 1 hit of damage to all enemies in a small radius.

base.name: Potted Plant
base.description: Nixie is currently a plant and cannot attack.

ult.name: FIREBALL!!!
ult.description: Nixie casts a fireball that engulfs the battlefield, hitting all enemies.  Each monster hit may be surrounded by Engulfing Flames.
ult.long_description: Nixie casts a gigantic fireball that engulfs the entire enemy's side of the screen, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all enemies. In addition, there is a 10% chance for each monster hit by this attack to be surrounded by Engulfing Flames.

abilities.name: Blazing Charisma
abilities.desc: Nixie increases the damage of all Champions with a Charisma of 17+ by 100%, including herself.

raw.name: Blazing Charisma
raw.tip_text: Nixie increases the damage of all Champions with 17+ Charisma including herself.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of all Champions with a Charisma of 17+ by $(amount)%, including herself.

abilities.name: Wild Magic Surge
abilities.desc: Each time Nixie makes a normal attack, there is a high chance that a random wild magic event happens.

raw.name: Wild Magic Surge
raw.tip_text: Each time Nixie makes a normal attack, there is a high chance that a random wild magic event happens. Many are good, some are not.

description.desc: Each time $(source_hero) makes a normal attack, there is a high chance that a random wild magic event happens.

conditions.desc: ^^Engulfing Flames - $(source_hero) lights the area of her attack on fire for 20 seconds. While lit, it deals $(seconds_plural amount___2) of BUD to enemies in the effect each second.^Potted Punch - $(source_hero) turns into a potted plant for 5 seconds and can't attack, increasing the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id___5) by $(amount___5)% while in that form, and for 15 additional seconds afterwards.^Coin Cascade - Gold coins also fly out from her attack's explosion, worth $(amount___6)% of a normal monster kill.^Shockwave - $(source_hero)'s attack also sends out a shockwave that stuns Monsters in the attack's area for $(seconds_plural amount___7).^Feeling Blue - $(source_hero)'s skin turns blue for 10 seconds.^Eldritch Entourage - A random monster is summoned.^Enlarge - $(source_hero)'s size increases. Her damage also increases by $(amount___11)% for 20 seconds.

abilities.desc: Increases the damage bonus of Wild Magic Surge: Potted Punch by 100% and Wild Magic Surge: Enlarge by 100%.

data.backstory: Rough and tumble, and ready for action, half-elven Fighter Evandra brings the muscle. Evandra ran away from home when her father discovered that she had been training in strength and combat. He tried to force her into an arranged marriage with an elven nobleman, but Evandra rejected this on both principle and taste. She decided instead to become an adventurer, free from her father's judgment.
data.name: Evandra

base.name: Trusty Sword
base.description: Evandra moves up next to the closest enemy and swings her sword, dealing 1 hit to all nearby enemies.

ult.name: Improvised Arms
ult.description: Evandra disarms a mechanical guard. She uses the guard's arm as a weapon for the next 15 seconds and gains some additional effects for the duration
ult.long_description: A mechanical guard charges toward the party. Evandra moves up, attacks the guard, and instantly "disarms" it and defeats it. Evandra uses the guard's arm as a weapon for the next 15 seconds instead of her sword. For the duration, Evandra's attack deals an additional 3 seconds of BUD damage, her normal attack speed cooldown is faster by 2 seconds, and Freedom's Fury is increased by 100% for the duration.

abilities.name: Evandra, the Magnificent
abilities.desc: Evandra can be used in any Wild Beyond the Witchlight campaign adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

description.desc: $(source_hero) can be used in any Wild Beyond the Witchlight campaign adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

abilities.name: Freedom's Fury
abilities.desc: Evandra increases the damage of all Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions by 100%.

raw.name: Freedom's Fury
raw.tip_text: Evandra buffs Neutral Champions on the Good / Evil axis. Try using Lawful and Chaotic Neutral Champions with her.

description.desc: $(source_hero) increases the damage of all Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Never Completely 'Armless
abilities.desc: When Evandra's health is brought to zero, she loses her left arm but returns to full health. Her arm regrows after moving to a new area. While missing her arm, she increases the damage bonus of Freedom's Fury by 100% for each second she had her arm in the current area, stacking additively and being applied multiplicatively.

raw.name: Never Completely 'Armless
raw.tip_text: The first time Evandra would otherwise die in an area, she merely loses an arm and returns to full health.

description.desc: When $(source_hero)'s health is brought to zero, she loses her left arm but returns to full health. Her arm regrows after moving to a new area. While missing her arm, she increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id___3) by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each second she had her arm in the current area, stacking additively and being applied multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Find the Secret Stash
abilities.desc: Increases the formation's gold find by 100%. Every time a Champion attacks but does not defeat an enemy, increase this bonus by 50%, stacking additively up to 120 times and applying multiplicatively. This bonus resets when an enemy is defeated.

description.desc: Increases the formation's gold find by $(not_buffed amount)%. Every time a Champion attacks but does not defeat an enemy, increase this bonus by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking additively up to $(max_stacks___2) times and applying multiplicatively. This bonus resets when an enemy is defeated.

conditions.desc: ^^Total Gold Find Bonus: $(amount)%

items.name: Faux Fur Collar
items.description: Of course it's fake - do you know how much stuff like this costs?

items.name: Low-Quality Fur Collar
items.description: Made this one myself. There are only a few holes and burn marks on it.

items.name: Dire Fox Skin
items.description: It may look like it was adorable, but it nearly took my arm off! ...again.

items.name: Living Collar
items.description: Bandits are very surprised when this comes to life and bites their throats.

items.name: Borrowed Armor
items.description: Those guys were already dead when we found them in the alley.

items.name: Improved Armor
items.description: Can you believe this was just lying around in a house we broke into?

items.name: Heroic Outfit
items.description: Oh, I could totally strangle someone with this cape!

items.name: Armor of Victory
items.description: Won this at a jousting tourney. No thanks to Dargle-bark.

items.name: Rented Blade
items.description: I checked this out in Stormwood. They didn't even ask for collateral!

items.name: Bandit Sword
items.description: These bandits were strange. 'No, we're guards!' Barely fought back.

items.name: Trusty Long Sword
items.description: I've cut off SO many heads with this baby.

items.name: Blade of Vengeance
items.description: This sword was forged to kill me, but I killed them first! Easy fight, really.

items.name: Unknown Fang
items.description: Nixie stole this at some point. No idea what it is, but it looks kinda cool.

items.name: Orc Tooth
items.description: Got this off Mogdar during a battle of strength. He says he didn't agree to it.

items.name: Bearowl Trophy
items.description: Dargle-bark as a bearowl is really annoying - so I took this to shut him up.

items.name: Necklace of Fury
items.description: Pulled this off an eldritch beast after I fell through a portal. No big deal.

items.name: Dirty Horn
items.description: Found this on a dead guard. Don't ask what else I found...

items.name: Travel Mead Horn
items.description: Got this on discount after threatening the merchant's family.

items.name: Rejuvenating Kantsi
items.description: Lorienne blessed this horn to heal me in battle! But it only heals 1 hp...

items.name: Horn of the Infinite
items.description: This horn never runs out of ale! I don't remember two tendays after getting it!

items.name: Evandra's Left Arm
items.description: No big deal. I'll just get Vlithryn to fix it.

items.name: Preserved Limb
items.description: Vlithryn didn't fix it... She just screeched and walked away. Very rude.

items.name: Mechanical Arm
items.description: I've beaten so many guards with this. Really gets the anger out.

items.name: Head of the Gnoll King
items.description: Got a wizard to make it stop decaying because it looks cool on my belt.

normal.name: Cute and Fierce

data.backstory: BBEG is the Big Bad Evil Guy brought to life by Pat, the DM of the Awful Ones. This drow necromancer believes immaculate planning will always lead to success, but his constant failures contradict this conviction. BBEG likes to monologue and taunt his opponents, leaving his summoned zombies to engage directly in combat.
data.name: BBEG

base.name: Chill Touch
base.description: BBEG conjures a spectral hand over the enemy with the most health and touches it, dealing one hit.

ult.name: Balgronuuth's Undead Horde
ult.description: Balgronuuth's symbol appears in the air for 30 seconds, causing Rise, My Minions! to summon two zombies instead of one.
ult.long_description: Balgronuuth's symbol appears in the air for 30 seconds. While the symbol is in the air, every time Rise, My Minions! summons a zombie, it summons two instead of one.

abilities.name: Awful Nemesis
abilities.desc: As the sworn enemy of the Awful Ones, BBEG is eligible for any adventure that any of them are eligible for. However, they still don't remember who he is.

description.desc: As the sworn enemy of the Awful Ones, $source is eligible for any adventure that any of them are eligible for. However, they still don't remember who he is.

abilities.name: Resting Lich Face
abilities.desc: BBEG counts as "undead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions (Desmond, Kas), but "alive" for all other purposes.

description.desc: BBEG counts as "undead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions (Desmond, Kas), but "alive" for all other purposes.

abilities.name: Evil Overlord
abilities.desc: BBEG increases the damage of all Champions with an Intelligence of 12 or less by 100%.

raw.name: Evil Overlord

description.desc: $source increases the damage of all Champions with an Intelligence of 12 or less by $(amount)%.

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each active potion, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Rise, My Minions!
abilities.desc: Every 10 seconds BBEG creates a plodding zombie that appears in front of the party and slowly plods forward. Zombies persist with area changes. Enemies near the zombie take 0.2 seconds worth of BUD damage per second.

description.desc: Every $(spawn_rate) seconds $source creates a plodding zombie that appears in front of the party and slowly plods forward. Zombies persist with area changes. Enemies near the zombie take $(amount) seconds worth of BUD damage per second.

conditions.desc: ^^Current Summon Speed: $(bbeg_buffed_minion_spawn_rate) seconds

abilities.name: Sources of Corpses
abilities.desc: The time it takes for Rise, My Minions! to summon a zombie is reduced by 2.5 seconds for each Awful Ones affiliation member in the formation, and the damage bonus of Evil Overlord is increased by 25% for each summoned zombie, stacking multiplicatively, with buffs applying to the pre-stack value.

description.desc: The time it takes for Rise, My Minions! to summon a zombie is reduced by $(amount___3) seconds for each Awful Ones affiliation member in the formation, and the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id___2) is increased by $(amount)% for each summoned zombie, stacking multiplicatively, with buffs applying to the pre-stack value.

abilities.name: Railroad
abilities.desc: If the current area is completed in 5s or less, BBEG reduces the next area's quest requirements by 25%.

raw.name: Railroad
raw.tip_text: BBEG reduces the next area quest requirements if you are completing areas quickly.

description.desc: If the current area is completed in $(seconds_plural amount) or less, $source reduces the next area's quest requirements by $(amount___2)%.

conditions.desc: ^^Time Remaining: $(bbeg_railroad_seconds_left)

specs.name: Powergaming
specs.desc: BBEG increases the damage bonus of Evil Overlord by 200% for each Evil Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

raw.name: Powergaming
raw.specialization_description: BBEG powers his evil empire with Evil minions

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Evil Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

specs.name: Min-Maxing
specs.desc: BBEG increases the damage bonus of Evil Overlord by 150% for each Champion with a total ability score of 78 or less in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

raw.name: Min-Maxing
raw.specialization_description: BBEG powers his evil empire with bumbling minions

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion with a total ability score of 78 or less in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

specs.name: Rules Lawyering
specs.desc: BBEG increases the damage bonus of Evil Overlord by 100% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

raw.name: Rules Lawyering
raw.specialization_description: BBEG powers his evil empire with Lawful minions

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Lawful Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively and applied multiplicatively.

items.name: Ritual Athame
items.description: This was the dagger he used to start his journey of evil.

items.name: Stained Dagger
items.description: The blood that stains this dagger imbues it with evil magic.

items.name: Necrotic Cleaver
items.description: 'This blade has killed many innocents,' he says with an evil laugh.

items.name: Deathfrost
items.description: You see a sword glowing with evil runes and a skull crossguard. It's badass.

items.name: Borrowed Screen
items.description: Yeah, I guess I could give this DM thing a try.

items.name: Updated Screen
items.description: This is full of sticky notes now.

items.name: Hand Made Kit
items.description: I actually made this all by myself. Yes, that is tape painted to look like wood.

items.name: Barrier of Meta Protection
items.description: It has tiny catapults to throw things at players when they sneak a peek.

items.name: Annoying Skull
items.description: He didn't always have an undead army. He started with just a talking skull.

items.name: Undead Advisor
items.description: One day the skull began talking about Balgronuuth, and he listened intently.

items.name: Skeletal Herald
items.description: 'My master will usher in the reign of Balgronuuth!' The herald begins to glow.

items.name: Zarxox, Undead General
items.description: 'You should serve my master,' says the general. 'Great dental plan for biting.'

items.name: Old Notebook
items.description: I just had this laying around. It'll do the job.

items.name: Story Journal
items.description: Don't touch! This has all my brilliant ideas in it - they're secret!

items.name: Book from E'tsyy
items.description: Look, I didn't know how to bind a book and this one was the coolest online.

items.name: Omniscient Tome
items.description: 'With this tome I will finally release Balgronuuth and destroy this realm!'

items.name: Starter Kit Die
items.description: Oh, it comes with dice. These will do until I get some nice ones.

items.name: DM's Die
items.description: DO NOT TOUCH THIS D20! YOU'LL JUST CURSE IT!

items.name: Metal D20
items.description: Wow, these edges are pretty sharp...

items.name: Die of 1 for All
items.description: Oh, here Eva, you can use my D20 for the save.

items.name: Backstory Plate
items.description: This was his brother's. The players don't need to know he killed his brother.

items.name: Inconspicuous NPC Armor
items.description: No, no, he's just a normal NPC that needs to be escorted somewhere.

items.name: Not-the-Villain Plate
items.description: I totally never, ever, expected this NPC to be part of the story - nope.

items.name: Armor of the Plot
items.description: HOW MUCH DAMAGE?! I mean, haha! He has immunity to that type of damage!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Oh, I misspoke -- retconning that to 'selfishness'.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: 'Minions! Gather your bones!' Hey, stop laughing -- it's not that funny!

normal.name: Recruitment
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Evil Overlord ability by 20%.
normal.desc: 'Yes! Use Balgronuuth's power! You all would make incredible henchmen!'

normal.name: Derailed Campaign
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Evil Overlord ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Well, I guess we're doing an evil campaign now. See you all next week...

normal.name: Evil Party
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Evil Overlord ability by 400%. Changes Evil Overlord to target champions with Int 11 or lower instead.
normal.desc: I'll be honest, I didn't think you'd wipe out that whole village!
effects: Changes $(upgrade_name id) to target champions with Int 11 or lower instead

normal.name: Balgronuuth's Pact
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Homebrew ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I had to write this one up myself -- the book didn't have anything evil enough.

normal.name: We Brought Snacks
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Homebrew ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Are you really trying to bribe me for more evil power? Oh, is that pizza?

normal.name: Improved Summoning
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Rise, My Minions! ability by 40%.
normal.desc: 'I can re-summon them -- better, stronger!'

normal.name: Stronger Sources
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Sources of Corpses ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: He's done this spell so many times he could do it with his eyes closed.

normal.name: Skipping Ahead
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Railroad ability by 100%.
normal.desc: We don't have time now because someone needed a shopping session!

normal.name: Evil Plan Completed
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Powergaming, Min-Maxing and Rules Lawyering by 40%.
normal.desc: 'With this, I am even more powerful than before! Muahahah!'

normal.name: Motivational Monologue
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of BBEG by 1.
normal.desc: 'Balgronuuth is really a nice god when you get to know them.'

normal.name: Vicious Damage
normal.effect: Increases the damage of BBEG by 400%. BBEG's attacks prevent the target from healing for 10s.
normal.desc: 'Now you face me at my true potential! Victory WILL be mine!'

normal.name: Encounter Builder
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Evil Overlord ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Okay, you hide behind the door. Wait for all of them to come in and then attack!

normal.name: Secret Stash
normal.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Homebrew ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I've hoarded an assortment of accursed concoctions just for this occasion.

spoilers.name: Undead Army
spoilers.effect: Increases the effect of BBEG's Sources of Corpses ability by 80%. (Prestack)
spoilers.desc: Death is not the end. Life begins after death. Live your afterlife to the fullest.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Elf Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a WIS score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion with a WIS score of 15 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Lawful Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Strongheart is a fearless seeker of justice, risking his life to ensure that good triumphs over evil. He is thoughtful, kind, and seldom rash, yet never hesitant to punish those who spit in the face of law and order.
data.name: Strongheart

base.name: Steel
base.description: Strongheart attacks the closest enemy with his sword, Steel, dealing one hit.

ult.name: Command: Yield!
ult.description: Strongheart commands the enemy with the most health to Yield. It is stunned and all attacks deal additional BUD damage.
ult.long_description: Strongheart moves forward and Commands the enemy with the most health to Yield, stunning it for 6 seconds. While it is stunned, all attacks against the enemy deal additional 15 seconds worth of BUD.

abilities.name: Critical Hit
abilities.desc: Strongheart's base chance to Critical Hit is 20%.

description.desc: $source's base chance to Critical Hit is $amount%.

abilities.name: Justice Needs Champions
abilities.desc: Strongheart increases the damage of all adjacent Champions by 100%.

raw.name: Justice Needs Champions
raw.tip_text: Strongheart buffs the damage of adjacent Champions!

description.desc: $source increases the damage of all adjacent Champions by $amount%.

abilities.name: Event Token Scavenger
abilities.desc: Strongheart can help scavenge up to `$strongheart_token_scavenger_max` additional Event Tokens when killing bosses. While this cap is not reached, Strongheart has a 33.3% chance of scavenging 20 Event Tokens each time a boss drops a loot bag. The cap increases by 300 every day.

raw.name: Event Token Scavenger
raw.tip_text: Strongheart has a chance to discover Event Tokens with each defeated boss, with a cap that increases every day.

description.desc: Strongheart can help scavenge up to $strongheart_token_scavenger_max additional Event Tokens when killing bosses. While this cap is not reached, Strongheart has a $(amount)% chance of scavenging $(tokens_per_boss) Event Tokens each time a boss drops a loot bag. The cap increases by $(additional_tokens_per_day) every day.^^$strongheart_event_token_scavenger_description

abilities.name: Courage to Stand
abilities.desc: Strongheart heals champions affected by Justice Needs Champions for 25 health per second.

description.desc: $source heals champions affected by Justice Needs Champions for $amount health per second.

abilities.name: Righteous Might
abilities.desc: Whenever Strongheart lands a critical hit, for the next 20 seconds he increases the damage of Justice Needs Champions by 400%, increases the healing amount of Courage to Stand by 100%, and reduces the base attack speed cooldown of himself and Champions affected by Justice Needs Champions by 0.5 seconds.

description.pre: Whenever $source lands a critical hit, for the next 20 seconds he increases the damage of $(upgrade_name id) by $(amount___4)%, increases the healing amount of $(upgrade_name id___2) by $(amount___2)%, and reduces the base attack speed cooldown of himself and Champions affected by Justice Needs Champions by $(amount___3) seconds.

conditions.desc: ^^$(strongheart_rightous_might_stack_desc)

specs.name: Valor's Call
specs.desc: Strongheart increases the damage bonus of Justice Needs Champions by 100% for each good Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Valor's Call
raw.specialization_description: Strongheart is heartened by Good Champions in the formation.

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each good Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Honorary Member
specs.desc: Strongheart gains the affiliation(s) of the most populous affiliation(s) in the formation, and increases the damage bonus of Justice Needs Champions by 150% for each Champion from the affiliation(s), stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Honorary Member
raw.specialization_description: Strongheart joins the largest bonded group in your formation.

description.pre: $(source_hero) gains the affiliation(s) of the most populous affiliation(s) in the formation, and increases the damage bonus of $(upgrade_name id) by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion from the affiliation(s), stacking multiplicatively.

conditions.desc: ^^$(strongheart_honorary_member_tag_desc)

specs.name: A Righteous Event
specs.desc: Strongheart increases the damage bonus of Justice Needs Champions by 20% for each Event Buff or Boon that is currently unlocked, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: A Righteous Event
raw.specialization_description: Strongheart is encouraged by a party that actively participates in important gatherings.

description.desc: Strongheart increases the damage bonus of Justice Needs Champions by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Event Buff or Boon that is currently unlocked, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Training Dagger
items.description: We all must start our adventure somewhere.

items.name: Guard's Weapon
items.description: It's not much, but it has saved me on countless occasions.

items.name: Blade of the Paladin
items.description: I pledge myself to your service. It is an honor to fight by your side.

items.name: Heart of Gold Hammer
items.description: This once helped a band of brave adventurers escape the Prison of Agony.

items.name: Winged Cap
items.description: This was my first cap, and only because it was all they had left.

items.name: Guard's Helmet
items.description: I found myself fond of the wings and kept them as a guard.

items.name: Winged Helm
items.description: Gifted to me by a dear friend in lands far from here.

items.name: Helm of Celestial Wings
items.description: I never thought I would soar through clouds -- until I found this.

items.name: Chainmail
items.description: This stopped more blades than it should have been able to.

items.name: Enhanced Mail
items.description: Enchanted by an elven cleric in the forests of Icewind Dale.

items.name: Plate Armor
items.description: Armor is only as good as the knight who wears it.

items.name: Word of Honor Plate
items.description: A promise was made when this was crafted. I will honor it forever.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.description: Armor doesn't clean itself after all. Well, unless you're a wizard I suppose.

items.name: Scented Polish
items.description: I stood in line for four hours in the Neverwinter market for this.

items.name: Draconic Soap
items.description: This was made for me by a bronze dragon. It never runs out!

items.name: Enchanted Mustache Wax
items.description: There's no reason one can't look fabulous on the battlefield!

items.name: Hempen Rope
items.description: Some scoff at always having rope with you. They're fools.

items.name: Unbreakable Rope
items.description: This has gotten me out of quite a few binds.

items.name: Collapsible Pole
items.description: The best advice I can give you is to ALWAYS have this in your adventuring pack.

items.name: Portable Ram
items.description: No villain can hide with this at my side.

items.name: Horse Grooming Kit
items.description: A knight's horse should be as clean as they are.

items.name: Expert Grooming Kit
items.description: My steed likes the extra care, so it's worth the extra coin to me.

items.name: Trusty Saddle
items.description: You should trust your saddle as much as your horse.

items.name: Mystic Horse Armor
items.description: A trusty steed deserves a set of trusty armor.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: You have my word that no harm will come to you.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: With me! Together we can push through!

normal.name: Strength in Numbers
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strongheart's Justice Needs Champions ability by 20%.
normal.desc: They may have bigger numbers, but we are stronger together!

normal.name: All Together Now
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strongheart's Justice Needs Champions ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The battle is almost won! Stand together!

normal.name: Eventful Warrior
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strongheart's Event Token Scavenger ability by 200%.
normal.desc: I hope my years of experience benefit you.

normal.name: Together We Stand
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strongheart's Courage to Stand ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Hold! We will give them no ground!

normal.name: Aura of Courage
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Strongheart's Righteous Might ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Let my words sing through your hearts!

normal.name: Wings of Steel
normal.effect: Increase the effect of all Strongheart's specializations by 20%.
normal.desc: Let my steel fly like a falcon!
effects: Increase the effect of all Strongheart's specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Wings of Gold
normal.effect: Increase the effect of all Strongheart's specializations by 40%.
normal.desc: Heart of Gold, lead me true!
effects: Increase the effect of all Strongheart's specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Tactical Prowess
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Strongheart by 5%.
normal.desc: Know your enemy's weakness as best you can.

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Strongheart by 10%.
normal.desc: A maintained blade is more effective on the battlefield.

normal.name: Durable
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Strongheart by 1.
normal.desc: It will take far more than that to fell me!

normal.name: Keen Mind
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Strongheart by 1.
normal.desc: There! The enemy attacks from our flank!

normal.name: Stunning Riposte
normal.effect: When Strongheart scores a critical hit, the target is stunned for 2 seconds.
normal.desc: The creature was so surprised by my attack that it nearly froze in place!
effects: When Strongheart scores a critical hit, the target is stunned for 2 seconds.

normal.name: Dragonborn Glitch
normal.effect: Strongheart also counts as a Dragonborn. Increases the effect of Strongheart's Justice Needs Champions ability by 20% for each Dragonborn Champion in the formation.
normal.desc: My heart now beats with the majesty of a dragon!
effects: Strongheart also counts as a Dragonborn

spoilers.name: Master's Precision
spoilers.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Strongheart by 20%.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Male Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Human Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Vin Ursa is one of the deadliest bounty hunters in Wildspace. Raised by autognome thieves and trained by a former Xaryxian assassin, Vin has all the skills she needs to get the job done. To keep those skills honed, she spends much of her off time in the Arena of Blood. If there's one thing you should hope for in Wildspace, it's to avoid ending up on the wrong side of her L.A.S.E.R. sight. She's built her renown fighting some of the most terrifying creatures this side of the Abyss and has a long list of Favored Foes to show for it.
data.name: Vin Ursa

base.name: L.A.S.E.R.
base.description: Vin Ursa uses her Light Accelerating Spectral Energy Relay to attack a random enemy.

ult.name: Target Acquisition
ult.description: Vin Ursa blasts an enemy and has a chance to make that enemy a favored foe.
ult.long_description: Vin Ursa blasts an enemy. She has a +20% chance to score a critical hit and the enemy becomes a favored foe if she crits.

abilities.name: Wildspace Lover
abilities.desc: Vin Ursa can be used in any Light of Xaryxis campaign adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

description.desc: $source can be used in any Light of Xaryxis campaign adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

abilities.name: Bounty Hunter
abilities.desc: Vin Ursa picks a random monster type from a monster in the current adventure as her Favored Foe. Her Favored Foes drop 400% extra gold and all Champions deal 400% damage to them.

raw.name: Bounty Hunter
raw.tip_text: Vin Ursa picks a random monster type as her favored foe. She can add additional Favored Foe types by using her ultimate ability.

description.pre: $source picks a random monster type from a monster in the current adventure as her Favored Foe. Her Favored Foes drop $(amount___3)% extra gold and all Champions deal $(amount___2)% damage to them.

conditions.desc: ^^Favored Foes: $(vin_ursa_bounty_hunter_discovered)^Undiscovered Foes: $(vin_ursa_bounty_hunter_undiscovered)

abilities.name: Vicious Vantage
abilities.desc: Vin Ursa increases the effect of your Deck specialization by 250% for each Favored Foe she has, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack multiplier.

description.desc: $source increases the effect of your Deck specialization by $(amount)% for each Favored Foe she has, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack multiplier.

abilities.name: Contract Negotiations
abilities.desc: Whenever you use a Bounty Contract with Vin Ursa in the formation, Vin Ursa increases the effect of your Deck specialization by 25% until the end of the current adventure, stacking multiplicatively. Caps at 100 stacks.

raw.name: Contract Negotiations
raw.tip_text: Vin Ursa increases the effect of her buffs whenever Bounty Contracts are used with her in the formation.

description.desc: Whenever you use a Bounty Contract with $source in the formation, Vin Ursa increases the effect of your Deck specialization by $(not_buffed amount)% until the end of the current adventure, stacking multiplicatively. Caps at 100 stacks.

specs.name: Front Deck
specs.desc: Vin Ursa increases the damage of all Champions in the front two columns by 400%.

raw.name: Front Deck
raw.specialization_description: Vin Ursa focuses her efforts on the front-most columns of the formation.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of all Champions in the front two columns by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Rear Deck
specs.desc: Vin Ursa increases the damage of all Champions in the rear two columns by 400%.

raw.name: Rear Deck
raw.specialization_description: Vin Ursa focuses her efforts on the rear-most columns of the formation.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of all Champions in the rear two columns by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Friends in Low Places
specs.desc: Vin Ursa increases the damage of Evil Champions by 400%.

raw.name: Friends in Low Places
raw.specialization_description: Vin Ursa likes to hang with a rather sadistic crowd.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of Evil Champions by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Friends in Meh Places
specs.desc: Vin Ursa increases the damage of Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions by 400%.

raw.name: Friends in Meh Places
raw.specialization_description: Vin Ursa likes to hang with Champions who like to keep their options open.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champions by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Friends in High Places
specs.desc: Vin Ursa increases the damage of Good Champions by 400%.

raw.name: Friends in High Places
raw.specialization_description: Vin Ursa reluctantly hangs out with Champions that have a moral code.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of Good Champions by $(amount)%.

items.name: Traveler's Fedora
items.description: Someone told me bounty hunters wear hats. This is what I could afford.

items.name: Lucky Cap
items.description: There are a few more ray gun marks than I thought on this...

items.name: Bounty Hunter Hat
items.description: Someone ran at the sight of my hat. It was awesome! I have a look now!

items.name: Hat of Disguise
items.description: For when you need a new face. Or a face at all.

items.name: Security Coat
items.description: Nicked this off a guard who wasn't looking. It's got armor inside!

items.name: Well Worn Coat
items.description: I genuinely cannot believe how many hits this coat has taken.

items.name: Plasmoid Jacket
items.description: I found a plasmoid tailor to make this for me. They knew how to keep me flowing.

items.name: Cloak of Stars and Darkness
items.description: This lets me seep into the shadows and also watches my back for me.

items.name: Compact Wrist Bow
items.description: I can't afford anything better -- so this will have to do.

items.name: Dead Eye Crossbow
items.description: I'm way better with this thing than I should be.

items.name: L.A.S.E.R. Wrist Array
items.description: This thing is so cool! Is it too cool for me? Ah! It's so cool!

items.name: Starstrike Array
items.description: This was specially designed for me by my dad. It was the last thing he made.

items.name: Heist Score
items.description: This was our last score before the team was wiped out...

items.name: Remaining Stash
items.description: There's not much of this left. I need more contracts. Fast.

items.name: Family Gears
items.description: Each of these comes from a member of my autognome family.

items.name: Arena of Blood Coin
items.description: Old Vocath looked really annoyed when he had to present this to me.

items.name: Happy Beholder Mug
items.description: You'd be surprised how many bounties just walk into a tavern you're already in.

items.name: Replacement Mug
items.description: I broke the last one over a giff's head. Got this one for free from Large Luigi.

items.name: Goblinpunk Stein
items.description: Have you been to Eberron? That place is WILD!

items.name: Infinity's Souvenir
items.description: I just found this place, and I never wanted to leave. SO MANY TAVERNS!

items.name: Active Bounty
items.description: Until I'm in a guild, these will have to do for contracts.

items.name: First Bounty Poster
items.description: I still hang onto this all these years later.

items.name: Wildspace Scrying Stone
items.description: Wildspace is REALLY big. This helps me find a bounty anywhere.

items.name: Dimensional Shackles
items.description: Some bounties require assurance that they stay on this plane.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Most of the time this would cost you, but I'll save these autognomes for free.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: I'm in charge because I have the cool coat.

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: I bring my own stein to taverns -- why pay for a new one every time?

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: I don't need luck! ...No wait, I totally do -- give me more luck.

normal.name: Tactical Prowess
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Vin Ursa by 5%.
normal.desc: I don't really make a plan, I just kinda go in and hope for the best and things work out.

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Vin Ursa by 10%.
normal.desc: I've been in a LOT of fights. Want to see my completed bounty list?

normal.name: Have I Fought You Before?
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Vin Ursa's Bounty Hunter ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Oh, another giff! I love fighting giff -- they're always tough!
