normal.desc: You'll learn when to strike. And more importantly, when not to.

normal.name: High Ground
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Vin Ursa's Vicious Vantage ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: It's over -- don't try it.

normal.name: Aggressive Negotiations
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Vin Ursa's Contract Negotiations ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Anyone else want to negotiate?

normal.name: All Hands!
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Vin Ursa's Front Deck and Rear Deck by 80%.
normal.desc: Did anyone see where the spelljammer went?

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Nonbinary Champions by 200%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a INT score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Lawful Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Lae'zel is a ferocious Githyanki warrior, mighty even by the standards of her mind flayer-hunting kind. Faced with transforming into the very monster she's sworn to destroy, Lae'zel must prove herself worthy of rejoining her people - if they don't execute her first.
data.name: Lae'zel

base.name: Greatsword
base.description: Lae'zel attacks the closest enemies with a swing of her greatsword.

base.name: War Magic
base.description: Lae'zel attacks with her greatsword and a volley of magic missiles.

ult.name: Psionic Leap
ult.description: Lae'zel leaps into the enemies and attacks, stunning them all for a short duration.
ult.long_description: Lae'zel psionically leaps into the enemies and attacks with a psionic shockwave, stunning them all for a short duration.

abilities.name: Critical Hit
abilities.desc: Lae'zel's base chance to Critical Hit is 20%.

description.desc: $source's base chance to Critical Hit is $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Lethal Coordination
abilities.desc: Lae'zel increases the damage of all Champions in her column by 100%, including herself.

raw.name: Lethal Coordination
raw.tip_text: Lae'zel increases the damage of all Champions in her column, including herself.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of all Champions in her column by $(amount)%, including herself.

abilities.name: Ceremorphosis
abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in Lae'zel's brain. $Lae'zel increases the effect of Lethal Coordination by 100% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in $source's brain. $source increases the effect of $(upgrade_name id___2) by $(amount)% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Straight to the Point
abilities.desc: In non-boss areas, whenever an enemy is defeated by anything OTHER than Lae'zel, she has a 100% chance to gain an Impatience stack. When she has 17 Impatience stacks, complete the current area and reset the Impatience stacks to the current Ceremorphosis count. Stacks persist when changing areas.

raw.name: Straight to the Point
raw.tip_text: Lae'zel gets impatient when other Champions defeat enemies which results in her completing areas early.

description.desc: In non-boss areas, whenever an enemy is defeated by anything OTHER than $source, she has a $(amount)% chance to gain an Impatience stack. When she has $(max_stacks___2) Impatience stacks, complete the current area and reset the Impatience stacks to the current Ceremorphosis count. Stacks persist when changing areas.

abilities.name: Aberration Hunter
abilities.desc: Aberrations are Lae'zel's Favored Foe. Every time an Aberration spawns, $Lae'zel's Lethal Coordination is multiplicatively increased by 100%, stacking up to 4 times the Ceremorphosis stack count and resetting when changing areas. There is a 33% chance with each wave in a non-boss area that an extra Mind Flayer spawns.

description.desc: Aberrations are $source's Favored Foe. Every time an Aberration spawns, $source's $(upgrade_name id___2) is multiplicatively increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking up to $(max_stack_mult___3) times the Ceremorphosis stack count and resetting when changing areas. There is a $(amount___4)% chance with each wave in a non-boss area that an extra Mind Flayer spawns.

abilities.name: Ferocious Warrior
abilities.desc: If Lae'zel attacks and any of her targets survive, her base attack cooldown for her next attack is reduced by 4 seconds.

description.desc: If $source attacks and any of her targets survive, her base attack cooldown for her next attack is reduced by $(amount) seconds.

specs.name: Champion
specs.desc: Increases Lae'zel's Critical Hit chance by 20% (additively) and Critical Hit damage by 100% (multiplicatively).

raw.name: Champion
raw.specialization_description: Lae'zel becomes a Champion, increasing the chance and damage of her critical hits.

description.desc: Increases $source's Critical Hit chance by $(amount)% (additively) and Critical Hit damage by $(amount___2)% (multiplicatively).

specs.name: Battle Master
specs.desc: When Lae'zel hits an enemy and they survive, the enemy is distracted and the next Champion (other than $Lae'zel) that hits them deals an additional 4 seconds of BUD-based damage.

raw.name: Battle Master
raw.specialization_description: Lae'zel's attacks distract enemies, causing the next attack that hits them to do massive damage.

description.desc: When $source hits an enemy and they survive, the enemy is distracted and the next Champion (other than $source) that hits them deals an additional $(amount) seconds of BUD-based damage.

specs.name: Eldritch Knight
specs.desc: Lae'zel now casts Magic Missile immediately after attacking with her greatsword, firing a missile at 3 random targets.

raw.name: Eldritch Knight
raw.specialization_description: Lae'zel becomes an Eldritch Knight, allowing her to cast Magic Missile after each of her Greatsword attacks.

description.desc: $source now casts Magic Missile immediately after attacking with her greatsword, firing a missile at 3 random targets.

items.name: Raiding Daggers
items.description: A gift from my sa'varsh. I used them to survive my first of many raids.

items.name: Balanced Blades
items.description: A fellow initiate called these blades 'insufficient'. The wounds they left on his forehead prove otherwise.

items.name: Ghaik Slayer
items.description: This will help me bring a ghaik head to my Undying Queen.

items.name: Mind Seeker
items.description: Each bolt is enchanted to seek out the brain of a ghaik and destroy it.

items.name: Training Weapon
items.description: The edge may be dull, but it will cleave my foes open all the same.

items.name: Battle Damaged Sword
items.description: Each mark on this blade is a lesson I learned on Crèche K'liir.

items.name: Greatsword
items.description: One day I will wield a true silver sword in Vlaakith's name.

items.name: Githyanki Silver Sword
items.description: Within this blade lives the whole of the empire's might!

items.name: Raiding Prize
items.description: A mere trinket.

items.name: Memory of the Tears
items.description: A simple memento of the crèche I once called home.

items.name: Aether Shards
items.description: Said to be found only in Tu'narath, the City of Death.

items.name: Token of Vlaakith
items.description: The engraving on the back reads: 'Vlaakith'ka sivim hrath krash'ht'

items.name: Ornate Garb
items.description: Discarded attire from Crèche K'liir - a hand-me-down from the varsh.

items.name: Ancient Adornment
items.description: Ceremonial garments, passed from the undead tl'a'ikith who wore them in life.

items.name: Githyanki Mail
items.description: The armor of a githyanki warrior is unmatched.

items.name: Dragonrider Armour
items.description: To wear this armour atop a red dragon steed is my duty and my destiny!

items.name: Leather Sandals
items.description: Tsk'va! I hate these things.

items.name: Well Used Sandals
items.description: Training on Crèche K'liir with these was close to torture.

items.name: Half Plate Boots
items.description: With one sturdy stomp, I could crush a ghaik's abominable skull.

items.name: Astral Striders
items.description: With these, I can walk amongst the stars and hunt ghaik wherever they hide.

items.name: Unidentified Crown
items.description: I snatched this from the ruins of a githyanki temple. It holds but a trace of psionic magic.

items.name: Ancient Crown
items.description: The magic within this crown reeks of shadow. I call upon it at my own peril.

items.name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
items.description: The spoils of a victorious raid. They serve their purpose more than adequately.

items.name: Sunwalker's Gift
items.description: With this, the shadows bow to me.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Lae'zel by 30%.
normal.desc: I do not brawl in taverns, but I will run you through for interrupting my drink.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Lae'zel by 60%.
normal.desc: Let me out of this cage and I won't need weapons to end you.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Selflessness is weakness.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Follow me if you want. I will not be responsible for your deaths.

normal.name: Lethal Timing
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Lethal Coordination ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Shadowheart is slow to detect danger, and even slower to react. It will be the death of her.

normal.name: Lethal Tactics
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Lethal Coordination ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Astarion is the only one among you who understands that success requires strategy.

normal.name: Stygian Vigor
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Ceremorphosis ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: This power from the vile ghaik slug seems to be increasing.

normal.name: Eldritch Empowerment
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Ceremorphosis ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: The power is useful, but it is a stain in my mind.

normal.name: No Time to Explain
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Straight to the Point ability by 40%.
normal.desc: There is no time for this -- there are ghaik to slay!

normal.name: Hurry Up!
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Straight to the Point ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I will leave you behind! Get moving!

normal.name: Aberrant Slayer
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Aberration Hunter ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Vlaakith demands the death of all ghaik.

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Lae'zel by 10%.
normal.desc: You would be wise to watch my movements, Tav. I am a true warrior.

normal.name: Cataclysmic Strike
normal.effect: Increases the Crit Damage of Lae'zel by 60%.
normal.desc: I will only find honor when I present Vlaakith with the head of a slain ghaik.

normal.name: Absolute Trust
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Lae'zel's Lethal Coordination ability by 80%.
normal.desc: You have proven yourself worthy of my trust. For now.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Githyanki Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a INT score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a DEX score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Melee Champion in the formation.

data.backstory: Astarion prowled the night as a vampire spawn for centuries, serving a sadistic master until he was snatched away. Now he can walk in the light and has the chance at a new life, but how long can he keep his past buried?
data.name: Astarion

base.name: Sneak Attack
base.description: Astarion attacks a random target, dealing massive damage if the enemy was recently attacked.

ult.name: Sanguine Hunger
ult.description: Astarion viciously attacks the enemy with the most health and heals to full health.
ult.long_description: Astarion viciously attacks the enemy with the most health with a vampiric bite and heals to full health.

abilities.name: Vampire Spawn
abilities.desc: Astarion counts as "undead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions (Desmond, Kas), but "alive" for all other purposes.

description.desc: Astarion counts as "undead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions (Desmond, Kas), but "alive" for all other purposes.

abilities.name: Ceremorphosis
abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in Astarion's brain. Astarion increases the effect of Outflank by 100% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in Astarion's brain. Astarion increases the effect of Outflank by $(amount)% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Generational Wealth
abilities.desc: Astarion increases the gold find of the formation by 1% multiplied by the total age of all Champions in the formation.

conditions.desc: Astarion increases the gold find of the formation by $(amount)% multiplied by the total age of all Champions in the formation. If The Dark Urge is in the formation, the effect of this ability is increased by $(amount___2)%.
Astarion increases the gold find of the formation by $(amount)% multiplied by the total age of all Champions in the formation.

abilities.name: Well Fed
abilities.desc: After using his Sanguine Hunger ultimate, Astarion's Outflank is increased by 400%. This effect can stack (multiplicatively) up to 5 times, with stacks resetting when changing areas.

description.desc: After using his Sanguine Hunger ultimate, Astarion's Outflank is increased by $(amount)%. This effect can stack (multiplicatively) up to $max_stacks___2 times, with stacks resetting when changing areas.

abilities.name: The Ultimate Outflank
abilities.desc: If Astarion is buffed by his own Outflank ability, when he uses his Sanguine Hunger Ultimate attack, he reduces the active ultimate cooldown of all other Champions in the formation by 10%.

raw.name: The Ultimate Outflank
raw.tip_text: Astarion reduces ultimate cooldowns of other Champions when he uses his ultimate if he is buffed by his own Outflank ability.

description.desc: If Astarion is buffed by his own Outflank ability, when he uses his Sanguine Hunger Ultimate attack, he reduces the active ultimate cooldown of all other Champions in the formation by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Outflank (Top)
specs.desc: Astarion increases the damage of all Champions at the top of each column by 100%.

raw.name: Outflank (Top)
raw.specialization_description: Astarion looks to the top of the formation to deal the most damage.
raw.tip_text: Astarion increases the damage of all champions on either the top or the bottom of each column, based on your choice.

description.desc: Astarion increases the damage of all Champions at the top of each column by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Outflank (Bottom)
specs.desc: Astarion increases the damage of all Champions at the bottom of each column by 100%.

raw.name: Outflank (Bottom)
raw.specialization_description: Astarion looks to the bottom of the formation to deal the most damage.
raw.tip_text: Astarion increases the damage of all champions on either the top or the bottom of each column, based on your choice.

description.desc: Astarion increases the damage of all Champions at the bottom of each column by $(amount)%

specs.name: Thief
specs.desc: Astarion increases the gold find of the party by 100% for each gold find Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Thief
raw.specialization_description: Astarion schemes with other gold find Champions in the formation to "obtain" even more gold.

description.desc: Astarion increases the gold find of the party by $(amount)% for each gold find Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Arcane Trickster
specs.desc: Astarion increases the damage bonus of his Outflank specialization by 100% for each Champion in the formation that is a Rogue, Wizard, or Absolute Adversaries affiliation member, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Arcane Trickster
raw.specialization_description: Astarion works best with fellow rogues, wizards, and Absolute Adversaries affiliation members.

description.desc: Astarion increases the damage bonus of his Outflank specialization by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation that is a Rogue, Wizard, or Absolute Adversaries affiliation member, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Assassin
specs.desc: Increases the bonus BUD-based damage Astarion's Sneak Attack deals to $(amount) seconds worth.

raw.name: Assassin
raw.specialization_description: Astarion focuses on dealing more damage when he attacks an enemy who has been recently attacked by an ally.

description.desc: Increases the bonus BUD-based damage Astarion's Sneak Attack deals to $(amount) seconds worth.

items.name: Gutter Sling
items.description: I found this in a gutter. It may look disgusting, but it's deadly. ...to rats.

items.name: Handmade Sling
items.description: It won't take down an owlbear, but perhaps a kobold? If the wind is right...

items.name: Infernal Blades
items.description: Don't ask where these came from, you don't want to know.

items.name: Nightfang Bow
items.description: Showy AND deadly? Oh it's perfect, darling!

items.name: Nautiloid Schematics
items.description: The others don't need to know I have this. It's for my own ...research.

items.name: Note-Filled Illustration
items.description: These have been fascinating. I think I'm getting closer to something...

items.name: Tome of the Illithid
items.description: Could it work? It shouldn't be possible. None of this should be possible...

items.name: Eldritch Experiment
items.description: If this goes the way I hope -- I'll never have to fear the sun again.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Map
items.description: This is one of my few possessions now that I serve Cazador...

items.name: Outdated Diagram
items.description: This used to be accurate. Now it feels more like an ancient painting than a map.

items.name: Twisted Lock Picks
items.description: I've been told these will never break. I'll put that to the test.

items.name: Forged Patents of Nobility
items.description: No one will question my nobility now. Or they shouldn't for the coin I paid.

items.name: The First of Many
items.description: Well, that was... disgusting.

items.name: Quick Snack
items.description: It may not be dignified, but needs must.

items.name: Broken Silver Mirror
items.description: Someday I'll see my face again. You're lucky enough to see it every day.

items.name: Cazador Szarr Portrait
items.description: Did you ever hate something so much, you just couldn't part with it?

items.name: Throwing Dagger
items.description: Better than a sling, that's for sure.

items.name: Balanced Blade
items.description: I'm much better with these than I expected. I'll have to get them enchanted...

items.name: Noble's Sword
items.description: Yes, this is mine. No, you don't need to know where I got it.

items.name: Vampiric Rapier
items.description: They'll lose the blood regardless. This just happens to save it for me.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: I picked up this little treasure with the coin I made from OnlyFangs.

items.name: Dispelled Ring
items.description: Well, it was good while it lasted.

items.name: Smuggler's Ring
items.description: Tav gave this to me and said it would suit me well. They were right.

items.name: Amulet of Misty Step
items.description: Stabbing your enemies gets much easier when you can simply appear behind them.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Just stick with me, darling. We'll use the shadows to conceal us.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Yes, I came back to help. But we're not doing your awful plan.

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: Oh, what's this? It seems they left their coin purse behind. Pity.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: Some would call that luck. I call it 'who cares, so long as I get the gold.'

normal.name: Mortal Bond
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Outflank (Top) and Outflank (Bottom) by 20%.
normal.desc: Sometimes I still remember how it felt to be mortal. It's... strange.

normal.name: Sanguine Pact
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Outflank (Top) and Outflank (Bottom) by 40%.
normal.desc: I can feel it -- that curse -- moving my blood instead of my heart.

normal.name: Eldritch Connection
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Ceremorphosis ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Have you ever felt a worm twitch in your brain?

normal.name: Undying Savings
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Generational Wealth ability by 20%.
normal.desc: It's interesting which items suddenly become valuable after a century or so.

normal.name: Familiar Tithing
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Generational Wealth ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Vampires don't make money -- their familiars make it for them.

normal.name: Blood Fueled
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Well Fed ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Mmm, such an exquisite taste. I think I'll have it all.

normal.name: Mist Step
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's The Ultimate Outflank ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Surely there's nothing for you to fear in the mists. Certainly not a knife.

normal.name: Shadow's Embrace
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's The Ultimate Outflank ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Darkness feels like a comforting embrace. Want to know how it feels?

normal.name: Tempting Power
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Astarion's Ceremorphosis ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: If it gives me the power to kill Cazador, I'll take it.

normal.name: Prodigal Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +50%.
normal.desc: Fine, I'll lead - but all of you need to be more stealthy!

normal.name: Satiate the Hunger
normal.effect: Increases the max stacks of Astarion's Well Fed by 100%.
normal.desc: Darling, anything is better than rats.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Male Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 45% for each Elf Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a INT score of 13 or higher by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CON score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Evil Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Commodore Krux is a giff soldier who believes his glory days are behind him. Krux has spent the last few years working as a mercenary on and around the Rock of Bral, but lately the giff has been spending more time in his cups as new jobs have become fewer and farther between.
data.name: Krux

base.name: Flintlock Pistols
base.description: Commodore Krux fires a pistol at a random target.

ult.name: Force Grenade
ult.description: Commodore Krux throws a grenade at the enemy with the most health which deals damage and knocks enemies back.
ult.long_description: Commodore Krux throws a grenade at the enemy with the most health, which explodes dealing ultimate damage to all enemies in a medium radius and knocking them all back a short distance.

abilities.name: Wildspace Lover
abilities.desc: Commodore Krux can be used in any Light of Xaryxis campaign adventure or variant, even if he would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

description.desc: Commodore Krux can be used in any Light of Xaryxis campaign adventure or variant, even if he would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

abilities.name: All Hands On Deck!
abilities.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage of all Champions in his column and the rear-most column of the formation by 100%. This does not apply twice if that is the same column.

raw.name: All Hands On Deck!
raw.tip_text: Commodore Krux buffs Champions who are in his column and the back column of the formation.

conditions.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage of all Champions in his column and the two rear-most columns of the formation by $(amount)%. This does not apply twice if he's in one of the two rear-most columns.
Commodore Krux increases the damage of all Champions in his column and the rear-most column of the formation by $(amount)%. This does not apply twice if that is the same column.

abilities.name: Battle Stations!
abilities.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage bonus of All Hands On Deck! by 25% for each second the Champions are in the current area, stacking multiplicatively up to a maximum of 100 stacks.

description.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage bonus of All Hands On Deck! by $(not_buffed amount)% for each second the Champions are in the current area, stacking multiplicatively up to a maximum of $(max_stacks) stacks.

abilities.name: Batten Down the Hatches!
abilities.desc: Commodore Krux increases the health of all other Champions by 0.1% of his max health for each adventure, variant, and Patron variant you have completed in the Light of Xaryxis campaign, stacking additively. Any healing effect on those Champions is increased by the same amount.

description.desc: Commodore Krux increases the health of all other Champions by $(amount)% of his max health for each adventure, variant, and Patron variant you have completed in the Light of Xaryxis campaign, stacking additively. Any healing effect on those Champions is increased by the same amount.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the health of $target and the effect of healing on $target by $amount

abilities.name: Starfarer's Spyglass
abilities.desc: Upon completing a new area, Commodore Krux raises a spyglass to his eye and spots an enemy from the next area. All enemies of that type become his Favored Foe (until another area is completed) and take 100% more damage from all sources.

raw.name: Starfarer's Spyglass
raw.tip_text: Commodore Krux is always looking ahead and chooses a Favored Foe from the next area when completing an area.

description.desc: Upon completing a new area, Commodore Krux raises a spyglass to his eye and spots an enemy from the next area. All enemies of that type become his Favored Foe (until another area is completed) and take $(amount)% more damage from all sources.

conditions.desc: ^^$(krux_starfarers_spyglass)

abilities.name: An Experienced Sailor
abilities.desc: Commodore Krux increases the effect of All Hands On Deck! by 20% for each adventure, variant, and Patron variant you have completed in the Light of Xaryxis campaign, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Commodore Krux increases the effect of All Hands On Deck! by $(not_buffed amount)% for each adventure, variant, and Patron variant you have completed in the Light of Xaryxis campaign, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Nautical Knockback
specs.desc: Commodore Krux gains the Control role and he increases the effect of All Hands On Deck! by 200% and his base attack knocks back his targets a short distance.

raw.name: Nautical Knockback
raw.specialization_description: Commodore Krux focuses on buffing the party and the strength of his Flintlock Pistols.

description.desc: Commodore Krux gains the Control role and he increases the effect of All Hands On Deck! by $(amount)% and his base attack knocks back his targets a short distance.

specs.name: Take the Helm
specs.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage of Champions with a magic base attack by 400%.

raw.name: Take the Helm
raw.specialization_description: Commodore Krux focuses on buffing his magic-based allies.

description.desc: Commodore Krux increases the damage of Champions with a magic base attack by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Foe of Xaryxis
specs.desc: Each time any favored foe is defeated, Commodore Krux increases the damage of All Hands On Deck! by 25%, stacking additively up to 25 times, until the area is changed.

raw.name: Foe of Xaryxis
raw.specialization_description: Commodore Krux keeps a keen eye on Favored Foes and further buffs Champions when one is defeated.

description.desc: Each time any favored foe is defeated, Commodore Krux increases the damage of All Hands On Deck! by $(amount)%, stacking additively up to $(max_stacks) times, until the area is changed.

items.name: Sailor's Clothes
items.description: Ah yes, been a few years since I fit into this one.

items.name: Shipmate Uniform
items.description: Smell that? Still smells like my old ship. Good memories.

items.name: Commodore Attire
items.description: On the Second Wind I get to choose my own uniform!

items.name: Warlord Armor
items.description: Haha! Nothing can stop me in this!

items.name: Flimsy Firearms
items.description: I remember these being much sturdier...

items.name: Reinforced Pistols
items.description: Oh, no, I was thinking of these. These were good weapons!

items.name: Dueling Muskets
items.description: I took these in a duel. No one lost, but they were too drunk to notice.

items.name: Muskets of Precision
items.description: Won these in a game at Infinity's. That celestial was not happy with me...

items.name: Empty Coin Purse
items.description: Oh dear, it seems there's been a hole in this one...

items.name: Unusually Light Pouch
items.description: I swear there were more coins in here this morning

items.name: Secured Purse
items.description: It may be light, but thieves can't easily access it!

items.name: Heavy Bag of Holding
items.description: I can carry most anything in this! There's nothing in it, but I could!

items.name: Terrestrial Sextant
items.description: At one point I sailed the seas and this was always with me.

items.name: Astral Navigator
items.description: I acquired this on a trip to the Radiant Citadel.

items.name: Cosmic Spyglass
items.description: A normal spyglass just won't cut it in Wildspace.

items.name: Wildspace Orrery
items.description: Only a fool would knowingly sail into Doomspace. And I'm that fool!

items.name: Broken Pocket Watch
items.description: This belonged to an old friend. Should I repair it?

items.name: Repaired Pocket Watch
items.description: It's good to hear this ticking away once again.

items.name: Broken Sending Stone
items.description: Warwyck broke this the last time I saw him...

items.name: Tarrasque Tooth
items.description: Few believe me when I tell them the story behind this tooth!

items.name: Dirty Flatcap
items.description: Wore this one down to the threads it seems.

items.name: Tailored Flatcap
items.description: Well, this WAS tailored.

items.name: Red Beret
items.description: Found this one floating out in Wildspace. I'm sure it's fine.

items.name: Armored Top Hat
items.description: Wish I had this when I found that Tarrasque...

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I find listening to one's heart is the best course of action.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: We are stronger as a crew -- those scoundrels can not break that!

normal.name: Elven Accuracy
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Krux by 30%.
normal.desc: I once trained with an ancient eladrin just to observe my surroundings.

normal.name: Sharpshooter
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Krux by 60%.
normal.desc: Haha! Just like my training!

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Krux by 15%.
normal.desc: Trying to break through a giff's hide is a losing fight.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Krux by 30%.
normal.desc: Never stop -- never concede!

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Krux takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Have at thee! Haha!

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Krux takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: A spot of tea never fails to calm the nerves.

normal.name: Trained Crew
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krux's All Hands On Deck! ability by 20%.
normal.desc: It's an honor to call you all my crew.

normal.name: Experienced Crew
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krux's All Hands On Deck! ability by 40%.
normal.desc: This crew is like a well-oiled machine.

normal.name: Man the Cannons
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Krux's Battle Stations! ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Load the cannons, ready your weapons, send them to the hells!

normal.name: Wildspace Veteran
normal.effect: Increases the effect of all of Commodore Krux's specialization choices by 40%.
normal.desc: Wildspace changes you. You have to decide if it's for the better.
effects: Increases the effect of all of Commodore Krux's specialization choices by $amount%.

normal.name: Nimble
normal.effect: Increases the Dexterity score of Krux by 1.
normal.desc: Judge me not by my size.

data.backstory: Certainty Dran, the heiress apparent of Acquisitions Incorporated, is endowed with knowledge surpassing even her father, Omin Dran, and privileged with access to the finest schools and resources. With a fusion of martial skill, clever magic, and unwavering self-belief, Certainty is certainly an unstoppable force.
data.name: Certainty

base.name: Jim's Magic Missile
base.description: Certainty attacks random enemies with a version of Jim's patented magic missile spell.

ult.name: Airship Attack
ult.description: A barrage of fire from Certainty's enlarged toy airship flings up to 10 enemies off the screen.
ult.long_description: A barrage of fire from Certainty's enlarged toy airship flings up to 10 enemies off the screen.

abilities.name: Secretarian's Advice
abilities.desc: Certainty increases the damage of Champions in the column in front of her by 100%.

raw.name: Secretarian's Advice
raw.tip_text: Certainty increases the damage of Champions in the column in front of her.

description.desc: Certainty increases the damage of Champions in the column in front of her by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Financing Rounds
abilities.desc: Certainty increases the effect of Secretarian's Advice and your Gold Find by 1% for each level on Acquisitions Incorporated or 'C' Team Champions in the formation, stacking additively. Each Champion's contribution caps at 1000 levels after their last available upgrade.

description.desc: Certainty increases the effect of Secretarian's Advice and your Gold Find by $(not_buffed amount)% for each level on Acquisitions Incorporated or 'C' Team Champions in the formation, stacking additively. Each Champion's contribution caps at $(max_levels_past_soft_cap) levels after their last available upgrade.

abilities.name: Dad and Uncle Jim
abilities.desc: Certainty helps her father Omin by increasing the damage of Champions of Tymora adjacent to her, and she helps her 'uncle' Jim Darkmagic by increasing his damage by 200% due to royalty payments for using his spell.

description.desc: Certainty helps her father Omin by increasing the damage of Champions of Tymora adjacent to her, and she helps her 'uncle' Jim Darkmagic by increasing his damage by $(amount___2)% due to royalty payments for using his spell.

abilities.name: Employee Evaluations
abilities.desc: Certainty assesses the average score of her preferred ability (INT) of the Champions in the column in front of her and increases the damage effect of Secretarian's Advice by 200% for each full point over 13, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Certainty assesses the average score of her preferred ability (INT) of the Champions in the column in front of her and increases the damage effect of Secretarian's Advice by $(not_buffed amount)% for each full point over $(min_stat_amount), stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Employee Evaluations
abilities.desc: Certainty assesses the average score of her preferred ability (CHA) of the Champions in the column in front of her and increases the damage effect of Secretarian's Advice by 200% for each full point over 13, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Certainty assesses the average score of her preferred ability (CHA) of the Champions in the column in front of her and increases the damage effect of Secretarian's Advice by $(not_buffed amount)% for each full point over $(min_stat_amount), stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Reboot Expert
abilities.desc: Certainty increases the effect of Secretarian's Advice by 100% each time she has been in an adventure for at least 250 areas when it is reset. This stacks additively and persists through resets.

raw.name: Reboot Expert
raw.tip_text: Certainty increases her effectiveness as you thoroughly complete  adventures with her.

description.pre: Certainty increases the effect of Secretarian's Advice by $(amount)% each time she has been in an adventure for at least $(num_areas___2) areas when it is reset. This stacks additively and persists through resets.

conditions.desc: ^^Current Adventure:$(certainty_reboot_desc)

specs.name: Best And The Brightest
specs.desc: Certainty's preferred ability is Intelligence and she grants a +1 INT bonus to all Champions in the column in front of her.

raw.name: Best And The Brightest
raw.specialization_description: Certainty increases the Intelligence of Champions in the column in front of her.

description.desc: Certainty's preferred ability is Intelligence and she grants a +$(amount) INT bonus to all Champions in the column in front of her.

specs.name: Smooth Negotiators
specs.desc: Certainty's preferred ability is Charisma and she grants a +1 CHA bonus to all Champions in the column in front of her.

raw.name: Smooth Negotiators
raw.specialization_description: Certainty increases the Charisma of Champions in the column in front of her.

description.desc: Certainty's preferred ability is Charisma and she grants a +$(amount) CHA bonus to all Champions in the column in front of her.

items.name: Starter Chimes
items.description: A gift from Dad. He said I should play these while Uncle Jim is reading.

items.name: Expert Cymbals
items.description: They said these didn't fit in the school marching band, but I did it anyway.

items.name: Standard Issue Gong
items.description: What do you mean a gong isn't a real instrument?! Are you looking for a fight?!

items.name: Gong of Activation
items.description: This was lying around headquarters. Dad said something about an acid pit?

items.name: Fresh Parchment
items.description: If you don't get how exciting fresh parchment is -- we can't be friends.

items.name: Important Documentation
items.description: These papers just hold the fate of the company in them, no big deal.

items.name: Portfolio Keeper
items.description: I wanted something more colorful, but Uncle K'thriss wanted it spooky.

items.name: Acq Inc. Sending Stone
items.description: Every Acq Inc. member has one of these. The important ones anyway.

items.name: Old Almanac
items.description: Found this in my room when I was a kid. No idea where it came from.

items.name: New Almanac
items.description: OH! So I -- OKAY, now I get what's going on. Hang on, be right back.

items.name: History of Acq Inc.
items.description: This book writes itself. I wonder what happens when it runs out of pages.

items.name: Teddy of Time
items.description: A strange, bald man gave me this in the Feywild. Is that weird?

items.name: School Reports
items.description: Oh, these are just some college papers I aced when I was eight.

items.name: College Papers
items.description: I told my professors I deserved an A++, but they said 'that isn't real.'

items.name: Mandragore Diploma
items.description: Did you know diplomas could be magic items?

items.name: Presage Grimoire
items.description: It's not that the contents are a secret, you just can't read it.

items.name: School Bag
items.description: Dad thought it was adorable that, as a kid, I put the AI on this all by myself.

items.name: Adventuring Pack
items.description: I made this look so cool they turned it into actual merch.

items.name: Certain Robes
items.description: This is called 'style.' Look it up.

items.name: Cloak of the Secretarian
items.description: Oh, this old thing?

items.name: Hand Made Toy
items.description: I never found out who made this. But I loved it when I was a kid.

items.name: Carved Model
items.description: I made this one on my own when I lost my childhood one. Just to show I could.

items.name: Improved Schematics
items.description: I've got some BIG plans. For a thing.

items.name: Wonderous Airship Miniature
items.description: Had to call in a lot of favors for this, but now I have an emergency airship!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I may be focused on the company, but I know how to be a hero.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Once I'm in charge, things will start running a lot smoother.

normal.name: Frugal
normal.effect: Gold Found +10%.
normal.desc: No, it's called a financial budget.

normal.name: Lucky
normal.effect: Gold Found +25%.
normal.desc: Money is the same thing as luck, right?

normal.name: The Pen is Mightier
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Certainty's Secretarian's Advice ability by 20%.
normal.desc: They may have a sword, but I'm in charge of their yearly adventuring review.

normal.name: Shorthand
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Certainty's Secretarian's Advice ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Did you know you can use shorthand for writing spells?

normal.name: New Me
normal.effect: Increases the stat provided by Certainty's Best And The Brightest and Smooth Negotiators to +2.
normal.desc: I'm always better than I was before.
effects: Increases the stat provided by Certainty's Best And The Brightest and Smooth Negotiators to +2

normal.name: Remaster
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Certainty's Reboot Expert ability by 20%.
normal.desc: It's not that you'll be different -- but you will look sharper!

normal.name: Remake
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Certainty's Reboot Expert ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Some things may be different. Okay, a lot of things.

normal.name: Q3 Reports
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Certainty's Financing Rounds ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I hope you brought bags of holding for all this gold!

normal.name: Tenacious
normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Certainty by 2.
normal.desc: If I can survive quarterly meetings, I can survive this!

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Half-Elf Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Thellora, a centaur paladin, belongs to an all-female regiment known as the Luma. These fifty-three centaurs are diverse, but unified in that each possess a distinctive golden right eye. The centaurs believe these individuals are chosen by their god, Callessa, to be devoted guardians and trained warriors. With their divine connection and martial prowess, they protect their land, embracing their unique gifts with unwavering dedication.
data.name: Thellora

base.name: Windsong's Strike
base.description: Thellora strikes an enemy with her hooves, and another with her blade.

ult.name: The Light of Mount Tura
ult.description: Thellora charges through the enemies, and then increases the damage of all champions for a short while.
ult.long_description: Thellora charges through the enemies, dealing 1 massive hit to them in a wide path. She then increases the damage of all champions by 400% for 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Plateaus of Unicorn Run
abilities.desc: Thellora gains a Rush stack for every 10 areas she completes in an adventure, and these stacks persist through resets. Thellora's Rush Target is equal to her number of Rush stacks or the current campaign's favor exponent, whichever is smaller. When Thellora attacks her first enemy she has enough damage to defeat in an adventure, she spends all her Rush stacks and skips to the first area past her Rush Target. Thellora gathers all the rewards (including gold) from bosses skipped in this fashion, but nothing from normal monsters.

raw.name: Plateaus of Unicorn Run
raw.tip_text: Thellora skips the first few areas of adventures, depending on the campaign's favor and the number of rush stacks she acquired in a previous adventure.

description.pre: Thellora gains a Rush stack for every $(amount) areas she completes in an adventure, and these stacks persist through resets. Thellora's Rush Target is equal to her number of Rush stacks or the current campaign's favor exponent, whichever is smaller. When Thellora attacks her first enemy she has enough damage to defeat in an adventure, she spends all her Rush stacks and skips to the first area past her Rush Target. Thellora gathers all the rewards (including gold) from bosses skipped in this fashion, but nothing from normal monsters.

conditions.desc: ^^$thellora_plateaus_of_unicorn_run_desc

abilities.name: Strength of the Luma
abilities.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Champions in the column behind her by 100%.

raw.name: Strength of the Luma
raw.tip_text: Thellora increases the damage of Champions in the column behind her.

description.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Champions in the column behind her by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Paladin's Resolve
abilities.desc: Each time Thellora attacks and doesn't kill an enemy, she increases the effect of Strength of the Luma by 15% until the area changes, stacking multiplicatively and capped at 100 stacks.

description.desc: Each time Thellora attacks and doesn't kill an enemy, she increases the effect of Strength of the Luma by $(not_buffed amount)% until the area changes, stacking multiplicatively and capped at $(max_stacks) stacks.

abilities.name: Radiance of the Sky Cents
abilities.desc: Thellora increases the health of all other Champions by 25% of her max health and any healing effect on those Champions is increased by 25%.

description.desc: Thellora increases the health of all other Champions by $(amount)% of her max health and any healing effect on those Champions is increased by $(amount___2)%.

abilities.name: Feats to Spare
abilities.desc: The effects of feats assigned to Thellora also apply to all adjacent Champions. Note that feats that buff her formation abilities have no effect when applied to other Champions.

description.pre: The effects of feats assigned to Thellora also apply to all adjacent Champions. Note that feats that buff her formation abilities have no effect when applied to other Champions.

conditions.desc: ^^$apply_feats_positionally

specs.name: Defender of the Meek
specs.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Champions with a STR of 12 or less by 60% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

raw.name: Defender of the Meek
raw.specialization_description: Thellora focuses on improving the weakest Champions.

description.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Champions with a STR of $(min_stat_amount___2) or less by $(amount)% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

specs.name: Vanguard of the Quick
specs.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Speed Champions by 50% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

raw.name: Vanguard of the Quick
raw.specialization_description: Thellora runs with the fastest Champions.

description.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Speed Champions by $(amount)% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

specs.name: Callessa's Blessed
specs.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Female and Non-Binary Champions by 50% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

raw.name: Callessa's Blessed
raw.specialization_description: Thellora allies with those that have been blessed by her deity.

description.desc: Thellora increases the damage of Female and Non-Binary Champions by $(amount)% for each such Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

items.name: Makeshift Halberd
items.description: I fashioned this in a time of need. It became my most trusted weapon.

items.name: Deadly Keepsake
items.description: When I meet Callessa, this will be the item I ask to be blessed.

items.name: Lance of Justice
items.description: Created at my request when I became a Luma at last.

items.name: Spear of the Gods
items.description: Forged in Mount Celestia with the power to defeat the gods themselves.

items.name: Training Armor
items.description: As a child, I could barely move in this, let alone gallop.

items.name: Studded Leather
items.description: After a few years of training, this armor felt like a second skin.

items.name: Frontline Armor
items.description: I dreamt of wearing this armor for many years before I finally donned it.

items.name: Callessa's Chosen
items.description: I led the Luma to face the shadows. Callessa and her people shall never fall!

items.name: Steel Sword
items.description: The weight of steel always felt natural in my hand.

items.name: Battle Worn Blade
items.description: I kept this blade for longer than I should have. But never once did it fail me.

items.name: Blade of Divine Wings
items.description: A prayer to Callessa is etched on the blade to keep her with me at all times.

items.name: Sword of Honor & Justice
items.description: Legends say this comes from another world. It burns with magic we do not know.

items.name: Wooden Buckler
items.description: 'Strong as the herd' is etched on the back.

items.name: Trusty Shield
items.description: An item that has saved my life more times than I can count.

items.name: Luma's Aegis
items.description: I led the charge in the battle of Sophress. They called me the Aegis of Luma.

items.name: Pyroclastic Phalanx Shield
items.description: Blood of Callessa be with me.

items.name: Shining Trinket
items.description: Given to me on the day of my first training.

items.name: Heart's Dagger
items.description: I will always think of the person that gave me this and what they meant to me.

items.name: Equine Treats
items.description: I need energy on the battlefield to crush my enemies!

items.name: Basalt Dagger
items.description: Made from part of Callessa herself. One of my most cherished gifts.

items.name: Ruby Headband
items.description: The ruby was harvested from a vein close to the peak of Mount Callessa.

items.name: Reminder of Loyalty
items.description: This represents an oath I failed to uphold. That will not happen again.

items.name: Amber Circlet
items.description: The final adornment that truly marks you as one of the Luma.

items.name: Mantle of Callessa
items.description: Summoned by the Amber Circlet and a direct connection to Callessa.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: My life for my people.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: The shadows are descending! Together we will show them the light!

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Thellora by 15%.
normal.desc: I'm not even close to finished.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Thellora by 30%.
normal.desc: I will see this battle to its end!

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Thellora takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Shields up!

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Thellora takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: No matter how many there are, my devotion to Callessa will never waver.

normal.name: Darting Weapon
normal.effect: Reduces the cooldown on Thellora's Base Attack by 0.5s.
normal.desc: Their eyes will be on my spear when my sword cuts through them.

normal.name: Flanking Positions
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Thellora's Strength of the Luma ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Stand together! They will not break us!

normal.name: Phalanx
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Thellora's Strength of the Luma ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Even if they surround us, they will not break our strength!

normal.name: Callessa's Will
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Thellora's Paladin's Resolve ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Callessa will not abandon us! Her power flows through our blades!

normal.name: Best of the Luma
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Thellora's Defender of the Meek, Vanguard of the Quick and Callessa's Blessed by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I will not let the Luma down. Ever.

normal.name: Thin Their Ranks
normal.effect: Reduces the number of areas required per Rush stack for Thellora's Plateaus of Unicorn Run ability by 50%.
normal.desc: We've cut them off! Take them while their numbers are low!

normal.effect: Increases the Constitution score of Thellora by 1.
normal.desc: We're not done here yet.

normal.name: Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Thellora by 2.
normal.desc: A tactician is only as good as their knowledge.

normal.name: Ferocious Charge
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Thellora's Strength of the Luma ability by 80%.
normal.desc: With me! Overwhelm them with our combined might! Make them fear us!

data.backstory: Jang Sao, a celestial voyager, traveled the Astral Planes for centuries collecting stars and painting galaxies with her cherished companion, Kwin. When Kwin departed, Jang Sao carried on her wishes of painting the cosmos. Now a wonderful artist, she immortalizes the heavens, reality, and most important of all, her friend.
data.name: Jang Sao

base.name: Star
base.description: Jang Sao throws a star at the nearest enemy.

ult.name: Starry Form
ult.description: Jang Sao transforms and shooting stars make her foes take more damage.
ult.long_description: Jang Sao transforms into her starry form for 15 seconds and fires shooting stars at her enemies, making them take 100% additional damage for the duration.

abilities.name: The Mysterious Wanderer
abilities.desc: Jang Sao increases the damage of all Champions in formation slots with 2 or fewer adjacent slots by 400%.

raw.name: The Mysterious Wanderer
raw.tip_text: Jang Sao increases the damage of all Champions in formation slots with 2 or fewer adjacent slots.

description.desc: Jang Sao increases the damage of all Champions in formation slots with $max_adj or fewer adjacent slots by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Star Collector
abilities.desc: Each time an enemy is defeated, there is a 1% chance it drops a star. Jang Sao collects these stars and increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by 1% for each star collected over all adventures, stacking additively. Caps at 4000000000 stacks.

raw.name: Star Collector
raw.tip_text: Jang Sao has a slim chance of collecting a star each time a monster is defeated, permanently increasing her damage buff.

description.desc: Each time an enemy is defeated, there is a $(amount___2)% chance it drops a star. Jang Sao collects these stars and increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by $(not_buffed amount)% for each star collected over all adventures, stacking additively. Caps at $max_stacks stacks.

abilities.name: Stellar Nursery
abilities.desc: Every 5 seconds, Jang Sao heals the 2 most damaged Champions in the formation for 100 health.

description.desc: Every $(tick_rate) seconds, Jang Sao heals the $(jangsao_stellar_nursery_target_count) most damaged Champions in the formation for $(amount) health.

abilities.name: Painter of Beauty
abilities.desc: For every Pigment assigned to equipment on Champions in the formation, the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer is increased by 10%, stacking multiplicatively. Pigments can be purchased in the Thayan Enclave Shop.

description.desc: For every Pigment assigned to equipment on Champions in the formation, the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer is increased by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively. Pigments can be purchased in the Thayan Enclave Shop.

specs.name: Wisdom of the Ages
specs.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a Wisdom of 13+, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Wisdom of the Ages
raw.specialization_description: Jang Sao prefers the company of those that are wise.

description.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a Wisdom of $(min_stat_amount___2)+, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Speed of Shooting Stars
specs.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a Dexterity of 15+, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Speed of Shooting Stars
raw.specialization_description: Jang Sao prefers the company of those that are quick.

description.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of The Mysterious Wanderer by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a Dexterity of $(min_stat_amount___2)+, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Moon Collector
specs.desc: In addition to collecting stars, Jang Sao collects moons. Each time an enemy is defeated, there is a 0.5% chance it drops a moon. Jang Sao collects these moons for the purpose of Star Collector, and they count as 5 stars.

raw.name: Moon Collector
raw.specialization_description: Jang Sao increases the chance of finding astronomical beauty by seeking out moons in addition to stars.

description.desc: In addition to collecting stars, Jang Sao collects moons. Each time an enemy is defeated, there is a $(amount)% chance it drops a moon. Jang Sao collects these moons for the purpose of Star Collector, and they count as $(broadcast_trigger_count) stars.

specs.name: Star Caller
specs.desc: Jang Sao fires 3 more stars from her lantern when she uses her Starry Form ultimate and the ultimate's damage debuff is multiplied by the number of stars fired, stacking additively.

raw.name: Star Caller
raw.specialization_description: Jang Sao increases the number of stars she launches when using her ultimate.

description.desc: Jang Sao fires $(amount) more stars from her lantern when she uses her Starry Form ultimate and the ultimate's damage debuff is multiplied by the number of stars fired, stacking additively.

specs.name: Night Runner
specs.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of Star Collector by a percentage equal to the number of stars she has collected on the current run.

raw.name: Night Runner
raw.specialization_description: Jang Sao increases her support abilities by the number of stars she has collected in the current adventure.

description.desc: Jang Sao increases the effect of Star Collector by a percentage equal to the number of stars she has collected on the current run.

items.name: Dawning Existence
items.description: I exist for a purpose I do not fully understand yet.

items.name: Cosmic Effigy
items.description: This is not just of the cosmos. It is the cosmos.

items.name: Exquisite Mask
items.description: Some say the tinkling of my star chains can be heard across the planes.

items.name: Adornment of the Cosmos
items.description: I understand now. I am ready.

items.name: Nightlight
items.description: If only Kwin were here.

items.name: Starlock
items.description: The stars will guide you...

items.name: A Divine Gift
items.description: The fuller the lamp gets, the farther hope spreads.

items.name: Nebula of Dreams
items.description: I will never lose my way with this, and neither shall others.

items.name: Path to Creation
items.description: We did not go where we simply wanted to. But where we needed to.

items.name: Star Mender
items.description: 'Of pathways and stars' is etched on the index.

items.name: Star Navigator
items.description: I hope it leads me back to you.

items.name: Celestial Orrery
items.description: Some art I display in frames. Most can only be displayed like this.

items.name: Tool of the Artist
items.description: From canvas to celestial void.

items.name: Everpainting Brush
items.description: Never needing to be dipped, I can work for as long as it takes.

items.name: Cosmological Brush
items.description: Plucked from the void itself and given form by the astral plane.

items.name: Marvelous Pigments
items.description: From simple flowers on a canvas to light-giving stars in the night sky.

items.name: Sketches Out of Time
items.description: The paint still looks fresh.

items.name: Entwined Eclipse
items.description: The Moon whispered to the Star...

items.name: Star Freckles
items.description: This means something. One day, I will understand it.

items.name: Lunation
items.description: All of time and space, within your imagination

items.name: Everdust
items.description: I've dreamt of moons and stars for as long as I've existed.

items.name: Star Drop
items.description: Fragile but mighty.

items.name: Gorgeous Giant
items.description: In another life, this could have been a star. But its beauty is still unmatched.

items.name: Night Scatterer
items.description: By Kwin's grace.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: My wants and needs come second to those of the cosmos.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: The stars will be with us; onward!

normal.name: The Astral Path
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's The Mysterious Wanderer ability by 20%.
normal.desc: The twinkling of the astral plane will guide us.

normal.name: Pathway to the Stars
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's The Mysterious Wanderer ability by 40%.
normal.desc: You may only walk amongst the stars if you truly know them.

normal.name: The Greater Journey
normal.effect: Increases the targeting of Jang Sao's The Mysterious Wanderer ability to now target formation slots with 3 or fewer adjacent slots.
normal.desc: Let us journey together.
effects: Increases the targeting of Jang Sao's The Mysterious Wanderer ability to now target formation slots with 3 or fewer adjacent slots

normal.name: Mystra's Star Circle
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Star Collector ability by 20%.
normal.desc: The stars are guiding us north. Quickly, we must follow.

normal.name: Amaunator's Belt
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Star Collector ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The Spine of the World is gorgeous this time of year.

normal.name: Purple Worm Nebula
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Stellar Nursery ability by 20%.
normal.desc: A nebula is the palette of the gods.

normal.name: Dragon Nebula
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Stellar Nursery ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The nebula's shape is not by chance. There is meaning.

normal.name: Fresh Paint
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Painter of Beauty ability by 40%.
normal.desc: The paint renews on its own. I do not know how or why.

normal.name: Time and Space
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Jang Sao's Wisdom of the Ages and Speed of Shooting Stars by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Nothing can be older. Nothing can be faster.

normal.name: Emerging Artist
normal.effect: Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each pigment applied to Jang Sao, stacking additively.
normal.desc: Let the paints come to life with your brush.

data.backstory: A devoted cleric of Shar, goddess of darkness and loss, Shadowheart agreed to have her memories wiped as part of a holy mission. Now its sole survivor, she must deliver a powerful relic back to her kin in order to win Shar's love and have her memories restored - but all the while, she is tormented by strange, painful magic that she struggles to understand.
data.name: Shadowheart

base.name: Sacred Flame
base.description: Shadowheart casts Sacred Flame on a random enemy, dealing 1 hit.

base.name: Guidance
base.description: Shadowheart casts Guidance on your BUD-setting Champion, increasing their next attack's damage.

ult.name: Absolute Sanctuary
ult.description: Shadowheart's mysterious relic prevents all damage for a short while.
ult.long_description: Shadowheart's mysterious relic strikes back enemies and prevents all damage to your Champions for a short while.

abilities.name: Twilight Trickery
abilities.desc: Shadowheart increases the damage of Champions within two slots of her by 100%.

raw.name: Twilight Trickery
raw.tip_text: Shadowheart increases the damage of Champions within two slots of her.

description.desc: Shadowheart increases the damage of Champions within two slots of her by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Light In The Dark
abilities.desc: Shadowheart heals Champions in the two columns ahead of her for 10 every second.

raw.name: Light In The Dark
raw.tip_text: Shadowheart heals Champions in the two columns ahead of her every second.

description.desc: Shadowheart heals Champions in the two columns ahead of her for $(amount) every second.

abilities.name: Ceremorphosis
abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in Shadowheart's brain. Shadowheart increases the effect of Twilight Trickery by 100% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in Shadowheart's brain. Shadowheart increases the effect of Twilight Trickery by $(amount)% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Invoke Duplicity
abilities.desc: Shadowheart creates an Illusory Duplicate of herself which hides in the formation and applies Twilight Trickery and Light in the Dark to Champions relative to itself with half the range as normal. The duplicate positions itself in the same formation slot as the Champion in the formation with the highest DEX score. Ties go to the Champion in the highest bench seat.

description.desc: Shadowheart creates an Illusory Duplicate of herself which hides in the formation and applies Twilight Trickery and Light in the Dark to Champions relative to itself with half the range as normal. The duplicate positions itself in the same formation slot as the Champion in the formation with the highest DEX score. Ties go to the Champion in the highest bench seat.

conditions.desc: ^^Illusory Duplicate Source: $shadowheart_illusory_duplicate_target^Twilight Trickery Damage Buff: $shadowheart_twilight_trickery_amount%^Light In The Dark Heal Amount: $shadowheart_light_in_the_dark_amount

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Twilight Trickery - Increases the damage of $target by $amount%
Light In The Dark - Heals $target for $amount every second

specs.name: Guidance
specs.desc: Shadowheart's base attack is replaced by Guidance. When she casts Guidance, she increases the damage of your BUD-setting Champion's next attack by 200%. Stacks multiplicatively up to 5 times.

raw.name: Guidance
raw.specialization_description: Shadowheart stops attacking and instead casts Guidance, repeatedly...

description.desc: Shadowheart's base attack is replaced by Guidance. When she casts Guidance, she increases the damage of your BUD-setting Champion's next attack by $(not_buffed amount)%. Stacks multiplicatively up to $(max_stacks) times.

specs.name: Sister of Darkness
specs.desc: If Shadowheart's Illusory Duplicate is placed in the same slot as she is, the effect of Twilight Trickery is increased by 400%.

raw.name: Sister of Darkness
raw.specialization_description: Shadowheart's buff greatly increases when she's standing beside herself!

description.desc: If Shadowheart's Illusory Duplicate is placed in the same slot as she is, the effect of Twilight Trickery is increased by $(amount)%.

specs.name: Find Yourself
specs.desc: The effects of Twilight Trickery and Light In The Dark from Shadowheart's Illusory Duplicate are increased by 100% for each formation slot away from Shadowheart the duplicate is (following the shortest path), stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Find Yourself
raw.specialization_description: Sometimes you need to seek out the things you've forgotten.

description.desc: The effects of Twilight Trickery and Light In The Dark from Shadowheart's Illusory Duplicate are increased by $(not_buffed amount)% for each formation slot away from Shadowheart the duplicate is (following the shortest path), stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Only Option
items.description: There's something familiar about this, but right now it's all I have.

items.name: Cleric's Weapon
items.description: Hardly stylish, but it will get the job done.

items.name: Masterwork Mace
items.description: Trickery and stealth can't solve every problem.

items.name: Spear of Night
items.description: I am her Chosen. Her Dark Justiciar.

items.name: Nothing Special
items.description: One day I will be adorned in the armor of a Dark Justiciar.

items.name: Studded Leather
items.description: I've trained enough. I'm ready.

items.name: Sharran Chainmail
items.description: I wear these with honor and reverence for Shar.

items.name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate
items.description: I have proven myself and answered the Lady's highest calling.

items.name: Reminder of Loss
items.description: When I look at this, I can't help but feel sad. Is that Lady Shar's will?

items.name: Dark Lady's Headpiece
items.description: This may have little point, but it does look good on me, don't you think?

items.name: Eternal Night Circlet
items.description: Sometimes I see things in the darkness of this stone...

items.name: Justiciar Coronet
items.description: My pain is my power.

items.name: Familiar Weight
items.description: I have no memory of learning how to wield this, but my muscles do.

items.name: Sharran Buckler
items.description: For those who must fight but have not shown their usefulness to the Dark Lady.

items.name: Chionthar Shield
items.description: It doesn't represent Lady Shar, but it will have to do.

items.name: Pain's Affinity
items.description: Her Shadows strengthen and the darkness takes all.

items.name: Forgotten Memories
items.description: I don't know when or where I was given this. But I treasure it.

items.name: Amulet of Shar
items.description: Few recognize this, but those that are important do.

items.name: Anointed Pauldron
items.description: Blessed by the Mother Superior herself.

items.name: Idol of Shar
items.description: In the end, Lady Shar claims everything.

items.name: Sacred Mission
items.description: I must not fail the Mother Superior.

items.name: Mysterious Prism
items.description: I... I think it wanted me to find it.

items.name: Whispering Artefact
items.description: Something is trying to speak with me. Can it be trusted?

items.name: The Weapon
items.description: The Absolute means nothing to the power I wield.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Should I worry about the others in combat? I'm unconvinced.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Our pain will fuel us! The Absolute will be defeated!

normal.name: Shar's Blessing
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Twilight Trickery ability by 20%.
normal.desc: We are stronger in the shadows. Lead them into the dark!

normal.name: Nightbringer
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Twilight Trickery ability by 40%.
normal.desc: If we cannot find my Lady's darkness, then it shall find us.

normal.name: Eternal Night's Grace
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Twilight Trickery ability by 80%.
normal.desc: We must walk the path of shadows.

normal.name: Illithid Bond
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Ceremorphosis ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I can feel the tadpole moving around in my mind. It wants more.

normal.name: Absolute's Favor
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Ceremorphosis ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Our power comes from the enemy.

normal.name: Life from Pain
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Light In The Dark ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Help is not free. Suffering must be exchanged.

normal.name: Shar's Embrace
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Light In The Dark ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Through loss we are healed.

normal.name: Tadpole Assistance
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Ceremorphosis ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: It may be illithid, but it's our only chance for survival.

normal.name: Wound Master
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Shadowheart's Light In The Dark ability by 60%.
normal.desc: I prefer to cast these spells out of combat - but if it will help, so be it.

normal.name: Selûne's Grace
normal.effect: Changes Hero Alignment to Lawful Good for Shadowheart.
normal.desc: You can't cast a shadow without some light.

normal.name: Shar's Veil
normal.effect: Changes Hero Alignment to Lawful Evil for Shadowheart.
normal.desc: Lady Shar demands my heart, and I give it to her freely.

data.backstory: From a scion of a famed Baldurian house to a life of adventure on the road, Wyll's life as the monster hunter called the Blade of Frontiers has made him one of the beating hearts of the Sword Coast. While he has done great deeds for the Coast's people, the source of his power remains secret. The cambion Mizora drew Wyll into a warlock's pact in a moment with many lives at stake, and cursed him with the duty of hunting her enemies. Mizora only asks Wyll to sacrifice devilish creatures to her, but a cambion's ambitions are ever fickle, and Wyll wishes to escape the pact before its price grows cruel.
data.name: Wyll

base.name: Blade & Blast
base.description: Wyll stabs the closest foe, then casts Eldritch Blast on the lowest health enemy.

ult.name: Mizora
ult.description: Mizora causes Wyll to attack faster and deal ultimate damage for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: Wyll's patron Mizora appears behind him for 15 seconds, increasing his attack rate and making him deal ultimate damage for the duration.

abilities.name: Folk Hero
abilities.desc: Wyll increases the damage of all Champions that belong to the most represented species, class, or affiliation(s) in the formation by 400%. If there is a tie, all tied groups gain the buff, and Champions who are part of several groups can gain multiple stacks of the buff (up to a max of 4 stacks), stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.

raw.tip_text: Wyll increases the damage of Champions that belong to the most represented species, class, or affiliation(s).

If there is a tie, all tied groups gain the buff, and Champions who are part of several groups can gain multiple stacks of the buff (up to a max of $(max_stacks___2) stacks), stacking multiplicatively. Buffs apply to the pre-stack value.
