items.name: Well-Worn Weapon
items.description: This weapon taught me the importance of always keeping your blade sharp.

items.name: Flaming Fist Sword
items.description: I may be no Flaming Fist, but I am well-versed in swordplay.

items.name: The Blade of Frontiers
items.description: Oh, the stories this blade could tell...

items.name: Infernal Rapier
items.description: I can't tell if I'm wielding the blade or if the blade is wielding me...

items.name: A Turning Point
items.description: Moments like these need to be remembered.

items.name: Dragon Cultist Mask
items.description: I did everything I could to stop them.

items.name: Goblin Raider Shield
items.description: The day The Blade of Frontiers was born.

items.name: Legend of the Frontier
items.description: The original owner gave me more than a few scratches before I felled it.

items.name: Final Communications
items.description: These were the last letters I received from... never mind.

items.name: Old Stationery
items.description: Just some old papers. Nothing to worry about. Trust me.

items.name: Amn Abacus
items.description: A merchant gave me this for saving him near the Chionthar.

items.name: Baldurian Goblet
items.description: Wine just doesn't taste as good from anything else.

items.name: Poor Bastard
items.description: Karlach cuts down even her own.

items.name: Evidence of Karlach
items.description: I'll chase her to the ends of Avernus.

items.name: Singed Tentacle
items.description: Burned with the fires of the Hells. She's close.

items.name: Bloody Tabard of Tyr
items.description: These were good people. Karlach will pay for this.

items.name: A Replacement
items.description: I needed a new eye...

items.name: Sending Stone Eye
items.description: ...and Mizora wanted a shorter leash.

items.name: Mizora's Necklace
items.description: There are some things even Mizora isn't allowed to speak about.

items.name: Infernal Contract
items.description: I can still remember that night as if it just happened.

items.name: First Steps
items.description: Father wanted me ready from the start.

items.name: Wooden Sword and Shield
items.description: They aren't close to the real thing, but I pretended they were.

items.name: Padded Armour
items.description: Someone told me they knew me by my armour. Guess I have a look!

items.name: Infernal Robes
items.description: The blade now burns with a fiendish light.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I'd give my life to protect the frontiers. Some say I've already given more.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: It's not the blade you wield that matters. It's the people you defend with it.

normal.name: Team Player
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Folk Hero ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: The only way we'll survive is by working together.

normal.name: Renowned Heroes
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Folk Hero ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: They will tell our story up and down the Sword Coast!

normal.name: Creeping Presence
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Ceremorphosis ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Something's lurking in my mind. I can feel it.

normal.name: Illithid Connection
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Ceremorphosis ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Those visions... did you see them too?

normal.name: Fulfilling the Pact
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's A Heartless Contract ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I must do what my patron demands. That is all I can say.

normal.name: Become Legend
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Bravado ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: One day, all Baldurians will know the Blade of Frontiers!

normal.name: Near Myth
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Bravado ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Listen - the bards sing of my legend!

normal.name: Mizora's Chosen
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Pact of the Blade, Pact of the Chain and Pact of the Tome by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: With this power, nothing can stand in my way.

normal.name: The Heartless
normal.effect: Constructs are now one of Wyll's Favored Foes.
normal.desc: Nothing with a heart - that was the deal.

normal.name: The Soulless
normal.effect: Undead are now one of Wyll's Favored Foes.
normal.desc: Wretched things. I'll be your end!

normal.name: Distracting Imps
normal.effect: Imp distractions will spawn regardless of the current area.
normal.desc: We're being followed. I can feel it.

normal.name: Athlete
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Wyll by 1.
normal.desc: Not all my skills are gifts from the Hells.

normal.name: Mizora's Pawn

normal.name: Duke's Pride
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Wyll's Folk Hero ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: He is our shield, as I am his blade. Together, we protect the people of Baldur's Gate.

data.backstory: Freshly escaped from Hell, Karlach is finally free of the Archdevil Zariel - but not from the infernal engine Zariel planted in her chest. With her first taste of freedom in ten years, Karlach is eager to find a fix for the engine that's burning hotter and hotter before it burns her out completely. But even more premiere in her mind? Exploring, finding like-minded travelers, falling in love (or lust)... and taking revenge on the man who sold her to Zariel all those years ago.
data.name: Karlach

base.name: Greataxe Cleave
base.description: Karlach attacks the closest enemies with a swing of her greataxe.

ult.name: Soul Coin
ult.description: Karlach increases her rage cap to 100 stacks and her Infernal Engine's damage by 100%.
ult.long_description: Karlach absorbs the energy of a soul coin, increasing her rage cap to 100 stacks and her Infernal Engine's BUD-based damage by 100% until completing the next boss area.

abilities.name: Champion of Zariel
abilities.desc: As a Champion of Zariel, Karlach can be used in any Zariel Patron adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

description.desc: As a Champion of Zariel, Karlach can be used in any Zariel Patron adventure or variant, even if she would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

abilities.name: The Fury of Avernus
abilities.desc: Karlach increases the damage of all Champions (including herself) in her column and the column behind her by 100%.

raw.name: The Fury of Avernus
raw.tip_text: Karlach increases the damage of all Champions in her column and the column behind her.

description.desc: Karlach increases the damage of all Champions (including herself) in her column and the column behind her by $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Ceremorphosis

abilities.name: Rage

Karlach increases the effect of The Fury of Avernus by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Rage stack, stacking multiplicatively. Stacks are reduced by $(karlach_rage_reduce_percent)% when changing areas.

abilities.name: Infernal Engine
abilities.desc: While Karlach has 20 or more Rage stacks, she ignites on fire dealing 0.1 second of BUD-based damage for each Rage stack to any enemy that attacks her. (Stacking additively).

description.desc: While Karlach has $(min_rage_stacks___2) or more Rage stacks, she ignites on fire dealing $(not_buffed amount) second of BUD-based damage for each Rage stack to any enemy that attacks her. (Stacking additively)

abilities.name: An Experienced Gladiator
abilities.desc: Karlach increases the effect of The Fury of Avernus by 10% for each Zariel Patron variant you have completed, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Karlach increases the effect of The Fury of Avernus by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Zariel Patron variant you have completed, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Berserker
specs.desc: While Karlach has 20 or more Rage stacks, she increases her damage by 50% for each Rage stack she has, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Berserker
raw.specialization_description: Karlach's rage is filled with unmatched fury, increasing her damage.

description.desc: While Karlach has $(min_rage_stacks) or more Rage stacks, she increases her damage by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Rage stack she has, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Wildheart
specs.desc: While Karlach has 20 or more Rage stacks, she heals 10% of her max health every second.

raw.name: Wildheart
raw.specialization_description: Karlach's unrelenting ferocity while raging sustains her, healing some of the damage she's taken each second.

description.desc: While Karlach has $(min_rage_stacks) or more Rage stacks, she heals $(amount)% of her max health every second.

specs.name: Wild Magic
specs.desc: While Karlach has 20 or more Rage stacks, she increases the effect of The Fury of Avernus by 100% for each stack of Ceremorphosis, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Wild Magic
raw.specialization_description: Karlach embraces the mental connection she has with other Champions undergoing Ceremorphosis, increasing her support capabilities.

description.desc: While Karlach has $(min_rage_stacks) or more Rage stacks, she increases the effect of The Fury of Avernus by $(not_buffed amount)% for each stack of Ceremorphosis, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: After Battle Plans
items.description: Gods, it'll be good to have a cold drink again.

items.name: Party Supplies
items.description: You're having fun, aren't you?

items.name: Silver Spoon
items.description: Killed a Barlgura with one of these. Good for eye-scooping.

items.name: Clive, the Teddy Bear
items.description: Clivey baby boo boo boy I love you.

items.name: New Look
items.description: These'll help me blend in with the hordes.

items.name: Heat Resistant Pants
items.description: Fit for the temperaturally challenged.

items.name: Avernus Leathers
items.description: You don't want to know who I peeled this leather from. Trust me.

items.name: Helldusk Armour
items.description: I CAN FLY NOW?!

items.name: Starting Somewhere
items.description: Baby's first chopper.

items.name: Hand Axe
items.description: What it lacks in size, it makes up for by being better than nothing.

items.name: Masterwork Greataxe
items.description: Now that's what I call a greataxe! Let's let some blood.

items.name: Zariel's Gift
items.description: One devil's gift is another Karlach's curse.

items.name: Engine Conversion Plans
items.description: Zariel said she killed the smith who made these. Always was paranoid.

items.name: Infernal Iron
items.description: I know what to do with this! Or Dammon does, anyway.

items.name: Heart of Iron
items.description: Look at that. It's almost beautiful.

items.name: First Ink
items.description: When in Avernus...

items.name: 'Zariel'
items.description: The more I look at those six letters, the less they scare me.

items.name: 'Elitesquad'
items.description: I'm elite and I was in a squad, what's confusing about that?

items.name: 'Demonsbane'
items.description: Has a ring to it, doesn't it? Though I much prefer 'Cliffgate' myself.

items.name: Fuel Source
items.description: Hmm. If we find one with a bit more juice, we can rev things up.

items.name: Partially Spent Soul Coin
items.description: It's something, soldier, but this won't cut it.

items.name: Soul Coin
items.description: Let's kick things up a notch.

items.name: Stockpile
items.description: Should I use all of these at once? No. Right? No. Maybe...

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Karlach by 30%.
normal.desc: Think really carefully before you square up.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Karlach by 60%.
normal.desc: I'll try not to knock you out so hard you can't tap out.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: It doesn't matter what happens to me; just get those people out of here!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Line up, soldiers! We're going hunting.

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Karlach by 15%.
normal.desc: However many hits you think I can take - double that.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Karlach by 30%.
normal.desc: I've felt the fires of the hells - this is nothing!

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Karlach takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: COME ON!

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Karlach takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Ha! I was almost worried there for a second. Silly me.

normal.name: Rising Flames
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's The Fury of Avernus ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Feel that? Time to cook.

normal.name: Roaring Inferno
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's The Fury of Avernus ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Is that all you've got? HAHAHA!

normal.name: Fiendish Fury
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's Rage ability by 20%.
normal.desc: AAAARRRRGGGGHHHH!!!

normal.name: Demonsbane
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's Rage ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I've fought in the Blood War! YOU CAN'T TOUCH ME!

normal.name: Powered by Flames
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's An Experienced Gladiator ability by 40%.
normal.desc: This is going to hurt bad. I just want you to know that.

normal.name: Taunt
normal.effect: All Champions damage +100%. Karlach's attacks have a 50% chance to taunt enemies.
normal.desc: C'mere, cutie.

normal.name: Fiery Tempest
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's The Fury of Avernus ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Oh... You're going to regret that!

normal.name: Feels Good
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Karlach's Rage ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Screaming calms me down. You should try it, Soldier.

normal.name: Heart Ablaze
normal.effect: Increases the BUD damage of Karlach's Infernal Engine ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I don't think I've ever felt more powerful.
effects: Increases the BUD damage of Karlach's Infernal Engine ability by $amount%.

data.backstory: Presto is a bookish and timid teenager whose dreams of becoming a magician became reality when he was transported with his friends to the magical world of Dungeons & Dragons. He wields a capricious, unpredictable form of magic with his distinctive green magical hat. Presto is known for his inventive but sometimes uncontrollable magical solutions as he and his friends search for a way back home.
data.name: Presto

base.name: Presto's Hat
base.description: Presto takes his hat off, pulls out a random projectile, and throws it at the nearest enemy, dealing one hit.

ult.name: A Hatful of Havoc
ult.description: Presto fires assorted objects from his hat at his enemies.
ult.long_description: Presto fires assorted objects from his hat at his enemies, debuffing them and changing the weather.

abilities.name: Hesitant Helper
abilities.desc: Presto increases the damage of Champions in the two columns in front of him by 100%.

raw.name: Hesitant Helper
raw.tip_text: Presto prefers the rear of the formation as he buffs all Champions in the two columns directly in front of him.

description.desc: $source increases the damage of Champions in the two columns in front of him by $(amount)%

abilities.name: Hat of Many Spells
abilities.desc:
Presto's attacks cause monsters hit by them to take +100% damage, stacking multiplicatively up to 5 times. In addition, a secondary effect occurs depending on the projectile.  
>   
> Birthday Cake: The monster is slowed by 50% for 5 seconds.  
> Skateboard: The monster is knocked back a short distance.  
> Rotary Phone: The monster is stunned for 2.5 seconds.

description.desc: Presto's attacks cause monsters hit by them to take +$(amount___4)% damage, stacking multiplicatively up to 5 times. In addition, a secondary effect occurs depending on the projectile.^^Birthday Cake: The monster is slowed by 50% for 5 seconds.^Skateboard: The monster is knocked back a short distance.^Rotary Phone: The monster is stunned for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ultimate Hat Trick
abilities.desc:
Presto's ultimate is unlocked and has a random effect when used.  
>   
> Snowballs: Snowballs fire out at all enemies, dealing 1 ultimate hit to each monster and slowing them by 50% for 10 seconds. The weather changes to Snow.  
> Fireworks: A shower of bright colorful fireworks shoot out and explode all over the battlefield, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all monsters, and stunning them for 5 seconds. The weather changes to Fog.  
> Tornado: A tornado flies out of the hat and grows in size, dealing 1 hit to all monsters and knocking them back a medium distance. The weather changes to Rain.

description.desc: Presto's ultimate is unlocked and has a random effect when used.^^Snowballs: Snowballs fire out at all enemies, dealing 1 ultimate hit to each monster and slowing them by 50% for 10 seconds. The weather changes to Snow.^Fireworks: A shower of bright colorful fireworks shoot out and explode all over the battlefield, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all monsters, and stunning them for 5 seconds. The weather changes to Fog.^Tornado: A tornado flies out of the hat and grows in size, dealing 1 hit to all monsters and knocking them back a medium distance. The weather changes to Rain.

abilities.name: Component Scavenger
abilities.desc: Presto can help scavenge up to 2000 Modron Component Pieces from boss loot sacks. While this cap is not reached, Presto has a 10% chance of scavenging 1 Modron Component Piece each time a boss drops a loot sack. The cap increases by 20 every day.

raw.name: Component Scavenger
raw.tip_text: Presto has a chance to uncover Modron Component pieces with each defeated boss, with a cap that increases every day.

description.desc: Presto can help scavenge up to $presto_component_scavenger_max Modron Component Pieces from boss loot sacks. While this cap is not reached, Presto has a 10% chance of scavenging 1 Modron Component Piece each time a boss drops a loot sack. The cap increases by 20 every day.^^$presto_component_scavenger_description

specs.name: Humble Heroes
specs.desc: Presto increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less.

raw.name: Humble Heroes
raw.specialization_description: Presto works best with those with similar talent, preferring companions with less heroic ability scores.

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less.

specs.name: Junior Juggernauts
specs.desc: Presto increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by 100% for each Champion in the formation with an age of 20 or less.

raw.name: Junior Juggernauts
raw.specialization_description: Presto excels with Champions of a similar age to himself.

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation with an age of 20 or less.

specs.name: Magical Mastery
specs.desc: Presto increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a magic attack.

raw.name: Magical Mastery
raw.specialization_description: Presto is inspired by other Champions capable of powerful magical attacks.

description.desc: $source increases the damage bonus of Hesitant Helper by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a magic attack.

items.name: Weekend Outfit
items.description: Mom said this made me look handsome.

items.name: Common Earth Clothes
items.description: Can't wait to go to the amusement park!

items.name: Wizard Robes
items.description: Whoa! These are way cooler than what I wore to the amusement park!

items.name: Prestigious Robes
items.description: Dungeon Master says these are epic!

items.name: Lunchtime Blues
items.description: Oh man, not again!

items.name: Broken Specs
items.description: Anyone got some tape?

items.name: Resilient Glasses
items.description: I bet these could even withstand a barbarian attack!

items.name: Eyes of the Arcane
items.description: Whoa! I can see magic with these!

items.name: Arcane Inspiration
items.description: A great wizard might have worn this!

items.name: Green Cap
items.description: I want to wear this, but I'm allergic to dust.

items.name: Wizard Hat
items.description: I'll be the greatest wizard the world has ever seen!

items.name: Hat of Many Spells
items.description: Maybe I can find something that can defeat Tiamat with this!

items.name: Big Trouble
items.description: I've got a bad feeling about this...

items.name: Anti-Magic Cuff
items.description: What do you mean I can't do magic? That's all I do!

items.name: Amulet of Health
items.description: Thanks, Dungeon Master!

items.name: Gateway Mirror
items.description: Guys! Look! The amusement park is on the other side!

items.name: Tricks of the Trade
items.description: I've been a wizard since I was six!

items.name: At-Home Magic Set
items.description: This was a birthday present. I decided then to be the greatest magician ever!

items.name: Haversack
items.description: Wait, I didn't put this in here. This is Bobby's!

items.name: Merlin's Spellbook
items.description: I'm going to learn all of these!

items.name: After School Game
items.description: I always lost at this game!

items.name: Conjured Marbles
items.description: HA! Those bullywugs can't run on these!

items.name: Frisbee of Returning
items.description: Hank's going to love this!

items.name: Animated Tank
items.description: Bet Venger wasn't expecting this! ATTACK!

normal.name: Selflessness

normal.desc: Don't worry, gang! I've got this!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader

normal.desc: Don't give up, Uni! We can make it!

normal.desc: This place is scary. I don't want to go first...

normal.name: Morning Lineup
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Presto's Hesitant Helper ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I can help a lot better from back here.

normal.name: Hocus Delirium
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Presto's Hat of Many Spells ability by 20%. (Prestack)

normal.effect: Increases the effect of Presto's Hat of Many Spells ability by 40%. (Prestack)

normal.name: Spell Me A Spell
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Presto's Hat of Many Spells ability by 80%. (Prestack)

data.backstory: Dynaheir, a Wychlaran Invoker hailing from the distant land of Rashemen, travels with her stalwart bodyguard, Minsc. Dynaheir carries a deep-seated animosity toward the Red Wizards of Thay. The mere mention of these hated adversaries sparks a fiery determination in her eyes and a steely edge to her voice, underscoring the intensity of her commitment to the ongoing struggle between the Witches of Rashemen and the Red Wizards.
data.name: Dynaheir

base.name: An Old School Sling
base.description: Dynaheir attacks the closest enemy with her trusty sling.
base.long_description: Dynaheir attacks the closest enemy with her sling, dealing 1 hit.

ult.name: Lightning Bolt
ult.description: Dynaheir flings a lightning bolt at the toughest monster, damaging all enemies in a line.
ult.long_description: Dynaheir casts a lightning bolt through the target with the most health remaining, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all creatures in a wide line and stunning them for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: The Resolve of Rashemen
abilities.desc: Dynaheir increases the damage of all Champions in the formation with a CON of 15+ by 400% for each Champion affected by this ability, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: The Resolve of Rashemen
raw.tip_text: Dynaheir increases the damage of all Champions with a Constitution of 15 or higher. The more high Con Champions, the greater the buff!

description.desc: Dynaheir increases the damage of all Champions in the formation with a CON of 15+ by $amount% for each Champion affected by this ability, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Enemy of Thay
abilities.desc: Humanoid enemies are Dynaheir's Favored Foe. There is a 50% chance that an additional Red Wizard spawns with each wave in non-boss areas.

description.desc: Humanoid enemies are Dynaheir's Favored Foe. There is a $(amount___2)% chance that an additional Red Wizard spawns with each wave in non-boss areas.

abilities.name: Spoils of War
abilities.desc: All Favored Foes have a 25% chance to drop double quest items or count for double quest progress.

raw.name: Spoils of War
raw.tip_text: Dynaheir causes Favored Foes (like her dislike of Humanoid Red Wizards) to have a chance to drop double quest items.

description.desc: All Favored Foes have a $amount% chance to drop double quest items or count for double quest progress.

abilities.name: Fireball / Lightning Bolt
abilities.desc: Unlocks Dynaheir's Ultimate Attack. She alternates between casting Fireball and Lightning bolt.

description.desc: Unlocks Dynaheir's Ultimate Attack. She alternates between casting Fireball and Lightning bolt.

abilities.name: Defensive Position
abilities.desc: Dynaheir increases the bonus of The Resolve of Rashemen by 20% each time an ally is attacked, up to a maximum of 100 stacks. Stacks apply multiplicatively and reset when changing areas. If Minsc is in the formation, the base effect is increased to 44%.

description.desc: Dynaheir increases the bonus of The Resolve of Rashemen by $(not_buffed amount)% each time an ally is attacked, up to a maximum of $max_stacks stacks. Stacks apply multiplicatively and reset when changing areas. If Minsc is in the formation, the base effect is increased to $(override_amount___2)%

abilities.name: The Unapproachable East
abilities.desc: Champions in the front-most column of the formation have their Overwhelm increased to 25, if it wasn't already higher.

description.desc: Champions in the front-most column of the formation have their Overwhelm increased to $amount, if it wasn't already higher.

specs.name: Circle Magic
specs.desc: Champions that are adjacent to Dynaheir get +1 CON and the base effect of The Resolve of Rashemen is increased by 10%.

raw.name: Circle Magic
raw.specialization_description: Dynaheir uses her circle magic to increase her buff as well as the Constitution of nearby Champions.

description.desc: Champions that are adjacent to Dynaheir get +1 CON and the base effect of The Resolve of Rashemen is increased by $amount%.

specs.name: Iron Lord's Justice
specs.desc: Champions deal 1000% more damage against all Favored Foes.

raw.name: Iron Lord's Justice
raw.specialization_description: Dynaheir unites her companions to defeat everybody's Favored Foes.

description.desc: Champions deal $amount% more damage against all Favored Foes.

specs.name: Loyal Bodyguard
specs.desc: Minsc gains the Tanking role and is eligible for this adventure. His base health increases by 200%, and then further increases by 75% for every 50 areas completed in the current adventure, up to area 600. All other Champions' health is increased by 25% of Minsc's max health.

raw.name: Loyal Bodyguard
raw.specialization_description: Dynaheir teaches Minsc how to be a tank.

description.desc: Minsc gains the Tanking role and is eligible for this adventure. His base health increases by 200%, and then further increases by 75% for every 50 areas completed in the current adventure, up to area 600. All other Champions' health is increased by 25% of Minsc's max health.

items.name: Childhood Training
items.description: I was the scourge of small creatures all across Rashemen.

items.name: Old Slingshot
items.description: Not much in a real fight.

items.name: Adventurer's Sling
items.description: Spells aren't always the answer.

items.name: Enchanted Sling
items.description: I've yet to find a creature this cannot harm!

items.name: First Attempt
items.description: I carved this as a child. I pretended I was a Wychlaran.

items.name: Witch-Mask
items.description: Masks have power in ways many don't seem to know...

items.name: Rashemi Face-Veil
items.description: I remember the first time I wore this. All of my life had led to that.

items.name: Regal Asatheirr
items.description: All Wychlaran, past and present, are with me now.

items.name: Important Lead
items.description: By the three, I will hunt these monsters to the ends of Toril.

items.name: Robe Fragment
items.description: They were here - and not long ago. We must be quick.

items.name: Forged Thayan Missive
items.description: Finally, we can strike them where it hurts

items.name: Red Wizard Trophy
items.description: I carry this in remembrance of all the lives it took.

items.name: A Reminder of Home
items.description: Somehow, these still smell of Rashemen.

items.name: Rashemi Attire
items.description: Part of me misses wearing this. But I've moved on to greater robes.

items.name: Wychlaran Garments
items.description: This gives me the commanding presence I demand.

items.name: Robes of the Archmage
items.description: Can we do something about the red? I don't like red robes.

items.name: It Will Do
items.description: We have to eat, right?

items.name: Bland Rations
items.description: I think I'll be gathering the food from now on.

items.name: Aged Sjorl
items.description: Not your taste? Then you have bad taste.

items.name: Old Empires Fire Wine
items.description: The decanter is for Minsc. The glass is all I require.

items.name: Handy Components
items.description: I cast more than simple spells.

items.name: Fireball Components
items.description: I love when they group up!

items.name: Lightning Bolt Components
items.description: You worry about the frontline. I'll handle the ones in the back!

items.name: Wychlaran Component Pouch
items.description: The secrets of this pouch could reshape realities.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: My life is not worth more than stopping the Thayans...

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: The sun smiles on us! To victory!

normal.name: Promising Group
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's The Resolve of Rashemen ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I've traveled with worse. We can do this.

normal.name: Wychlaran Empowerment
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's The Resolve of Rashemen ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Just keep fighting - I'll make sure you have the power!

normal.name: Slain Dragon's Hoard
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's Spoils of War ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Who brought the Bag of Holding?

normal.name: Treasures of Bhaal
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's Spoils of War ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Careful - these could be cursed!

normal.name: Two by Three
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's Defensive Position ability by 20%.
normal.desc: This is most optimal for this situation.

normal.name: Triangle Formation
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's Defensive Position ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Minsc wants to go first - and I think we should let him.

normal.name: Empowering West
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's The Unapproachable East ability by 10.
normal.desc: Hold! We can weather this storm!

normal.name: Witchcraft
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's specializations by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: I'll do things my way - you do yours in your way.

normal.effect: Increases the effect of Dynaheir's specializations by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: You stand before a true Wychlaran.

normal.desc: You want me to put what in my brain?

data.backstory: The Dark Urge remembers nothing but a path paved with blood. Unimaginable cruelty whispers from within. Can he escape it? Would he even want to?
data.name: Dark Urge

base.name: Murderous Slash
base.description: The Dark Urge strikes nearby enemies with a slash of his dagger.

base.name: Murderous Slash (Storm Sorcery)
base.description: The Dark Urge strikes nearby enemies with a slash of his dagger.

base.name: Slay
base.description: The Dark Urge strikes nearby enemies, dealing 1 hit of ultimate damage.

ult.name: Form of the Slayer
ult.description: The Dark Urge transforms into the Slayer form for 15 seconds, dealing massive damage for the duration.
ult.long_description: The Dark Urge transforms into the Slayer form for 15 seconds, dealing massive damage for the duration. Sceleritas Fel, immune to damage, takes his place in the formation for the duration.

abilities.name: Dark Inheritance
abilities.desc: The Dark Urge is eligible to start in all adventures, even if the Patron, Variant, or other restrictions would say otherwise. He also does not interact with any Champion abilities or variant effects that are based on age.

description.desc: The Dark Urge is eligible to start in all adventures, even if the Patron, Variant, or other restrictions would say otherwise. He also does not interact with any Champion abilities or variant effects that are based on age.

abilities.name: The Urge
abilities.desc: Each time the Dark Urge defeats an enemy, he gains a Murder stack. The Dark Urge increases his damage by 0.1% for each Murder stack he has. Stacks persist between adventures.

raw.name: The Urge
raw.tip_text: The Dark Urge increases his damage each time he defeats an enemy, with a count that persists between adventures.

description.desc: Each time the Dark Urge defeats an enemy, he gains a Murder stack. The Dark Urge increases his damage by $(not_buffed amount)% for each Murder stack he has. Stacks persist between adventures.

abilities.name: Ceremorphosis
abilities.desc: Your formation gains one Ceremorphosis stack due to the mind flayer tadpole in the Dark Urge's brain. The Dark Urge increases his damage by 100% for each Ceremorphosis stack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Living on the Edge

description.desc: The Dark Urge has $(max_stacks___2) Outcast stacks, minus $(stack_reduction_per_champ_mult___2) stack for each adjacent Champion that does not have the DPS role. The Dark Urge increases his damage by $(amount)% for each Outcast stack, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.desc: The Dark Urge's Murderous Slash attack is empowered by lightning. This increases the range by 200% and deals up to 800% more damage to enemies based on how close they are to him.

raw.name: Divine Soul

raw.specialization_description: The Dark Urge suppresses his violent instincts, winning the approval of good Champions and gaining assistance from an unusual ally.

description.desc: The Dark Urge's alignment becomes Lawful Good, he gains the Control role and he unlocks the Withers' Resurrection ultimate, and deals $(not_buffed amount___2)% more damage for each Good Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: They Won't Need It

items.name: Traveler's Trousers

items.name: Storm Robes
items.description: Very stylish, milord. Could use some gore.

items.description: These really hold onto the blood, milord.

items.description: I don't know what you see in that Enver Gortash, Milord.

items.name: Noblestalk Mushroom
items.description: Oh, such fond, twisted memories of our dissection days.

items.description: Very wise, milord - now you can heal them and hurt them again!

data.backstory: Gale of Waterdeep was a prodigious archmage, his talents earning him the attention of Mystra, the goddess of magic. At her side, he learned all that mortals might accomplish with the Weave, in time earning his place as her lover, and her Chosen. And yet, he was not satisfied. In an attempt to prove he was ready for even greater power, he accidentally unleashed 'the orb' - a highly volatile fragment of pure Weave, corrupted by Netherese magic, which buried itself in his chest. Cast out by Mystra, humbled by his downfall, he does all he can to prevent the orb's cataclysmic detonation, watching for his chance to get back everything he lost, and more.

items.name: Fond Memories
items.description: Even at my lowest, playing with Tara lifted my spirits...

items.name: Ball of Retrieval
items.description: ...though the ball's purpose eluded her. I was always the one fetching it...

items.name: Cat Flap of Displacement
items.description: Tara comes and goes as she pleases. But she's always pleased to help me.

items.name: Ring of Evasion
items.description: A ring as evasive as Tara, when I asked how she obtained it...

items.name: These Old Things
items.description: Comfortable, practical, and relatively unsinged.

items.name: Wizarding Robes
items.description: Not as flashy as Elminster's, but at least they've plenty of pockets.

items.name: Robes of Increased Potency
items.description: I could get used to these. Elegant, but powerful - just like Tara.

items.name: Archmage's Accoutrements
items.description: Incredible! Every stitch is infused with Weave. Like wearing magic itself...

items.name: Nothing Much
items.description: I'd have preferred something with a library...

items.name: Camping Tent
items.description: ...but it will do. For now.

items.name: Crystal Ball
items.description: Handy for glimpsing the future. And also shaving.

items.name: Celestial Spyglass
items.description: I like gazing at the heavens. To remember. And to forget...

items.name: Crumpled Chapbooks
items.description: At least they're written in full sentences.

items.name: Well-thumbed Tomes
items.description: I've lost count of how many times I've read these. Still just as magical.

items.name: Magical Miscellany
items.description: A spell for all situations. And my improvements in the margins.

items.name: The Annals of Karsus
items.description: You can trust me with this - you have my word.

items.name: Boots of Ambiguous Enchantment
items.description: A little pick-me-up, for when any Weave will do...

items.name: Lonely Boot of Elvenkind
items.description: A snack-sized shoe for the wizard who travels light.

items.name: Boots of Very Fast Blinking
items.description: Blink and you'll miss me. But I'll always hit you.

items.name: Mystra's Grace
items.description: These were a gift from... well, never mind.

items.name: Cramped Jotter
items.description: Magical musings and mullings. Not my best handwriting.

items.name: Waterdhavian Quill
items.description: This was... well, it was expensive, let's leave it at that.

items.name: The Chosen's Earring
items.description: A symbol of Mystra's faith in me. Former faith, I suppose...

items.name: Wizard's Pouch
items.description: All manner of wizarding sundries. Pungent but powerful.

data.backstory: Diana was already a formidable gymnast when she and her friends were transported to the magical world of Dungeons & Dragons. Diana wields her Javelin Staff with determination and courage, harnessing its potent magic to triumph over countless obstacles. The confidence of this outspoken athlete propels her friends forward in their quest to return home.

data.backstory: Ulder Ravengard is the leader of the Flaming Fist and the Grand Duke of Baldur's Gate. His primary concerns are the stability and prosperity of Baldur's Gate, and he's been a voice of reason and common sense among the ruling council. In recent years, he has been a target of fiendish plots in unsuccessful attempts to take over the city.
data.name: Ravengard

data.backstory: Aeon, a Goliath of exceptional intellect and charm, masterfully intertwines her skills as an Artillerist Artificer and Bard of the College of Whispers. Operating under the guise of a master tinkerer, she is, in truth, a cunning spy and manipulative puppet master. Aeon owns the renowned Greenhow, a unique tavern where patrons are served by her intricate automata, while she sells mechanical devices and curios embedded with Sending Stones and other surveillance tools; her 'gifts' have managed to make their way into some of the most powerful homes in the North Ward of Waterdeep. Her strategy is brilliantly deceptive; she portrays herself as a flamboyant performer and entertainer, so vivid and engaging that none suspect her of orchestrating a grand network of espionage, controlling events from the shadows.
data.name: Aeon

items.name: An Emerging Interest
items.description: This is difficult for folks? Seems pretty easy to me.

items.name: Sparking Cane
items.description: Skill is one thing. The tools to properly protect yourself are another.

items.name: Artificer's Walking Stick
items.description: Leave them amazed, even if it's just by going for a walk.

items.name: Antimatter Blasting Cane
items.description: Reconsider that choice before you find out what my cane can really do.

items.name: Start of the Show
items.description: I once saw a showman that drew crowds from all around wear this...

items.name: Top Hat
items.description: ...and from that moment on I knew exactly how I wanted to present myself.

items.name: Hat of the Spymaster
items.description: As time went on my style and skills began to crossover...

items.name: Top Hat of Telepathy
items.description: ...until eventually, they became one and the same.

items.name: Spy's Protection
items.description: In this world, thoughts are not safe. I know that better than most.

items.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
items.description: There's a second feature of this item most don't think about. A backup plan.

items.name: Necklace of Intellect
items.description: I need my mind and my skills to be as sharp as they can be.

items.name: Bigby's Beneficent Bracelet
items.description: A recent gift from back home. Somewhere I haven't been in a long, long time.

items.name: A Fresh Idea
items.description: These were just something I made in my free time...

items.name: Music Box
items.description: ...but I saw a much greater potential for them.

items.name: Aeon's Wonderous Music Box
items.description: It's amazing the things people will just take into their homes.

items.name: Cosmic Wind-up
items.description: This one... this one is just for my own collection.

items.name: Elegant Disguise
items.description: People always think of spies in black leathers and hoods...

items.name: Glamoured Shawl
items.description: ...never in elegant formal wear out on the town.

items.name: Heels of Elvenkind
items.description: These had to be specially made, but it was completely worth it.

items.name: Gown of Whispers
items.description: Not even a hushed conversation escapes me while in this.

items.name: A New Friend
items.description: This was more of a test of my own skill than anything else.

items.name: Mark II Sparrow
items.description: But, to my surprise, it turned into a friend and companion.

items.name: Mark VII 'Deuce'
items.description: It took a while to find a form he was comfortable in...

items.name: Mark X Pseudodragon
items.description: ...but just wait until he sees what I've been working on for him.

data.backstory: Umberto Thornheart is the orphaned child of two infamous thieves, and saw his parents executed for their crimes. Rather than live on the streets, he was taken in by the very detective who arrested his parents, and eventually became a detective himself, hoping to protect the innocent and (perhaps) reform the guilty.
data.name: Umberto

abilities.name: Beehive Barrage
abilities.desc: Every second, Umberto's staff magically summons 1 swarming bees, which buzz around the staff, up to a maximum of 10 swarming bees. When an enemy attacks Umberto, he unleashes a swarming bee from the staff onto that enemy. When an enemy with one or more swarming bees is hit by any Champion, all their bees sting them, dealing 1s of BUD-based damage for each bee. A maximum of 5 swarming bees can swarm a single enemy. Bees persist until the enemy is defeated, or until Umberto is removed from the formation.

A maximum of $amount___2 swarming bees can swarm a single enemy. Bees persist until the enemy is defeated, or until Umberto is removed from the formation.

Every second, Umberto's staff magically summons $amount___3 swarming bees, which buzz around the staff, up to a maximum of $max_bees___3 swarming bees. abilities.name: Ongoing Investigation
abilities.desc:
Pick an Investigation to pursue. Umberto gains stacks of Clue, and can start another Investigation after the Investigation concludes. Each Clue stack increases Detective's Entourage by 50%, stacking multiplicatively. Caps at 100 stacks. Once you are capped, additional Investigations are not offered. Clue stacks persist between areas and reset when the adventure ends.> 
> Investigation 1: Rapid Reconnaissance  
> Umberto immediately gains 10 Clue stacks, but will lose all but 1 when he concludes his investigation in 2 hours.
> 
> Investigation 2: Steadfast Search  
> Umberto gains 1 Clue stack after every 2 hours, plus 3 Clue stacks when the investigation concludes in 8 hours.
> 
> Investigation 3: Thorough Inquiry  
> Umberto gains 1 Clue stack after every 3 hours, plus 17 Clue stacks when the investigation concludes in 24 hours.

Each Clue stack increases Detective's Entourage by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively. Caps at $max_stacks stacks. Once you are capped, additional Investigations are not offered. Clue stacks persist between areas and reset when the adventure ends.

raw.specialization_description: Umberto's command over his swarm intensifies, increasing the rate he can send bees towards his enemies.

description.desc: Umberto's Beehive Barrage increases the number of swarming bees spawned each second by $amount%, and when an enemy hits Umberto the maximum number of bees are unleashed. Finally, the damage per bee is increased by $(amount___2)%.

specs.name: More Clues
specs.desc: Increases the maximum number of Ongoing Investigation's Clue stacks by 50%.

raw.name: More Clues
raw.specialization_description: Umberto delves deeper into his investigations, empowering his allies during extended endeavors.

description.desc: Increases the maximum number of Ongoing Investigation's Clue stacks by $amount%.

specs.name: More Damage
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Detective's Entourage by 200%.

raw.name: More Damage
raw.specialization_description: Umberto just focuses on supporting his fellow Champions, ignoring his loyal bees and his important investigations.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Detective's Entourage by $amount%.

items.name: A Lifeline
items.description: When I could not see my potential...

items.name: Druidic Stave
items.description: ...Brenton Lonefire showed me who I could become.

items.name: Staff of the Hive
items.description: Apologies for the bees. Errr, they keep me company.

items.name: Honeycomb's Heart
items.description: The magic of this staff seems to keep the bees happier.

items.name: What It Takes
items.description: Part of learning survival is understanding what little you need to live.

items.name: Foraging Spoils
items.description: This was a feast on some of Brenton's expeditions.

items.name: Harrowdale Pie
items.description: They may be known for their fishing, but their bakers are marvelously skilled.

items.name: King Salmon
items.description: It's bulky, yes, but the inconvenience will be worth it once it's cooked up.

items.name: Natural Understanding
items.description: Death is a part of nature...

items.name: Skinning Knife
items.description: ...and nothing should go to waste.

items.name: Obsidian Blade
items.description: A finer tool makes a cleaner job.

items.name: Dragontooth Dagger
items.description: I am not a slayer of dragons, but an old friend was. I cherish this gift.

items.name: Constant Reminder
items.description: Err, I only need them when reading...

items.name: Spectacles
items.description: ...and sometimes writing - but besides those, I am fine!

items.name: Journal & Emerald Pen
items.description: Not everything needs to be kept floating around in my grey matter.

items.name: Disguise Kit
items.description: Sometimes, you need more than guile and deception to solve a case.

items.name: Her Favorite Set
items.description: Incredible that she kept these after all these years.

items.name: Thieves' Tools
items.description: We found these in her hideout after she... Well, you know what happened.

items.name: Dagger of Venom
items.description: Cruel for my tastes, but for Sliver, this was just another tool.

items.name: Zhentarim Medallion
items.description: Errr, there was plenty of other evidence. I needed to hold onto this.

items.name: Favorite Scent
items.description: The bear may be full of rage, but a whiff of these will always calm me.

items.name: Cormyrean Flowers
items.description: I learned these calmed me down on... Errr, a date. That is all I will say.

items.name: Enchanted Honeycomb
items.description: The bees of my staff make the bear's most favorite of treats.

items.name: Jar of Endless Honey
items.description: The case was difficult, but the reward was beyond my wildest dreams!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I will not rest until the killer is found.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: We will put them behind bars like so many villains before them.

normal.name: Tough
normal.effect: Increases the health of Umberto by 15%.
normal.desc: The bear is NOT happy.

normal.name: Resilient
normal.effect: Increases the health of Umberto by 30%.
normal.desc: I can take more hits than you, I can assure you.

normal.name: Defensive Duelist
normal.effect: Umberto takes 5 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Errr, is this all you brought?

normal.name: Calm Under Pressure
normal.effect: Umberto takes 10 more Enemies attacking to get overwhelmed.
normal.desc: Do not boil your grey matter - it is not a soup.

normal.name: By the Book
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Umberto's Detective's Entourage ability by 20%.
normal.desc: You all are catching on fast!

normal.name: Make Haste
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Umberto's Detective's Entourage ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Don't let your grey matter go to waste. That's what Brenton always told me.

normal.name: Not a Game
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Umberto's Ongoing Investigation ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I am sure you are all wondering why I gathered you here...

normal.name: Unlikely Companions
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Umberto's Law's Alliance, Family of Orphans and Call of the Wardens by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Your differences do not matter - we have a killer to find!

normal.name: Taunt
normal.effect: All Champions damage +100%. Umberto's attacks have a 50% chance to taunt enemies.
normal.desc: Now you have angered the bear.

normal.name: Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Umberto by 2.
normal.desc: I only remember the things I need.

normal.name: Woken the Hive
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Umberto's bees by 80%.
normal.desc: You've done it now!

normal.name: Mounting Evidence
normal.effect: Adds 40 Clue Stacks to Umberto's Ongoing Investigation.
normal.desc: If you search their bags, you will find plenty of evidence to put them away.

data.backstory: Bobby is the youngest of the group that was transported to the magical world of Dungeons & Dragons. As a brave and loyal Barbarian, he wields a powerful magical club that enhances his strength. Bobby has close ties to his sister Sheila and his pet unicorn, Uni. Despite his impulsiveness, Bobby's courage and determination are key assets in the search to find the way back home.
data.name: Bobby

base.name: Thunder Club
base.description: Bobby swings his club at the closest enemy.

ult.name: Bobby-quake
ult.description: Bobby strikes the ground with his club, stunning and knocking back all enemies.
ult.long_description: Bobby strikes the ground with his club, knocking all enemies up and back and stunning them for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Critical Hit
abilities.desc: Bobby's base chance to Critical Hit is 20%.

description.desc: Bobby's base chance to Critical Hit is $(amount)%.

abilities.name: Charge Into Battle
abilities.desc: Bobby increases his damage by 100% for each column behind him, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Bobby increases his damage by $(amount)% for each column behind him, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Uni, the Unicorn
abilities.desc: Uni takes her place next to Bobby. Uni increases the damage of Bobby and all other Champions next to her by 100%. If Uni is in Dungeon Master's formation slot, this is further increased by 400%.

raw.name: Uni, the Unicorn
raw.tip_text: Bobby's pet unicorn Uni supports all Champions that are next to her.

description.desc: Uni takes her place next to Bobby. Uni increases the damage of Bobby and all other Champions next to her by $(amount___2)%. If Uni is in Dungeon Master's formation slot, this is further increased by $(amount___5)%.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Increases the damage of $target by $amount%

abilities.name: Now We're Talking
abilities.desc: Whenever Bobby lands a Critical Hit, the effect of Charge Into Battle is increased by 100%, stacking multiplicatively up to 10 times and resetting when changing areas.

description.desc: Whenever Bobby lands a Critical Hit, the effect of Charge Into Battle is increased by $(amount)%, stacking multiplicatively up to 10 times and resetting when changing areas.

abilities.name: Scales of Tiamat Scavenger
abilities.desc: Bobby can help scavenge up to 5000 additional Scales of Tiamat from boss loot sacks. While this cap is not reached, Bobby has a 10% chance of scavenging 10 Scales of Tiamat each time a boss drops a loot bag. The cap increases by 150 every day.

raw.name: Scales of Tiamat Scavenger
raw.tip_text: Bobby has a chance to uncover Scales of Tiamat with each defeated boss, with a cap that increases every day.

description.desc: Bobby can help scavenge up to $(current_scavenge_cap bobby_scale_scavenger floor) additional Scales of Tiamat from boss loot sacks. While this cap is not reached, Bobby has a $amount% chance of scavenging 10 Scales of Tiamat each time a boss drops a loot bag. The cap increases by $cap_increase_per_day every day.

conditions.desc: ^^Scales of Tiamat Scavenged: $(stat_value_unformatted bobby_scales_collected 0 none) ($(stat_value_unformatted bobby_scales_collected_this_adventure 1 none) this adventure)

specs.name: Stunning Strength
specs.desc: Bobby gains the Control role and he increases his damage by 100%. When Bobby scores a Critical Hit, the enemies are also knocked back and stunned for 5 seconds.

raw.name: Stunning Strength
raw.specialization_description: Bobby impulsively focuses on his damage dealing role by stunning his opponents when he scores critical hits.

description.desc: Bobby gains the Control role and he increases his damage by $(amount)%. When Bobby scores a Critical Hit, the enemies are also knocked back and stunned for 5 seconds.

specs.name: Group Charge
specs.desc: Bobby's Charge Into Battle now also increases the damage of all Champions behind Bobby by $(amount)% of the buff it provides to Bobby.

raw.name: Group Charge
raw.specialization_description: Bobby bravely focuses on his support role by leading the heroes behind him into the battle.

description.desc: Bobby's Charge Into Battle now also increases the damage of all Champions behind Bobby by $(amount)% of the buff it provides to Bobby.

specs.name: Not So Low
specs.desc: Bobby increases the effect of his first Specialization choice by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Not So Low
raw.specialization_description: Bobby focuses on Champions who have low total ability scores.

description.desc: Bobby increases the effect of his first Specialization choice by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.specialization_description: Bobby works best with other young Champions.

description.desc: Bobby increases the effect of his first Specialization choice by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation that is 20 years old or younger, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Strong Armed
specs.desc: Bobby increases the effect of his first Specialization choice by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a Strength of 15 or higher, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Strong Armed
raw.specialization_description: Bobby flexes his muscles with other strong Champions.

description.desc: Bobby increases the effect of his first Specialization choice by $(amount)% for each Champion in the formation with a Strength of 15 or higher, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Mom's Picks
items.description: Mom says I get to pick out my clothes next year!

items.name: Weekend Clothes
items.description: Mom said to not get these dirty - oh well!

items.name: Barbarian Gear
items.description: Sheila - look how cool I am in this!

items.name: Clothes of the Harvest
items.description: That golden crow is never gonna suspect this!

items.name: Home Run
items.description: Did you see how far I hit that one?!

items.name: Baseball Bat
items.description: I promise not to break this one!

items.name: Sturdy Club
items.description: I could hit so many home runs with this!

items.name: Magical Bonking Club
items.description: Tiamat won't stand a chance against this!

items.name: A Time of Fear
items.description: I was so scared I was going to lose you, Uni!

items.name: Shed Horn
items.description: No matter what, I'll always have this to remind me of Uni.

items.name: Uni Hair
items.description: Uni, you're shedding everywhere!

items.name: Dragonbane Wreath
items.description: That old man said it would bring Uni luck - and he was right!

items.name: Go Fasters
items.description: I can round the bases faster than anyone else on the team!

items.name: School Shoes
items.description: It took me forever to get my mom to let me wear these to school!

items.name: Leather Boots
items.description: I miss my laces, but the fur is cool!

items.name: Boots of Wheat
items.description: I feel like that scarecrow from that old movie!

items.name: Know Your Limits
items.description: Dungeon Master said that I need to know when to run away...

items.name: Amulet of Protection
items.description: ...but this is for when I don't!

items.name: Terri's Heart Necklace
items.description: I'll always remember...

items.name: Kelek's Amulet
items.description: Kelek will NEVER get this back!

items.name: Rally Time
items.description: We need a little extra help! Everyone flip your caps!

items.name: Baseball Cap
items.description: No, we can't clean it! It's lucky!

items.name: Helm of the Barbarian
items.description: Dungeon Master says I need to be careful - I could put someone's eye out!

items.name: Goddess Touched Helm
items.description: My head isn't just for thinking - it's a weapon!

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Bobby by 30%.
normal.desc: I'm not old enough to go inside - but I'll kick your butt in the street!

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Bobby by 60%.
normal.desc: You won't BELIEVE how far I'm gonna throw you!

normal.name: Tactical Prowess
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Bobby by 5%.
normal.desc: Okay, Uni. You go around and distract them. I'll bonk 'em on the head!

normal.name: Battle Expertise
normal.effect: Additively increases the Crit Chance of Bobby by 10%.
normal.desc: I've fought a battle or two before - don't worry!

normal.name: Cataclysmic Strike
normal.effect: Increases the Crit Damage of Bobby by 60%.
normal.desc: Now we're talking!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: You'll have to go through me to get to Uni!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Uh, usually Hank handles this stuff. But - we can do this! I know it!

normal.name: Lead the Party
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Bobby's Charge Into Battle ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Don't worry - I'll go in first and you all sweep up!

normal.name: Lead the Charge
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Bobby's Charge Into Battle ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Kelek can't stop all of us! Let's GO!

normal.name: Lead the Unicorns
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Bobby's Charge Into Battle ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: FOR UNI!

normal.name: Oh, Uni!
normal.effect: Increases the base damage of Bobby's Uni, The Unicorn ability by 20%.
normal.desc: You're always getting into so much trouble, Uni. But we still love you!

normal.name: Uni, Watch Out!
normal.effect: Increases the base damage of Bobby's Uni, The Unicorn ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Uni, RUN! I'll protect you!

normal.desc: Go with Dungeon Master. He'll keep you safe, okay?

normal.name: Barbarian Confidence

normal.desc: I'm just like that one barbarian from that movie!

normal.name: Barbarian Strength

normal.desc: Just because I'm small doesn't mean I can't lift this boulder!

normal.desc: NO ONE TREATS UNI LIKE THAT!

normal.desc: All right, so we take turns picking players. Then you'll decide...
effects: Increases the effect of Bobby's Not So Low, Still Growing Up, and Strong Armed specializations by $amount%.

data.backstory: Once the Lieutenant of Vecna, Kas betrayed his former master in a fight resulting in the dreaded artifacts, the Hand and Eye of Vecna. Kas is a vampire, legendary swordfighter, and ruthless warlord, and he is driven primarily by one thing: his hatred for Vecna.
data.name: Kas

base.name: Vengeful Swing
base.description: Kas attacks the closest enemy and other nearby foes with a sweep of his sword.
base.long_description: Kas moves up to the closest enemy and swings his sword, dealing one hit to all enemies in a small area.

ult.name: Rise, Fallen Soldier!
ult.description: Kas summons two specters that deal ultimate damage each second for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: Kas summons two specters that move towards enemies, dealing ultimate damage each second for 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Vampire Lord
abilities.desc: Kas is Undead and counts as "dead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions, but "alive" for all other purposes. Via his abilities, Kas may cause one or more other Champions in the formation to become his Vampire Spawns, which are also Undead.

description.desc: Kas is Undead and counts as "dead" for the purposes of effects that care about dead Champions, but "alive" for all other purposes. Via his abilities, Kas may cause one or more other Champions in the formation to become his Vampire Spawns, which are also Undead.

abilities.name: Born Into Evil
abilities.desc: Kas increases his damage by 100% for each Evil Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Born Into Evil
raw.tip_text: Kas increases his damage for each Evil Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: Kas increases his damage by $(amount)% for each Evil Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Mortal Pawns
abilities.desc:
Every time an area is completed, Kas gains Pawn stacks equal to the number of Champions in the formation that are not one of his Vampire Spawns. Each Pawn stack increases the effect of Born Into Evil by 0.5%, stacking multiplicatively.   
> Non Vampire Spawn Champions: $(upgrade_stacks_total 15620,3).

description.desc: Every time an area is completed, Kas gains Pawn stacks equal to the number of Champions in the formation that are not one of his Vampire Spawns. Each Pawn stack increases the effect of Born Into Evil by $(amount___2)%, stacking multiplicatively. ^Non Vampire Spawn Champions: $(upgrade_stacks_total 15620,3)

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.desc: When an Undead Champion in the formation attacks, they regain 50 Hit Points.

description.desc: When an Undead Champion in the formation attacks, they regain $(amount) Hit Points.

abilities.name: Spawn of Kas
abilities.desc: When a Champion that is not already Undead dies, they immediately resurrect at full health as a Vampire Spawn, counting as Undead for the rest of the adventure. The effect of Born Into Evil is increased by 100% for each Undead Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Spawn of Kas
raw.tip_text: When a Champion that isn't Undead is defeated, Kas brings them back as an Undead Vampire Spawn. Undead Champions also heal with every attack.

description.desc: When a Champion that is not already Undead dies, they immediately resurrect at full health as a Vampire Spawn, counting as Undead for the rest of the adventure. The effect of Born Into Evil is increased by $(amount___2)% for each Undead Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Rise, Fallen Soldier!
abilities.desc: Unlocks Kas' Rise, Fallen Soldier! Ultimate Attack.

description.desc: Unlocks Kas' Rise, Fallen Soldier! Ultimate Attack

specs.name: Kas the Bloody Handed
specs.desc: Kas increases the effect of Life Drain by 100% and Evil Champions attack faster as their base attack cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

raw.name: Kas the Bloody Handed
raw.specialization_description: Kas' Evil nature improves the healing abilities of his thralls.

description.desc: Kas increases the effect of Life Drain by $(amount)% and Evil Champions attack faster as their base attack cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

specs.name: Kas the Betrayer
specs.desc: Kas' damage against Boss enemies is increased by 100%, and the effect of Born Into Evil is increased by 100% for each Undead Champion in the formation.

raw.name: Kas the Betrayer
raw.specialization_description: Betraying those in charge is second nature for someone like Kas.

description.desc: Kas' damage against Boss enemies is increased by $(amount)%, and the effect of Born Into Evil is increased by $(amount___2)% for each Undead Champion in the formation.

effect_keys.total_title: Total Buff to Born Into Evil

specs.name: Kas the Destroyer
specs.desc: Increases the effect of Born Into Evil by 100%. In addition, Champions adjacent to Kas gain the Evil tag. This does not affect their other alignment tags, and doesn't affect whether they are eligible for the adventure.

raw.name: Kas the Destroyer
raw.specialization_description: When in doubt, choose the evil path.

description.desc: Increases the effect of Born Into Evil by $(amount)%. In addition, Champions adjacent to Kas gain the Evil tag. This does not affect their other alignment tags, and doesn't affect whether they are eligible for the adventure.

items.name: Dark Tidings
items.description: In death, they offered me a new life. I would have been a fool to deny them.

items.name: Tendrils of Darkness
items.description: I can feel their influence on the fringes of my mind...

items.name: Will of the Dark Powers
items.description: ...they need me to spread darkness across the multiverse. And I will.

items.name: Crown of Lies
items.description: I will be the heart of darkness within the light of hope.

items.name: Memories of Glory
items.description: I still remember the feeling of the blade slicing his neck.

items.name: Death of Vecna
items.description: The look of terror on his decapitated head.

items.name: The Final Battle
items.description: The sight of his lifeless body collapsed.

items.name: Painting of Victory
items.description: How good the rage felt as the monster realized he had lost.

items.name: Former Banner
items.description: I once proudly rode under this banner.

items.name: Symbol of Vecna
items.description: The symbol strikes fear into the hearts of countless across the multiverse.

items.name: Hand of Vecna
items.description: I do not care of its power - this will never be used against me again.

items.name: Eye of Vecna
items.description: Sometimes I feel as if he can still see me through it...

items.name: The Key to Power
items.description: No longer will I hide in the shadows. My name will be feared once again.

items.name: Two of Seven
items.description: Those fools suspect nothing...

items.name: Four of Seven
items.description: ...soon they will bring me everything I need.

items.name: The Rod of Seven Parts
items.description: Soon, my friend, you will be free.

items.name: Start Down a Dark Path
items.description: How many did I kill with one of these? Not just on the battlefield...

items.name: Lieutenant Sword
items.description: ...but in the towns and cities Vecna claimed in his conquest.

items.name: Vengeful Sword
items.description: Into this blade, I pour my anger, my rage, and my vengeance.

items.name: Sword of Kas
items.description: It urged me to kill him. Haunted me with the thoughts of his death.

items.name: A Piece of Home
items.description: The Dark Power granted me leave from Tovag....

items.name: Grave Dirt
items.description: ...but I cannot exist far from its soil.

items.name: Symbol of Kas
items.description: I found this just after Tovag was created. Do the Dark Power mock me?

items.name: Book of the Vampyr
items.description: A gift from Darkon so I may learn about my new form of dread...

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Kas by 30%.
normal.desc: I do not brawl in taverns - I feast on mortal fools.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Kas by 60%.
normal.desc: As my fangs sink into your neck - I want you to remember your life one last time.

normal.name: Born in Darkness
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Born Into Evil ability by 20%.
normal.desc: The Darkness made me who I am. It molded me into the man I am today.

normal.name: Evil Begets Evil
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Born Into Evil ability by 40%.
normal.desc: On its own, it grows. With many, it flourishes.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Born Into Evil ability by $amount%

normal.name: Familiars
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Mortal Pawns ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Mortals still serve some purposes.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Mortal Pawns ability by $amount%

normal.desc: Some mortals are more devoted than others.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Mortal Pawns ability by $amount%

normal.desc: Take what you need from these mortals - life and all.

normal.name: Sanguine Wine
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Life Drain ability by 40%.
normal.desc: What is a man?
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Life Drain ability by $amount%

normal.name: Live Again
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Spawn of Kas ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Drink. And you will live forever.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Spawn of Kas ability by $amount%

normal.name: My Creatures
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Spawn of Kas ability by 80%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: To do my bidding and to be my jackals when I want to feed.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Spawn of Kas ability by $amount%

normal.name: Dark Powers' Embrace
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kas' Kas the Bloody Handed, Kas the Betrayer, and Kas the Destroyer specializations by 40%. Increases the effect of Kas's Kas the Betrayer ability by 40%. Increases the effect of Kas's Kas the Destroyer ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I am the vengeance in your heart. I am the rage in your veins.
effects: Increases the effect of Kas' Kas the Bloody Handed, Kas the Betrayer, and Kas the Destroyer specializations by $amount%.

normal.name: The Sword of Kas
normal.effect: Kas' damage is increased by 400% and his base attack cooldown is reset at the start of every area.
normal.desc: The voice... it's clearer now... it... it wants your death.
effects: Kas' damage is increased by 400% and his base attack cooldown is reset at the start of every area.

normal.name: Stake to the Heart
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Kas by 400%. Kas' attacks prevent the target from healing for 400 seconds.
normal.desc: ARGH! HOW DARE YOU! I will consume you in my rage!
effects: Kas' attacks prevent the target from healing for $amount seconds

normal.name: Weapon Master

data.backstory: Minthara, once a House Matron from the esteemed House Baenre in Menzoberranzan, was cast aside by the Absolute after failing to recover a powerful and mysterious artifact. Having broken free from the Absolute's control, she now harbors an intense hatred for her former master. Fueled by vengeance and a desire to reclaim her lost honor, Minthara channels her dark powers and cunning to oppose the Absolute and any who stand in her way.
data.name: Minthara

base.name: Double Maces
base.description: Minthara dashes toward the healthiest enemy and damages nearby foes with a swing of her maces.

ult.name: Spider's Lyre
ult.description: A summoned Drider attacks all enemies, potentially completing the current area.
ult.long_description: Minthara summons Kar'niss the Drider to attack all enemies. In a non-boss area, the Champions advance to the next area if Kar'niss defeats at least one enemy and no enemies remain after the attack.

abilities.name: Noble of Menzoberranzan
abilities.desc: Minthara gains a Strife stack for each Evil Champion in the formation, including herself. Minthara increases the damage of these Champions by 100% for each Strife stack, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Noble of Menzoberranzan
raw.tip_text: Minthara buffs Evil Champions, and these abilities improve as more Evil Champions are in the formation.

conditions.desc: Minthara gains a Strife stack for each Evil or Neutral (Good/Evil axis) Champion in the formation, including herself. Minthara increases the damage of these Champions by $(amount)% for each Strife stack, stacking multiplicatively.

Minthara gains a Strife stack for each Evil Champion in the formation, including herself. Minthara increases the damage of these Champions by $(amount)% for each Strife stack, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Soul Branding
abilities.desc: When Minthara damages an enemy, they take 100% additional damage from all subsequent attacks, stacking multiplicatively up to the number of Strife stacks Minthara has.

raw.name: Soul Branding
raw.tip_text: Minthara debuffs enemies she hits, causing them to take more damage from subsequent attacks.

description.desc: When Minthara damages an enemy, they take $(amount)% additional damage from all subsequent attacks, stacking multiplicatively up to the number of Strife stacks Minthara has.

conditions.desc: ^^Max Stacks: $minthara_max_stacks

abilities.name: Oath of Vengeance
abilities.desc:
Minthara provides benefits based on the number of Strife stacks she has.  
> 3+ Strife stacks: Unyielding: Minthara increases her health by 10% for each Strife stack she has, stacking additively.  
> 5+ Strife stacks: Piercing: Enemies affected by at least two Soul Branding stacks lose an additional armor or segmented health piece when they are attacked.  
> 7+ Strife stacks: Scarring: When Minthara damages an enemy, she immediately applies the maximum possible number of Soul Branding stacks.  
> 9+ Strife stacks: Nobility: Increases the base value of Noble of Menzoberranzan by 400%.

description.desc: Minthara provides benefits based on the number of Strife stacks she has.^3+ Strife stacks: Unyielding: Minthara increases her health by $(amount___2)% for each Strife stack she has, stacking additively.^5+ Strife stacks: Piercing: Enemies affected by at least two Soul Branding stacks lose an additional armor or segmented health piece when they are attacked.^7+ Strife stacks: Scarring: When Minthara damages an enemy, she immediately applies the maximum possible number of Soul Branding stacks.^9+ Strife stacks: Nobility: Increases the base value of Noble of Menzoberranzan by $(amount___5)%.

data.backstory: Wren woke up in the Mortuary with the Champions and, like them, had no memory of who she was. The talking skull, Morte, gave her a name and from there she journeyed with the Champions on a quest to discover who they were. Along the way, disaster struck twice and Wren was killed - but each time she quickly returned in the form of herself from somewhere else in the Multiverse!

abilities.name: Instability
abilities.desc: All three of Wren's glitch forms yearn to be utilized. For each area completed, all three forms gain a yearning stack, which generally persists between adventures. Wren's chosen form buffs her Hero's Call by 100% for each yearning stack for her chosen form, stacking additively. Yearning stacks for any glitch form she has specialized in during your current adventure are set to zero at the end of the adventure.

items.description: Handed down through the generations by my family.

items.description: My great-grandfather made this. He poured all of his hope for my family into it.

items.description: No matter how dark things get, I will never give up my hope.

items.description: The red dragon's flames would have for sure ended me...

items.name: Ring of Evasion
items.description: ...if it were not for this gift from my brother.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: In an ancient tomb, in a sunlit altar, I found the protection I needed.

items.name: Ring of Spell Turning
items.description: They told me I couldn't block spells, but nothing about returning them!

items.name: Lost Wanderer
items.description: Some believe they know their destination, but cannot find the path...

items.name: Broken Compass
items.description: ...others know the path is their destination.

items.name: Purple Worm Plate
items.description: I hacked my way out and took this as my prize.

items.name: Memory of Protection
items.description: No matter how dark things get, I will always protect the light at all costs.

items.effect: Incarnation's Class - Monk's Tenacity, Incarnation's Class - Barbarian's Resilience and Incarnation's Class - Sorcerer's Flames

items.description: Evil has no place in this world.

items.description: Forged in primordial fire and imbued with arcane secrets of the giants.

items.name: Gauntlets of Flaming Fury
items.description: My rage is a roaring flame, but these turn it into a blaze.

items.name: Belt of Stone Giant Strength
items.description: I may not be a giant in size, but this gets me close in strength.

items.name: A Piece of Home
items.description: The Mournland is a scar on Eberron...

items.name: Bag of Sand
items.description: ...but it's the first memory I have. It will always be my home.

items.name: Khyber Dragonshards
items.description: Perhaps with these, I can not only stop time but begin to reverse it.

items.name: Memory of Ages
items.description: No matter how dark things get, I can reverse them. But not my memories...

items.name: A Blade in the Dark
items.description: I used to fear what lurked in the dark...

items.name: Dagger of Blindsight
items.description: ...before the dark became as clear as day to me.

items.name: Ring of Spell Storing
items.description: An old friend gave me this. I will never forget them. I won't. Not again.

items.name: Rod of Alertness

data.backstory: Halsin, the esteemed Archdruid of the Emerald Grove, is a wise and powerful elf dedicated to the protection and preservation of nature. After being captured by goblins allied with the Absolute, he escaped and now fights to protect his grove and its inhabitants from this encroaching evil. He channels his deep connection to the natural world to aid his allies in their quests.
