abilities.name: Call To Action
abilities.desc:
In non-boss areas, every time the area quest progresses there is a chance that you will just immediately complete the quest and move on to the next area. The maximum chance is 20% if the quest is one away from being completed but is greatly reduced based on the number of quest items left to collect or enemies left to defeat.  
>   
> `$halsin_guaranteed_instant_complete`.

description.desc: In non-boss areas, every time the area quest progresses there is a chance that you will just immediately complete the quest and move on to the next area. The maximum chance is $(amount)% if the quest is one away from being completed but is greatly reduced based on the number of quest items left to collect or enemies left to defeat.^^$halsin_guaranteed_instant_complete^^Current Chance: $halsin_chance_to_instant_complete%

abilities.name: Vow of Harmony
abilities.desc:
Halsin provides benefits based on the number of Harmony stacks he has.  
> 3+ Harmony stacks: Nurturing: The effect of Nature's Revival is increased by 20% for each Harmony stack he has, stacking additively.  
> 5+ Harmony stacks: Hurrying: The effect of Call To Action is increased by 50%.  
> 7+ Harmony stacks: Recharging: When a Champion uses an Ultimate Attack, it recharges with 10% of the cooldown already done.  
> 9+ Harmony stacks: Growing: Increases the base value of Archdruid of Emerald Grove by 400%.

data.backstory: Eric is the Cavalier of the group of friends trapped in the magical world of Dungeons & Dragons. Known for his sarcasm and frequent cowardice, he's often the butt of jokes. Yet, when danger strikes, Eric's bravery emerges, and he uses his magical shield to protect his friends. Despite his complaints and fears, his loyalty and courage make him an essential part of the group's quest to find their way home.
data.name: Eric

base.name: Forceful Bash
base.description: Eric knocks back the closest enemy with a hit from his shield.
base.long_description: Eric hits the closest enemy with his shield, dealing one hit and knocking them back a short distance.

ult.name: Protective Field
ult.description: A field from Eric's shield knocks back enemies and protects the Champions for 10 seconds.
ult.long_description: Eric's shield projects a powerful force field, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all monsters while protecting the Champions from all damage for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Cavalier's Code
abilities.desc: Eric increases the effect of his Trait specialization choice and the party's Gold Find by 20% for each enemy that has spawned in the current area, stacking multiplicatively up to 100 enemies. Boss enemies count as 25 enemies for this ability.

raw.tip_text: Eric's first specialization choice buffs different areas of the formation, and his Cavalier's Code increases these buffs and gold find as enemies spawn.

data.backstory: By wood, river, cavern, and vale, nomads of the Shaar spread the tale of Kalix the Exile. Gifted in combat from a young age, this thri-kreen warrior amassed a collection of trophies, garnering acclaim from the others of his tribe--the Krakk't. However, the hunter was never satisfied. He dreamed of quarry none would dare. At the Hill of Memories, during the yearly gathering, Kalix attacked the emissaries of the other tribes. None could deny his prowess. For this act, he was banished and forced to wander the world, searching for purpose. Now Kalix offers his services to all who promise a worthy hunt, and woe unto any foe he marks as his prey.
data.name: Kalix

base.long_description: Kalix throws a Chatkcha at the closest enemy, dealing 1 hit.

He increases the effect of Mindlink by 100% for each Ally stack, stacking multiplicatively. Standard species are Aasimar, Dragonborn, Dwarf, Elf, Gnome, Goliath, Halfling, Human, Orc, Tiefling, Half-Orc, and Half-Elf.

The effect of Mindlink is increased by 100% each time this triggers, stacking multiplicatively up to 25 times and resetting when changing areas.

The effect of Mindlink is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% each time this triggers, stacking multiplicatively up to $max_stacks times and losing $(stack_percentage_lost_on_area_change___2)% of stacks when changing areas.

Enemies that attempt to choose Kalix as a target do not, and instead choose to attack another Champion, assuming another valid target exists. The effect of Mindlink is increased by $(not_buffed amount)% each time this triggers, stacking multiplicatively up to $max_stacks times and resetting when changing areas.

items.name: Rough Hewn Chatkcha
items.description: Suitable for practice, not for a true challenge.

items.name: Pitchstone Chatkcha
items.description: Obsidian of low quality is acceptable for a hunt of the same.

items.name: Hamaad Chatkcha
items.description: A Calishite fool once hunted me for revenge. I made this from her steel.

items.name: Ka'eth'rek
items.description: This word means Blade Eye. It is a reminder to always look sharp.

items.name: Paper Flower
items.description: Childish ephemera, but this shape is pleasing to me.

items.name: Alluring Bloom
items.description: I found this on the first day of my exile. It sings so sweetly in my mind.

items.name: Ancient Symbol
items.description: The mark of the Celestial Lotus. I will know its words. I will sing its song.

items.name: Lyric of the Eternal Lotus
items.description: I am its keeper. I am worthy. It will find another when I am gone.

items.name: Drab Mineral
items.description: There is no power here, but that too is worth knowing.

items.name: Worked Quartz
items.description: Simple crystal stimulates curiosity. This is useful for new journeys.

items.name: Precious Gemstones
items.description: Ruby for skill, fortune, vengeance. Sapphire for the mind, magic, and mourning.

items.name: Psionic Foci
items.description: Amethyst for logic. Rainbow obsidian for power. For intention. For the kill.

items.name: Empty Flask
items.description: It is an insult to be given this. It means leave and never return.

items.name: Filled Canteen
items.description: Water is life. All who wander the Shaar know this.

items.name: Gourmet Rations
items.description: The flesh of the dire horse is a delicacy among my kind. You must try it. Now.

items.name: Nomad's Pride
items.description: I made this. I charted the Shaar. Every shadow, every step. I know this land.

items.name: Old Prey
items.description: I do not remember this kill. Perhaps another will refresh my memory.

items.name: Fresh Quarry
items.description: Do not mindlink with me until I've had my morning hunt.

items.name: Grim Trophies
items.description: They thought they were safe. There is no such thing.

items.name: Exotic Remnants
items.description: They were beautiful to behold. Magnificent. I brought them a suitable end.

items.name: Crude Stone Gythka
items.description: The young train with these. My first weapon, for my first hunt.

items.name: Pitchstone Gythka
items.description: To hold the gythka is an honor. To learn it, a promise. To master it, a life.

items.name: Solbar Gythka
items.description: To hunt a sultan of Calimshan, this was my payment, and his demise.

items.name: Drak'en'raa
items.description: This word means Pathless. It hurt me once. Now it is mine to wield.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: The clutch is all. My first lesson. I have not forgotten.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Are you predator, or prey? Join me. Learn. The hunt welcomes all.

normal.name: Psionic Talent
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Thri-kreen Telepathy ability by 80%.
normal.desc: I see into your mind. I sense your weakness. I know your strength.

normal.name: Expanded Awareness
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Mindlink ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I need not speak your tongue to know your ways.

normal.name: Mental Discipline
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Mindlink ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Thoughts are like blades. They can be sharpened.

normal.name: Eclectic Collective
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Unorthodox Alliance ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Prove to me your prowess, and I shall call you kin.

normal.name: Hidden Danger
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Chameleon Carapace ability by 20%.
normal.desc: To become unseen is to become their undoing.

normal.name: Last Surprise
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's Chameleon Carapace ability by 40%.
normal.desc: They never see it coming.

normal.name: Common Quarry
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's The Deadliest Prey ability by 20%.
normal.desc: They are all prey. I permit them to prove me wrong.

normal.name: Hunt the Civilized
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Kalix's The Deadliest Prey ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I have tested them many times. All have failed.

normal.name: Hunt the Divine
normal.effect: Add Celestial as a favored foe for Kalix.
normal.desc: They think themselves above us all. I will bring them low.
effects: Add Celestial as a favored foe for Kalix.

normal.name: Hunt the Bound
normal.effect: Add Construct as a favored foe for Kalix.
normal.desc: I will break them into pieces. I will scatter their remains.
effects: Add Construct as a favored foe for Kalix.

normal.name: Hunt the Amorphous
normal.effect: Add Ooze as a favored foe for Kalix.
normal.desc: A lack of anatomy is a false shield. I will destroy them, utterly.
effects: Add Ooze as a favored foe for Kalix.

normal.name: Entertainer
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Kalix by 2.
normal.desc: Hunting is an art. Death, a spectacle. Are you not entertained?

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Female Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion in the formation with a EVIL alignment.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a DEX score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Champion with a CHA score of 11 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Ranged Champions by 150%.

data.backstory: Volothamp "Volo" Geddarm is a flamboyant world traveler, self-proclaimed expert, and author of such works as Volo's Guide to Monsters. Known for his bombastic personality and flair for storytelling, Volo has a knack for turning facts into tall tales. Though he's quick to avoid personal danger, he's fiercely loyal to his friends - just don't expect him to cover the tab.
data.name: Volo

base.name: Volo's Guide to Malicious Mockery
base.description: Volo writes a scathing note, dealing a deep magical cut to the nearest enemy.

ult.name: Volo's Guide to Writing Wrongs
ult.description: Volo causes his buffed allies to deal additional BUD-based damage for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: Volo takes out a book and quill and writes for 15 seconds, causing his buffed allies to deal additional BUD-based damage for the duration.

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to the Sword Coast
abilities.desc: Volo can be used in any Grand Tour of the Sword Coast campaign adventure or variant, even if he would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to the Sword Coast

description.desc: Volo can be used in any Grand Tour of the Sword Coast campaign adventure or variant, even if he would not normally be available to be used due to variant or patron restrictions.

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to Combat
abilities.desc: Volo increases the damage of all Champions in the two columns in front of him by 100%.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to Combat
raw.tip_text: Volo increases the damage of Champions in the two columns in front of him. Place him behind your damage dealers.

description.desc: Volo increases the damage of all Champions in the two columns in front of him by $amount%.

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to Questing
abilities.desc: Volo increases the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat by 10% for each Guide and/or Collection Quest completed, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to Questing
raw.tip_text: Volo gets more effective based on the number of guide and/or collection quests you've completed. Complete more quests to power him up!

description.desc: Volo increases the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat by $amount% for each Guide and/or Collection Quest completed, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to Monsters
abilities.desc: Volo counts each type of enemy encountered in the current adventure. Volo increases the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat by 100% for each enemy type encountered, stacking multiplicatively.

description.pre: Volo counts each type of enemy encountered in the current adventure. Volo increases the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat by $amount% for each enemy type encountered, stacking multiplicatively.

conditions.desc: ^^Encountered Monster Types: $volo_encountered_monster_tags

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to Writing Wrongs
abilities.desc: Unlocks Volo's Guide to Writing Wrongs Ultimate Attack.

description.desc: Unlocks Volo's Guide to Writing Wrongs Ultimate Attack

abilities.name: Volo's Guide to Rapid Retreats
abilities.desc: If a Champion in the column in front of Volo is defeated, the formation immediately retreats to the previous area. Upon returning to the area of their near defeat, the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by 1000% in that area.

description.pre: If a Champion in the column in front of Volo is defeated, the formation immediately retreats to the previous area. Upon returning to the area of their near defeat, the effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by $amount___2% in that area.

conditions.desc: ^^Active Area: $volo_buffed_area

specs.name: Volo's Guide to Spirits and Specters
specs.desc: Volo gains the Hunter role and Undead become his Favored Foe. The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by 100% for each Champion in the formation with the Hunter role, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to Spirits and Specters
raw.specialization_name: Volo's Guide to Spirits and Specters
raw.specialization_description: Volo writes his manuscript on fighting undead while consulting with other Champions hunting their favored foes.

description.desc: Volo gains the Hunter role and Undead become his Favored Foe. The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by $amount% for each Champion in the formation with the Hunter role, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Volo's Guide to Brain-Eating Tadpoles
specs.desc: The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by 100% for each Ceremorphosis stack the formation has, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to Brain-Eating Tadpoles
raw.specialization_description: Volo carefully studies the formation's Ceremorphosis-infected population, enhancing his own abilities.

description.desc: The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by $amount% for each Ceremorphosis stack the formation has, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Volo's Guide to All Things Magical
specs.desc: The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a Magic base attack, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Volo's Guide to All Things Magical
raw.specialization_name: Volo's Guide to All Things Magical
raw.specialization_description: Volo works with his fellow "wizards" and other magically inclined Champions.

description.desc: The effect of Volo's Guide to Combat is increased by $amount% for each Champion in the formation with a Magic base attack, stacking multiplicatively.

items.name: Volo's Crumpled Cap
items.description: Drat. Another one. You would not believe how many of these I go through.

items.name: Volo's Basic Beret
items.description: Not a snug fit, but it will do for some comfort during my daily ruminations.

items.name: Volo's Handsome Headpiece
items.description: Aha! An acceptable adornment. It does lend an air of refinement, doesn't it?

items.name: Volo's Magnificent Millinery
items.description: Finally! A crown fit for my brow. A reflection of my very soul, no doubt!

items.name: Volo's Discarded Dagger
items.description: That dull, old thing? Why, I hardly recognize it. Perhaps it may open letters?

items.name: Volo's Curvaceous Cutter
items.description: An elegant edge, to be sure. One I hope to never find cause to use!

items.name: Volo's Resplendent Rapier
items.description: More for show than anything, but it does help to keep the ruffians at bay.

items.name: Volo's Quintessential Quill
items.description: Scoff if you must, but I dare say I hold in my hand the mightiest of blades!

items.name: Volo's Counterfeit Canvas
items.description: A far cry from the genuine article, but he is a handsome devil, is he not?

items.name: Volo's Perfect Portraiture
items.description: Once stolen, but later returned. There is, perhaps, some honor among thieves.

items.name: Volo's Daring Deed
items.description: Shall I tell you of a remarkable and historic property in Waterdeep?

items.name: Volo's Ersatz Eye
items.description: Take this. A far superior relic than that old jelly you were chained to.

items.name: Volo's Discontinued Draft
items.description: Was this a treatise on goblin poetry, a recipe book, or a sordid romance novel?

items.name: Volo's Waterdeep Enchiridion
items.description: You have in your hands the foremost and most up-to-date guide to the city.

items.name: Volo's Multitudinous Manuals
items.description: No matter your destination, Volothamp Geddarm shall be your humble guide!

items.name: Volo's Guide to Monsters
items.description: Would you believe a particularly artistic hydra created this incredible cover?

items.name: Volo's Rejected Report
items.description: Even the Sage of Shadowdale falls prey to a lack of imagination, it would seem.

items.name: Volo's Guide to All Things Magical
items.description: My editor provided a revision for Candlekeep, but I prefer the original.

items.name: Volo's Illithids Illustrated
items.description: The little blighters burrow into the brain through the ocular cavity! Ghastly...

items.name: Volo's Guide to Spirits and Spectres
items.description: My latest work, made manifest at last! Unlike its subject matter, of course.

items.name: Volo's Tawdry Tools
items.description: I've no interest in sullying my research with implements of inferior quality.

items.name: Volo's Everyday Essentials
items.description: Yes, I do believe these resources shall suffice for my general needs. For now.

items.name: Volo's Incredible Ink
items.description: Ah, the secretion of the elusive rocktopus! A valuable asset, indeed!

items.name: Volo's Pelagic Pigment
items.description: Kraken ink! I shall ensure that every drop furthers the cause of knowledge!

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I am the very model of altruism, my friend! What I do, I do for us all.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: My very presence provides a certain sense of sudden capability!

normal.name: Volo's Constructive Consultation
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Combat ability by 20%.
normal.desc: The trick is to keep hitting them until they can no longer hit you back.

normal.name: Volo's Discerning Details
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Combat ability by 40%.
normal.desc: That one's trousers have a loose thread. A keen observation, yes?

normal.name: Volo's Expanded Expertise
normal.effect: Increases the number of columns buffed by Volo's Guide to Combat by +1.
normal.desc: I've had an epiphany! If I raise my voice, more willing ears might hear me!
effects: Increases the number of columns buffed by Volo's Guide to Combat by +1.

normal.name: Volo's Helpful Hints
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Questing ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Expand your horizons, bolster your ranks, seek gainful employment...

normal.name: Volo's Inspirational Intimations
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Questing ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Amass a menagerie of helpful creatures, forge the finest arms...

normal.name: Volo's Boundless Brilliance
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Questing ability by 80%.
normal.desc: And, finally, be sure to boast of your achievements for all the world to see!

normal.name: Volo's Grasping Guesswork
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Monsters ability by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: The origins of the fearsome owlbear are a subject of debate among scholars.

normal.name: Volo's Fantastic Findings
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Monsters ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: In truth, owlbears are neither natural nor the result of magic gone awry.

normal.name: Volo's Justified Jaunt
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Rapid Retreats ability by 40%.
normal.desc: I believe a swift, strategic withdrawal is in order. No time to dilly-dally!

normal.name: Volo's Adaptable Approach
normal.effect: Increases the base effect of Volo's specializations by 40%. Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to Brain-Eating Tadpoles ability by 40%. Increases the effect of Volo's Volo's Guide to All Things Magical ability by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: No matter the circumstances, the estimable Volo remains ready!
effects: Increases the base effect of Volo's specializations by $amount%

normal.name: Athlete
normal.effect: Increases the Strength score of Volo by 1.
normal.desc: Behold my physique! Yes, I do maintain a regiment of calisthenics.

normal.name: Illithid Tadpole
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%. Additively increases Ceremorphosis Stacks by 1.
normal.desc: I've simply the worst headache today. Bah! I'm certain it's nothing serious.

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 10% for each Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Male Champions by 125%.
Increases the damage of all Human Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 11 or higher by 100%.

data.backstory: Sheila is the compassionate heart of a group of young friends whisked away to the magical world of Dungeons & Dragons. She reluctantly took on the role of Thief, using her Cloak of Invisibility to move unseen. Sensitive and loyal, Sheila strives to keep her loved ones safe, especially her younger brother, Bobby. Her supportive spirit is a powerful force as they journey together in search of a way back home.
data.name: Sheila

base.name: Unseen Strike
base.description: Sheila turns invisible and deals 1 hit to the closest enemy.

ult.name: Ultimate Invisibility
ult.description: Sheila turns invisible and attacks each enemy.
ult.long_description: Sheila turns invisible for a short while and attacks each enemy.

abilities.name: Kind Heart
abilities.desc: Sheila increases the damage of all Good Champions by 100%.

raw.name: Kind Heart
raw.tip_text: Sheila's inherently good nature supports other good Champions in the formation.

description.desc: Sheila increases the damage of all Good Champions by $amount%.

abilities.name: Cloak of Invisibility
abilities.desc: Every time Sheila attacks, the enemies become less coordinated, opening them up to more critical hits. For each attack, increase the Critical Hit Chance of all Champions by 2%, and increase their Critical Hit Damage by 10%, stacking additively up to 10 times and resetting every time you change areas.

description.desc: Every time Sheila attacks, the enemies become less coordinated, opening them up to more critical hits. For each attack, increase the Critical Hit Chance of all Champions by $(not_buffed amount)%, and increase their Critical Hit Damage by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking additively up to $max_stacks times and resetting every time you change areas.

abilities.name: Potion Reagent Scavenger
abilities.desc: Sheila can help scavenge up to 2500 additional Potion Reagents when killing bosses. While this cap is not reached, Sheila has a 10% chance of scavenging 5 Potion Reagents each time a boss is defeated. The cap increases by 100 every day.

raw.name: Potion Reagent Scavenger
raw.tip_text: Sheila has a chance to uncover Potion Reagents with each defeated boss, with a cap that increases every day.

description.desc: Sheila can help scavenge up to $(current_scavenge_cap sheila_potion_reagent_scavenger floor) additional Potion Reagents when killing bosses. While this cap is not reached, Sheila has a $amount% chance of scavenging $amount_per_drop Potion Reagents each time a boss is defeated. The cap increases by $cap_increase_per_day every day.

conditions.desc: ^^Potion Reagents Scavenged: $(stat_value sheila_reagents_collected 0 none) ($(stat_value sheila_reagents_collected_this_adventure 1 none) this adventure)

specs.name: Meekly Meeting
specs.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by 100% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Meekly Meeting
raw.specialization_description: Sheila teams up with a bunch of underestimated heroes.

description.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by $amount% for each Champion in the formation with a total ability score of 78 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Youthful Allies
specs.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by 100% for each Champion in the formation with an age of 20 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Youthful Allies
raw.specialization_description: Sheila's youthful friends are a force to be reckoned with.

description.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by $amount% for each Champion in the formation with an age of 20 or less, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: A Rosy Outlook
specs.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by 100% for each Female or Non-Binary Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: A Rosy Outlook
raw.specialization_description: Sheila's allies prove there's power in solidarity.

description.desc: Sheila increases the damage bonus of Kind Heart by $amount% for each Female or Non-Binary Champion in the formation, stacking multiplicatively.

specs.name: Frightening Strike
specs.desc: Sheila's base and ultimate attacks frighten her targets. Frightened enemies take 100% more damage from critical hits, stacking multiplicatively up to 8 times per enemy.

raw.name: Frightening Strike
raw.specialization_description: Sheila's attacks frighten her targets, leaving them vulnerable to critical attacks.

description.desc: Sheila's base and ultimate attacks frighten her targets. Frightened enemies take $(not_buffed amount)% more damage from critical hits, stacking multiplicatively up to 8 times per enemy.

specs.name: Enraging Strike
specs.desc: Sheila's base and ultimate attacks enrage her targets. The damage enraged enemies take increases by 15% every 2 seconds, stacking multiplicatively up to 30 times. The stacks reset when the enemy takes out their anger by attacking a Champion.

raw.name: Enraging Strike
raw.specialization_description: Sheila's attacks anger her opponents, making them take additional damage until they strike back.

description.desc: Sheila's base and ultimate attacks enrage her targets. The damage enraged enemies take increases by 15% every 2 seconds, stacking multiplicatively up to 30 times. The stacks reset when the enemy takes out their anger by attacking a Champion.

specs.name: Confusing Strike
specs.desc: Sheila gains the Control role. Sheila's base and ultimate attacks confuse her targets for 3 seconds. Confused enemies are stunned, take 1000% additional damage, and face the other direction.

raw.name: Confusing Strike
raw.specialization_description: Sheila's attacks confuse her foes, halting their advance for a few seconds and causing them to take additional damage.

description.desc: Sheila gains the Control role. Sheila's base and ultimate attacks confuse her targets for 3 seconds. Confused enemies are stunned, take $amount% additional damage, and face the other direction.

items.name: Oversized Dress
items.description: Maybe I'll grow into it?

items.name: Fitted Flared Dress
items.description: Perfect for a day at the amusement park!

items.name: Pretty Purple Dress
items.description: Dungeon Master did a great job picking this out for me.

items.name: Garb of the Benevolent Thief
items.description: Now I'm ready for anything this world can throw at me.

items.name: Runaway Present
items.description: Hey, they're getting away! Better hurry, Bobby!

items.name: Happy Hoppers
items.description: Eric says he found these in the jungle. They're kind of cute!

items.name: Mystery Gifts
items.description: Bobby! You forgot to open Hank and Uni's presents!

items.name: A Friendly Surprise
items.description: Thanks, guys. I haven't seen Bobby that happy in a long time.

items.name: Patchy Rags
items.description: Oh no, not another tear!

items.name: Mended Mantle
items.description: I'll be more careful with this one.

items.name: Cloak of Invisibility
items.description: When I put on the hood, I vanish! Watch!

items.name: Cloak of Perfect Concealment
items.description: I'll be like a ghost. Venger will never find me now.

items.name: Poorly Made Boots
items.description: These old things are ready to fall apart.

items.name: Just Right Boots
items.description: That's much better! No more tripping!

items.name: Adventuring Boots
items.description: These boots were made for adventuring, and that's just what I'll do!

items.name: Boots of Silent Passage
items.description: I'll be as quiet as a mouse, and ten times more dangerous.

items.name: Sad Little Sash
items.description: It lost its color weeks ago.

items.name: Functional Sash
items.description: As long as it works, I won't complain.

items.name: Bright Belt
items.description: Who knew green and purple could go so well together?

items.name: Waistguard of Grace
items.description: I feel so light with this on, like I could even dance on the clouds!

items.name: Danger Pin
items.description: Ouch! It keeps poking me!

items.name: Safety Pin
items.description: One of these can help keep anything in place.

items.name: Stylish Clasp
items.description: This keeps my cloak from falling off no matter what dangers we face.

items.name: Clasp of Protection
items.description: The less I have to worry about myself, the more I can focus on Bobby.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: I have to help my little brother. That's what big sisters do.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: Come on, everyone! We can't give up now! What would Dungeon Master say?

normal.name: Heart of Copper
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Kind Heart ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Any friend of Bobby is a friend of mine.

normal.name: Heart of Silver
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Kind Heart ability by 40%.
normal.desc: We have to help those villagers. They can't defend themselves!

normal.name: Heart of Gold
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Kind Heart ability by 80%.
normal.desc: Well, I lost us a chance to get home, but gained a friend!

normal.name: Unseen Advantage
normal.effect: Increases the Critical Hit chance bonus of Sheila's Invisible Cloak ability by 40%.
normal.desc: They can't dodge so easily with their boot laces tied together!
effects: Increases the Critical Hit chance bonus of Sheila's Invisible Cloak ability by $amount%

normal.name: Unseen Danger
normal.effect: Increases the Critical Hit damage bonus of Sheila's Invisible Cloak ability by 40%.
normal.desc: It would be a shame if their armor fell off right as they charged, huh?
effects: Increases the Critical Hit damage bonus of Sheila's Invisible Cloak ability by $amount%

normal.name: Making Friends
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Meekly Meeting, Youthful Allies and A Rosy Outlook by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: We'll need all the help we can get if we want to make it back home.

normal.name: Better Friends
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Meekly Meeting, Youthful Allies and A Rosy Outlook by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: With friends like mine, I know we'll make it through anything!

normal.name: Mischief Maker
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Frightening Strike, Enraging Strike and Confusing Strike by 20%.
normal.desc: You can do lots of tricky things when no one can see you!

normal.name: Sneaky Saboteur
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Sheila's Frightening Strike, Enraging Strike and Confusing Strike by 40%.
normal.desc: Venger's minions won't even know what hit them.

normal.name: Actor
normal.effect: Increases the Charisma score of Sheila by 1.
normal.desc: I'm going to join the drama club at school when we get home!

normal.name: Scholar
normal.effect: Increases the Intelligence score of Sheila by 2.
normal.desc: If this world is testing us, I'll have to study extra hard to pass.

data.backstory: Grimm's immense strength and steadfast loyalty make him the perfect partner for Beadle's clever schemes. A giant in both stature and courage, Grimm is as at home smashing through foes as he is keeping the Giant's Bane Tavern running smoothly.
data.name: Grimm

base.name: Giant's Bane
base.description: Grimm cleaves through the nearest enemies with his two enormous greatswords.

ult.name: One-on-One
ult.description: Grimm attacks the enemy with the most health and knocks back other enemies in a small area.
ult.long_description: Grimm attacks the enemy with the most health and knocks back other enemies in a small area. In non boss areas, a Frost Giant spawns in revenge.

abilities.name: Inseparable
abilities.desc: Beadle & Grimm are so inseparable that if either one qualifies for an adventure restriction based on their tags, ages, ability scores, etc., then both can be used.

description.desc: Beadle & Grimm are so inseparable that if either one qualifies for an adventure restriction based on their tags, ages, ability scores, etc., then both can be used.

abilities.name: Brothers In Armors
abilities.desc: If Beadle is in the formation, all of Grimm's equipment item levels are increased by Beadle's base average item level.

description.desc: If Beadle is in the formation, all of Grimm's equipment item levels are increased by Beadle's base average item level.

abilities.name: Get Buff
abilities.desc: Each time Grimm attacks an enemy his base attack cooldown is reduced by 0.2 seconds and he deals 20% more damage, stacking up to 25 times. Damage bonus stacks multiplicatively, while the base attack cooldown stacks additively. Stacks reset upon changing areas, unless Moving Right Along is triggered.

raw.name: Get Buff
raw.tip_text: Each time Grimm strikes, his attacks quicken and his damage intensifies, lasting until he moves to a new area.

description.desc: Each time Grimm attacks an enemy his base attack cooldown is reduced by 0.2 seconds and he deals $amount% more damage, stacking up to 25 times. Damage bonus stacks multiplicatively, while the base attack cooldown stacks additively. Stacks reset upon changing areas, unless Moving Right Along is triggered.

abilities.name: Break Their Will
abilities.desc: Each time Grimm attacks an enemy and breaks at least one armor or segmented health, he breaks 1 more on all subsequent attacks, stacking additively up to 5 times. Stacks reset upon changing areas, unless Moving Right Along is triggered.

raw.name: Break Their Will
raw.tip_text: Grimm's attacks progressively break through more armor or segmented health. His bonuses last until changing areas, or may persist longer if the party advances quickly.

description.desc: Each time Grimm attacks an enemy and breaks at least one armor or segmented health, he breaks 1 more on all subsequent attacks, stacking additively up to 5 times. Stacks reset upon changing areas, unless Moving Right Along is triggered.

abilities.name: One-on-One
abilities.desc: Grimm leaps into the fray, brutally slashing the enemy with the most health and knocking back all other enemies in a small area. Afterwards, if you're not in a boss area, a Frost Giant spawns in revenge.

description.desc: Grimm leaps into the fray, brutally slashing the enemy with the most health and knocking back all other enemies in a small area. Afterwards, if you're not in a boss area, a Frost Giant spawns in revenge.

abilities.name: Moving Right Along
abilities.desc: If the party completes a new area within 15 seconds of entering it, Grimm's Get Buff and Break Their Will stacks do not reset upon entering the next area.

description.desc: If the party completes a new area within 15 seconds of entering it, Grimm's Get Buff and Break Their Will stacks do not reset upon entering the next area.

abilities.name: Barbarian's Protection
abilities.desc: Grimm increases the health of all other Champions by 25% of his max health and any healing effect on those Champions is increased by 25%.

description.desc: Grimm increases the health of all other Champions by 25% of his max health and any healing effect on those Champions is increased by 25%.

abilities.name: Ultimate Tag Team
abilities.desc: When Beadle uses his ultimate ability in the same party as Grimm, Grimm's ultimate ability goes on cooldown and he gains one Tag Team stack. For each Tag Team stack Grimm has, his ultimate cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, and his next ultimate attack deals 200% more damage, stacking multiplicatively. Tag Team stacks cap at 10 and reset when Grimm uses his ultimate ability.

description.desc: When Beadle uses his ultimate ability in the same party as Grimm, Grimm's ultimate ability goes on cooldown and he gains one Tag Team stack. For each Tag Team stack Grimm has, his ultimate cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, and his next ultimate attack deals $amount% more damage, stacking multiplicatively. Tag Team stacks cap at 10 and reset when Grimm uses his ultimate ability.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: For each Tag Team stack Grimm has, his ultimate cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, and his next ultimate attack deals $amount% more damage, stacking multiplicatively

specs.name: Giant Hunter
specs.desc: Grimm gains the Hunter role, and Giants become his Favored Foe. Grimm deals 10000% more damage against his Favored Foe, and all boss enemies also count as Giants for the purposes of all abilities that care about such things.

raw.name: Giant Hunter
raw.specialization_description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

description.desc: Grimm gains the Hunter role, and Giants become his Favored Foe. Grimm deals $amount% more damage against his Favored Foe, and all boss enemies also count as Giants for the purposes of all abilities that care about such things.

specs.name: Giant Taunter
specs.desc: Grimm taunts all enemies he attacks, causing them to switch targets and attack him. For each enemy that has attacked him in the current area, his damage is increased by 20%, stacking multiplicatively up to 100 times.

raw.name: Giant Taunter
raw.specialization_description: The only problem with taunting giants is that they sometimes hear you.

description.desc: Grimm taunts all enemies he attacks, causing them to switch targets and attack him. For each enemy that has attacked him in the current area, his damage is increased by $(not_buffed amount)%, stacking multiplicatively up to 100 times.

specs.name: Giant Profits
specs.desc: Grimm gains the Gold Find role. Enemies that Grimm defeats drop 50% additional gold for each enemy he has defeated in the current area, stacking multiplicatively and capping at 20.

raw.name: Giant Profits
raw.specialization_description: The Giant's Bane Tavern wasn't built on good intentions — it was built on giant treasure.

description.desc: Grimm gains the Gold Find role. Enemies that Grimm defeats drop $(not_buffed amount)% additional gold for each enemy he has defeated in the current area, stacking multiplicatively and capping at 20.

items.name: Lost and Found Sword
items.description: If it's sharp, then IT'LL DO! ~Grimm

items.name: Silvered Sword
items.description: What do you mean it might not be silver!? ~Grimm

items.name: Grimm's Blade
items.description: Every blade is unique. This one is my blade. No touching. ~Grimm

items.name: Sword of Redemption
items.description: I'll make up for my past mistakes. ~Grimm

items.name: Proof of a Duel
items.description: There he was, steel brandished! His terrible foe towered over him! ~Beadle

items.name: Taste of Victory
items.description: The frost giant fell, and Grimm the Giant Slayer's legend had been born! ~Beadle

items.name: Crude Mockery
items.description: But the giants would soon have their revenge! They left a dire warning. ~Beadle

items.name: Memory of Trask
items.description: They will be remembered, and I will never forget. ~Grimm

items.name: Spare Helmet

items.name: Frost Giant Helmet

items.description: This... is a reminder of my hubris. My biggest mistake. ~Grimm

items.name: Makeshift Leather Armor

items.name: Mammoth Hide Armor

items.name: White Wyrm Scale Mail
items.description: Not even old Iceclaws could stop me now! ~Grimm

items.name: Blizzard Ruined Furs
items.description: I ended up doing more damage to the cloak than the bugbear! ~Grimm

items.name: Icky Furs
items.description: Do you remember the gelatinous cube you RAN into!? ~Grimm

items.name: Frozen North Furs
items.description: Leave your cloaks at the door, friends. You're in the Giant's Bane Tavern, now. ~Beadle

items.name: Elegant Snow Cloak
items.description: Now THIS is a fashion statement! ~Grimm

items.name: Dueling Boots
items.description: Beadle uses them when he wants to perform a dueling scene. ~Grimm

items.name: Trash Boots
items.description: Grimm uses them when he needs to take out the trash. ~Beadle

items.name: Mithral Toed Boots
items.description: It's all fun and games till Grimm tosses his cleaver across the room. ~Beadle

items.name: Boots of the Giant Slayer
items.description: They make me look awesome, right?! Can I borrow them? ~Beadle

normal.desc: Beadle! Need you over here! No, it can't wait! ~Grimm

normal.name: Beadle's Partner in Crime

data.backstory: Ever since she was a hatchling in her kingdom under the sea, Vlithryn has dreamt of helping the less fortunate land dwellers and spreading the good word of her God, Persana. She’s always willing to lend a helping hand, or a healing word, to those who need it - for the right price of course. She is usually cool, calm, and collected, but don’t get on her bad side, or her banshee scream and lighting attacks will leave you begging for a revivify that you can’t afford.
data.name: Vlithryn

base.name: Blessed Mace
base.description: Vlithryn attacks a random enemy, dealing 1 hit and knocking them back a short distance.

base.name: Blessed Mace
base.description: Vlithryn attacks a random enemy, dealing 1 hit and knocking them back a short distance.

base.name: Blessed Mace
base.description: Vlithryn attacks a random enemy, dealing bud-based damage and knocking them back a short distance.

ult.name: Call Lightning
ult.description: Vlithryn zaps the enemy with the most Health, empowering her attacks for 15 seconds.
ult.long_description: Vlithryn zaps the enemy with the most remaining Health, and then empowers her attack with lightning for 15 seconds, increasing her attack speed and adding BUD-based damage.

abilities.name: Justice of the Depths
abilities.desc: Vlithryn increases the damage of all Champions in the columns in front of her by 400%.

description.desc: Vlithryn increases the damage of all Champions in the columns in front of her by $amount%.

abilities.name: Cleric Clinic
abilities.desc: Every second, Vlithryn heals the 3 most damaged Champions for 20 health. This amount is increased by 25% for each Tanking Champion in the formation.

raw.name: Cleric Clinic
raw.tip_text: Vlithryn increases the damage of Champions in the columns in front of her and heals the most damaged Champion in the formation every second.

description.desc: Every second, Vlithryn heals the $optional_targets most damaged Champions for $amount health. This amount is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each Tanking Champion in the formation.

abilities.name: Call Lightning
abilities.desc: Vlithryn raises her Mace in the air, which is struck by lightning from above. Then the enemy with the most remaining Health is zapped by lightning, dealing ultimate damage. For 15 seconds, her mace is charged with lightning. For the duration, she decreases her base attack cooldown by 3 seconds, and her base attacks deal 3 seconds of bud-based damage with each hit.

description.desc: Vlithryn raises her Mace in the air, which is struck by lightning from above. Then the enemy with the most remaining Health is zapped by lightning, dealing ultimate damage. For 15 seconds, her mace is charged with lightning. For the duration, she decreases her base attack cooldown by 3 seconds, and her base attacks deal 3 seconds of bud-based damage with each hit.

abilities.name: Pantheon of Blessings
abilities.desc: Vlithryn increases the effect of Justice of the Depths by 10% for each Global Tier Blessing you have unlocked, stacking multiplicatively.

raw.name: Pantheon of Blessings
raw.tip_text: Vlithryn's main damage buff is multiplicatively boosted by the number of Global Tier Blessings you have unlocked.

description.desc: Vlithryn increases the effect of Justice of the Depths by $amount% for each Global Tier Blessing you have unlocked, stacking multiplicatively.

abilities.name: Revivify
abilities.desc: When a Champion is defeated, Vlithryn consumes a Revivify charge and screams in frustration, pushing back all enemies a short distance. She then casts Revivify and heals the defeated Champion, bringing them back to life at full health. Vlithryn's Revivify charges are equal to the number of Awful Ones in the formation and reset upon changing areas. The effect of Justice of the Depths is increased by 400% for each Revivify charge used in the current area, stacking multiplicatively.

description.desc: When a Champion is defeated, Vlithryn consumes a Revivify charge and screams in frustration, pushing back all enemies a short distance. She then casts Revivify and heals the defeated Champion, bringing them back to life at full health. Vlithryn's Revivify charges are equal to the number of Awful Ones in the formation and reset upon changing areas. The effect of Justice of the Depths is increased by $amount% for each Revivify charge used in the current area, stacking multiplicatively.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: When a Champion is defeated, Vlithryn consumes a Revivify charge and screams in frustration, pushing back all enemies a short distance. She then casts Revivify and heals the defeated Champion, bringing them back to life at full health.

abilities.name: Divine Intervention
abilities.desc:
Vlithryn gains one Dire Straits stack every time she effectively heals a Champion with Cleric Clinic. When she reaches 30 stacks, Persana appears and blesses her with the following:  
>   
> - Revivify immediately gains an additional charge  
> - Justice of the Depths is increased by 10% for each Dire Straits stack, stacking multiplicatively  
> - The healing amount of Cleric Clinic is increased by 10% for each Dire Straits stack, stacking additively.  
>   
> Dire Straits stacks continue to increase after Persana appears, up to a maximum of 100. Upon changing areas, Vlithryn loses up to 25 Dire Straits stacks, and if her stacks drop below 30, Persana disappears, taking his blessings with him.

description.desc: Vlithryn gains one Dire Straits stack every time she effectively heals a Champion with Cleric Clinic. When she reaches $persana_stack_num stacks, Persana appears and blesses her with the following:^^- Revivify immediately gains an additional charge^- Justice of the Depths is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)% for each Dire Straits stack, stacking multiplicatively^- The healing amount of Cleric Clinic is increased by $(not_buffed amount___3)% for each Dire Straits stack, stacking additively.^^Dire Straits stacks continue to increase after Persana appears, up to a maximum of $max_stacks. Upon changing areas, Vlithryn loses up to $stacks_lost_on_area_change Dire Straits stacks, and if her stacks drop below $persana_stack_num, Persana disappears, taking his blessings with him.

effect_keys.override_key_desc: Vlithryn calls for her deity Persana in areas where she effectively heals 30 times, letting her Revivify an additional time, and increase the potency of her main support bonus and healing amount.

effect_keys.total_title: Total Justice of the Depths Bonus

data.backstory: Hank is the steadfast and courageous leader of the group of friends that has been swept away into the perilous realm of Dungeons & Dragons. As the Ranger, he wields his signature Energy Bow to fend off danger and light the way forward. Though the weight of leadership tests him at every turn, Hank's tactical insight and unwavering resolve keep the party moving forward in their quest to find a way back home.

specs.desc: Whenever an enemy is knocked back, Hank gains a Tactics stack. For each Tactics stack, the Critical Hit Chance of all Champions in the formation is increased by 1%, and the Critical Hit Damage of all Champions in the formation is increased by 10%. Tactics stacks stack additively up to 50 times and reset when changing areas.

Tactics stacks stack additively up to $max_stacks times and reset when changing areas.

Stalwart Encouragement’s effect is increased by 100% for each Dragon defeated in the current area, stacking multiplicatively up to 10 times. In boss areas, non-boss waves always spawn a dragon, and defeated dragons provide 5 stacks.

In boss areas, non-boss waves always spawn a dragon, and defeated dragons provide 5 stacks.

items.description: Come on, everyone! We can do anything if we work together!

items.description: Hey, I remember this! I would play with it for hours.

items.name: Prize Bow
items.description: I won this for Bobby at a carnival game. I hope he likes it.

items.name: Ranger's Bow
items.description: You're wondering where the string is? Don't worry about that.

items.name: Energy Bow
items.description: The arrows it fires can tie up baddies and even make ladders to climb!

items.name: Venger's Talisman
items.description: We might be able to stop Demodragon with this!

items.name: Explosive Trinket
items.description: I have an idea! Get down and cover your eyes!

items.name: Circle of Power
items.description: This better be worth the trouble...

items.name: Heartstone
items.description: I learned an important lesson from my time with the cloud bears.

items.name: Overstarched Coat
items.description: Too... stiff... Can't... move...

items.name: Varsity Jacket
items.description: Go Dragons!

items.name: Ranger's Studded Leather
items.description: Does this make me look heroic? I sure hope so.

items.name: Emerald Vest
items.description: I'll blend into the trees with this on. Venger will never know what hit him.

items.name: Itchy Belt
items.description: I really don't want to put this on.

items.name: Rawhide Belt
items.description: It's not much better, but at least the itching stopped.

items.name: Ranger's Belt
items.description: Tough and reliable, just like me and my friends.

items.name: Belt of Bracing
items.description: My stance has improved ever since I put this on. It helps me aim better.

items.name: Thrifty Sneakers
items.description: My parents got these on sale years ago. They don't really fit now.

items.name: Tennis Shoes
items.description: Now we're talking! I can run for miles with these on!

items.name: Ranger's Boots
items.description: I'm ready to wander the whole world now!

items.name: Wayfarer's Boots
items.description: No matter where I go, these boots will always bring me back home.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Look out! Get behind me!

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: No matter what Venger throws at us, I know we'll make it!

normal.name: Kind Words
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's Stalwart Encouragement ability by 20%.
normal.desc: I believe in you, and I'm right here with you.

normal.name: Stirring Words
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's Stalwart Encouragement ability by 40%.
normal.desc: When the going gets tough, we rely on you. You've got this.

normal.name: Chipping In
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's Every Little Bit Helps ability by 20%.
normal.desc: If we all give a little bit, together it makes a big difference.

normal.name: Helping Hand
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's Every Little Bit Helps ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Hey, you're not alone. Let's do this together, okay?

normal.name: Rookie Leader
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's first set of Specializations by 20%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Don't fight, you guys! We have to work together!

normal.name: Skilled Leader
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Hank's first set of Specializations by 40%. (Prestack)
normal.desc: Great job, gang! Now that's what I call teamwork!
effects: Increases the effect of Hank's first set of Specializations by $(amount)%

normal.name: Training Montage

data.backstory:
Tessalynde is an ambitious young rogue who dreams of leading Faerûn's foremost adventuring party. While the crew she’s gathered isn't the stuff of legend yet, she's confident her guidance can get them there.

[The Fallbacks: Bound for Ruin - Fandom Wiki](https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/The_Fallbacks:_Bound_for_Ruin)

abilities.name: Trap Expert
abilities.desc: There's a 5% chance when an enemy dies that they drop a Trap that Tess immediately spots. During Tess's next attack, rather than attacking, she leaps out and disarms the Trap before it can harm any of her friends. For each Trap disarmed in this way, Lead The Way is increased by 10%, stacking additively. Stacks persist through resets.

description.desc: There's a $chance% chance when an enemy dies that they drop a Trap that Tess immediately spots. During Tess's next attack, rather than attacking, she leaps out and disarms the Trap before it can harm any of her friends. For each Trap disarmed in this way, Lead The Way is increased by $(not_buffed amount___2)%, stacking additively. Stacks persist through resets.

abilities.name: Deadly Dance
abilities.desc: Tess throws one of her teleportation daggers at the enemy with the most health, dealing 1 ultimate hit. She then teleports behind that enemy, and stabs a bunch of times, dealing 1 ultimate hit to all targets within melee range, including the original target. She then returns to her place in the formation.

[The Fallbacks: Bound for Ruin - Fandom Wiki](https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/The_Fallbacks:_Bound_for_Ruin)

data.backstory: A dedicated champion of Tiamat, Windfall has been granted phenomenal power by her master. She is the proprietor of the Red Belvedere, a monument to Tiamat and a remnant of Avernus's original existence as a bucolic paradise designed to tempt mortals. Its edifice was destroyed in the carnage of the Blood War, but Windfall rebuilt the casino and rededicated it to the Dragon Queen as a celebration of her god's greed and vanity. Windfall is ostentatious and charismatic, making small talk with regular patrons and jovially welcoming new faces to the casino. She once plotted to assemble the Rod of Seven Parts to create a gift for her cruel goddess, but has instead joined the Champions at Tiamat's behest.

items.name: Urchin's Knife
items.description: When you grow up on the street, you learn to cut or be cut.

items.name: Occult Dagger
items.description: The Cult of the Dragon took me in. Through them, I found my queen.

items.name: Chromatic Rapier
items.description: I outgrew the cult, and took to Avernus to worship my queen directly.

items.name: Queen's Blade
items.description: She rewarded me with this on the day I opened the Red Belvedere.

items.name: Weathered Windpipe
items.description: I took this from a dying man. Taught myself how to play. It was easy.

items.name: Favored Flute
items.description: A little tune and a wink is all it takes to make most fools do whatever I want.

items.name: Lucky Lute
items.description: It's such a burden to be cursed with this much talent, beauty, and luck.

items.name: Harbinger's Harp
items.description: The dirge it plays is the last sound you'll ever hear. Shall I?

items.name: Corrupting Token
items.description: The more you have, the more you want.

items.name: Talon Coin
items.description: Win a thousand of these and I'll let you into the VIP area. Maybe.

items.name: Tome of Leadership & Influence
items.description: A gift from one of my many admirers. I fed them to a dragon.

items.name: The Final Piece
items.description: Tasked with a crusade to save the multiverse. What a pain.

items.name: Fizzy Swill
items.description: Gross. Remind me to have someone flay the bartender.

items.name: Salubra Slinger
items.description: Enough of this and your mouth goes numb. Aw, can't talk? Good.

items.name: Blazing Bloody Jack
items.description: Coagulated bottled bliss. Spicy and sweet. Just like me, right? Don't answer.

items.name: Joker's Sky
items.description: My favorite. This stuff gives you wings. No, literally. Drink up.

items.name: Cursed Doll
items.description: We sell these in our gift shop, for anyone stupid enough to buy.

items.name: Tiawut Plush
items.description: Tell a soul I sleep with this and no one will ever hear from you again.

items.name: Mark of Pride
items.description: If you want to be let into Dragon's Pride, you'll need to impress me.

items.name: Tiamat Idol
items.description: All that I do is for your glory, my queen.

items.name: Street Cloak
items.description: It's all I had to keep me warm, until I learned how to get what I want.

items.name: Performer's Cape
items.description: Song and dance are for children. Performance is an art. Watch and learn.

items.name: Enchanted Robe
items.description: Jealous? Of course you are. I look exactly the way you wish you could.

items.name: Scintillating Tailcoat
items.description: Tailored just for me, and blessed by my queen. Stunning, I know.

normal.name: Tavern Brawler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Windfall by 30%.
normal.desc: Start a fight in my bar, and I'll be the one who finishes it.

normal.name: Grappler
normal.effect: Increases the damage of Windfall by 60%.
normal.desc: You have no idea what these hands can do. Try me.

normal.name: Selflessness
normal.effect: All Champions damage +10%.
normal.desc: Pffft hahaha! Selfless!? ME!? Gods, that's hilarious. You're funny.

normal.name: Inspiring Leader
normal.effect: All Champions damage +25%.
normal.desc: We all serve a greater purpose. I know mine. Now, do as I say.

normal.name: Hustler
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Long Game ability by 20%.
normal.desc: Hey! Welcome to the Red Belvedere! We have SO much to show you!

normal.name: Viper
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Long Game ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Oh sweetie, you thought I was your friend? Aww, that is so sad.

normal.name: Ante Up
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Gambler ability by 20%.
normal.desc: If you're going to play the game, you have to learn to play it right.
effects: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Gambler ability by $amount%

normal.name: Poker Face
normal.effect: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Gambler ability by 40%.
normal.desc: Know when to hold, when to fold, when to walk away, and when to run.
effects: Increases the effect of Windfall's The Gambler ability by $amount%

effects: Increases the damage of all Champions by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 20% for each Female Champion in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Tiefling Champions by 150%.
Increases the damage of all Champions with a CHA score of 11 or higher by 100%.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 30% for each Champion with a CON score of 13 or higher in the formation.
Increases the damage of all Champions by 40% for each Champion in the formation with a EVIL alignment.
